column5: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346042#1346043#TD4037E.TXT.r_4132# byang chub chen por yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir rgya che ba dang  'dod pa'i bsod nams dang  bdag nyid dub par byed pa'i mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i phyir kha na ma tho ba med  pa dang  rab tu dga' ba'i gnas dang mthun pa dang  ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang bslab pa 'bul bar mi byed pa'i phyir rtag tu byed pa dang  rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang  phas kyi rgol ba dang  nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis mi non cing mi 'phrogs     // /

column3: byang chub sems  dpa' theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa gzungs dang spobs pa'i yon tan thob pa theg pa chen po'i don 'dzin pa dang rab tu ston par nus pa des sam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232578#232586#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2365;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2366# tshul khrims can ni rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang  phas kyi rgol ba dang  nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa zil gyis mi gnon pa'i phyir dang  'phrog par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383834#2383836#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8704;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8705# rgya cher  de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par 'byung ste / /

column7: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216934#216934#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_370;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_371# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni  rkyen rnam pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po nyid du yongs su grub par ston gyi bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa med do // /

column9: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233704#233704#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2521;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2522# tshig lnga po 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas / / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni / /

column7: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234022#234023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2558;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2559# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  gnyi ga'i cha dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa  bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba bstan te / /

column3: 'di  ltar 'jig rten pa las brtsams nas / / +bden par smra bya khro mi bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232745#232763#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2390;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2391;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2392# rnam  par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid las bdun du phye ste / /

column3: slong la chung yang sbyin par bya // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa gzhan dag las sangs rgyas kyi gsung khyad par du 'phags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232764#232771#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2392;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2393# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu la shin tu mngon par yid ches pas bdag nyid kyi las kyis mi mthun pa'i yul mngon du gyur pa na 'khrug pa  skyed par mi byed de de la las mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rgyu'o / /

column3: nyan thos kyi dbang du byas na / / +kye ma 'du byed rtag pa med // / +skye zhing 'jig pa'i  chos can yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232770#232780#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2392;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2394# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu la shin tu mngon par yid ches pas bdag nyid kyi las kyis mi mthun pa'i yul mngon du gyur pa na 'khrug pa  skyed par mi byed de de la las mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rgyu'o / /
column5: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1818679#1818679#TD4039E.TXT.r_404;TD4039E.TXT.r_405# zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gang yin pa dang  rjes su chags pa'i kun tu sbyor bas kun tu chags par byed pa ste / / +zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gang yin pa dang  phyi     // /
column6: 0.028#TD4066E.TXT.r#2107173#2107173#TD4066E.TXT.r_721# lta ba dang  mnyan pa la  sogs pa'i bya ba'i yul du gyur pa la bsam pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de ni bsam pa'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags te / / +de lta bas na nges par bya bar rigs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232781#232789#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2394;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2395;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2396# gnod pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de ni bzod par bya ba'i yul lo // / +'khrug pa mi skyed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid de / / +rgyu dang rkyen 'di gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang po bstan to // /

column3: chos mngon par theg pa chen po'i mdo las zhes bya ba ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i rgyu'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232790#232798#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2395;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2396;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2397# rgyu dang rkyen 'di gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang po bstan to // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos    rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346671#1346674#TD4037E.TXT.r_4204# 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni  gzhan gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du byung na 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste / /

column3: grags pa'i phyir chos mngon par ming btags pa theg pa chen  po'i mdo khyad par can las gsungs kyi gzhan las ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227158#227161#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1703# byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa  rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du 'byung ba na 'di ltar yang dag par slob par byed de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232799#232811#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2397;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2398# 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du byed pa la 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346684#1346685#TD4037E.TXT.r_4204;TD4037E.TXT.r_4205# 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni  gzhan gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du byung na 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste / / +'di ni rang gi las kyi le lan yin te / /

column3: de ni theg pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pa'am / / +chen po rnams kyi theg pa yin pas theg pa chen po ste / / +rgyu dang 'bras bu che ba'i phyir byed pa dang  bgrod par bya ba bsgrub pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232810#232824#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2397;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2398;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2399;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2400# 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du byed pa la 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste / / +'di ni rang gi las kyi le lan yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346684#1346695#TD4037E.TXT.r_4204;TD4037E.TXT.r_4205;TD4037E.TXT.r_4206# 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni  gzhan gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du byung na 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste / / +'di ni rang gi las kyi le lan yin te / /
column6: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227173#227179#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1704;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1705# 'di ni rang gi las kyi le lan yin te / / +des na bdag rang gis byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba nyams su myong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher  de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: mdor bsdu na  byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o // / +rgyas par byan  chen po rnam pa bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232825#232835#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2399;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2400;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2402# des na bdag rang gis  byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong la / / +bdag ni sdug bsngal mi 'dod de / / +mi bzod pa de phyi ma la yang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu'i gnas su 'gyur la / /
column5: 0.014#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346707#1346716#TD4037E.TXT.r_4208;TD4037E.TXT.r_4209;TD4037E.TXT.r_4210# mi bzod pa 'di ni phyi ma la yang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu'i gnas su 'gyur la / / +bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa'i chos de yang dag par blangs te / /

column3: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams dang  pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang  bslab pa rnams dang  gzhi dang rtags la sogs pa ni theg pa chen po'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232836#232843#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2402;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2403# bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par blangs te / / +'dug na ni bdag nyid mi  sdug pa gang yin pa de la bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid sbyor bar byed par nges so zhes bya ba la sogs ba rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: de'i    mdo ni smos pa'i phyir te / / +rkyang pa dang tshig tu sbyar ba'i sgrar snang ba 'dod pa'i don gyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa nyan pa'i rnam par rig pa'i tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232844#232851#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2403;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2404# 'dug na ni bdag nyid mi  sdug pa gang yin pa de la bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid sbyor bar byed par nges so zhes bya ba la sogs ba rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232851#232860#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2403;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2404# 'dug na ni bdag nyid mi  sdug pa gang yin pa de la bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid sbyor bar byed par nges so zhes bya ba la sogs ba rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +lan bya ba'i phyir slar yang spyo pa dang  gshe ba dang  rdeg pa dang  bsdigs pa dang  mtshang 'bru ba'i gnod pa sna tshogs sbyor bar mi byed pa  zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gnyis pa bstan to // /
column6: 0.019#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119934#3119934#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4043# thams cad las gnod  pa thams cad nye bar gnas pa na bdag nyid kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pas mi 'khrug pa dang  lan bya ba'i phyir slar spyo ba dang  gshe ba dang  rdeg pa dang  bsdigs pa dang  ma tshang 'dru ba'i gnod pa dag gis sbyor bar mi byed pa dang  khon gyi bsam pa mi  'dzin pa dang  shad kyis 'chags pa na yongs su nyon mongs par mi byed pa dang  shad kyis 'chags pa la mi sdod pa dang  'jigs pa dang  zang zing gi sems kyis bzod par byed pa ma yin pa dang  phan gdags par bya ba la yal bar mi 'dor ba de ni bzod  pa rnam par dag pa rnam pa bdun yin no // /

column3: gal te de lta yin na byang chub sems dpas de ji ltar bshad de / / +nyan pa'i rnam par rig pa ni des ma bshad do zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232859#232870#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2404;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2405# lan bya ba'i phyir slar yang spyo pa dang  gshe ba dang  rdeg pa dang  bsdigs pa dang  mtshang 'bru ba'i gnod pa sna tshogs sbyor bar mi byed pa  zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gnyis pa bstan to // /

column3: de'i dbang  gis byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya ste / / +lha la sogs pa'i dbang gis rmi lam na bstan bcos dang sngags la sogs pa rnyed pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232871#232878#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2404;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2405;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2406# lan bya ba'i phyir slar yang spyo pa dang  gshe ba dang  rdeg pa dang  bsdigs pa dang  mtshang 'bru ba'i gnod pa sna tshogs sbyor bar mi byed pa  zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gnyis pa bstan to // / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid rnam pa gnyis rab tu rtogs par spyod ba mi dmigs pa dang  gzhan yang bzod pa myur du 'grub pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232879#232886#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2405;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2407;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2408# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid rnam pa gnyis rab tu rtogs par spyod ba mi dmigs pa dang  gzhan yang bzod pa myur du 'grub pa'i phyir / / +lan mi bzod par byed de / /

column3: gzhan du na ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyang sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ji ltar 'gyur / / +re zhig ngag gi rang bzhin ni mdor mi 'thad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232885#232897#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2407;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2408;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2409;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2410# lan mi bzod par byed de / / +gal te lan bya bar gyur na / / +phan yon chen po las  rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1337015#1337015#TD4037E.TXT.r_2924;TD4037E.TXT.r_2925# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phan  yon la mi lta bar gyur na / / +byang chub sems dpa' log pa'i 'bras bu la lta ba las gyur pa'i nyes pa de myur ba myur bar shes rab kyis rtogs nas / /

column3: yi ge re  re ni don rtogs par byed par mi rung ba'i phyir ro // / +rim gyis 'byung ba lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams kyang tshogs par mi rung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232898#232909#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2409;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2410;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2411# gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +'di la gshe bar byed pa dang  gshe bar bya ba dang  khro bar bya ba dang  mtshang 'bru bar byed pa dang  mtshang 'bru bar bya ba dang  rdeg par byed pa dang  brdeg par bya ba 'ga' yang med do // /
column5: 0.002#TD4036E.TXT.r#44395#44404#TD4036E.TXT.r_6772;TD4036E.TXT.r_6773# 'di la gshe bar byed pa dang   gshe bar bya ba dang  khro bar byed pa dang  khro bar bya ba dang  mtshang 'bru bar byed pa dang  mtshang 'bru bar bya ba dang  rdeg par byed pa dang  brdeg par bya ba 'ga' yang med de / /
column6: 0.012#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2549386#2549386#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1684# bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i tshor ba dang mthun pa 'am 'di la bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yod pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa'o // /
column7: 0.012#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1994961#1994961#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2358;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2359# bde ba myong ba dang mthun pa'am / / +'di la bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yod pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa'o // /
column8: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1346887#1346888#TD4037E.TXT.r_4233;TD4037E.TXT.r_4234;TD4037E.TXT.r_4235;TD4037E.TXT.r_4236;TD4037E.TXT.r_4237# 'di ni rkyen la rag las pa dang  'du byed tsam dang  chos tsam du zad de / / +'di la ni gshe bar  byed pa'am / / +khro bar byed pa'am / / +rdeg par byed pa'am / /
column9: 0.015#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2876244#2876244#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1221;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1222# tshul khrims yang dag par bsrungs pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg par mi bsngo bas yid la byed pa'i gyeng ba med pa dang  gang zag dang  tshul khrims dang  bsrung bas gsum du mi rtog pas rnam par rtog pa'i gyeng ba med de / / +de ltar rnam par rtog pa'i gyeng  ba la chags pa med pas na chags pa med pa zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#45060#45061#TD4036E.TXT.r_6864;TD4036E.TXT.r_6865# mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu ni ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa na / / +de la dmigs pa'i sred pas yang 'byung ba'i sred pa'i srid par skyed par byed cing / /
column11: 0.016#TD4091E.TXT.r#741228#741228#TD4091E.TXT.r_8421;TD4091E.TXT.r_8422;TD4091E.TXT.r_8423# dbang bo rnon bo ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o // / +dad pas rjes su 'brang ba na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o // / +de 'di la yod pas na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba can te / /
column12: 0.018#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2040994#2040997#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9115;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9116;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9117# dngos po'i byed pa po'o // / +dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o // /
column13: 0.019#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1595913#1595913#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_192;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_193;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_194# 'di las sdug bsngal kun  'byung bas kun 'byung ba'o // / +'jig pas na 'jig rten no // / +'di la lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas gnas pas na lta ba'i gnas so // /
column14: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#13335#13336#TD4036E.TXT.r_1962;TD4036E.TXT.r_1963;TD4036E.TXT.r_1964# mdo'i sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang  lung du bstan pa'i sde dang  rgyas par snga ma bzhin du chos gang dag thos shing bzung la bstan par byas pa'am // / +kha ton bya ba'am / / +yid kyis brtags pa dang  mthong bas shin TU RTOGS PAR BYED PA DE dag las  rnam grangs du mar 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang  'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  'dod pa la zhen pa dang  'dod pa la 'chums pa dang  'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa la rnam par smad pa dang  rnam par mi snyan par brjod pa dang  rnam par skyon du bgrang ba dang  'dod pa  la 'dod chags dang  'dod pa la 'dun pa spong ba rnam grangs du mar bstod pa dang  bsngags pa dang rab tu bsngags pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'du gnas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa yin te / /
column15: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#776138#776139#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1548;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1549# de dag gang las rgyu yod pas na zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba'o // /
column16: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1319434#1319435#TD4037E.TXT.r_509# 'ba' zhig dang gzhan dang 'brel pa dang  phan pa'i rgyu dang  bde ba'i rgyu dang  rgyur bsdus pa dang  'bras bur bsdus pa dang  tshe 'di pa dang  tshe rabs gzhan pa dang  gtan du ba dang  gtan du ba ma yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.021#TD4019E.TXT.r#2429398#2429398#TD4019E.TXT.r_3032;TD4019E.TXT.r_3033# yang sangs rgyas rnams ni de 'dra ba'i byed ba dang bral mod kyi gang gi mjug thogs su gang skye bar nges pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba don dam par 'dod de de 'dra ba'i byed pa dang yang bral ba'o // / +'di la zhes pa la     // /
column18: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#12513#12513#TD4036E.TXT.r_1819;TD4036E.TXT.r_1820# de la zas ran par yongs su longs spyod par byed cing / / +zas ran pa ma yin pas yongs su longs spyod par mi byed pas na // /
column19: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#33549#33549#TD4036E.TXT.r_5127;TD4036E.TXT.r_5128# yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed cing rab tu 'dzin par byed pa'o // / +de la so sor brtag par 'os pa'i yid la byed pa ni / /
column20: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2050245#2050245#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10444;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10445# de bzhin du 'di la     // / +bdag nyid 'chi bar sems pa'i chos yod pas na 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can no // /
column21: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317972#1317973#TD4037E.TXT.r_270;TD4037E.TXT.r_271;TD4037E.TXT.r_272# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas las / / +rigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o //// / +'di la byang chub sems dpa'i dang po'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dge ba'i smon lam thams cad kyi nang na yang  dag pa'i smon lam gyi dang po yin te / /
column22: 0.022#TD4019E.TXT.r#2467584#2467586#TD4019E.TXT.r_7940;TD4019E.TXT.r_7941# skyon med de / / +dang por rgyun du zhugs par rtogs pa'i tshe de nyid las ma 'phos pas de rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i dbye bar bstan pa'o // /
column23: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1024698#1024698#TD4054E.TXT.r_5582;TD4054E.TXT.r_5583# de dag ni sems kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bsam gtan gyi sgo nas gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsgribs pa'i lung du ma bstan par 'gyur BA'I PHYIR RO // / +de la  sred pas ni ro myang ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs so // /
column24: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#748778#748779#TD4091E.TXT.r_9756# sdug bsngal ril gyis yongs su shes par bya ba dang  kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang  'gog pa la mngon du bya bar mi nus  kyi lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus par mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i thob pa mi skye'o // /
column25: 0.022#TD4039E.TXT.r#1878624#1878624#TD4039E.TXT.r_7435;TD4039E.TXT.r_7436# bdud rngon pa lta bu'i ni med do // / +so so'i skye bo'i sa la ni gnyis ka'i gnas yod par rig par bya'o // /
column26: 0.023#TD4079E.TXT.r#761800#761800#TD4079E.TXT.r_905;TD4079E.TXT.r_906# ci ste gsal na ni gsal ba nyid dang  de'i don dag nyid de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur bas / / +don med bzhin du zhes bya bar yang mi  'gyur bas / /
column27: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2002686#2002686#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3554;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3555# 'ga' yang 'jam por rjes su 'brel ba med PA'I PHYIR RO // / +chags par bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas brnab sems kun du spyod pa med do // /
column28: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2082336#2082336#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15137;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15138# gsum pa na yang med de / / +bde ba'i snying pos bskyod pas de la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i bsam pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro // /
column29: 0.025#TD4018E.TXT.r#3058044#3058045#TD4018E.TXT.r_6993# pa'i sems kyi rgyud gang la yang skye ba dang gnas pa dang  'gog pa la sogs pa kun rtog pa de la yang tha dad pa'i byed pa dang byed pa por 'brel bar mi rung bar thams cad mkhyen pas rigs pa bzhin gyis bsgrub par mdzad pa / /
column30: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136443#1136444#TD4047E.TXT.r_2193;TD4047E.TXT.r_2194;TD4047E.TXT.r_2195# phyin ci log tu byed mi nus zhes bya ba'i don to // / +zlog par mi byed pa ni ma gus pas mi byed pa'o // / +log par mi byed pa ni 'dren par mi byed pa ste / /
column31: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342210#1342210#TD4037E.TXT.r_3582;TD4037E.TXT.r_3584;TD4037E.TXT.r_3585;TD4037E.TXT.r_3586# rgyu des bsad pa'am / / +chad pas bcad pa'am / / +gnod par 'gyur ba'am / / +sad par 'gyur ba zhig yin na nyes pa med do // /
column32: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2610325#2610326#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9245;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9246;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9247;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9248# rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am / / +lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am / / +phyir mi 'ong ba'i  'bras bu'o // /
column33: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#157468#157468#TD4035E.TXT.r_5630;TD4035E.TXT.r_5632;TD4035E.TXT.r_5633# log par yid la byed pa'am / / +yid gnyis za ba'am / / +skur pa 'debs pa'i mi shes pa gang yin pa'o // /
column34: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155760#1155760#TD4047E.TXT.r_5094;TD4047E.TXT.r_5095# rang bzhin gyis brling ba ni rab tu dang ba'i shugs kyis kun du bskyed pa'i phyir brling ba'o // / +rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i    sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir gsal ba'o // /
column35: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#728626#728627#TD4091E.TXT.r_6216;TD4091E.TXT.r_6217;TD4091E.TXT.r_6218# skyes pa nyid yin pa dang  bud med ma yin pa dang  ston pa mngon sum du gyur pa dang  sangs rgyas  la dmigs pa'i sems pas bskal pa brgyar 'phen par byed kyi / / +mang por ni ma yin no // /
column36: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2708366#2708366#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_840# ming gi tshogs dang  tshig  gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag kyang rig pa'i gnas lnga po nang gi rig pa dang  gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang  sgra'i rig pa dang  gso ba'i rig pa dang  'jig rten pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas kyi rig pa dag las brtsams te yongs su brtags pa yin par  rig par bya'o // /
column37: 0.027#TD4002E.TXT.r#2187108#2187108#TD4002E.TXT.r_242;TD4002E.TXT.r_243;TD4002E.TXT.r_244# zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +'di la brdzun du smra ba'i nyes par yang mi 'gyur te / / +snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don sgrub pa dang  gnod pa bsal ba'i bsam pa can yin  pa'i phyir ro // /
column38: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1169088#1169088#TD4047E.TXT.r_7061;TD4047E.TXT.r_7062# sems nye bar brtan par byed PA'I PHYIR RO // / +zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed pa mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i phyir / /
column39: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#60507#60507#TD4036E.TXT.r_8932;TD4036E.TXT.r_8933;TD4036E.TXT.r_8934# phung po de dag la ni gang skye bar 'gyur ba'am / / +rga bar 'gyur ba'am / / +na bar 'gyur ba'am / /
column40: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#153978#153978#TD4035E.TXT.r_5068;TD4035E.TXT.r_5069# 'di lta ste lta ba'i bsam pa dang  mi lta ba'i bsam pa dang  gnod pa'i bsam pa dang   snying rje'i bsam pa dang  kun nas mnar sems kyi bsam pa dang  dang ba'i bsam pa dang  byas pa mi gzo ba'i bsam pa dang  byas pa gzo ba'i bsam pa'o // / +de la lta ba'i bsam pas kyang las mi dge ba tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur te / /
column41: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1374634#1374634#TD4037E.TXT.r_7812;TD4037E.TXT.r_7813# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas tha ma las spyod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// / +de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba'i  sa las brtsams te / /
column42: 0.029#TD4044E.TXT.r#388885#388885#TD4044E.TXT.r_1310;TD4044E.TXT.r_1311# sprul pa'i  sems kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par 'dus byas nas 'grub par 'gyur bas / / +'di la ji ltar 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i brjod pa 'grub pa'o // /
column43: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2929586#2929586#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8587;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8588# yongs su shes pa'i mdo sde las yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o // / +yongs su shes par byed pa ni rnam par byang ba'o zhes bya ba la yongs su shes pa'i mdo sde'i nang nas yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos dang   yongs su shes par byed pa ste rnam pa gnyis su gsungs so // /
column44: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1328707#1328707#TD4037E.TXT.r_1772;TD4037E.TXT.r_1773# de ltar na yongs su smin par bya ba'i gang zag las yongs su smin par rig par bya'o // / +de la yongs su smin pa'i rnam pa'i dbye ba gang zhe na / /

column3: de ltar na bdag ma thob pa'i ngag ni ming la 'jug par mi rung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232910#232917#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2410;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2411;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2412# 'di la gshe bar byed pa dang  gshe bar bya ba dang  khro bar bya ba dang  mtshang 'bru bar byed pa dang  mtshang 'bru bar bya ba dang  rdeg par byed pa dang  brdeg par bya ba 'ga' yang med do // / +'di dag ni yi ge dag gis brjod par bya ba kho nar zad pas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#44407#44413#TD4036E.TXT.r_6773;TD4036E.TXT.r_6774# de dag ni yi ge de dag gis brjod par bya ba kho nar zad pas / / +de dag ni sgra tsam dang  skad tsam du zad pa'i  phyir dang  gzhan yang bdag gang la gnas pa'i lus 'di la / /

column3: yi ge'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i sgra byung ba yang ming la cung zad kyang gsal  bar mi byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232918#232928#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2412;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2413# de dag gi sgra tsam dang skad tsam du zad pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang bdag gang la gnas pa'i lus 'di la 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#44414#44421#TD4036E.TXT.r_6774;TD4036E.TXT.r_6775;TD4036E.TXT.r_6776# de dag ni sgra tsam dang  skad tsam du zad pa'i  phyir dang  gzhan yang bdag gang la gnas pa'i lus 'di la / /

column3: de ltar na ming gi rang bzhin yang mdor mi 'thad do // / +de lta bas na ji skad bstan pa nyid mdor rigs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232926#232936#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2412;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2413# de dag gi sgra tsam dang skad tsam du zad pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang bdag gang la gnas pa'i lus 'di la 'di lta ste / / +sgra'i reg pa dang  lag pa dang bong ba dang  dbyug pa dang  mtshon cha'i reg pa'i reg pa de lta bu dag 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i  lus 'di ni gzugs can rags pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#44430#44439#TD4036E.TXT.r_6776;TD4036E.TXT.r_6777;TD4036E.TXT.r_6778# sgra'i reg pa dang  lag pa dang  bong ba dang  dbyung pa dang  mtshon cha'i reg pa'i reg pa de lta bu dag 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i lus 'di ni / /

column3: chos mngon pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo de las so // / +rnam pa zhes bya ba ni bye brag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232937#232944#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2413;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2415# sgra'i reg pa dang  lag pa dang bong ba dang  dbyug pa dang  mtshon cha'i reg pa'i reg pa de lta bu dag 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i  lus 'di ni gzugs can rags pa / /

column3: de dag nyid phan tshun ma 'dres pas khyad par du 'gyur bas  na khyad par ram / / +nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos rnams las mchog tu gyur pa dang  lhag pa'i phyir khyad par te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232945#232959#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2415;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2417;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2418# 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur ba de lta bu yin te / / +bdag gi lus 'di yang mi rtag pa yin pa la reg pa de dang de dag dang  gnod par byed pa de dag kyang mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang sems can thams cad ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#44448#44456#TD4036E.TXT.r_6778# bdag gi lus 'di yang mi rtag pa yin la reg bde dag dang gnod pa byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir dang gzhan yang sems can thams cad ni skye ba dang  rga ba dang  na ba dang  'chi ba'i chos can yin te de dag ni rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal bar     // /

column3: byang chub chen po sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +bcu zhes bya ba ni grangs te / / +sangs rgyas kyi gsung bgrang bar bya ba khyad par du 'phags pas bstan bcos kyi  lus rnam par 'jog go / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232960#232974#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2418;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2417;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2419;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2420# skye ba dang  rga ba dang  na ba dang      // / +de dag ni rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba yin pas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#44489#44495#TD4036E.TXT.r_6784;TD4036E.TXT.r_6785;TD4036E.TXT.r_6786# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / +yun ring po 'das pa nas / / +gang dag khyed kyi pha ma dang phu nu dang  bu sring dang  mkhan po dang  slob dpon dang  bla ma dang  bla ma lta bur ma gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu ni / /

column3: 'di dag gi gsung ni rnam pa bcus khyad par du 'phags pas / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rnam pa bcus khyad par du 'phags pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232975#232983#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2420# gang dag khyed kyi pha ma dang  phu nu dang  bu sring dang  mkhan po dang  slob dpon dang  bla ma dang  bla ma lta bur gyur ba'i sems  can de lta bu ni 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te / /

column3: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can dang  nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i gti mug gi gnyid  gnyis zad pa dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232984#232993#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2420;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2421# gang dag khyed kyi pha ma dang  phu nu dang  bu sring dang  mkhan po dang  slob dpon dang  bla ma dang  bla ma lta bur gyur ba'i sems  can de lta bu ni 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#44506#44519#TD4036E.TXT.r_6787;TD4036E.TXT.r_6788;TD4036E.TXT.r_6789;TD4036E.TXT.r_6790# 'ga' yang yang dag  par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te / /

column3: shes bya thams cad la shes pa rgyas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas te / / +skyes bu gnyid sad pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232992#233001#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2421;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2422# de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang mdza' bshes kyi phyogs nyid kyang dgra bo'i phyogs yin la dgra bo'i phyogs nyid kyang mdza' bshes kyi phyogs yin pas 'di la mdza' bshes dang  dgra bo'i dngos po  'ga' yang yongs su grub pa med de / /

column3: me tog ku mu ta rgyas pa bzhin no // / +shes bya ni shes par bya'o // / +gnas kyi sgras phye ba'i phyir gnas pa rnams ni 'dus byas rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233002#233014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2421;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2422;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2423;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2424;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2425# de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang mdza' bshes kyi phyogs nyid kyang dgra bo'i phyogs yin la dgra bo'i phyogs nyid kyang mdza' bshes kyi phyogs yin pas 'di la mdza' bshes dang  dgra bo'i dngos po  'ga' yang yongs su grub pa med de / / +mdza' bshes la la dgra bor 'gyur la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#44529#44539#TD4036E.TXT.r_6791;TD4036E.TXT.r_6792;TD4036E.TXT.r_6793# mdza' bshes kyang dus la lar dgra bor 'gyur la / / +dgra bo yang mdza' bshes su 'gyur bas / / +de'i phyir bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang  lta ba mnyam pa nyid dang  phan pa'i bsam pa dang  bde ba'i bsam pa dang  bde ba nye bar sgrub pa dang  bde ba  nye bar bsgrub par mos pa mnyam pa nyid du bya'o snyam du sems te / /

column3: kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur     // / +pa dang  rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos rnams so // / +'dus ma byas rnams ni ma yin te / / +gnas kyi don med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233015#233023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2424;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2425;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2426# de'i phyir bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang  lta ba mnyam pa nyid dang  phan pa'i bsam pa dang  bde ba'i bsam pa  dang ; / +bde ba nye bar sgrub pa dang  bde ba nye bar sgrub par smos pa nyid du bya'o snyam du sems pa ste zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#44538#44538#TD4036E.TXT.r_6793# de'i phyir bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang  lta ba mnyam pa nyid dang  phan pa'i bsam pa dang  bde ba'i bsam pa dang  bde ba nye bar sgrub pa dang  bde ba  nye bar bsgrub par mos pa mnyam pa nyid du bya'o snyam du sems te / /

column3: de dag gi gnas ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste rgyu yin pa dang  rten yin pa'i phyir ci rigs su sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233024#233032#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2425;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2426;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2427# bde ba nye bar sgrub pa dang  bde ba nye bar sgrub par smos pa nyid du bya'o snyam du sems pa ste zhes 'byung ste / / +de lta bu'i bsam gtan gyi bzod pa sgom par byed do // /

column3: shes bya nyid  shes bya'i rten du 'gyur te / / +shes bya nyid kyang rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang mi 'gal lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233033#233040#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2426;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2427;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2428# de lta bu'i bsam gtan gyi bzod pa sgom par byed do // / +khon gyi bsam pa mi mdzad pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa ste / /

column3: shes bya'i gnas nyid khyad par yin pas / / +shes bya'i gnas kyi khyad par te / / +des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags pas shes bya'i gnas kyi khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags  pa'i gsung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233041#233050#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2427;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2429# khon gyi bsam pa mi mdzad pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa ste / / +bzod pa'i phan yon khong du chud  par gyur na 'dod pa gdon mi za bar khon du 'dzin pa med de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233051#233058#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2429# bzod pa'i phan yon khong du chud  par gyur na 'dod pa gdon mi za bar khon du 'dzin pa med de / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gzhan dag gis gnod pa byas pa na phyir gnod pa yang mi byed pa dang  yid 'khrugs par yang mi 'gyur ba dang  dgrar bsam par yang mi 'dzin la / /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhes bya bar thams cad du rnal ma dang sbyar ro // / +shes bya'i mtshan nyid ni shes bya'i ngo bo nyid de de mtshon par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233059#233072#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2429;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2430# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gzhan dag gis gnod pa byas pa na phyir gnod pa yang mi byed pa dang  yid 'khrugs par yang mi 'gyur ba dang  dgrar bsam par yang mi 'dzin la / /

column3: ngo bo nyid gsum zhes bya ba la yongs su grub pa ni dngos po yin pas ngo bo nyid do // / +kun brtags pa  ni ngo bo nyid dang 'dra bas ngo bo nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233073#233083#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2431;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2432# sngar ji  lta ba bzhin du phyis kyang phan 'dogs pa'i phyir brtson par byed ces bstan pa yin no // / +shad kyis chags pa na yongs su nyon mongs par mi byed pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid bzhi pa bstan pa ste / /

column3: 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin pa dang  ngo bo nyid kyi gnas yin pas gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233084#233092#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2431;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2432;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2433# shad kyis chags pa na yongs su nyon mongs par mi byed pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid bzhi pa bstan pa ste / / +dgra bo dag gis shad kyis 'chags su 'ong ba'i tshe bshags pa dang du len cing nyon  mongs pa skyed par mi byed pa ste / /

column3: de la yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni chos thams cad kyi nang du zhugs pas spyi'i mtshan nyid do // / +gzhan gyi dbang ni lus la sogs pa 'khrul pa'i rnam par rig pa  rnams phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir dang gi mtshan nyid do / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233093#233103#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2432;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2433;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2434# dgra bo dag gis shad kyis 'chags su 'ong ba'i tshe bshags pa dang du len cing nyon  mongs pa skyed par mi byed pa ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233103#233113#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2435# pha rol yongs su ngal bar byas pa'i 'og tu chags pa mi len gyi / /

column3: sa'i khams la sogs pa bzhin no // / +dper na sa'i khams sra bar yongs su gcod pa na gzhan ma yin yang sra ba'i mtshan nyid ces brjod pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233111#233125#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2435;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2437# de yongs su skyo zhing ngal bar 'gyur bar dogs nas 'ongs ma thag tu 'chags pa len par byed do zhes bshad do // /

column3: yang dper na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyid rnams dang  mdo sde pa'i skye ba la  sogs pa bzhin no // / +des na de ni shes bya'ang yin la mtshan nyid kyang yin pa'am yang na shes bya'i mtshan nyid yin pas shes bya'i mtshan nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233124#233140#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2438# dgongs    pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / / +gal te bshags par gsol ba 'debs na dus bzhin du len par byed pas gzhan la gnod pa mi skyed pa zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: de gzhan ma yin pa dang  gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa las grol ba'i phyir ci rigs su sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233141#233151#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2438;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2439;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2440# shad kyis 'chags pa sdod pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid lnga pa bstan te / /

column3: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du  'phags so // / +'dis shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233150#233159#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2439;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2440# byang chub sems dpa' ni dgra bos byang chub  sems dpa' nyid la gnod pa byed du dogs pas / / +byang chub sems dpa' nyid myur du dgra bo de nyid du 'gro zhing bshags par byed gyi / /

column3: 'di ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa yin pas shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233160#233168#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2440;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2442# byang chub sems dpa' nyid myur du dgra bo de nyid du 'gro zhing bshags par byed gyi / / +pha rol 'ongs pa la bsdad nas bshags pa ni ma yin no // /

column3: 'jug pa ni mngon par rtogs pa'o // / +rnam par rig pa tsam nyid ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'o // / +de nyid khyad    par te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233167#233177#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2443# pha rol 'ongs pa la bsdad nas bshags pa ni ma yin no // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang / /

column3: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so // / +'jug pa de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa zhes bya ba rnam par rig pa tsam nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233176#233185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2445# khon yod pa dag la bdag  nyid 'gro zhing bshags par byed do zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233186#233193#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2445;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2446# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / / +gal te gzhan gyis gnod par byas na yang mi brjed par 'chags par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: de'i rgyu ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa la sbyor ba'i dus na 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa  ma dag pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233194#233202#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2445;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2447# gal te gzhan gyis gnod par byas na yang mi brjed par 'chags par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +'jigs pa dang zang zing gi sems kyis bzod par byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan  nyid drug pa bstan te / /

column3: 'bras bu ni rab tu rtogs pa'i dus na de dag nyid 'jig rten las 'das par gyur pa ste / / +lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pas yongs su zin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233201#233211#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2447;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2448# 'jigs pa dang zang zing gi sems kyis bzod par byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan  nyid drug pa bstan te / / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa'i phyir bzod par byed pa ma yin te / /

column3: de dag nyid des 'jug pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par te / / +des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233210#233221#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2447;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2448;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2449;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2451# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa'i phyir bzod par byed pa ma yin te / / +dper na rgyal po la sogs pa la 'jigs pa lta bu ni ma yin pa'o // /

column3: de'i  rgyu dang 'bras bu bsgom pa rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba la rnam par rig pa tsam de nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu ni de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233219#233231#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2449;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2451;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2452# zang zing gi sems kyis yongs su tshol bar byed pa yang ma yin te / / +zas dang skom la sogs pa  tshol ba'i phyir ma yin gyi / /
column5: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2055230#2055230#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_11116;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_11117# de'i mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes  pa'i bzod pa skye ba'i phyir ro // / +'jig rten pa'i chos gzhan dag gis mi brdzi ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni yang na 'jig rten pa'i chos gzhan dag gis mi brdzi ba'i phyir / /

column3: bsgom pa ni de goms par byed pa'o // / +des rab tu dbye bas de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu bsgom pa rab tu dbye ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233230#233246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2451;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2453;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2454# gzhan dogs pa'i phyir bzod pa bsgom pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten med pa dang  tshol ba med pas bzod par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385683#2385684#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247470#247472#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270214#270215#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7085;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7086# sngon shes rab  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384462#2384464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column9: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258660#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column10: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228688#228688#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405614#2405616#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column12: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386839#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column13: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230801#230801#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256223#256224#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column17: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228865#228867#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column18: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228982#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column19: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334726#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /

column3: sa bcu'i ngo bo nyid do // / +de nyid khyad par te / / +des  'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so // /

column6: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230242#230242#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2096# 'dod pa la dga' ba dang  longs spyod dang  dbang  phyug ces 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258661#258661#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column8: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273161#273162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533913#533914#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# de dag gi 'di la rnam par rtog pas bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa     // / +zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242248#242248#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3609# nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kho na la bskal pa gsum du  bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / /
