column3: pha rol tu phyin pa goms par byed pa tha dad pa'i sa de dag nyid la de nye bar 'dzin pa la brtson pa na de la slob pa yin pas bslab pa gsum rnam par gzhag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233247#233259#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2454;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2455# 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang  zas dang  skom gyi phyir dang bzod par byed pa ma yin pa zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab  pa ste / / +sa de dag nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa spong ba dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dang  dge ba thams cad spyod pa dang  tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yang dag par len to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233260#233277#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2455;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2456;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2457;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2458# phan gdags par bya ba la yal bar mi dor ba zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid bdun bstan te / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par sems can la phan 'dogs par byed kyi / /

column3: gdul ba srab kyi kha lo sgyur ba bzhin du lam log par zhugs pa'i lus la sogs  pa'i las rnams 'dis sdom pas na sdom pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233278#233288#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2457;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2458;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2460;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2461# lan cig sems can la phan btags pas chog go zhes yal  bar dor nas bya ba gzhan mi byed pas phan 'dogs pa'o // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang / /

column3: de ltar na bslab pa nyid lhag pa'i tshul khrims te / / +tshul khrims dang lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir ro // / +lhag pa'i tshul khrims nyid khyad par te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233289#233299#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2460;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2461;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2462;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2463;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2464# lan cig tsam phan btags nas yal bar bor te / / +phan 'dogs pa ma yin no zhes 'chad do // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2319586#2319587#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1027;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1028# de'i phyir 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa'i mdo las / / +drang po'i sems ni byang chub kyi snying po'i zhes gsungs pas drang bo'i sems ni mngon par yid chos pa'i sems la bya'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4019E.TXT.r#2496185#2496185#TD4019E.TXT.r_11640# mnyen pa'i sems dang  yid du 'ong ba'i sems dang  las su rung ba'i sems dang  dri ma med pa'i sems su 'dug pa'o zhes mdo las bshad pa'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4050E.TXT.r#1102836#1102836#TD4050E.TXT.r_823;TD4050E.TXT.r_824# sbyor ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i sems de ni nus pa med pa ma yin pas bdag po'i rkyen ni de'i nus pa yin pas rgyu'i rkyen nyid ni ma yin no // / +de bas na bdag po'i rkyen las 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems de 'byung ngo // /

column3: des 'di dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so // / +sems kyi dbang du byas pa'i  bslab pa ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233297#233308#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2462;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2463;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2464;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2465# rtag par phan btags pa'i sems     // / +kyis yal bar mi dor bar zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.029#TD4053E.TXT.r#2973664#2973665#TD4053E.TXT.r_1219;TD4053E.TXT.r_1220# sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba nyid kyi mjug thogs su thog ma kho nar gzugs na spyod pa'i sems 'byung ngo // / +mi  lcogs pa med pa'i dge ba'i mjug thogs su dngos gzhi'o // /
column6: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1007633#1007634#TD4054E.TXT.r_2774;TD4054E.TXT.r_2775# sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba nyid kyi mjug thogs su thog ma kho nar gzugs na spyod pa'i sems 'byung ngo // / +mi lcogs pa med pa'i dge ba'i mjug thogs su dngos gzhi'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235717#235717#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2792# de ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste / /

column3: dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha'i mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni bzang skyong dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la sogs pa bsdu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233305#233316#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2464;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2465;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2466# de ni bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bdun pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni / / +gnyis pa bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233316#233324#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2465;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2466# gnyis pa bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' gang gis brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid rang  tu shes pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to // /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233989#233989#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2556# de ni brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes pa ni gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //// /

column3: lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa la ting nge 'dzin     // / +nyid sems su ston pas gsungs so zhes smras te / / +sems kyi rnam pa bris zhes bya ba las su bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354824#2354826#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5118;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5119;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5120# gcig tu bzlum pa dang  gcig tu bsdu ba dang  gcig tu brtul ba dang  phung po gcig tu byas nas 'di snyam du yid la byed do ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pas ni gnyis pa  'dres pa la dmigs pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232733#232736#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2387;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2388;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2389# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bdag nyid kyi las kyi rnam par smin  pa'i 'bras bu la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa la brten pas gnod pa thams cad nye bar gnas pa nang 'khrug pa mi bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233323#233337#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2466;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2467;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2468;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2469# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid rang  tu shes pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to // /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520452#520455#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9196;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9197;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9198# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column8: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248771#248774#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4410;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4411;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4412;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4413# sbyin gnas chen por grags pa'i khyim du ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column9: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273362#273365#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7461;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7462;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7463;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7464# gnyis po de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column10: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234022#234023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2558;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2559# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  gnyi ga'i cha dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa  bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba bstan te / /
column11: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520056#520057#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9143;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9144;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9145# de la dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column12: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234417#234422#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2602# 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas ston to // / +rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa gnyis kyis rnam pa bdun du dbye ba 'di ni mtshan nyid dang po bstan pa'o // /
column13: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#508856#508857#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7778;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7779;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7780# rnam  par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // / +rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column14: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225660#225660#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1507;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1508# 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan pa'o // / +rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#268291#268292#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6828;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6829;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6830# dang po  yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column16: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2370169#2370171#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7055;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7057;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7058# bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225360#225360#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1473# 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug  bsdu bas bstan te / /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#508609#508609#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7748;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7749;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7750# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba ste / / +'di rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: shes rab kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o // / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni spros pa'i rnam par rtog pa  thams cad kyi gnyen po'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233338#233348#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2468;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2469;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2470# rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // / +rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa bdun du dbye ste / /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256192#256193#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5236# 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid las rnam pa bdun du dbye ste // /

column3: de la sbyor ba ba'i dngos gzhi'i dbang du byas / / +de'i rjes la thob pa'i dbang du byas / / +de'i bla na med pa'i dbang du byas nas tshul khrims dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab kyi bslab pa 'di dag ni lam gyi rang bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233349#233358#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2469;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2470;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2471;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2472# rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa bdun du dbye ste / / +'di ni dang  po brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233358#233367#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2471;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2472;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2473;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2474# de la dam lhod ran par gyur ba'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /

column3: de'i 'bras bu spangs pa dang   ye shes kyi khyad par gnyis kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233366#233376#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2472;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2473;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2474;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2475;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2476# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +yang byang chub sems dpa' ha cang mi zhum pa / / +ha cang brtun mi ngas pas brtson 'grus rtsom ste / /
column5: 0.008#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349295#1349302#TD4037E.TXT.r_4520;TD4037E.TXT.r_4521;TD4037E.TXT.r_4522# yang byang chub sems dpa' ha cang yang mi zhum / / +ha cang yang brtun mi ngas par brtson 'grus rtsom ste / /
column6: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1128521#1128522#TD4047E.TXT.r_1046;TD4047E.TXT.r_1047# de ltar  sems bskyed cing smon lam gdab pa byas pa ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar de'i rjes la brtson 'grus rtsom mo // /
column7: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1027825#1027825#TD4054E.TXT.r_6088;TD4054E.TXT.r_6089# mngon par yid ches pa rnams ni bden pa mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spros pa'i tshul gyis    brtson 'grus bsgom par 'gyur ro // / +brtson 'grus ba rtsom sa pa ni / /
column8: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#308705#308705#TD4026E.TXT.r_6164;TD4026E.TXT.r_6165# 'di ltar zhi gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa'i  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhum pa dang rgod pa dag gi gnyen por brtson 'grus rtsom mo // / +brtson 'grus ji ltar rtsom zhe na / /
column9: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1732175#1732175#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4397# stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang   spro ba dang  brtan pa dang pha rol gnon pa khur mi 'dor ba gang gis pags pa dang  rtsa rgyus dang  rus pa tsam zhig lus shing lus kyi sha dang  khrag skams kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom pa gang dang  stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang  spro ba dang  brtan  pa dang  pha rol gnon pa dang  khur mi 'dor ba gang gis thob par bya ba ma thob pa de srid du brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur te / /
column10: 0.027#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1065102#1065103#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2043# dad par gyur  pa ni 'bras bu'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do // /
column11: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2156644#2156645#TD4029E.TXT.r_4752# de dag bsal ba'i phyir rnal 'byor pa 'di brtson 'grus rtsom pas 'bad pas brtson 'grus kyi gnas skabs CHES KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS SO // /
column12: 0.028#TD4051E.TXT.r#1254064#1254064#TD4051E.TXT.r_3119;TD4051E.TXT.r_3120# bzod na mi mthun pa la mi mjed pas brtson 'grus rtsom mo // / +brtson 'grus brtsams na sems mnyam  par 'jog go // /
column13: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#642164#642166#TD4069E.TXT.r_2746# lus dub par gyur pa dang  sems dub par gyur pa na brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do // /
column14: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2899419#2899419#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4419;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4420# bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'dod pa yod na don skyo ba med cing brtson 'grus rtsom ste / / +de bas na brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang skyo ba med pa'i rgyu mos pa yin pas rgyu la 'bras bur ming btags nas mos pa la skyo ba med pa'i rang bzhin du  bshad do // /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226096#226096#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1559;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1560# gnyen po la mi brjed pas brtson 'grus rtsom mo // / +brtson 'grus brtsams nas sems mnyam par 'jog go // /

column3: bslab pa 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu ni de'i 'bras bu'o // / +de ni de'i 'bras bu yang yin la spangs pa yang yin pas de'i 'bras bu spangs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233375#233388#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2474;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2475;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2476;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2477# ha cang brtun mi ngas pas brtson 'grus rtsom ste / / +sbyor ba snyoms par  byed cing / / +brtson 'grus bya ba thams cad snyoms par gus par byed pa ni 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snyoms pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column5: 0.008#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349311#1349312#TD4037E.TXT.r_4523# brtsam par bya ba thams  cad la snyoms par gus par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snyoms pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1349212#1349212#TD4037E.TXT.r_4508;TD4037E.TXT.r_4509# yang byang chub  sems dpa' zhi gnas dang  rab tu 'dzin pa dang  btang snyoms kyi mtshan ma rnams dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang  ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dang  ldang ba'i mtshan ma rnams shes pa dang  mi brjed pa dang  rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu byed cing / / +gus par byed pa 'di ni    byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar rtogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#302303#302303#TD4026E.TXT.r_4876# rab tu dbye ba rnam pa drug po gtso bo'i dbye ba dang  de'i rgyu'i dbye ba dang  las kyi dbye ba dang  rnam pa'i dbye ba dang  rten  gyi dbye ba dang  bar chad rnam pa bzhi'i gnyen po'i dbye bas brtson 'grus yongs su shes par bya ste / /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402009#2402009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10834;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10835# yan lag snga ma la phyi ma'i spyod pa yongs su ma rdzogs par bstan pa dang  rang gi phyogs brtson 'grus kyis yongs su rdzogs par sgrub par byed pa bstan pa ste / / +'di ni dang po'o // /

column3: glo bur gyi sgrib pa dang bral ba de bzhin nyid rnam par  grol ba'o // / +mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba nyid du mthong ba'i phyir 'khor ba nyid mya ngan las 'das pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233387#233406#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2476;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2477;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2478;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2479;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2480# brtson 'grus bya ba thams cad snyoms par gus par byed pa ni 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snyoms pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bstan pa yin no // / +'dul ba dum bu lnga pa las kyang / /

column3: de shes pa ni chags pa'i gnas ma yin no // / +phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233403#233411#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2479;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2480# de phyir 'dul ba 'di las / / +de'i tshe nyan thos rna ba bye ba nyi shu pas bcom ldan 'das la bdag rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byed par ci gnang zhes gsol ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ngo // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233590#233590#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2510# brtson 'grus ran pa la gnas na gdod  sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ro // / +nyan thos rna ba bye ba nyi shu pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / /

column3: de nyid khyad par te / / +des 'di  dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so // / +bslab pa 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu ni de'i 'bras bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233412#233422#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2480# de'i tshe nyan thos rna ba bye ba nyi shu pas bcom ldan 'das la bdag rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byed par ci gnang zhes gsol ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ngo // /

column3: de ni de'i 'bras bu yang yin la ye shes kyang yin pas de'i 'bras bu ye shes so // / +sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233423#233433#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2480;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2481# de'i tshe nyan thos rna ba bye ba nyi shu pas bcom ldan 'das la bdag rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byed par ci gnang zhes gsol ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ngo // / +des ring por ma lon par sgo khang dang tshal dang  'chag  sa dag tu brtson 'grus spyod pas rkang ba las khrag 'dzag pas nyan thos rnab bye ba nyi shu pa 'di snyam du sems te / /

column3: ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni dri ma med cing thogs pa med pa'i ye shes te / / +chos  kyi sku zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233434#233444#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2481;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2482# des ring por ma lon par sgo khang dang tshal dang  'chag  sa dag tu brtson 'grus spyod pas rkang ba las khrag 'dzag pas nyan thos rnab bye ba nyi shu pa 'di snyam du sems te / /

column3: 'di ltar gnyi ga yang rnam par rtog pa kun tu mi 'byung na rnam par mi rtog pa dang 'di bye brag ci yod ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233442#233452#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2481;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2482# des ring por ma lon par sgo khang dang tshal dang  'chag  sa dag tu brtson 'grus spyod pas rkang ba las khrag 'dzag pas nyan thos rnab bye ba nyi shu pa 'di snyam du sems te / /

column3: de ni gnyen po ste bya ba dang bcas pa'o // / +'di ni de'i 'bras bu bya ba byas pa ste / / +'di ni bye brag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233453#233460#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2482;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2483;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2484# bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi nang na brtson 'grus ni bdag las lhag pa med na yang / / +da dung sdug bsngal rnams kyi rtsa ba zad par ma gyur to // /

column3: longs spyod rdzogs pa ni de'i dbang gis thob pa  ste ; / +ye shes khyad par can des byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa rnams dang lhan cig thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa so sor myong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233461#233469#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2483;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2484;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2485# da dung sdug bsngal rnams kyi rtsa ba zad par ma gyur to // / +bdag gi khyim na nor dang  rin po che mang du yod pas slar khyim par babs te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233469#233479#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2484;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2485# bdag gi khyim na nor dang  rin po che mang du yod pas slar khyim par babs te / / +bsod nams yid la ma gcags par byas kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs su chud par gyur nas de'i thad du gshegs te / /

column3: phyi rol rnam par dag pa'i ye shes med par byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba dang  tshogs lhag ma    yang rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233480#233489#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2486# bsod nams yid la ma gcags par byas kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs su chud par gyur nas de'i thad du gshegs te / /

column3: sprul pa ni de'i rjes la thob pa'i ye shes nyid kyi bye brag go // / +des de kho na las rab tu mi nyams shing byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa mi gtong bas las dang po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang  nyan thos rnams la bya ba sgrub bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233490#233519#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2488;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2489;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2490# NYAN THOS RNA BA BYE BA nyi shu pa la khyod 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed pa bden nam zhes bkas    smras pa dang  des med do zhes gsol to // /

column3: mig gi dbang po dang  de'i rnam par shes pa dang  gzugs kyi dpe rnams dang sbyar te / / +de med na de med par 'gyur ro // /
de nyid khyad par te / / +des de dag gi gsung khyad par du 'phags so // / +nyan thos kyi theg pa las khyad par du byas pa zhes bya ba ni der ma bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233520#233536#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2490;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2491;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2492;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2493;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2494;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2495;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2496# khyod sngon khyim na gnas pa'i tshe pi wang la mkhas sam / / +gsol ba / /

column3: gnas  bcu po 'di dag ces bya ba ni de dag la theg pa chen po'i don mtha' dag gnas pas gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233532#233542#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2494;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2495;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2496;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2497;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2498# pi wang gi rgyud thang chad pa'i tshe sgra ran cing snyan par 'gyur ram / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233543#233556#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2497;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2498;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2499;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2500;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2501;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2502# yang bka' stsal pa / / +pi wang gi rgyud lhod pa'i tshe sgra snyan cing ran par 'gyur ram / /

column3: gzhi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +gang dag byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i ched du bshad pa dag go zhes brjod pa'i rigs pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa dag go zhes smos  pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar des gnang nas bshad pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233557#233565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2501;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2502;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2503;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2504;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2505# 'o na ji ltar byas na snyan par 'gyur / / +gsol pa / / +ha cang dam pa yang ma lags / /

column3: sa bcu pa la sogs pa bzhin no // / +de'i phyir / / +bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233566#233573#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2504;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2505;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2506;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2507;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2508# ha cang lhod par yang ma gyur na / / +gdod snyan par 'gyur lags so // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / /

column3: mchog nyid ces bya ba ni lam de sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bstan pa mchog yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233574#233582#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2507;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2508;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2509# nga'i chos la yang de bzhin te / / +ha cang lhod pa dang  ha cang brtun pas lam thob par mi 'gyur gyi / /

column3: ji ltar na de  bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung khyad par rnam par bcus khyad par du 'phags pa 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mi srid du dogs nas smras pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233583#233598#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2510;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2511# brtson 'grus ran pa la gnas na gdod  sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di ltar dngos po drug la sogs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa bstan par mi dmigs la / / +bye brag la sogs pa la ni de dmigs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233597#233607#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2510;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2511;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2512;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2513# nyan thos rna ba bye ba nyi shu pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / +thos nas 'chags de nyid du zag pa rnams ma lus par 'byang bar gyur to zhes gsungs pa yin te / /

column3: de tsam  gyis ni bye brag yi sogs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi gsung du mi 'gyur ro zhes gzhan gyi skabs su 'gyur ba yid la bzhag nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233608#233622#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2512;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2513;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2514# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +lung gcig las 'phros pa dang   lung sna tshogs dang  'dul ba dum bu bzhi pa las kyang phal cher de skad du ston to // /

column3: gnas bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub chen po kun du sgrub par byed pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smros so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233621#233631#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2513;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2514# lung gcig las 'phros pa dang   lung sna tshogs dang  'dul ba dum bu bzhi pa las kyang phal cher de skad du ston to // / +brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid kyis bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod pa zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa nga rgyal dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus bstan te / /

column3: de ni byang chub kyang yin la chen po'ang yin pa'am / / +chen  po rnams kyi byang chub yin pas byang chub chen po'o // / +ye shes dang spangs pa'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233629#233642#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2514;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2515# brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid kyis bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod pa zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa nga rgyal dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus bstan te / /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227651#227651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1758;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1760# bstan    bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las mdo las gsungs pa'i tshig lnga po dag mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum du bstan te / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'chad do // /
column6: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2877857#2877857#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1441;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1442# go cha'i sgras ni go cha'i brtson 'grus bstan / / +sbyor ba'i sgras kyang sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus bstan to zhes bya ba ni rtsom pa bya ste / /
column7: 0.026#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2882848#2882848#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_2082# brtson 'grus 'bri dang 'phel zhes bya ba la sogs pas brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa'i bye brag ston te / /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227431#227431#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1737;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1738# go rims bzhin du sems can mi spong ba dang  dman pa'i sems spangs pa dang  mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang  gsum gyis yongs su bzung ba yin par rab tu ston to // / +brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni go cha'i brtson  'grus dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus so zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233924#233930#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2548# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang  mi bskyod pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus dang  de la thog ma kho nar ni 'dun pa drag po bskyed do // /
column10: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2732197#2732203#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4559# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum pa'i brtson 'grus dang mi 'khrul pa'i brtson 'grus dang chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus so // /
column11: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836098#1836104#TD4039E.TXT.r_2613# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang  mi bskyod pa'i brtson 'grus  dang ; /
column12: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983171#983173#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11890;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11891# rtag pa'i brtson 'grus dang rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus so // / +de la rtag pa'i brtson 'grus ni gang dge ba rgyun du byed pa'o // /
column13: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#634828#634828#TD4069E.TXT.r_1709;TD4069E.TXT.r_1710# de dag med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la / / +de dag ni brtson 'grus dang brtson 'grus de las  'bras bu dang  dge sbyong gi tshul gyi don te / /

column3: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa dag / / +spangs pa yin te de spangs pas // / +dri med ye shes thogs pa med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233643#233652#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2515;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2516;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2517# byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus ni gzhan  la phan 'dogs pa sngon du 'gro bas gzhan dag la phyir nga rgyal skyed par lta ga la byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233914#233914#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2545;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2546# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste / /

column3: 'di ni byang chub rnam pa bzhi // / +zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +de kun     // / +tu sgrub par byed cing thob par byed pa ni gnas bcu po dag yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233653#233672#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2516;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2517;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2518;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2519# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang / / +brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba'i phyir / /

column3: dngos po drug gam / / +gtso bo la sogs pa ni ma yin pas de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227680#227682#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1761# slob  dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni brtson 'grus gsum po dag gi ngo bo tha dad pas mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba dang ldan pa dang  brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes gsungs te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233665#233674#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2518;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2519# nga rgyal dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o zhes 'byung  ngo ; / / +mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni brtson 'grus phyi ma lnga po mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang  spro     // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233685#233696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2519;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2520;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2521# mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni brtson 'grus phyi ma lnga po mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang  spro     // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233828#233836#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2534# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  go cha dang  sbyor  ba dang  zhum pa med pa dang  mi 'khrugs pa dang  chog bar mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba la brtson pa mi gtong ba dang  go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes  'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.018#TD4053E.TXT.r#2965902#2965904#TD4053E.TXT.r_175# dge ba'i chos rnams la mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  brtson pa mi 'dor ba zhes 'byung ba mdo'i tshig 'di rnams ni go cha la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa spro    ba'i dngos po rnams dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro // /
column9: 0.018#TD4054E.TXT.r#994520#994522#TD4054E.TXT.r_504# dge ba'i chos rnams la mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang zhes bya ba'i mdo'i tshig 'di rnams ni go cha la sogs pa la mngon par spro ba'i dngos po rnams dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro // /
column10: 0.020#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2732167#2732168#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4556# bcom ldan 'das kyis mthu dang ldan pa dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang spro ba dang ldan pa dang brtul ba dang brten pa dang brtson pa ma bor bar dge ba'i  chos rnams la gnas so zhes gang gsungs pa dbang po gang la brten nas she na / /

column3: shin tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba ni tshad ma dang ldan pa'i phyir te / / +'di ltar 'og nas  gtan la 'bebs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233673#233685#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2519# mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson pa mi gtong BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI ni brtson 'grus phyi ma lnga po mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang  spro     // /

column3: mthun pa zhes bya ba ni mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir te / / +rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba ni skyon med pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227680#227681#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1761# slob  dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni brtson 'grus gsum po dag gi ngo bo tha dad pas mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba dang ldan pa dang  brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes gsungs te / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233828#233828#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2534# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  go cha dang  sbyor  ba dang  zhum pa med pa dang  mi 'khrugs pa dang  chog bar mi 'dzin PA ZHES BYA BA NI MDO las mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba la brtson pa mi gtong ba dang  go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes  'byung ngo // /

column3: ji ltar dngos po drug la sogs pa shes pa'am / / +nyan thos kyi theg pa skyon dang bcas shing sangs  rgyas nyid dang mi mthun pa ltar gnas bcu po 'di dag ni de lta ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518152#518155#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8869# 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni rnam pa bdun du bstan te / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233697#233713#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2520;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2521;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2522;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2523# ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba'i chos rnams brtson pa mi gtong ba bstan pa ste / / +tshig lnga po 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas / /
column7: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367640#2367640#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6716# ming gi rnam grangs mang po de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas / /

column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233772#233788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2530;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2531;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2532# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa mdo sde'i gzhi bsdu ba'i skabs ni don gyis rnam pa  lnga'i ming bzhag nas rnam par bshad pa ni yod kyi / / +mdo'i tshig dang sbyar ba ni med do // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa las ni / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247386#247387#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4250# gnas gyur pa'i mtshan  nyid de yang rgyu cher ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag dang  bstan bcos kun las btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  mdo sde'i rgyan dang  ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan  ba dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535790#535791#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11242# rang gi ngo bo nyid dang bye brag gi don rgya cher bshad pa ni  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237745#237746#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3033# rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa lnga po de dag kyang slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las 'chad do // /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237661#237661#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3024# gzhan yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column14: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536928#536928#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11399# rgya cher ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column16: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382539#2382539#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8567# mdo  DAG DANG MI MTHUN PA dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de lta bu'i bshad pa med pa'i phyir tshad mar gzung du mi rung ngo // /

column3: med pa dang yod pa lhan cig gcig tu 'dogs pa ni sgro 'dogs pa'o // / +yod pa la skur cing sel ba ni skur pa 'debs pa'o // /

column3: sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba'i mtha' 'di gnyis ni gyang sa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233799#233807#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2533# de'i phyir 'dir re zhig bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  ngo bo nyid kyi 'grel pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa mdo sde'i gzhi bsdu ba las bshad pa dang sbyar nas mdo 'di bshad par bya ste / /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214234#214234#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // /

column3: 'di gnyis la gnas  na dbu ma'i lam las rab tu nyams par 'gyur ro // / +de gnyis spangs pa la mkhas pa ni yang dag par so sor rtog pa ste / /

column3: med pa kun brtags pa la sgro mi 'dogs shing mi skur te med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233818#233827#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2534# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  go cha dang  sbyor  ba dang  zhum pa med pa dang  mi 'khrugs pa dang  chog bar mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba la brtson pa mi gtong ba dang  go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes  'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227678#227679#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1761# slob  dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni brtson 'grus gsum po dag gi ngo bo tha dad pas mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba dang ldan pa dang  brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes gsungs te / /

column3: yod pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i phyir ro // / +gzhan gyi dbang la sgro 'dogs par    mi byed de yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4053E.TXT.r#2965901#2965904#TD4053E.TXT.r_175# dge ba'i chos rnams la mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  brtson pa mi 'dor ba zhes 'byung ba mdo'i tshig 'di rnams ni go cha la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa spro    ba'i dngos po rnams dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#994519#994522#TD4054E.TXT.r_504# dge ba'i chos rnams la mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang zhes bya ba'i mdo'i tshig 'di rnams ni go cha la sogs pa la mngon par spro ba'i dngos po rnams dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro // /
column6: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119985#3119985#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4045# brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa mnyam pa nyid rab tu shes pa dang  brtson 'grus brtsams pa des bdag la mi stod cing zhan mi snod pa dang  mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan  pa dang  rtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson pa ma btang ba de ni brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa rnam pa bdun yin no // /
column7: 0.018#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2732167#2732168#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4556# bcom ldan 'das kyis mthu dang ldan pa dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang spro ba dang ldan pa dang brtul ba dang brten pa dang brtson pa ma bor bar dge ba'i  chos rnams la gnas so zhes gang gsungs pa dbang po gang la brten nas she na / /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227724#227725#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1765# zhum pa med pa  pa dang  ldog pa med pa dang  chog pa med pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes bya ba nas / /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233685#233685#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2519# mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni brtson 'grus phyi ma lnga po mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang  spro     // /

column3: med pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // / +skur par yang mi byed de 'khrul pa tsam du yod pa'i phyir ro // /
