column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476011#476013#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3423;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3424# de bzhin du byis pa chung du la sogs pas kyang khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534910#534913#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11140;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11141# kun du rtog pa tsam du dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni nor ba'i rnam par shes pas brtags pa nyi tshe yod par 'gyur ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2356926#2356928#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5368;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5369# nyon mongs pa shin tu nyams smad par byed pa'i phyir yang 'jig  par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233837#233845#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2534;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2535;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2536# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  go cha dang  sbyor  ba dang  zhum pa med pa dang  mi 'khrugs pa dang  chog bar mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang  spro ba dang ldan pa dang  brtul ba brtan pa dang  dge ba la brtson pa mi gtong ba dang  go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes  'byung ngo // /
column9: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478206#478206#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3668;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3669# sems can gang yang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang  sprul pa'i sku las gud na med do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams la dbus dang mtha' med pa de  bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i yon tan yang de bzhin te / /
column10: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535490#535490#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11203;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11204# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  mchog gi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir yongs su grub pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel ba las ni yongs su rdzogs par grub cing de kho na nyid kyi  ngo bo nyid do zhes 'byung ste / /
column11: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226069#226070#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1555;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1556# ci'i phyir pha rol tu  phyin pa drug po dag gi go rims bstan ce na 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma rnams pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni longs  spyod la ma chags na tshul khrims bsrung nus so // /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529728#529728#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10486;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10487# gnas zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i don to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang / /
column13: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474177#474178#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3218;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3219# bcom ldan 'das  kyi yon tan khyad par can gsungs pa dang  gzhan dag rab tu dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226775#226775#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1648# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni rnam grangs gnyis kyis ston te / /
column15: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478772#478772#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3749;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3750# de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pas phyi ma'i mtha' mu mthar byon pa la rgyun chad pa mi mnga' ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536695#536695#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11365;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11366# nyon  mongs pa can gyi yid do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column17: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405392#2405392#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11183;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11184# blo gros shin tu dge ba'i phyir legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar so so  yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur cing / /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#451977#451977#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_235;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_236# zhes smra ba'i mi rigs so zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med  kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni mdo sde rnams kyi tshig dag gis ngo bo nyid byed do zhes zer ba 'di yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes sun 'byin te / /

column3: yongs su grub pa la sgro 'dogs par mi byed de yod pa'i phyir ro // / +de nyid kyi phyir skur bar mi byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233846#233862#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2535;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2536;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2537;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2538;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2539# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: yang na 'dir sgro 'dogs pa dang  skur  pa'i mtha' spangs pa la mkhas pa 'di ni gang gzhan gyi dbang la kun brtags pa med pas sgro mi 'dogs pa dang  yongs su grub pa yod pas skur par mi byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233863#233874#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2538;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2539;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2540;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2541# 'di ni mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bstan to // / +sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: mtha' gnyis spangs pas ngo bo nyid gsum la mkhas pa de lta bu la brten nas rnam par rig pa tsam nyid kyis  ji skad smos pa'i shes bya'i mtshan nyid rtogs par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233875#233889#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2540;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2541;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2542# sbyor ba ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du nan    tan gyis sbyor bar byed pa ste / / +'di ni mdo las brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bstan to // /

column3: khong du chud pa ni rtogs pa ste / / +'jug pa dang mngon sum du byed pa'o // / +yang na gang gis rtogs pa'o // / +de'i 'og tu 'jug pa rnam par rig pa tsam nyid de dang mthun pa kun rdzob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag don dam par  rtogs par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233890#233899#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2542;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2543;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2544# bdag nyid ngal zhing sdug bsngal ba las sems ldog cing ma nyams par byed pa ni zhum pa med pa zhes bya'o // / +gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa rnams kyis sems mi gyos pa ni mi  'khrugs pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233900#233907#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2543;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2544# gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa rnams kyis sems mi gyos pa ni mi  'khrugs pa zhes bya'o // / +byang chub la thug gi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la brtson zhing bar ma dor yongs su mi gtong ba ni chog par mi 'dzin pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pas yongs su zin par bya'o // / +'dun pa dang mos pa ni bsam pa ste / / +shes nas dad pas bsdus pa'i phyir de'i tshe de gnyis lhag par che'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233908#233922#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2544;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2545;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2546;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2547;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2548# byang chub la thug gi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la brtson zhing bar ma dor yongs su mi gtong ba ni chog par mi 'dzin pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836090#1836096#TD4039E.TXT.r_2610;TD4039E.TXT.r_2611;TD4039E.TXT.r_2612;TD4039E.TXT.r_2613# gnas pa'i rgyun du byed cing byang bar byed pa gang yin pa'o // / +brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste / /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233649#233651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2515;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2516;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2517# byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus ni gzhan  la phan 'dogs pa sngon du 'gro bas gzhan dag la phyir nga rgyal skyed par lta ga la byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang / / +brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba'i phyir / /

column3: 'jug pa ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang don gcig go // / +sa bcu  dag tu bslab pa gsum la bslab cing bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bsgoms pas de dag nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233923#233938#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2547;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2548;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2549# 'di lta ste / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang  mi bskyod pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus dang  de la thog ma kho nar ni 'dun pa drag po bskyed do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#925151#925152#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_4412# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  ma zhum  pa'i brtson 'grus dang  ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas shing brtson 'grus de dag kyang 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du gtong bar mi byed pa ni nan tan mchog la gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983168#983173#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11889;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11890;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11891# brtson 'grus rnam pa gnyis te / / +rtag pa'i brtson 'grus dang rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2732195#2732205#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4558;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4559# brtson 'grus kyi dbang po la ste mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga po dag gis rnam pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus de yongs su bstan pa yin te / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum pa'i brtson 'grus dang mi 'khrul pa'i brtson 'grus dang chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus so // /
column8: 0.0#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836097#1836108#TD4039E.TXT.r_2612;TD4039E.TXT.r_2613;TD4039E.TXT.r_2614;TD4039E.TXT.r_2615# 'di lta ste / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang  mi bskyod pa'i brtson 'grus  dang ; /
column9: 0.008#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#964531#964532#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9582;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9583# dge ba la sems spro ba ni brtson 'grus kyi brtson 'grus so // / +le los sems  ma gyengs pa ni brtson 'grus kyi bsam gtan zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.010#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2930936#2930936#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8736# lus la grang ba dang  tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal byung ba nyams su len cing srog la bab pa  na yang brtson 'grus mi gtong bar lus dang srog la mi phangs par byas nas brtson 'grus rgya chen por rtsom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus la ngo mtshar du bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column11: 0.010#TD4047E.TXT.r#1182470#1182470#TD4047E.TXT.r_8830;TD4047E.TXT.r_8831# tshul khrims la sogs pa'i mdor bstan pa dang chos mtshungs pa'o // / +rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  rdzogs par byed pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni 'di dag gi rnam grangs so // /
column12: 0.010#TD4080E.TXT.r#591#594#TD4080E.TXT.r_63# dge ba'i las rnams la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  brtsams pa mthar phyin pa'i brtson 'grus te / /
column13: 0.011#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348720#1348721#TD4037E.TXT.r_4464;TD4037E.TXT.r_4465# de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dkar po'i chos sgrub par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa dang  skyes pa rnams gnas par byed pa dang  mi nyams par byed pa dang  'phel zhing rgyas  par byed pa'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus las yongs su dag par byed pa ni las rnam pa gsum po lus kyi las dang  ngag gi las dang  yid kyi las dge ba rnam par dag par byed pa dang  sdud par byed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.011#TD4048E.TXT.r#1693204#1693204#TD4048E.TXT.r_1323# chos kyi sbyin pa dang  zang zing gi sbyin pa dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa dang  sdom pa'i tshul  khrims dang  dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims dang  gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang  sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang  chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang  go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs pa la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus dang  gnas pa dang  mngon par sgrub pa dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan dang  rnam par mi rtog par sbyor ba dang  rnam par mi rtog pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes la thob pa'i shes rab    po ; /
column15: 0.011#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119439#3119440#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3992# brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus so // /
column16: 0.011#TD4053E.TXT.r#2990926#2990930#TD4053E.TXT.r_3531;TD4053E.TXT.r_3532# brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i brtson 'grus so // /
column17: 0.011#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034689#1034693#TD4054E.TXT.r_7088# brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sems can gyi don bya ba'i brtson 'grus so // /
column18: 0.011#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2881446#2881448#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1904# brtson 'grus kyi dngos po ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa'o // /
column19: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348827#1348833#TD4037E.TXT.r_4473;TD4037E.TXT.r_4474# rgyun du sbyor ba'i phyir rtag pa'i brtson 'grus  dang ; / +lhur sbyor ba'i phyir gus pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus dang  so sor brtags shing brtags shing dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtson 'grus dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams  cad kyis mi 'khrugs shing gzhan du bsgyur du med pa'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus dang  khyad par thob pa chung ngu dang  ngan don tsam gyis chog mi shes pa'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus so // /
column20: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348903#1348903#TD4037E.TXT.r_4477# rnam pa bdun ni phyi phyir zhing bla na med pa yang dag par  rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu shas cher 'dun pa dang  smon pa rjes su 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus 'dun pa dang ldan pa dang  brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos rnams la mthun zhing rnal 'byor du gnas par 'gyur la / /
column21: 0.012#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183410#1183414#TD4047E.TXT.r_8939# khyad par can gyi brtson 'grus kyi  sbyor ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column22: 0.013#TD4047E.TXT.r#1125252#1125253#TD4047E.TXT.r_559;TD4047E.TXT.r_560# dus kun du sbyor ba nyid ni rtag tu byed pa'i brtson 'grus te / / +des sbyor ba'i  brtson 'grus la gnas par 'gyur ro // /
column23: 0.013#TD4041E.TXT.r#1269280#1269280#TD4041E.TXT.r_51;TD4041E.TXT.r_52# 'dun pa ni de byed 'dod pa dang  thob par 'dod pa gang yin pa'o // / +brtson 'grus ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i  sems mngon par spro ba gang yin pa'o // /
column24: 0.017#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2874882#2874882#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_997;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_998# lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa ni sems    kyi brtson 'grus so // / +brtson 'grus de ltar shes nas ni // /
column25: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227651#227651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1758;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1760# bstan    bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las mdo las gsungs pa'i tshig lnga po dag mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum du bstan te / / +go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'chad do // /
column26: 0.019#TD4029E.TXT.r#2122569#2122569#TD4029E.TXT.r_314# gang gi tshe go cha'i brtson 'grus la sogs pa'i brtson 'grus las brtsams pas mgu bar byed pa de'i tshe yon tan khyad par can mngon par shes pa dang  stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis dbang phyug  rnyed par 'gyur bas dbang 'byor ba'i rgyu nyid du bstan to // /
column27: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183329#1183329#TD4047E.TXT.r_8930;TD4047E.TXT.r_8931# dus rtag  tu 'jug pa'i phyir rtag pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // / +'dun pa drag po'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas gus pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o // /
column28: 0.020#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983198#983198#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11894;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11895# ces bya ba la / / +de ltar rtag pa'i brtson 'grus dang  rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus gnyis kyis gnyis po yongs su smin pa dang  sbyang bar bya ba la 'grub ste / /
column29: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1348634#1348634#TD4037E.TXT.r_4456;TD4037E.TXT.r_4457# phyin ci ma log cing don dang  ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin te / / +de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba'i brtson 'grus gsum pa yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: de'i 'og tu de'i 'bras bu nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa dang  thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dri ma med cing thogs pa med pa thob par bya'o / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233937#233950#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2548;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2549;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2550;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2551# go cha'i brtson 'grus dang  sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang  zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang  mi bskyod pa'i brtson 'grus dang  chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus dang  de la thog ma kho nar ni 'dun pa drag po bskyed do // /

column3: de ltar na go rims dang grangs kyi dgongs pa dang  byang chub chen po dang mthun pa yang dngos dang zhar la bshad pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233951#233959#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2551;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2552;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2553;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2554# de'i 'og tu ni chos rgya chen po rnams rgya chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836122#1836126#TD4039E.TXT.r_2617;TD4039E.TXT.r_2618# chos rgya chen po rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid la yang khyad du mi gsod de zhum par mi 'gyur  ro ; / /

column3: go rims ni 'di kho na yin la grangs kyang bcu kho na ste / / +mi nyung mi mang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233960#233968#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2553;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2554;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2555# zhum par yang mi 'gyur ro // / +de'i 'og tu ni grang ba la sogs pa'i gnod pa rnams kyang bzod do // /

column3: 'bras bu bye brag med par 'gyur ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi lam nyid sangs rgyas kyi lam nyid du mi  rung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233969#233979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2555;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2556# ngan ngon gyis chog par mi 'dzin pas yon  tan gong ma bas kyang ches gong ma gya nom pa 'dod pa'i tshul gyis gnas so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.023#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836139#1836139#TD4039E.TXT.r_2620# gong ma bas kyang ches gong du gya nom pa 'dod pa'i tshul gyis gnas so // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du byas nas nyan thos kyi theg pa las ni gang du yang sangs rgyas kyi lam bstan pa med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233980#233988#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2555;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2556# ngan ngon gyis chog par mi 'dzin pas yon  tan gong ma bas kyang ches gong ma gya nom pa 'dod pa'i tshul gyis gnas so zhes 'byung ngo // / +de ni brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes pa ni gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //// /

column3: sangs rgyas ni nyan thos las khyad par du ma 'phags par yang mi 'dod de / / +ston pa dang slob mar rnam par gzhag pa med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233989#234000#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2556;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2557;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2558# de ni brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes pa ni gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //// /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233310#233311#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2465# gnyis pa bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /

column3: de bas na lam     // / +gyi khyad par nye bar bstan pa 'ga' zhig bshad dgos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234001#234010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2558# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  gnyi ga'i cha dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa  bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // /

column3: de ni theg pa chen po 'di las gzhan du mi 'thad do // / +de lta bas na byang chub chen po kun du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung nyid du mngon te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234011#234024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2558;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2559# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  gnyi ga'i cha dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa  bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // /
column5: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232733#232734#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2387;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2388;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2389# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bdag nyid kyi las kyi rnam par smin  pa'i 'bras bu la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa la brten pas gnod pa thams cad nye bar gnas pa nang 'khrug pa mi bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column6: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233331#233332#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2466;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2467;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2468# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid rang  tu shes pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232400#232400#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2341;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2342# gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pa bcas pa la bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad la mkhas pa dang  ltung ba las bslang ba la  mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston te / / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan pa yang dang po mtshan nyid bdun bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234412#234412#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2600;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2601# dbu ma'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba ni shes rab ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  drug pa shes rab kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas ston to // /

column3: sangs rgyas kyi las  ni sangs rgyas ma yin pas bshad par mi nus so // / +bstan pa 'dir ni theg pa chen po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa med pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234025#234039#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2558;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2559;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2560;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2561# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  YONGS SU RDZOGS PA DANG ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  gnyi ga'i cha dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni lnga pa  bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba bstan te / /
column5: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225080#225080#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1444# rgyun mi  'chad par sgom mi nus pa dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba'i phyir dang  khams dang mos pa dman pa'i phyir sems nang du 'jog mi nus pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang  dmigs pa dang  legs par ma bsgoms pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyis 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par mi nus pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa smon lam la brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column6: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#508416#508418#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7726;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7727# skyon rnam pa gsum med par bstan pa yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba dang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te / /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#500680#500681#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6732;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6733# rtog pa dang dpyod pa ni tha snyad kyi spyod yul la spyod pas zhes bya ba  la sogs pas ni bzhi pa dngos po thams cad yang dag par chad pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba dang gnyis kyis bstan te 'di ni dang po'o // /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502621#502622#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7002;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7003# rtog pa dang dpyod pa ni rtsod par smra ba'i spyod yul la spyod pas zhes bya ba 'di man chad kyis ni  lnga pa rtsod pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba gnyis kyis bstan te / /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#508607#508607#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7747;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7748;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7749# gnyis pa skyon med pa rnam pa lnga la brten nas rjes su mthun par bshad pa'i rigs pas tha dad pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i skyon rnam par gzhig par mdzad do // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column10: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397678#2397678#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10281;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10282;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10283# sangs rgyas kyi  sa'i bar du bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column11: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263930#263931#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6311;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6312# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni de  bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // / +'di yang mdor bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba bstan te / /

column3: rgyu dang 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam pa thams cad bshad pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i phyir 'di ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234040#234048#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2561;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2563# kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma legs par     // / +rtogs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: ji snyed dang ji lta ba bzhin du khyad par dang bcas par bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +thog ma med pa'i dus kyi dbyings // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234049#234057#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2563;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2564# yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi yul la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni yul las yul mi thob pa yin pas yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang po'i mu med pas na thog ma med pa'i dus so // / +dbyings ni rgyu ste sa bon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234058#234066#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2563;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2564;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2565# yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi yul la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni yul las yul mi thob pa yin pas yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o // / +kun rdzob dang  don dam pa'i yul gnyi ga la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de  ni gnyi ga'i cha zhes bya'o // /

column3: gang dag gi zhe na / / +kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams  cad kyi'o // / +rnam par byang ba rnams kyi ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234067#234084#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2564;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2565;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2566# kun rdzob dang  don dam pa'i yul gnyi ga la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de  ni gnyi ga'i cha zhes bya'o // / +shugs kyis 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  mi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  shin tu sbyangs pa byas pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid bzhi pa dang  lnga pa dang  drug  pa bstan te / /
column5: 0.018#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120013#3120015#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4047# mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam    gtan pa dang  gnyi ga'i cha'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  shugs kyis 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  mi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  shin tu sbyang ba byas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  yongs su rdzogs pa'i  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi dmigs pa yongs su bsgom pa dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa de ni bsam gtan rnam par dag pa rnam par bdun pa yin no // /

column3: 'di ltar 'og nas mang du thos pas bsgos pa'i gnas kun gzhi rnam par shes pas bsdus pa ma yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234071#234076#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2565# shugs kyis 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  mi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  shin tu sbyangs pa byas pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid bzhi pa dang  lnga pa dang  drug  pa bstan te / /

column3: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed pas bsdus pa'i chos rnams kyi sa bon gang yod pa'o zhes  'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234083#234096#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2565;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2566;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2567# shugs kyis 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  mi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang  shin tu sbyangs pa byas pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid bzhi pa dang  lnga pa dang  drug  pa bstan te / / +go rims bzhin du sbyor ba dang  yang dag pa'i ye shes dang  rjes la thob pa'i ye shes gsum dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang sbyar bar bya'o // /

column3: rten yin pa'i phyir chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te / / +rgyu yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234095#234104#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2566;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2567# go rims bzhin du sbyor ba dang  yang dag pa'i ye shes dang  rjes la thob pa'i ye shes gsum dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang sbyar bar bya'o // / +de la sbyor ba'i shes pa de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i yid la byed pa shugs kyis 'jug pa'i gnas su gyur ba'i ting nge  'dzin kho na yin pas shugs kyis 'jug pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: rten gyi don ni gnas kyi don te / / +rgyu'i don ni ma yin pas gnas logs shig tu smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234103#234112#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2567;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2568# de la sbyor ba'i shes pa de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i yid la byed pa shugs kyis 'jug pa'i gnas su gyur ba'i ting nge  'dzin kho na yin pas shugs kyis 'jug pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: gzhan du na ni dbyings kyi sgra nyid kyis chog par 'gyur ro // / +de yod pas na  'gro kun dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234113#234125#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2567;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2569# de la sbyor ba'i shes pa de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i yid la byed pa shugs kyis 'jug pa'i gnas su gyur ba'i ting nge  'dzin kho na yin pas shugs kyis 'jug pa zhes bya'o // / +rtsa ba'i ye shes de ni tha dad pa'i spyod yul gyi gnas su med par brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin pas mi gnas pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: mya ngan 'das pa'ang thob par 'gyur // / +zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gtan la dbab pa'i gnas su 'og nas bshad pa lta bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234121#234133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2569# rtsa ba'i ye shes de ni tha dad pa'i spyod yul gyi gnas su med par brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin pas mi gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234239#234246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2580;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2579;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2581# rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni mi gnas pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: skye ba kun nas nyon mongs pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na sems can dmyal ba la sogs par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang   skye ba la sogs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa log pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234134#234150#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2569;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2570# rjes la thob pa'i ye shes ni spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'grub pa'i rten du gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin pas shin  tu sbyang ba byas pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de'i phyir de thob pa yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234151#234158#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2570;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2571;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2572# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang  dmigs pa dang  yongs su bsgom pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa gang yin pa dang zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid bdun bstan pa ste / /

column3: yang zhal nas gsungs pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sgrub ste / / +chos kun sa bon thams cad pa'i // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234159#234167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2571;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2572;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2573# 'dis ni sbyor ba'i dus kyi shes rab bstan to // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: rnam par shes pa kun    gzhi ste // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +skye ba can zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234168#234185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2574;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2575# theg pa chen po'i gsung rab yin pas gsung rab 'di thos par nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la don gyis thos pa'i shes rab ces bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234188#234199#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2575;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2576;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2577# dmigs pa'i  ZHES BYA BA NI TING nge 'dzin la gnas pa la don gyis bsam pa'i shes rab ces bstan to // /
column6: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1208352#1208353#TD4047E.TXT.r_12426# shes rab dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ZHES BYA BA NI TING nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa'i shes rab ces bya ba'i don to // /

column3: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams las rnam par dbye ba'o // / +rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa can nyon mongs  pa thams cad kyi bang ba dang mdzod lta bur gyur pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'bras bu'i dngos por sbyor ba ma yin te / /
column4: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2083449#2083449#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15305;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15306;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15307# gnyis su med cing zhes pa ni bar chad med par yid la byed pa ston pa'o // / +tshad med PAR ZHES BYA BA NI mtha' yas par mos pa'o // / +'di ni rnal 'byor pa ting nge 'dzin la     // /

column3: de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro // / +mi mthun pa dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por mi rung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234200#234207#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2577;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2578# ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su yang ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par nus    pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1187714#1187715#TD4047E.TXT.r_9522;TD4047E.TXT.r_9523# 'jig rten  pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i YANG PHYIR RO // / +yang ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab dang  rnam par grol ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i yang phyir dang  gnyis kyis skal ba dang ldan pa rnams mnyam par gzhag pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rgyu YANG YIN PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column3: gang na mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod pa de na gnyen po yod pa'i phyir gnas ni yin no / / +rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i don ni kun gzhi'i don no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234208#234219#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2577;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2578# ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su yang ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par nus    pa'i phyir ro // / +bshad pa'i rnam pa bzhin du ni shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab dbang du gyur ba'i phyir chos kyi mtshan ma rab tu rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: lhan cig 'jug pa'i don ni gnas kyi don te / / +sman nad med kyi thigs pa dug gi bum pa dang lhan cig gnas pa ni dug gi rgyu las 'byung bar mi rung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234220#234237#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2578;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2579;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2580# bshad pa'i rnam pa bzhin du ni shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab dbang du gyur ba'i phyir chos kyi mtshan ma rab tu rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa zhes bya'o // / +nang gi so so yang dag par rig pa  yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni shugs kyis 'jug pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: der zhes bya ba ni bag chags kyi gnas ston te / / +bag chags tsam ni  kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi / /
bag chags kyi gnas dang bcas pa la bya ste / / +dper na gzhan dag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234247#234262#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2581;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2582;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2583# rjes la thob  pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni / / +mngon du khyad par bag chags bsgo // / +zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
yang na sems can dag de'i bdag nyid du  sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234263#234271#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2583;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2584# theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi bstan pa thos pa'i shes rab kyis dmigs pa byas  nas dpag tu med pa'i bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: ji ltar chen po la sogs pa gsal ba dag gtso bo la mi gsal ba'i bdag nyid du sbyor ba ltar chos thams cad kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la de lta ni ma yin no zhes bye brag tu dbye ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234272#234287#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2583;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2584# theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi bstan pa thos pa'i shes rab kyis dmigs pa byas  nas dpag tu med pa'i bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir ro // / +brgyud de bshad pa dag las dang po gcig ni ting nge 'dzin gyi cha lhan cig ma snyoms pa'i bsam gtan pa rgyu mtshan gyi rnam pa la rtog pa yin pas mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: sa bon thams cad pa zhes  bya ba smos te / / +sa bon thams cad dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234288#234295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2584;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2585# brgyud de bshad pa dag las dang po gcig ni ting nge 'dzin gyi cha lhan cig ma snyoms pa'i bsam gtan pa rgyu mtshan gyi rnam pa la rtog pa yin pas mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: sten pa'i tshul gyis kun gzhi dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa phan tshun du sbyor te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234296#234303#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2585# gnyis pa ni shes rab kyi cha  lhag cing ma snyoms pa'i bsam gtan pa lta ba'i rnam pa la rtog cing rang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin pas yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: gtso bo nyid gsal ba'ang yin la bdag gi ngo bo yang yin zhes bya ba de ni 'gal lo // / +dam pa dag la zhes bya ba ni  byang chub sems dpa' khyad par can rnams la bshad pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234304#234315#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2585;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2586;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2587# gnyis pa ni shes rab kyi cha  lhag cing ma snyoms pa'i bsam gtan pa lta ba'i rnam pa la rtog cing rang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin pas yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'os yin pa'i phyir ro // / +'os ma yin pas gzhan dag la ni ma bshad do // / +de ni len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya ste zhes bya ba ni lung gzhan gyis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam grangs su rnam par 'jog pas grags     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234314#234324#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2586;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2587;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2588# ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab cha mnyam pa'i bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga'i cha zhes bya'o // / +tshul bzhin yid la byed  pa'i shes pa dang  mtshungs par ldan pa mthong ba'i lam gyi bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de ni mi gnas pa zhes bya'o / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234324#234333#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2587;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2588# tshul bzhin yid la byed  pa'i shes pa dang  mtshungs par ldan pa mthong ba'i lam gyi bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de ni mi gnas pa zhes bya'o / / +tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i shes pa dang  mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: pa ston to // / +len pa'i rnam par shes pa zab cing phra // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zab pa ni 'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa'i blos kyang gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234334#234352#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2588;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2589;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2590;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2591# tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i shes pa dang  mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o // / +byang chub  sems dpa'i sde snod las bstan pa'i sbyor ba'i bsam gtan thob pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa'i shes rab po // /

column3: phra ba ni nyan thos rnams kyis kyang shes par dka' ba'i phyir ro // / +de'i phyir de dag  shes bya phra ba thams cad shes pa'i skabs ma yin pas nyan thos rnams la ma bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234352#234361#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2590;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2591;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2592;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2593# dmigs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam pa'i shes rab bo // / +bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni bsgom pa'i shes rab yin te / /

column3: chu bo zhes bya ba ni skad cig gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas rgyud mi 'chad pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234360#234374#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2592;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2593;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2594;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2595;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2596# shes rab gsum po 'di dag la brten nas     // / +ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa rgya cher bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: chu'i chu bo bzhin no // / +ji srid 'khor gyi bar du rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med pas 'di la bdag tu yongs  su sems par gyur na mi rung zhes byis pa bdag tu lta ba de dag la ma bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232702#232706#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2386# de'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bdun zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234375#234388#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2595;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2596;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2597;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2598# ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo yin la / / +bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal yin pas so // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225322#225322#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1471# de'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa  yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235718#235719#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2792# de ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste / /

column3: dbang po gzugs can thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra 'jug pa'i rgyur ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234389#234397#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2597;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2598;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2599;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2600# de ni bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i mtshan  nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sgro 'dogs pa dad / /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234436#234438#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2603;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2604# de la sgro 'dogs pa dang   skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs te / /

column3: 'dis tshe ji srid par rjes su 'jug gi bar du grub pa dang bde ba gcig pas dbang po gzugs can thams cad  len pas len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234397#234411#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2599;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2600;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2601# skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs te / / +dbu ma'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba ni shes rab ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  drug pa shes rab kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // /
column5: 0.013#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120044#3120045#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4049;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4050# de'i shes rab de sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' dang  skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs  te ; / +dbu ma'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba dang  shes rab des stong pa nyid dang  smon pa med pa nyid dang  mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa dang  kun brtags pa dang  gzhan gyi  dbang dang  yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid gsum po dag la ngo bo nyid kyi don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang  mtshan nyid dang skye ba dang don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa gsum po dag la ngo bo nyid med pa'i don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang  rig  pa'i gnas lnga po dag la kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang  de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun la / /

column3: gzhan du na ni shi ba'i ro bzhin du 'jig par 'gyur ro // / +lus kun te / / +lus te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232400#232402#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2341;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2342# gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pa bcas pa la bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad la mkhas pa dang  ltung ba las bslang ba la  mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston te / / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan pa yang dang po mtshan nyid bdun bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234412#234419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2600;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2602# dbu ma'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba ni shes rab ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  drug pa shes rab kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas ston to // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233337#233341#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2468;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2469# rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // / +rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa bdun du dbye ste / /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234023#234023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2558;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2559# byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang  gnyi ga'i cha dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa  bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba bstan te / /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225360#225360#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1473# 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug  bsdu bas bstan te / /

column3: lus thams cad nye bar len pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dbang po gzugs can rnams ma byung ba dang  gzugs med par yang lus mngon par 'grub  pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234420#234433#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2602;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2603# 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas ston to // / +rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa gnyis kyis rnam pa bdun du dbye ba 'di ni mtshan nyid dang po bstan pa'o // /

column3: nyid mtshams sbyor ba'o // / +de sprel ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa'o // / +de mngon par 'grub pa nye bar 'dzin pa'i phyir khu chu dang khrag gi nang du brgyal ba na kun gzhi rnam par shes pas lus mtha' dag bzung ba yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234432#234447#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2602;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2603;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2604# rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa gnyis kyis rnam pa bdun du dbye ba 'di ni mtshan nyid dang po bstan pa'o // / +de la sgro 'dogs pa dang   skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs te / /
column5: 0.013#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120044#3120044#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4049;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4050# de'i shes rab de sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' dang  skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs  te ; / +dbu ma'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba dang  shes rab des stong pa nyid dang  smon pa med pa nyid dang  mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa dang  kun brtags pa dang  gzhan gyi  dbang dang  yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid gsum po dag la ngo bo nyid kyi don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang  mtshan nyid dang skye ba dang don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa gsum po dag la ngo bo nyid med pa'i don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang  rig  pa'i gnas lnga po dag la kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang  de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun la / /

column3: lus mtha' dag gi bag chags bsgos pa'i phyir yongs su bzung ba yin no // / +de ni sems zhes kyang bya ste / / +zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs rnam par gzhag pa nyid du lung gzhan gyis ston par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234446#234462#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2604;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2606# dbu ma'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen bo bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360515#2360515#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5785# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /

column3: gnyis pa nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ces bya ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa nyon mongs pa bzhi po dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234463#234473#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2606;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2607# med pa dang rgyu med pa la nan tan gyis yod pa nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir sgro 'dogs  pa zhes bya'o // / +yod pa dang med pa'i rgyu la nan tan gyis med do zhes skur ba'i phyir skur ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba ste / /

column3: de la 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni  bdag dang bdag gis mngon par zhen pa'o // / +de'i dbang gis nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234474#234482#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2606;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2608# yod pa dang med pa'i rgyu la nan tan gyis med do zhes skur ba'i phyir skur ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba ste / / +de ltar sgro 'dogs ma dang skur ba 'debs pa de dag ni gnyi ga yang mtha' zhes bshad do // /

column3: nga'o bdag go snyam du khengs so // / +de gnyis yod na bdag la chags pa 'byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234481#234490#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2609# de ltar sgro 'dogs ma dang skur ba 'debs pa de dag ni gnyi ga yang mtha' zhes bshad do // / +de la mtha' ni ltung bar byed pa'i don yin te / /

column3: bdag la dga'o // / +de gsum gyi rgyu ni ma rig pa ste / / +mi shes pa rig pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234489#234499#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2610;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2611# 'di gnyis 'byung bar gyur ba dbu ma'i  lam las nyams par gyur bas so // /

column3: de ni rnam par shes    pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnas yin te / / +mnyam par gzhag pa dang  mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang  dge ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234498#234509#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2610;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2611;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2612;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2613# 'di gnyis 'byung bar gyur ba dbu ma'i  lam las nyams par gyur bas so // / +kun du brtags pa ni sgro 'dogs pa kho na yod kyi / /

column3: 'gal ba med par kun du 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +gzhan du na ni dge ba'i sems la nga'o snyam du ji ltar 'gyur / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234510#234521#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2613;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2614;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2615;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2616;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2617# de ltar yod pa la ltos nas gdod skur pa 'byung bas so // / +gzhan gyi dbang la ni sgro 'dogs par mi byed de / /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372906#2372906#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7394;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7395# 'on kyang kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs  pa'i tshe gzhan gyi dbang gi rang gi mtshan nyid la so sor rtog par mi byed de / / +so sor mi rtog pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang mi snang ngo zhes bstan to // /
column6: 0.020#TD4051E.TXT.r#1233831#1233833#TD4051E.TXT.r_222;TD4051E.TXT.r_223# yod pa la skur pa 'debs PA'I PHYIR RO // / +gzhan gyi dbang la sgro 'dogs par    mi byed de yod PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column7: 0.025#TD4048E.TXT.r#1688737#1688737#TD4048E.TXT.r_684# skyes nas kyang skad cig las lhag par bdag nyid gnas par mi nus pas na gzhan gyi dbang zhes bya'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1124924#1124924#TD4047E.TXT.r_513# gzhan gyis bcol zhing gsol ba btab pa rnams la grogs byed du 'gro ba bstan pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang du byed cing gzhan la rag  las par byed de zhes bya ba ni / /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535260#535260#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11180# skyes nas kyang skad cig las lhag par bdag nyid gnas par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: gnas gcig pos ni skyed  ces bya ba ni 'gags ma thag pa'i yid kyis so // / +gnyis pas ni nyon mongs pa can du byas pa ste zhes bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234520#234540#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2615;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2616;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2617;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2618;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2619;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2620;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2621;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2622# bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir ro / / +'di ltar  yod pa ma yin pa las / /

column3: nyon mongs pa bzhi dang mtshungs par ldan pa ste / / +ngar 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni des byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.023#TD4051E.TXT.r#1233844#1233847#TD4051E.TXT.r_225;TD4051E.TXT.r_226# skur par yang mi byed de 'khrul pa tsam du YOD PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380217#2380219#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8285;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8286# skur par yang mi byed de yang dag pa ma yin pa tsam du yod pa'i  phyir ro // / +yongs su grub pa la ni sgro 'dogs par mi byed de yang dag par YOD PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column3: yul la rnam par rig pa'i phyir // / +zhes  bya ba ni yul 'dzin par snang ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i sgrar grub bo // /

column5: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367102#2367102#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6641;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6642# bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa dang  chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  rnam par bshad pa las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las  bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385997#2385997#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8937# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las bstan pa bzhin no // /
