column18: 0.007#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2610637#2610637#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9295# de bas na 'phags pa la nges par mi rtog pa'i sgo nas bdag tu lta ba  la sogs pa 'byung bar mi rung bas yongs su nyams pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pas yongs su nyams pa med do // /
column19: 0.007#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#970574#970574#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10293# chos kyi sbyin pa chen po ston pa rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba dang don gcig tu sbyar ba'i phyir / / +de la dang pos ni mang du thos pa'i phyir gsal bar ston par 'gyur RO ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column20: 0.007#TD4069E.TXT.r#664728#664728#TD4069E.TXT.r_5903;TD4069E.TXT.r_5904# 'o na de lta na ni gzugs mang po las gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du bstan pa ni 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar byas pas 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir  yin zhe na / /
column21: 0.007#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603089#2603090#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8395;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8396# dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba kho na'i phyir spel bar byed kyi de dag la yang yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir nyon  mongs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // / +yang ji ltar na nyon mongs pas 'jigs pas yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir spel bar byed ce na / /
column22: 0.008#TD4047E.TXT.r#1174874#1174874#TD4047E.TXT.r_7815;TD4047E.TXT.r_7816# 'gal ba dang bcas pa ni byang  chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // / +bsam pa dag pa'i sar chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam pa dag pa'i khyad par thob pa'i phyir chos nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi mchod pa la rtag tu zhugs pa nyid yin pas de ni sgrub pa'i mchod pa dang 'bral ba'i dus med de / /
column23: 0.008#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847941#2847942#TD4052E.TXT.r_773;TD4052E.TXT.r_774# rnam pa gcig tu na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang  so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi  shes pas yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir zab pa'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa'i shes pas shes par dka' ba'i phyir phra ba'o // /
column24: 0.010#TD4044E.TXT.r#391376#391376#TD4044E.TXT.r_1779;TD4044E.TXT.r_1780# grol ba rnams yongs su byang bar mdzad pa'i phyir te / / +bstan par mdzad pa'i don du sbyong bar mdzad pa'i don to // /
column25: 0.010#TD4051E.TXT.r#1250238#1250239#TD4051E.TXT.r_2527# bsnyen bkur byed pa la sogs pa tshe 'di'i 'bras bu la chags par mi sems pa'i phyir dang  byang chub chen po thob par bya BAR SEMS PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column26: 0.010#TD4047E.TXT.r#1124486#1124488#TD4047E.TXT.r_447;TD4047E.TXT.r_448;TD4047E.TXT.r_449# bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir / / +sems can la dga' ba yin no // / +rnam pa bcus ji ltar rigs par sems can la sogs pa'i yul la yang dag par sgrub par byed pas 'jug pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtags bstan pa'i phyir / /
column27: 0.010#TD4047E.TXT.r#1169088#1169088#TD4047E.TXT.r_7061;TD4047E.TXT.r_7062# sems nye bar brtan PAR BYED PA'I PHYIR RO // / +zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed pa mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i phyir / /
column28: 0.010#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2050288#2050288#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10451;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10452# dbang po rno ba'i phyir na mi gyo ba ste / / +'di gyo bar mi nus pa'i  phyir mi gyo ba'i chos can no // /
column29: 0.010#TD4017E.TXT.r#2655828#2655828#TD4017E.TXT.r_407# slob pa'i sa rnams rdzogs pas 'gog pa'i bden pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro // /
column30: 0.010#TD4037E.TXT.r#1335581#1335581#TD4037E.TXT.r_2729;TD4037E.TXT.r_2731;TD4037E.TXT.r_2732;TD4037E.TXT.r_2733;TD4037E.TXT.r_2734# bsdigs pa'am / / +gsad pa'am / / +bcing ba'am / / +chad pas gcad pa'am / / +go rar gzhug pa'am / /
column31: 0.010#TD4043E.TXT.r#362822#362822#TD4043E.TXT.r_988;TD4043E.TXT.r_989# des chad pa'i mthar thug par 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +'gyod par mi byed PAS ZHES BYA BA NI snying rje med par gyur pas phyir blang ba'i rgyur gyur pa yid la gtsigs pa'i  gnas med par ston to // /
column32: 0.010#TD4069E.TXT.r#636813#636813#TD4069E.TXT.r_1976# 'bad pa med pa dang  ji ltar 'dod par  'byung BA'I PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA NI 'BAD pa med par 'byung ba'i phyir dang  ji ltar 'dod par 'byung BA'I PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA'I THA TSHIG GO // /
column33: 0.010#TD4069E.TXT.r#642100#642100#TD4069E.TXT.r_2739# zhum pa dang  rgod pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa nyid kyi phyir ZHES BYA BA NI ZHUM pa'i gnyen po bsgom pa'i phyir sems rab tu 'dzin par byed do // /
column34: 0.010#TD4071E.TXT.r#408881#408881#TD4071E.TXT.r_1549;TD4071E.TXT.r_1550# de ni len pa yang yin la rnam par  shes pa yang yin pas len PA'I RNAM PAR SHES PA'O // / +gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ZHES BYA BA NI RTEN du gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column35: 0.010#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2641482#2641482#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13196;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13197# de med pa ni mig GI RNAM PAR SHES PA med pa'i phyir ro // / +bde ba'i snying pos BSKYED PA'I PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column36: 0.010#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2074422#2074424#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13959;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13960# 'dis rnam par 'byed par byed pas na zhes bya ba'i phyir ro // / +'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur BA'I PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA NI rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur BA'I PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA'I don to // /
column37: 0.011#TD4054E.TXT.r#1024698#1024698#TD4054E.TXT.r_5582;TD4054E.TXT.r_5583# de dag ni sems kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bsam gtan gyi sgo nas gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsgribs pa'i lung du ma bstan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de la  sred pas ni ro myang ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs so // /
column38: 0.011#TD4091E.TXT.r#748778#748779#TD4091E.TXT.r_9756# sdug bsngal ril gyis yongs su shes par bya ba dang  kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang  'gog pa la mngon du bya bar mi nus  kyi lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus par mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir de la mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes las thob pa'i thob pa mi skye'o // /
column39: 0.011#TD4032E.TXT.r#1957985#1957985#TD4032E.TXT.r_5984;TD4032E.TXT.r_5985;TD4032E.TXT.r_5986# 'khrul pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o // / +ma 'khrul ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i ma 'khrul ba ni / / +ma 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir ma 'khrul ba'i 'bras bu ni rnam par byang ba ste / /
column40: 0.011#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2935269#2935269#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9277# gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par bya ba dang  sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtha' med pa'i phyir te / /
column41: 0.011#TD4035E.TXT.r#177844#177845#TD4035E.TXT.r_9303# gsum po 'di dag ni bsod nams 'dod nas log par phyi rol gyi me la rim gro bya bar mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rim gror bya ba don med par mi 'gyur BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR / /
column42: 0.011#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1477061#1477061#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8958# mi dge ba ni sa gong ma pa'i dge ba'i sbyor ba nyid yin par mi srid pa'i phyir dang  de ma spangs par sa gong mar skye ba'i sems mi     // /
column43: 0.011#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#777600#777600#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1773;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1774# 'dir yang sems bcas pa smos pa ni 'di sems gyengs pa med pas na sems ma gyengs pa ste / / +sems gyengs pa bkag pa'i phyir dang  mi gyeng ba mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column44: 0.012#TD4049E.TXT.r#2305283#2305283#TD4049E.TXT.r_3085# 'bel ba'i gtam gyis gtan la 'bebs pas chos la rdzogs par longs spyod pas bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir / /
column45: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#1332806#1332812#TD4037E.TXT.r_2326;TD4037E.TXT.r_2327# sems can rnams kyi don du tshogs chung ngus longs spyod bsgrub pa'i phyir  dang ; / +sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes pa sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column46: 0.012#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2625945#2625945#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11139;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11140# de med pa'i phyir ro // / +sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa med pa'i shes pa bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dang  bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang  mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa de lta bu ni 'thob po // /
column47: 0.012#TD4053E.TXT.r#2967348#2967348#TD4053E.TXT.r_391;TD4053E.TXT.r_392# sngon gyi las las nges par byung  ba'i phyir rnam par smin PA'I RNAM PAR SHES PA'O // / +yang dang yang nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed pas len PA'I RNAM PAR SHES PA'O // /
column48: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#1331303#1331304#TD4037E.TXT.r_2132;TD4037E.TXT.r_2133# nang gi rig pa dang  gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang  sgra'i rig pa dang  nad gso ba'i rig pa dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas kyi rig pa'o // /
column49: 0.013#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136706#1136707#TD4047E.TXT.r_2233# rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgyad po 'di dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i phyir dang  yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir  bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bas phan pa ste gzhan gyi don las brtsams pa'o // /
column50: 0.013#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2550998#2550998#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1881;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1882# chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya bar chos kyi ngo bo nyid mngon PAR SHES PA'I PHYIR RO // / +gya gyu'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir ZHES BYA BA NI GYA gyu'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir te / /
column51: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324602#2324602#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1666# theg pa chen po la skur ba 'debs pa'i sems can mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir de la mos par mi 'gyur te / /
column52: 0.014#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096203#3096203#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_614# de med na nye bar 'dogs pa yang med par 'gyur bas de'i phyir de gnyi ga yang med par thal bar 'gyur ba dang  nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang  sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i skyon du  yang 'gyur ro // /
column53: 0.015#TD4095E.TXT.r#96172#96172#TD4095E.TXT.r_6431# phyir mi 'ong ba dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR RO // /
column54: 0.015#TD4010E.TXT.r#2274601#2274603#TD4010E.TXT.r_5625# gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang  gcad pa dang  dbug pa'i rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i phyir sems can ma lus pa'i  don yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o // /
column55: 0.015#TD4039E.TXT.r#1858829#1858830#TD4039E.TXT.r_5083# snga ma bzhin du 'du byed thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir dang  de ma yin pa'i byed pa po'i sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column56: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264094#264095#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6337;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6338# lhag pa ci yang med pas dbrir med pa'i  phyir ro ; / / +byang chub sems dpas 'thob pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang yin pa dang  'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'thob pa'i mtshan la bye brag tu gyur pa ci yod ce na / /
column57: 0.016#TD4048E.TXT.r#1683982#1683982#TD4048E.TXT.r_7;TD4048E.TXT.r_8# theg pa chen po la shin tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas / / +theg pa chen po'i che ba'i bdag nyid brjod pa'i phyir / /
column58: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#1167738#1167740#TD4047E.TXT.r_6863# chos la ser sna byed pa gzhom pa'i don dang  ma 'ongs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i  phyir dang  sems can rnams yongs su smin PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR RO // /
column59: 0.018#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2035520#2035521#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8316;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8317# so so'i skye bo'i rgyud la yod pa ni thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor  ba na 'dris pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob pa'o // / +'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa ni ma 'dris pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'o // /
column60: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2350815#2350815#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4626# bzhi po 'di dag ni gzugs can gyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir dang  gzugs can gyi chos    thams cad rab tu nyams par byas pa'i phyir dang  gzugs kyi chos 'dir skye ba'i skabs med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column61: 0.018#TD4018E.TXT.r#3054340#3054340#TD4018E.TXT.r_6486# de  yang snang ba dang bcas pa dang snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang byed pa rnam pa de lta bu'i dbang byed pa thob nas ma lus pa'i sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir 'jug pas na ji lta bur bshad pa de lta bur theg pa gcig pu nyid do // /
column62: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#804497#804498#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6304;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6305# mngal nas skye ba dang  sgo nga las skye ba'i sems can du gyur pa'i phyir ro //// /
column63: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477226#477226#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3549# sems can gdul ba'i mkhyen pa'i mchog brnyes PAR GYUR PA'I PHYIR RO ZHES BSTAN par 'gyur ro // /
column64: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#830992#830992#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10671;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10672# tshe bdag nyid ma gtogs pa lhag ma gnas par byed pa ste / / +skye ba'i mtshan nyid med par ni de dag gnas par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column65: 0.019#TD4010E.TXT.r#2246039#2246039#TD4010E.TXT.r_1939;TD4010E.TXT.r_1940# zhes bya ba ni 'tsho ba'i don gyi bzo'i gnas la sogs pa la mi mkhas pa'i phyir dbul por gyur la / / +'tsho ba med pas 'tsho ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung     // /
column66: 0.020#TD4025E.TXT.r#2172006#2172006#TD4025E.TXT.r_844# snying rje chen pos sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su ma btang bas ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir / /
column67: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264799#264800#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6429# rigs kyi bu de lta na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lung gi tshad ma'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid lnga po dag gis yongs su dag pa YIN NO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa tshad ma gsum las brtsams nas mtshan nyid  snga ma lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa'o // /
column68: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264887#264887#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6439;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6440# de ltar na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni / / +mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  dpe'i phyir dang  yongs su grags pa'i phyir dang  lung gi  tshad ma'i phyir mtshan nyid lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column69: 0.020#TD4018E.TXT.r#3081206#3081206#TD4018E.TXT.r_10073# rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang mtshan mas brgyan pa'i sku la sogs par snang bas sems can mgu bar bya ba'i phyir dang  shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ji ltar rtag pa dang  bdag tu chags pa dang  las kyi rgyu las skye ba dang  'chi  ba'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ldog pa de ltar chos ston to // /
column70: 0.020#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1060344#1060344#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1305;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1306# dgra bcom pa dbang po rnon po rnams ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas    PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR RO // / +dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i yang phyir te / /
column71: 0.020#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2070011#2070011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13311# rmad du byung ba ni sangs rgyas rnams las gzhan la med pa'i phyir dang  mdzad par dka' ba'i phyir dang  brnyes par dka' ba'i phyir ro // /
column72: 0.021#TD4025E.TXT.r#2174537#2174537#TD4025E.TXT.r_1283# de ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba SPANG BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR chos bstan / /
column73: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2162254#2162254#TD4029E.TXT.r_5496# de ni 'gro ba la 'khyud nas 'dug pa lta bu yin pas snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa rna bas  sems can la phan par byed kyi gtan du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug pa ni ma yin no // /
column74: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478012#478012#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3642;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3643# de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid so so tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dam pas sems can thams cad rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // /
column75: 0.021#TD4018E.TXT.r#3086925#3086925#TD4018E.TXT.r_10781# rab tu dag pa'i sa la gang  zag dang chos la bdag med pa khong du chud pa nas bdag dang bdag gir mngon par chags pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bzung ba yongs su spangs te / /
column76: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1205917#1205917#TD4047E.TXT.r_12035# brtan par  gyur na sems can rnams kyi log par bsgrub pas mi mjed pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin no // /
column77: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1001038#1001038#TD4054E.TXT.r_1604;TD4054E.TXT.r_1605# 'das pa'i tshe rabs brgyud nas 'ongs pa shes pa'i phyir  'ong ba'o // / +ma 'ongs pa'i skye bar 'gyur ba shes pa'i phyir 'gro ba'o // /
column78: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1198931#1198931#TD4047E.TXT.r_11033# dbang phyug spangs nas nges par 'byung ba'i rgyu bstan pa'i phyir gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o / /
column79: 0.024#TD4048E.TXT.r#1694365#1694365#TD4048E.TXT.r_1500;TD4048E.TXT.r_1501# sems can thams cad kyi log par sgrub pa rnams kyis de las phyir mi phyogs pa'i phyir ro // / +mngon du phyogs par dka' ba spyod pa ni / /
column80: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#293696#293696#TD4026E.TXT.r_3233;TD4026E.TXT.r_3234# gsal ba ni zad par ston pas slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa'i phyir ro // / +sna tshogs ni mi zlos pa'i phyir ro // /
column81: 0.024#TD4010E.TXT.r#2230763#2230764#TD4010E.TXT.r_122# de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos nyan pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir 'gro ba zhes bya ba ste / /
column82: 0.024#TD4046E.TXT.r#2205495#2205496#TD4046E.TXT.r_1285# byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'grub par  byed pa'i phyir dang  lha dang mi'i 'gro ba 'grub par byed pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi don mang po'i 'bras bu 'grub par byed pa'i phyir / /
column83: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1179253#1179253#TD4047E.TXT.r_8370# de yang sa re re la ji ltar 'tsham pa'i mtshan 'grub  par byed pa'i phyir dang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'grub par byed pa'i phyir dang  lha dang mi'i 'gro ba 'grub par byed pa'i phyir dang  sems can gyi don mang po'i 'bras bu 'grub par byed pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ste / /
column84: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#634934#634939#TD4069E.TXT.r_1722;TD4069E.TXT.r_1723;TD4069E.TXT.r_1724# the tshom dang ldan pa'i phyir mi gsal ba'o // / +log pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi mkhas pa'o // /
column85: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1161841#1161841#TD4047E.TXT.r_5978# byang chub sems dpa' dbul por gyur na yang tshogs chung dus longs spyod bsgrub pa'i phyir dang  longs spyod kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i bya bas phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i dbang du byas nas smras pa / /
column86: 0.025#TD4046E.TXT.r#2196649#2196649#TD4046E.TXT.r_103;TD4046E.TXT.r_104# snying brtse ba ni ji ltar na 'di na la la dge ba dang gnod pa med pa'i spyod pas gzhan dag la snying brtse bar byed pa lta bu'o // / +don ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir dang  don dang ldan pa'i  phyir te 'dod par bya ba dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa'o // /
column87: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1170384#1170384#TD4047E.TXT.r_7250;TD4047E.TXT.r_7251# snying brtse ba ni ji ltar 'di na la la dge ba dang  gnod pa med pa'i spyod pas gzhan dag la    snying brtse bar byed pa lta bu'o // / +don ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir dang  don dang ldan pa'i phyir te / /
column88: 0.025#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1664761#1664761#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11221# yang na byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni grol ba ma yin pas ma grol     // /
column89: 0.025#TD4032E.TXT.r#1961623#1961623#TD4032E.TXT.r_6544;TD4032E.TXT.r_6545# de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir / / +rnam par  gzhag pas na rnam par gzhag pa'o // /
column90: 0.025#TD4001E.TXT.r#1976610#1976610#TD4001E.TXT.r_574;TD4001E.TXT.r_575# 'gro ba la sogs pa'i  byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir sems can ma yin no // / +skad cig pa'i phyir srog ma yin no // /
column91: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1319645#1319646#TD4037E.TXT.r_528;TD4037E.TXT.r_529;TD4037E.TXT.r_530# de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i rnam pa de dag la ma gtogs par de ma yin par de las bzlog pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag gi don thams cad ni gzhan gyi don dang 'brel pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig  yin pas / / +byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes par byas nas spang bar bya ba ni 'di yin te / /
column92: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#684686#684686#TD4083E.TXT.r_87;TD4083E.TXT.r_88# byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dpag tu med pa yongs su bsdus pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o // / +sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar mngon par gnas pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'o // /
column93: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1846149#1846149#TD4039E.TXT.r_3759;TD4039E.TXT.r_3760# nyon mongs pa  thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o // / +shes pa yongs su byang ba'i phyir ni legs par bsgoms pa'o // /
column94: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#794952#794952#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4720;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4721# rigs mthun pas mtshungs pa'i phyir te / / +de dang 'dra BA'I PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA'I don to // /
column95: 0.027#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530139#1530139#TD4061E.TXT.r_2402# 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag las bzlog nas ji srid du bgrod par bya bar gshegs pa'i phyir dang  'gro ba bzang por gshegs pa'i phyir dang  phyir mi ldog par gshegs pa'i phyir te / /
column96: 0.027#TD4009E.TXT.r#339631#339631#TD4009E.TXT.r_2598;TD4009E.TXT.r_2599;TD4009E.TXT.r_2600# phyir ma yin / / +tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin / / +mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin zhes bya ba'o // /
column97: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#785865#785865#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3178# de'i phyir de ltar na rags pas rnam pa ches mang por brtag tu rung ba'i phyir dang  mang po dag gis brtag par rung ba'i  phyir te ; /

column3: sems kyi sgra de la 'jug pa'i rgyur ston to // / +shes bya phra mo bsdus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas ni shes bya phra mo nye bar bzung ba khas blangs nas nyan thos rnams la ma bshad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235252#235271#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2723;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2724;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2725;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2726# sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i  phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpas rig pa'i gnas lnga bo 'di dag thams cad tshol ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1332819#1332829#TD4037E.TXT.r_2328;TD4037E.TXT.r_2329# byang chub sems dpa'i rig pa'i gnas lnga po 'di dag thams cad tshol yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi    ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir te / /
column6: 0.028#TD4001E.TXT.r#1973301#1973301#TD4001E.TXT.r_108;TD4001E.TXT.r_109;TD4001E.TXT.r_110# dus chen po ni bskal pa grangs  med pa gsum gyis byang chub 'thob pa'i phyir ro // / +yang dag par 'grub pa chen po ni / / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de dag ni shes bya rags pa bsdu bas gdul ba yin pa'i phyir / / +shes bya phra mo shes pa la gtogs pa med pa nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235270#235281#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2724;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2725;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2726;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2727# byang chub sems dpas rig pa'i gnas lnga bo 'di dag thams cad tshol ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir te / / +thams cad la de ltar ma bslabs na / / +rim gyis thams cad mkhyen  pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pa thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#265046#265048#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6460# chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid phan tshun 'gal ba'i rgyu la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#501217#501218#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6807;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6808# res 'ga'  ni phyin ci log tu yang 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383799#2383799#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8698;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8699# yang dag pa nyid du skyon med pa la zhugs pa bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la lta ba zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380317#2380317#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8298;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8299# yod pa la mngon par zhen pa dang  med pa la mngon par zhen pa yang dngos po gnyi ga stod par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no zhe'o // /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371108#2371108#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7158;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7159# ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs pas zhes bya ba ni sems de las phung po lnga dag skye ba dang  'jig pa nyid du mthong ba'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: nyan thos rnams ni shes bya thams cad shas pa la gtogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nus pa dang  don du gnyer ba dang  gtogs pa'i mtshan nyid med  par ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235282#235293#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2726;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2727;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2728# rim gyis thams cad mkhyen  pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pa thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#218503#218507#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_567;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_569# de ni skye ba rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239706#239706#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3302;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3303# bskal pa chen po grangs med pa gsum la ni che bar  rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#461287#461287#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1549# ji ltar legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo las / /

column3: de dag ni de bstan pa med par yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nyan thos rnams la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma bstan kyang shes bya gzugs la sogs pa rags pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235294#235306#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2728;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2729;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2730# legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang don gyis de skad du ston to // /
column5: 0.019#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120091#3120096#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4050;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4051# dbu ma'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba dang  shes rab des stong pa nyid dang  smon pa med pa nyid dang  mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa dang  kun brtags pa dang  gzhan gyi  dbang dang  yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid gsum po dag la ngo bo nyid kyi don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang  mtshan nyid dang skye ba dang don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa gsum po dag la ngo bo nyid med pa'i don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang  rig  pa'i gnas lnga po dag la kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i don kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang  de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun la / /

column3: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bdag nyid la mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dag nyon  mongs pa rnams spangs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235307#235316#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2730;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2731;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2732# de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mtshan nyid drug pa ston to // /

column3: de'i don du de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na tshangs par spyod par gnas so // / +rags pa nyid ni gzugs ni lus can yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235317#235328#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2732;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2733;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2734;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2735# yul mos nas shes pa bstan pa dang  rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis sgrub pa bstan pa ste / /

column3: tshor ba la sogs pa ni dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su chad pa dang  rgyu rags pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235327#235336#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2733;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2734;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2735;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2736# 'di ni dang po'o // / +de la dam pa ni ye shes dam pa'o // / +don ni yul gyi don to // /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#486388#486389#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4842;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4843# don dam pa zhes bya ba yang dam pa ni ye shes dam pa'o // / +don ni yul gyi don te / /

column3: de las bzlog pa     // / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni phra ba'o // / +chos gcig mngon par ma shes shing yongs su ma shes na yang sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par ngas ma bshad do zhes gang gsungs pa de ni nyon mongs pa rnams las dgongs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235337#235344#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2736;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2737;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2738# de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun ni ye shes dam pa'i yul gyi don yin pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235345#235361#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2737;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2738;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2739;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2741# don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste / / +'di ni bdag po'i dbang du bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: ma spangs na zhes bya ba'i bye brag  gi sgra dang gzhi mthun pa'i phyir te / / +nyon mongs pa la ma gtogs pa spang bar bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235362#235370#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2741# las kyang lha'i rgyal po ji tsam du tshig gi brjod pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya'o // / +tshig las dben pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so // /

column3: yang na mi rtag pa la sogs pa spyi'i rnam par snyegs kyi / / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid ces ma bzung bas nyes pa med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235371#235381#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2741;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2742;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2743# tshig las dben pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so // / +bstan bcos shin tu rgyas pa brgya  pa las kyang ; /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes bya  thams cad shes pa la gtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi mthus nus pa dang  don du gnyer ba dang  gtogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235382#235395#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2744# don dam pa'i bden pa ni 'phags pa dag gis shes par bya ba rnam par rtog par bya ba'i ming dang tshig gis thog tu mi phebs pa rang gi nang gi rig pa gzhan dag gi rkyen la mi ltos pa mtshan ma med pa / /

column3: thams cad shes par bya bar gtogs so // / +gzhan du na ni gzhan gyi don byed mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235396#235403#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2744;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2745# tha snyad chad pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o zhes  bshad do ; / / +gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med la tshul gcig tu de la mang du gnas pa'i phyir dang  'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir dang  lhag mthong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis bsgrubs pa ston te / /

column3: gzhan dag gi  bsam pa dang  bag la nyal dang  khams dang  dbang po mchog dang  mchog ma yin pa dang  skal pa yod pa dang  skal ba med pa dang  dus dang dus ma yin pa mi shes pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas gzhan gyis don mtha' dag byed mi nus pa'i phyir de don du gnyer ba'i  byang chub sems dpa' rnams la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235404#235411#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2745# gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med la tshul gcig tu de la mang du gnas pa'i phyir dang  'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir dang  lhag mthong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis bsgrubs pa ston te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235411#235421#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2746# gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med la tshul gcig tu de la mang du gnas pa'i phyir dang  'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir dang  lhag mthong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis bsgrubs pa ston te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235422#235430#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2746;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2747# gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med la tshul gcig tu de la mang du gnas pa'i phyir dang  'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir dang  lhag mthong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis bsgrubs pa ston te / / +'di ni de bzhin gshegs  pa nyid la dmigs pa'i ye shes so // /

column3: de shes pa med par ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par sla ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yongs su shes pa med par don du yongs su rtogs pa spong bar mi 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235431#235438#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2747;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2748# gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa med ces bya ba la sogs pas ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235439#235447#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2748;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2749# rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs dang  spros pa med cing de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gcig 'ba' zhig yod pa la mang du gnas pa'o // /

column3: de ma spangs na  yongs su brtag par ma bya ba'i don yod pa'i phyir rna par mi rtog pa'i ye shes med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235446#235456#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2748;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2749# rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs dang  spros pa med cing de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gcig 'ba' zhig yod pa la mang du gnas pa'o // / +ye shes  ni rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383417#2383418#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8656# kha cig na re bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las    btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa bzhin du chos rnam pa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid de 'di ltar bying ba dang rgod pa dang ro myang ba'o // /

column3: de'i phyir shes bya thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid mngon sum du ma byas pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par sla ba ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235457#235466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2749;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2750# ye shes  ni rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530008#530008#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10527# rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i 'grel ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //// /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#503991#503991#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7179# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa  bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pas yongs su brtag  par bya ba'i don gcig las gcig bzlog pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ma rtogs na ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir thams cad rtogs par mi nus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235464#235475#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2750;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2751# 'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa'i chos de bzhin nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di'i dmigs pa  byed pas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235476#235484#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2750;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2751;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2752;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2753# 'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa'i chos de bzhin nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di'i dmigs pa  byed pas so // / +gzhan yang 'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa zhes bya bas ni / /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320066#2320067#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1077# 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gang rjes su gzung bar mdzad pa de dag gi mos pa'i rjes su yang dag pa'i chos kyi bstan pa 'jug par mdzad pas / /

column3: rnam par rig par snang bar 'byung bar shes na de'i tshe gzung ba'i don med par rtogs nas 'dzin pa yang med par rigs pas khong du chud nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235497#235514#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2755;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2756;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2757;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2758;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2759# gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis so so tha dad pa la dmigs  pa'i phyir ro // / +gnyis pa ni 'dres pa chen po'i chos te / /

column10: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233700#233702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2521;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2522# tshig lnga po 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas / /

column18: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229575#229575#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1997# pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun bas kha cig las mtshan nyid rnam ba bzhis pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan pa yod de / /

column6: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274191#274192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7572;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574# sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan pa'i phyir dang  sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba'i phyir dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams klu la sogs pa dag tu sprul nas mchod pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang  yang bdag nyid  de lta bur sprul nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  lang gi che bsgyur ba las kyang de skad du ston to // /

column15: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258784#258785#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5591# don gzhan la sogs pa'i dgongs  pa de dag ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon dbyeg gnyin dnyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  mdo sde'i rgyan dang  chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa    la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column16: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#454809#454810#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_631# de la gsum pa bsags pa rnam par phye bas sems kyi khyad par bstan pa zhes bya ba yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba byas pa las ji skad du brgyus zhing 'brel pa'i phyir mdo zhes bya'o zhes  'byung ba lta bu ste / /
column17: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2356336#2356337#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5300# rnam par bshad pa ni med pas 'dir ni slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba dang theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig dang sbyar na / /
column18: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#482983#482984#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4353;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4354# de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang / / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2318300#2318301#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_883;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_884# sde snod gsum char la yang sdig pa 'gog pa'i don yod pa'i phyir ro zhe'o // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba las kyang / /
column20: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391341#2391342#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9548# gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba byas pa las / /

column22: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2329677#2329677#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2236;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2237# gzhan yang 'das pa'i dus rgyal po snying rje dang ldan pas ri dags mang po rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin pa'i gnas yin pas de'i phyir yang gnas de drang srong lhung ba ri dags byin pa'i tshil zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / / +zhib tu de nyid las  bstan pa bzhin no // /
column23: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406055#2406055#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11249;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11250# skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snga ma de dag rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang dge ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char chen po bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams mi shes pa las langs pa'i  nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyi me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang  gzhan yang mtshan nyid rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ston cing sems can rnams yongs su sgrol ba'i phyir chos kyi sprin zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin tu rig par bya'o // /
column24: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316532#2316532#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_661# gong du bstan pa'i don rnam pa gnyis ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang 'di skad du ston to // /

column3: chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin nam zhe na / / +thams cad mkhyen pa ni yin mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235602#235609#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2774;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2775# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa la chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ba la thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ni chos zhes bya'o // /

column3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni ma yin no // / +yang rnam grangs kyis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyan thos kyi theg par yang bstan te zhes bya  ba ni sde pa gzhan la grags par nye bar 'god pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i lam po che btod pa nyid du mjug sdud par skabs sbyor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235610#235620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2774;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2775;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2776;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2777# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa la chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ba la thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ni chos zhes bya'o // / +lam gang  yin pa de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235649#235664#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2782;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2783;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2784;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2785;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2786# bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab de ting nge 'dzin gyi sems kyi rgyud la spyod pa'i phyir ro // / +'phel bar byed pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni / /

column8: 0.011#TD4047E.TXT.r#1161810#1161812#TD4047E.TXT.r_5974;TD4047E.TXT.r_5975# nad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par zhi bar bya  ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni nad pa rnams kyi nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // / +phan gdags pa'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA NI nad med par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.011#TD4069E.TXT.r#659832#659832#TD4069E.TXT.r_5244;TD4069E.TXT.r_5245# nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis ni mtshungs pa dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / +rgyas pa'i  phyir na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni go ba yin no // /
column10: 0.011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2062258#2062259#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12193# 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2074427#2074427#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13960# 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA NI rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.013#TD4071E.TXT.r#399571#399571#TD4071E.TXT.r_73# de'i bsam pa ni rnam par dbye ba gang yang rung ba zhig bstan pas don rtogs pa'i phyir de  las gzhan pa'i sgrub pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar na de lus kyis byas pa'i las zhes bya zhes smos nas lus kyi zhes bya ste / /
column13: 0.013#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2918399#2918399#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7102;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7103;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7104# gong du bshad pa ltar na 'du byed rnams sems kyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams skad cig mar rig par bya'o // / +don de nyid bstan pa'i phyir / / +de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir  skad cig ma las 'bras bu skad cig ma med par mi rung ngo zhes smos te / /
column14: 0.013#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2758464#2758464#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8156;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8157# 'dod pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir dang  nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +de la nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di yin te / /
column15: 0.014#TD4046E.TXT.r#2196648#2196649#TD4046E.TXT.r_103;TD4046E.TXT.r_104# snying brtse ba ni ji ltar na 'di na la la dge ba dang gnod pa med pa'i spyod pas gzhan dag la snying brtse bar byed pa lta bu'o // / +don ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir dang  don dang ldan pa'i  phyir te 'dod par bya ba dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.014#TD4047E.TXT.r#1170383#1170384#TD4047E.TXT.r_7250;TD4047E.TXT.r_7251# snying brtse ba ni ji ltar 'di na la la dge ba dang  gnod pa med pa'i spyod pas gzhan dag la    snying brtse bar byed pa lta bu'o // / +don ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir dang  don dang ldan pa'i phyir te / /
column17: 0.014#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#864496#864496#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15862;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15863# 'gro ba la gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi 'gog pa'i phyir te / / +thogs par byed pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column18: 0.015#TD4069E.TXT.r#659647#659647#TD4069E.TXT.r_5211;TD4069E.TXT.r_5212# mdo sde'i don bshad pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir te / / +mdo sde'i don gzhan bshad pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242106#242106#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3595# gnyis pa ni sa brgyad pa la spri la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spangs pas shin tu phra ba'i don gsal bar 'gyur ba'i  phyir spri la yod pa lta bu spangs pa'i phyir ni gsum pa de rab tu dbye ba yin no zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no // /
column20: 0.017#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#970574#970575#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10293# chos kyi sbyin pa chen po ston pa rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba dang don gcig tu sbyar ba'i phyir / / +de la dang pos ni mang du thos pa'i phyir gsal bar ston par 'gyur RO ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column21: 0.017#TD4009E.TXT.r#339631#339633#TD4009E.TXT.r_2598;TD4009E.TXT.r_2599;TD4009E.TXT.r_2600;TD4009E.TXT.r_2601# phyir ma yin / / +tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin / / +mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin zhes bya ba'o // /
column22: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#1157629#1157630#TD4047E.TXT.r_5377# de la mig ltar gyur pa bshad pa'i phyir don gsal ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir zhes bya bas so // /
column23: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162145#1162145#TD4047E.TXT.r_6020;TD4047E.TXT.r_6021# chos kyang don dang nye bar ldan pa ni rjes su mthun pa dang zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +brjod par bya ba'i don phyin ci ma log pa dang ldan pa'i phyir don dang ldan pa'o // /
column24: 0.017#TD4051E.TXT.r#1250241#1250241#TD4051E.TXT.r_2527;TD4051E.TXT.r_2528# bsnyen bkur BYED PA LA SOGS PA tshe 'di'i 'bras bu la chags par mi sems pa'i phyir dang  byang chub chen po thob par bya bar sems pa'i phyir ro // / +tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni brda sprad par zad do // /
column25: 0.017#TD4039E.TXT.r#1820629#1820630#TD4039E.TXT.r_692# de la phan yod ma mthong bas mi 'jug pa'i phyir dang  de thob par yid mi ches pas ma dad  pa'i phyir dang  dmigs pa de la mngon par mi dga' bas mi gnas pa'i phyir dang  de la mngon par mi dga' bas rnam par ma grol ba'i phyir ro // /
column26: 0.017#TD4039E.TXT.r#1858830#1858830#TD4039E.TXT.r_5083# snga ma bzhin du 'du byed thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir dang  de ma yin pa'i byed pa po'i sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.018#TD4067E.TXT.r#1087433#1087433#TD4067E.TXT.r_79;TD4067E.TXT.r_80# de la chags pa ni tshor ba'i ro myang ba'i phyir te / / +mngon par dga' ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column28: 0.018#TD4069E.TXT.r#639943#639943#TD4069E.TXT.r_2432# zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi  mig de ni don mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir log par lta ba'i gnyen po yin no // /
column29: 0.018#TD4025E.TXT.r#2179816#2179816#TD4025E.TXT.r_2136;TD4025E.TXT.r_2137# sems kyi  rang bzhin 'od gsal ba la glo bur gyi dri ma mtha' dag dang bral ba'i phyir ro // / +de la dri ma med pa'i rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu'i don las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /
column30: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1146047#1146047#TD4047E.TXT.r_3624# rab tu 'brel ba'i phyir dang  mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyir dang  mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i sems dang rab tu 'brel pa'i phyir ro // /
column31: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324537#2324537#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1657# chos nyid dang bral ba'i phyir dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i phyir dang  mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro // /
column32: 0.023#TD4017E.TXT.r#2651677#2651678#TD4017E.TXT.r_28;TD4017E.TXT.r_29# sems can dgrol ba la mnga' brnyes pa dang  sngon gyi dus na dam bcas shing  smon lam btab pa de nyid spyod pa dang 'bras bu mthun par gyur pa bzhin sems can thams cad kyang spyod pa de la gzud pa'i phyir don de bstan to // / +de la tshol ba'i rgyu ni mos par bya ba'i le'u las / /
column33: 0.024#TD4041E.TXT.r#1275771#1275771#TD4041E.TXT.r_1051;TD4041E.TXT.r_1052# nyon mongs pa las skyes pa'i phyir dang      // / +nyon mongs pa dang nye bar gyur pa'i phyir dang  sems kyi rgyun nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa'i phyir na nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams te / /
column34: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355047#1355047#TD4037E.TXT.r_5218# sdug bsngal rnam pa drug ni ngan song gi rgyu rten pa'i phyir rgyu'i sdug bsngal dang  ngan song du skyes pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i sdug bsngal dang  longs spyod las  brtsams te yongs su tshol ba'i sdug bsngal dang  bsrung ba'i sdug bsngal dang  chog mi shes pa'i sdug bsngal dang  med par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal te / /
column35: 0.025#TD4026E.TXT.r#306476#306477#TD4026E.TXT.r_5696;TD4026E.TXT.r_5697# de la mnyam pa ni tshor ba rnam pa gsum  car gyi gnas skabs su gang ci tshor ba de ni 'dir sdug bsngal ba'o zhes bya bar rig pa'i phyir ro // / +de yang bsam pa'i phyir ni sems kyis snying rje ba'i phyir ro // /
column36: 0.025#TD4069E.TXT.r#657270#657271#TD4069E.TXT.r_4879# lus yongs su gdung bar byed pa'i phyir dang  sems yongs su gdung bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column37: 0.026#TD4053E.TXT.r#3002833#3002833#TD4053E.TXT.r_5064;TD4053E.TXT.r_5065# smra ba'i  yon tan dang nyes pa brtags nas mi byed pas 'byung ba ni chad pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +byed pas 'byung ba ni lcogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column38: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1050672#1050672#TD4054E.TXT.r_9397;TD4054E.TXT.r_9398;TD4054E.TXT.r_9399# smra ba'i yon tan dang nyes pa brtags nas mi phyed pas 'byung ba ni chad pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir  ro ; / / +byed pas 'byung ba ni / / +mi gzhol ba'i phyir ro // /
column39: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1477061#1477061#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8958# mi dge ba ni sa gong ma pa'i dge ba'i sbyor ba nyid yin par mi srid pa'i phyir dang  de ma spangs par sa gong mar skye ba'i sems mi     // /
column40: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#777600#777600#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1773;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1774# 'dir yang sems bcas pa smos pa ni 'di sems gyengs pa med pas na sems ma gyengs pa ste / / +sems gyengs pa bkag pa'i phyir dang  mi gyeng ba mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column41: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#644328#644328#TD4069E.TXT.r_3062# 'dun pa dang 'dod chags spangs par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA NI 'dun pa spangs par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir dang  'dod chags spangs par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column42: 0.026#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2035520#2035521#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8316;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8317# so so'i skye bo'i rgyud la yod pa ni thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor  ba na 'dris pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob pa'o // / +'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa ni ma 'dris pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'o // /
column43: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2550998#2550998#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1881;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1882# chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya bar chos kyi ngo bo nyid mngon par shes pa'i phyir ro // / +gya gyu'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gya gyu'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir te / /
column44: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478012#478012#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3642;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3643# de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid so so tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dam pas sems can thams cad rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // /
column45: 0.028#TD4052E.TXT.r#2854849#2854849#TD4052E.TXT.r_1662# dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag kyang de dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  de la rag las pas te 'jug pa'i phyir de lta bur grags so // /
column46: 0.028#TD4079E.TXT.r#758413#758413#TD4079E.TXT.r_278;TD4079E.TXT.r_279# rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir / / +de la dmigs pa yin gyi kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no // /
column47: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222301#222302#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1065;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1066# bstan bcos byang chub kyi tshogs bstan pa las ni don rnam pa lngas bstan te / / +yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang  yongs su 'dzin pa'i don dang  gso ba'i don dang  rgyu'i don dang  phun sum tshogs pa'i don te / /
column48: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2930101#2930101#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8645;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8646# bdag tu lta ba la goms par bya ba'i gang zag yod par gsungs pa dang mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ji ltar mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir gang  gi phyir bdag tu lta ba ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa ste zhes bya ba smos te 'di ltar bdag tu lta ba ni 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dus nas sems can gyis goms pa dang  'dris par byas zin pas na de la goms par bya ba'i phyir bshad ces byar mi rung ngo // /

column3: ji lta zhe na / / +'di ltar kun gzhi las yang dag par byung ba zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i dus te de las byung ba'i phyir ro //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235662#235676#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2785;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2788# rnam par 'jog pa 'debs pa'i don to // / +ting nge 'dzin gyi sems der bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab de 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'di ltar yang 'di ni ma 'ongs pa na mngon par dga' ba'i ngang tshul can te / / +de 'dod pa la gzhol ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235677#235684#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2788;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2789# de mngon sum du dbang thob par byed pa'i phyir zhes bya     // / +bas ni 'phal bar byed pa'i don bsnan nas bshad pa ste / /

column3: de lta bas na kun gzhi la mngon par dga' bas can zhes bya ba'o // / +kun gzhi spangs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni legs par gzhom pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235685#235696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2788;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2789# bas ni 'phal bar byed pa'i don bsnan nas bshad pa ste / / +'di ltar bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis sems kyi kun tu spyod pa la dbang thob par byed cing de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'o // /

column3: nyan 'dod ces  bya ba ni nyan par 'dod pa'o // / +rnam par gtod ces bya ba ni smon lam btab nas thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas nyan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474727#474729#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261# chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i yon tan dang  mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa ston pa'i yon tan dang  sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su mchad pa'i yon tan dang  'khor ba'i mtha' ji snyam par sems  can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan dang  mi zad pa'i yon tan la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475086#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477882#477883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3627# 'di nyid dang sbyar te yon tan gyi ming bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par bstan pa rnams yongs su ma 'dres PAR GYUR PA'O // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478759#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3747# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529705#529706#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10481;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482# gnas kyi khyad par gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533783#533783#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535458#535458#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235697#235708#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2789;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2791# 'di ltar bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis sems kyi kun tu spyod pa la dbang thob par byed cing de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226753#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 0.013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.014#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column15: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385675#2385675#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column16: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398087#2398087#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238344#238344#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3123;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3124# 'di ni slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i spyi mjug bsdu ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column18: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column20: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227064#227065#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688# tshul khrims phyi ma gnyis kyi bshad pa ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228204#228204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816# phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column23: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column24: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column25: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen pa zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column26: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column27: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column29: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314615#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column30: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527912#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column32: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244504#244504#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914# ces bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel    pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to // /
column33: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478552#478552#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3713;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3714# 'di ni 'khor ba'i mtha' ji tsam par sems can thams cad la phan pa dang  bde ba nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i yon tan nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column34: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba de 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column35: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /
column36: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214117#214117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig ces ston te / /
column37: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220616#220616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /
column38: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316432#2316432#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column39: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403883#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column40: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536673#536673#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: kun shes par byed par sems nye bar 'jog ces bya ba ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pas don gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235709#235718#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2791;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2792# chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes BYA BA NI BSTAN PA bzhin du spyod pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234382#234384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2597# de ni bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i mtshan  nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes BYA BA NI GNYIS PA mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233306#233306#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2464;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2465# de ni bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bdun pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni / / +gnyis pa bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /

column3: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub  ces bya ba ni bsgoms pa las byung ba 'jig rten las 'das pas so // / +lam gyi bden pa ni bstan pa'i chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos te nan tan du bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397095#2397097#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10215# de nas byang  chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397227#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397271#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397571#2397572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /

column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216182#216185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_265;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_266# 'di ltar gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gnas skabs su kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len rnams yongs  su spong ba'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column28: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244719#244719#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3938;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3939# lam gyi  grangs su gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams dpag tu med pa skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa gzhan dag gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir te / / +dper na shing gi rtsa ba ni sdong bu la sogs pa'i rgyu yin pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221970#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225870#225873#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228563#228565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235751#235764#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2797# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236133#236136#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236670#236673#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226462#226464#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239242#239245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column12: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388443#2388444#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column13: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222895#222896#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column14: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236480#236483#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column15: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237160#237161#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column16: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231004#231004#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column17: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245241#245242#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs PA ZHES BYA BA STON to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column18: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246078#246080#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4097# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan  te ; /
column19: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272278#272278#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7352# de bzhin gshegs pa dang de dag tu rgyu dang rkyen ci zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column20: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273238#273238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7451# bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa lta bu zhig mchis dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems  can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column21: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273603#273603#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7486# dngos po gang ni dka' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa zhing yongs su dag pa dang zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag na gang    dag rnyed par dka' ba dang  gang dag mod pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column22: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237279#237280#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257345#257346#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5386# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig gang ZHE NA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // / +'di'i zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du  gsungs pa ston to // /
column24: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236863#236864#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2926# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di la yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column25: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242523#242523#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3639;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3640# bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa du dag gis gnas ngan len de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa gnas ngan len spong ba'i dus rab tu dbye ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs  pa bstan te ; /
column26: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360973#2360973#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5843;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5844# tshig gang ZHE NA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa tshig rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column27: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361054#2361054#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5854;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5855# yi ge gang ZHE NA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gsum pa yi ge'i rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column3: sa ston sde'i lung las kyang zhes bya ba ni de dag gi lung gi phung po rnam pa gsum la skad cig pa ni gang  dag skad cig re re la skye ba dang 'gag pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235765#235778#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2797;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2798# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // / +'di ni gong du bstan pa'i chags pa med pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las kyi nus pa zhu ba ste / /

column3: de'i tshe rabs pa ni gang dag 'chi ba la thug gi par du rjes su 'brang ba'o // / +'khor ba ji srid pa ni gang dag rdo rjes lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du rjes su 'brang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216406#216409#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_294# zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231591#231593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238776#238778#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3182;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3183# pha rol tu  phyin pa drug po dag las pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /

column21: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220198#220199#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column22: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226438#226439#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /

column26: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231631#231634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column27: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216181#216181#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_265;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_266# 'di ltar gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gnas skabs su kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len rnams yongs  su spong ba'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column29: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236901#236901#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2931# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems  dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column30: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214243#214246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column31: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397570#2397570#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10265;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# gnyis pa ni yan lag bcu gcig las ni du dag gis bsdus par 'gyur zhes zhu ba'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column32: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226477#226481#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1611# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column33: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228595#228599#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1872# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column34: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236517#236517#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2887;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2888# 'bras    bu rnam pa lnga rgya cher bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa khungs su bzhag nas bstan pa las byung ba bzhin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column35: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397394#2397394#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10240;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10241# zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan  du gsungs pa smos pa dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du zhes bya ba man chad zhu ba gsol ba nyid kyi bstan pa smos pa dang  gang gsungs pa'i sa de dag ces bya ba man chad zhu ba gsol ba nyid kyi tshig bstan pa'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba  'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ming ste / /

column6: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324413#2324413#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1645# gal te sems can  gang dag de'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed pa dag ni de dag las chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes thos na skrag  cing dngang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de dag gi lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing / /
