column6: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235924#235924#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2817;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2818# ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang  lan du phan 'dogs pa dang   'brel pa med pa'i phyir / / +phyi ma la bag yod pa'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed de / /

column3: kha cig 'di snyam du zhes bya ba ni log par rtogs pa ston te / / +sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa ni don gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235917#235933#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2816;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2817;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2818;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2819# mi lta ba nyid kyi phyir ni phyi ma la bag yod pa'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed DO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa mi lta ba nyid kyi las bstan to // / +ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang  lan du phan 'dogs pa dang   'brel pa med pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.024#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120291#3120291#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4076# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni ches lhag par bde ba dang  yid bde ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang     phyi ma la de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir dang  mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235906#235906#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2815;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2816# tshe 'di la las rgyun chad med par gus par byed pa'i nan tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag bsgom  pas bag yod pa dang bcas par gyur pa'o // / +mi lta ba nyid kyi phyir ni phyi ma la bag yod pa'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed DO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa mi lta ba nyid kyi las bstan to // /

column3: de yang mi 'thad de zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +yid rnam par shes  pa gnyis don tha dad par dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235934#235947#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2819;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2820# ma 'ongs pa na bag yod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag khad kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni rjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i rang bzhin can gyi sgra gnyis dang don gnyis tha dang ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235948#235960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2820;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2821# kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par bsgom pa dang   yongs su rdzogs pa dang  yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su byang bar byed pa'o ZHES BYA BA NI GSUM PA kha na ma thob med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las bstan to // /

column3: rnam par shes pa drug po 'das ma thag pa ni yid do // / +yul so sor rna par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'byung bas  yid dang rnam par shes pa gnyis don tha dad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235959#235985#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2821;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2822;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2824;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2825# 'di yang kha na ma thob med pa'i phyir ni las kyi tshig bzhi yod par 'gyur te / /

column3: de bzhin du sems kyi don gyis kyang tha dad du dbye bar bya'o // / +yang kha cig ni zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi la kun du dga' ba la sogs pa don gzhan du rtogs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235985#235994#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2825;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2826# snying rje med pa'i phyir dang  tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba dang  rtag tu mi 'byed pa'i sbyor ba dang  ma gus pa'i sbyor ba dag dang bral ba'i phyir tshig  bzhi po 'di dag gsungs pa yin no / /
column5: 0.011#TD4049E.TXT.r#2298818#2298824#TD4049E.TXT.r_2012;TD4049E.TXT.r_2013;TD4049E.TXT.r_2014# sbyor ba ni bzhi ste / / +'dod pa'i sbyor ba dang  srid pa'i sbyor ba dang  lta ba'i sbyor ba dang  ma rig pa'i sbyor ba'o // /
column6: 0.011#TD4054E.TXT.r#1015946#1015952#TD4054E.TXT.r_4218;TD4054E.TXT.r_4219;TD4054E.TXT.r_4220# sbyor  ba ni bzhi ste / / +'dod pa'i sbyor ba dang  srid pa'i sbyor ba dang  lta ba'i sbyor ba dang  ma rig pa'i sbyor ba'o // /
column7: 0.011#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2578699#2578700#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_5341# de dag nyid DANG ZHES BYA BA NI 'DOD pa'i sbyor ba dang srid pa'i sbyor ba dang lta ba'i sbyor ba dang ma rig pa'i sbyor ba'o // /
column8: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1804364#1804368#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13095;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13096;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13097# dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni sbyor ba ste / / +'dod pa'i sbyor ba dang  srid pa'i sbyor ba dang  lta ba'i sbyor ba dang  ma rig pa'i sbyor ba'o // /
column9: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1804493#1804494#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13109# 'dod par mi sbyor ba dang  srid par mi sbyor ba dang  lta bar mi sbyor ba dang  ma rig par mi sbyor ba'o // /
column10: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#1319005#1319005#TD4037E.TXT.r_443;TD4037E.TXT.r_444;TD4037E.TXT.r_445# gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yin te / / +lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba dang  sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'o // / +de la lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ni phan pa bya ba dang  bde ba bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de nyid nyin gcig bzhin du yang  dag par spel ba'o // /
column11: 0.013#TD4054E.TXT.r#1010596#1010598#TD4054E.TXT.r_3306# cha med pas sbyor ba dang  'dres par gyur pas sbyor ba dang  phrad par sbyor ba dang  lhan cig 'byung bas sbyor ba dang  bya ba sgrub pas sbyor ba dang  mthun par rtogs pas sbyor ba'o // /
column12: 0.013#TD4097E.TXT.r#2216042#2216043#TD4097E.TXT.r_1576# sbyor ba rnams kyang tshul 'di dang 'dra STE ZHES BYA BA NI 'DOD pa'i sbyor ba dang  srid pa'i sbyor ba dang  lta ba'i sbyor ba dang  ma rig pa'i sbyor ba rnams so // /
column13: 0.014#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2024627#2024627#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_6740# sbyor ba bzhi ste de dag nyid DO ZHES BYA BA NI 'DOD ba'i sbyor ba dang  srid pa'i sbyor ba dang  lta ba'i sbyor ba dang  ma rig pa'i sbyor ba'o // /
column14: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1756713#1756713#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7217# 'dod    pa'i sbyor ba dang  srid pa'i sbyor ba dang  lta ba'i sbyor ba dang  ma rig pa'i sbyor ba'o // /
column15: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#45604#45606#TD4036E.TXT.r_6951# 'de lta ste mthun pa'i sbyor ba dang  goms pa'i sbyor ba dang  phyin ci ma log pa'i sbyor ba dang  mi lhod pa'i sbyor ba dang  dus kyi sbyor ba dang  nye bar rtog pa'i sbyor ba dang  chog mi shes pa'i sbyor ba dang  mi 'gal ba'i sbyor ba  dang ; /
column16: 0.017#TD4051E.TXT.r#1254738#1254738#TD4051E.TXT.r_3224;TD4051E.TXT.r_3225# bsam gtan byas  na mu ge dang nad kyi 'jigs PA LA SOGS PA ZHI bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +rnam par mi rtog par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba ni rnam par mi rtog par sbyor ba ste / /
column17: 0.026#TD4040E.TXT.r#2195632#2195633#TD4040E.TXT.r_959;TD4040E.TXT.r_960;TD4040E.TXT.r_961# tshul 'chos pa la sogs pas 'tsho ba'i chos rnam par spangs pa'i phyir te / / +'di lta ste / /
column18: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3119651#3119651#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4012;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4013# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de ni sbyor ba bzhis rig par bya ste / / +snying rje med pa'i sbyor ba dang  tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba dang  rtag tu mi byed pa'i sbyor ba dang  gus  par mi byed pa'i sbyor bas so // /

column3: de smras pa / / +nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag ni kun gzhi zhes bya'o  zhes bya ba ste / / +de dag la bdag nyid du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235993#236005#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2825;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2826;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2827# snying rje med pa'i phyir dang  tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba dang  rtag tu mi 'byed pa'i sbyor ba dang  ma gus pa'i sbyor ba dag dang bral ba'i phyir tshig  bzhi po 'di dag gsungs pa yin no / / +kha cig na re yang dag par bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'i tshig go // /

column3: 'jig tshogs la lta ba kun gzhi'o zhes bya bas ni des de dag la bdag nyid du 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236004#236013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2827;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2828# tshig 'og ma gsum po dag ni yon tan gsum gyi rgyu rnam par phye nas bstan pa yin te / /

column3: bde ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dag bcas pa ni kun gzhi'o zhes bya ba ni / / +'dod chags dang tshor ba lhan cig spyod pa'i spyi ni kun gzhi nyid  de ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236012#236023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2827;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2828;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2829;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2830# tshig 'og ma gsum po dag ni yon tan gsum gyi rgyu rnam par phye nas bstan pa yin te / / +de la yongs su rdzogs zhes bya bas ni spangs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyu bstan to // /

column3: 'dod chags rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +yang na so so la bya ste / / +chags pa dang de'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236024#236033#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2830;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2831;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2832# su dag pa zhes bya bas ni ye shes kyi yon tan gyi rgyu bstan to // /

column3: de dag ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la rmongs pa rnams so // / +ji lta zhe na / / +lung dang rtogs pas de snyam du sems so zhes bya ba smos pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236034#236045#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2831;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2832# yongs su byang ba zhes bya bas ni lan du phan 'dogs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyu bstan to zhe'o // / +rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ni thabs la mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya bas  ni bzhi pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las bstan te / /

column3: nye bar bstan pa     // / +nyes par khong du chud pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na yid ches pa'i lung med pa dang  rang gis kyang khong du ma chud pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236046#236058#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2832;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2833;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2834# rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ni thabs la mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya bas  ni bzhi pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las bstan te / /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229312#229312#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1963# pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid kyi rang gi mtshan nyid la sgra ji bzhin du mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // /

column3: nyan thos kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa'i tshul du na yang de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa de mi rung ba med mod kyi zhes bya ba ni smad pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236059#236076#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2834;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2835;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2836# thabs la mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la bya'o / /

column3: rang gi lo rgyus kyi lugs kyis na de thams cad kyi thams cad du rung bar bstan to // / +de la ma rmongs pa rnams kyi kun gzhi rnam par gzhag pa de kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yin par yongs su bzung nas rnam par 'jog pa ni ches bzang ngo zhes bya ba ni smad par rnam par 'grel te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236076#236091#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2836;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2837;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2838# yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyi phyir ni tshe rabs thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa dang  de dag gi 'dod pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mi zad pa nyid thob par byed do zhes bya ba las lnga pa yongs su bsngo ba'i mtshan nyid  kyi las bstan te / /
column5: 0.023#TD4050E.TXT.r#1098595#1098595#TD4050E.TXT.r_222# 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa dang  bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i bar du 'di las bstan te / /
column6: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3105164#3105164#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1915# de la yongs  su bsngo ba nyid ni sbyin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: de'i bshad pa'i  rnam par rtog pa'i nyes pa brjod pa'i phyir ro // / +'di ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i ngan 'gro rnams su skyes pa dag dang mi mthun pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la ngan 'gro ni sems can dmyal ba dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397095#2397097#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10215# de nas byang  chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397227#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397270#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397570#2397572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10265;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# gnyis pa ni yan lag bcu gcig las ni du dag gis bsdus par 'gyur zhes zhu ba'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214020#214024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3# bam po lnga bcu lnga pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216181#216185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_265;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_266# 'di ltar gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gnas skabs su kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len rnams yongs  su spong BA'I PHYIR RO // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220198#220203#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad DO ZHES BYA BA NI gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221934#221937#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1012;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1013# 'phags pa'i gsung rab dag ni so so nas don re re smos pa'i phyir phan tshun 'gal ba med do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223638#223641#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1262;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1263# mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad  ces gsol to // /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226438#226444#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235730#235731#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2793;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2794# mdo nyid kyis brda phrad  par zad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236090#236100#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2836;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2837;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2838;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2839# yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyi phyir ni tshe rabs thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa dang  de dag gi 'dod PA'I RNAM PAR SMIN PA'I 'bras bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mi zad pa nyid thob par BYED DO ZHES BYA BA LAS LNGA pa yongs su bsngo ba'i mtshan nyid  kyi las bstan te / / +mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column17: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236101#236112#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2838;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2839;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2840;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2841# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa gang gsungs pa 'di dag shin tu rgya che ba nyid ni gang lags / /
column18: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236442#236443#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2882# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to ; / /
column19: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236634#236638#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2905# gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gya nom pa bskyed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha DAD PA'I PHYIR RO // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column20: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239206#239214#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3239;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3240;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3242# de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med pa nyid 'dzin par byed do zhes brjod DO ZHES BYA BA NI LNGA pa mjug  bsdu ba ste / / +brda phrad par zad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column21: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245208#245210#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3998# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis    bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column22: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246049#246050#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4094# de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column24: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216406#216409#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_294# zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column25: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235783#235786#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2799# 'di ltar mtshan nyid rnam PA LNGA PO DAG RE re la yang  mos rnam pa du mchis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column26: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231592#231598#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2244# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column27: 0.006#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237122#237127#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2956;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2957;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2958# longs spyod chen po thob pa dang bad 'gror 'gro ba dang  khon med cing dbye ba med pa dang  bde ba dang yid bde ba mang ba dang  sems can gyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa dang  lus la gnod pa med pa dang  dbang che bar grags pa ni go rims bzhin du sbyin pa la  sogs PA'I RNAM PAR SMIN PA'I 'bras bur rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column28: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222909#222912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam PA LNGA PO DAG GIS bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column29: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237242#237243#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2971# rgyu dang rkyen des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub par 'gyur bas so // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column30: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231631#231634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column31: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214243#214245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column32: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224790#224793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1415# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column33: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224732#224732#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1407# brtags na khong du chud par 'gyur bas zhib tu ma  bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column34: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244719#244719#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3938;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3939# lam gyi  grangs su gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams dpag tu med pa skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column35: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228595#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column36: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397443#2397444#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10244;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10245# de'i phyir 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sgo mo la gnas pa'o zhes gsungs so // /
column37: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397477#2397477#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10250;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10251# de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzigs pa'i mdo las / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs     // /
column38: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237177#237178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2963# 'di ni dang po dang  rgyu dang     'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column39: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219872#219872#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_744# mdo 'di las ni dang po las kyi  stobs ma gtogs pa skye ba gzhan rnams las brtsams nas bstan pa yin no // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column40: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223706#223709#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column41: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236517#236517#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2887;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2888# 'bras    bu rnam pa lnga rgya cher bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa khungs su bzhag nas bstan pa las byung ba bzhin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column42: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117956#3117956#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3802;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3803# theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo  las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste / / +bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhu ba zhus pa / /
column43: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219505#219505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_699;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_700# de don gang la dgongs pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column44: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238777#238777#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3182;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3183# pha rol tu  phyin pa drug po dag las pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column45: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244097#244101#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3855;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3856# bskal pa dpag tu med pas 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs  so ; / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column46: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238710#238710#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3176;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3177# de lta bu de dag ni zas dang skom la sgrib pa med pa'i yi dvags rnams zhes bya ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column47: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216362#216366#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_287;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_288# bam po lnga bcu drug pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column48: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228538#228538#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1864;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1865# bam po drug cu pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column49: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402894#2402894#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10942;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10943# bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column50: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239775#239775#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3311;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3312# bam po drug cu bzhi pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: de dag ni rtag par  shin tu sdug bsngal ba nyid du bye brag med de / / +de dag la res 'ga' yang bde ba med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236110#236122#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2839;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2840;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2841;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa gang gsungs pa 'di dag shin tu rgya che ba nyid ni gang lags / / +kun nas  nyon mongs pa mchis pa nyid ni gang lags / /
column5: 0.025#TD4025E.TXT.r#2175327#2175327#TD4025E.TXT.r_1416# shin tu rnam par dag pa mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rnam par dag pa'i gnas skabs 'di nyid la dbye ba med pa'i don las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa / /

column3: mi mthun pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod pa'o // / +'dod pa med pa'i don la ni su yang mi sbyor te / / +sbyor ba'i don dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236123#236132#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382130#2382133#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8517;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8518# bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems  dpa' rnams zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du gyur pa na sems rnam par gyeng bar 'gyur ba'i chos du zhig khong du chud bar bgyi 'tshal lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni gsum pa rnam par gyeng ba rnam pa lnga rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358808#2358808#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5586;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5587# bcom ldan 'das 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gang las rtogs shing gang las thob par 'tshal bar bgyi lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad  ni gsum pa rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i sa'i gnas skabs rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359037#2359037#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5614;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5615# ji ltar na rtog ba ma mchis pa dang dpyod pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi bar 'gyur lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni bcu po rtog pa dang dpyod pa la sogs pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359883#2359883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5699;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5700# btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan ni gang lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad bcu gcig pa zhi gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang  btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385108#2385110#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8845;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8846# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du sgrib pa gang dag gi gnyen por gyur pa lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni bzhi pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrib pa bcu gcig gi gnyen por gyur pas bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston te / / +'di yang  rnam pa gnyis te / /
column10: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391883#2391883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9596;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9597# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sgrub par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang  yon tan yangs shing rgya cher  rab tu 'dren par 'gyur lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni bcu bdun pa mthu dang yon tan yangs shing rgya che ba'i bar du 'dren pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column11: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221158#221158#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_890# du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu  lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column12: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231616#231616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2245# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam pa du mchis pa LAGS ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI man chad ni dgu pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /

column3: de dag ni de dang 'bral ba nyid du 'dod do zhes bya bas ni de ston te / / +sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di dag med kyang ci ma rung snyam du sdug bsngal gyi phung po dang bral bar 'dod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221971#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225870#225874#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228563#228566#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231003#231005#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed PA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235756#235759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236133#236140#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2845# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236141#236149#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2845;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2846# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs PA BSTAN TE / / +'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236670#236674#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245240#245245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4001# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246078#246082#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4097;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4098# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan  te ; /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272277#272279#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7352# de bzhin gshegs pa dang de dag tu rgyu dang rkyen ci zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273238#273238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7451# bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa lta bu zhig mchis dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems  can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin PA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273602#273605#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7487# dngos po gang ni dka' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa zhing yongs su dag pa dang zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag na gang    dag rnyed par dka' ba dang  gang dag mod pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column17: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221161#221172#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_891;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_892;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_893# du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column18: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229979#229979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2056# 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column19: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230655#230655#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2141# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column20: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271454#271460#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7226# bcom ldan 'das de  bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gang lags pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang lags pa de nyid la bye brag tu bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol pa dang   lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column21: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388443#2388444#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column22: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222895#222896#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column23: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226463#226464#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column24: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236480#236481#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column25: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237160#237164#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column26: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239244#239245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column27: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242523#242523#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3639;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3640# bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa du dag gis gnas ngan len de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa gnas ngan len spong ba'i dus rab tu dbye BA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs  pa bstan te ; /
column28: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248703#248704#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4402# bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column29: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253710#253711#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4968# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad PA BSTAN TE / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column30: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237279#237285#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2975# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column31: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360973#2360973#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5843;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5844# tshig gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa tshig rnam par bshad PA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column32: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361054#2361054#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5854;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5855# yi ge gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa yi ge'i rnam par bshad PA STON TO // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column33: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236863#236864#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2926# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di la yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column34: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349119#2349120#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4388;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4389;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4390# lhag mthong bstan  pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / / +'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column35: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378908#2378911#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8135;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8136;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8137# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column36: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238744#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pa dang  gal du gsol ba dang  rung ba nyid du sgrub pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column37: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247723#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column38: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240696#240696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3438# bcom ldan 'das bag la nyal de dag gnas ngan len de dag spangs pa rnam pa dus rab tu dbye ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa gnas ngan len spangs pas rab tu dbye ba zhes bya BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan  du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column39: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253207#253207#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4893# 'di  yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column40: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248433#248434#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4377# bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis  pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +dang po zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column42: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397361#2397361#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10237;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10238# dang po yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / / +'di ni dang po byang chub sems dpas zhu ba gsol ba'o // /

yid 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas rnam par sun 'byin pa'i phyir ro // / +de dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397225#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397269#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397571#2397572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236243#236252#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2858;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2859# mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga las kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang  rnam par rtog pa  med pa nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: de bas na shin tu sdug bsngal ba sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams su skyes pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zhig par 'dod pa la gzhol yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de la bdag tu chags pa'i  zhags pas bcings pa rnams de rnam par zhig par 'dod par ni nam yang mi 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236251#236260#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2858;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2859# mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga las kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang  rnam par rtog pa  med pa nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ste / / +'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa na rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rab tu sbyangs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'di yang  gnas skabs rnams dang sbyar ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236261#236276#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2859;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2860# 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa na rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rab tu sbyangs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'di yang  gnas skabs rnams dang sbyar ro // /

column3: tshor ba btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan pas mi mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +'di ltar de dag ni rtag tu sdug bsngal ba'i phung po 'di dag med kyang ci ma rung snyam du smon gyi bdag med kyang ci ma rung snyam  du ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236285#236296#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2861;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2862# so sor brtag cing bya ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rab tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa sa'i gnas skabs las brtsams nas mtshan nyid phyi ma gsum bstan pa ston to // / +'di ni rab tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan  pa ste ; /

column3: bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro // / +'gro ba gzhan la brten pa'i phung po rnams la de dag gi 'dod pa gang yin pa de'ang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis 'gyur gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236297#236312#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2862;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2863;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2864# 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la so sor brtag pa khyad par du 'phags pa brgyad kyis bya ba byed pa'i phyir rab tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la de ltar bdag tu chags par ni mi rung ste / / +de ni ngan 'gror  sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236313#236322#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2864;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2865# yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos sar zhugs pa gang yin pa de  ni mi gyo ba zhes bya'o zhes bya bas ni bzhi pa mi gyo ba'i mtshan nyid bstan to // /

column3: de nyid kyi phyir 'gro ba gzhan du yang de la 'dod par ni mi rung ngo // / +bsam gtan bzhi pa yan chad gzugs med par skyes pa rnams 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i bde ba dang mi mthun du zin kyang bdag tu chags pas bcings pa  ni bdag tu chags pas gzhan gyi dbang gis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa kho na la 'jug gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa la ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236323#236330#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2864;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2865;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2866# yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos sar zhugs pa gang yin pa de  ni mi gyo ba zhes bya'o zhes bya bas ni bzhi pa mi gyo ba'i mtshan nyid bstan to // / +'di ni sa brgyad pa dang  dgu pa nas te mi gyo ba'i don ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236331#236338#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2865;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2867;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2868# 'di ni sa brgyad pa dang  dgu pa nas te mi gyo ba'i don ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236339#236348#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2867;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2868;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2869# sa dang po yan chad la mi gyo ba zhes bya ba zhes 'byung     // / +ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2330937#2330937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2388;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2389# chos kyi 'khor lo gsum pa ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo yin no zhes bstan to // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399142#2399142#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10457;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10458# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni gong du rnal 'byor rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u las bshad pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa de las yang dag  par 'das nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rgyud la yod pa'i 'jug go zhes gsungs so // /
column9: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334729#2334729#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2789# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / / +dang po ni nyan thos bsgrub pa'i gang zag gi ched du'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222938#222938#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1170;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1171;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1172# grangs mdor smos pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye nas bstan pa ste / / +'di ni dang po'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsgom pa'i chos rnam pa lnga ste zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120230#3120230#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4070# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa bcu par gtogs pa nyid dang  sangs rgyas kyi sar gtogs pa nyid gang yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221519#221519#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_951# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dang po gsum gyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus te / /
column13: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2377879#2377879#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8023# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin no // /
column14: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392942#2392942#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9727;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9728# re zhig dga' ba'i tshor ba bstan pa yin no // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dga' ba dang  mtshungs par ldan pa'i rnam par rig pa ni bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis PA'I RNAM PAR SHES PA LTA bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: 'di ltar gnyen po ma byung gi bar du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni 'gyur ba med par 'jug gi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236349#236356#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2869;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2870# sa bcu par gtogs pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi sar gtogs pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni lnga pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // /

column3: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma yin te / / +'du shes med  pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su rgyun chad med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236357#236367#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2869;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2871# sa bcu par gtogs pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi sar gtogs pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni lnga pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // / +'di ltar sa bcu pa'i tshe ni  rgyus khyad par du 'phags pa yin la / /

column3: yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshor ba med pa ni gnyi ga la yang grub pa med do // / +de bzhin du chos 'di pa kun brtags pa'i bdag tu lta ba dang mi mthun du     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236368#236380#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2871;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2872;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2873;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2874;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2875# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar ni 'bras bus khyad par du 'phags shing mthar thug pa'i rnam par dag pa yin pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520873#520873#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9267# bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216021#216021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_245# de'i  phyir bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#488141#488141#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5099;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5100# des na 'dus byas ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364571#2364571#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6302# so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224604#224604#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1394# rim gyis sgrib pa rab tu sel ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun    las btus pa las ni / /

column3: zin kyang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la bdag tu chags pa dang rjes su 'brel ba lhan cig tu skyes pa ni yod pa nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236381#236390#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2873;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2874;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2875;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2876# yongs su rdzogs pa'i khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'di lta ste / / +sa bcu pa  dang ; / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la mnga' ba'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams go rims bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa yin no // /

column3: glo bur du sgra chen po thos nas skrag pa skye ba'i phyir ro // / +chags pa de phung po dag nyid la ci'i phyir mi 'dod ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236389#236399#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2875;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2876;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2878# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la mnga' ba'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams go rims bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa yin no // / +ming 'di gsum la bye brag yod pa ni / /

column3: 'di ltar de dag  la de 'byung ba yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid las 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236400#236408#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2878# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +de  la rang bzhin gyis brling ba'i phyir dang  rab tu gsal ba'i phyir dang  'bras bu che ba rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  phan che ba'i phyir dang  rab tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: phung po bzhi po de dmigs pa dang rnam par yongs su chad pa dag ni 'du shes med pa dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la brten pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236405#236419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2879;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2880# de  la rang bzhin gyis brling ba'i phyir dang  rab tu gsal ba'i phyir dang  'bras bu che ba rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  phan che ba'i phyir dang  rab tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#908477#908479#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2299# lung dam pa la mnos pa dang  rgyu dam pa bsgrub pa dang  rang bzhin  dam pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o zhes bstan par 'dod nas / /

column3: gal te de ltar na dgra bcom pa la yang 'byung ngo  zhe na / / +bdag tu lta ba dang mi mthun du zin kyang zhes brjod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236420#236429#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2879;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2880# yongs su mi nyams pa'i phyir dang  khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir mi gyo ba zhes bya'o // / +byang chub  sems dpa' sa'i nang na mchog tu bla na med pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //// /

column3: de spangs su zin kyang zhes brjod pa ni ma yin te / / +dgra bcom pas ni de spangs pas nyes pa med do // / +yang na dgra bcom pa la ni de log pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la de chags pa med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397095#2397097#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10215# de nas byang  chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column20: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219872#219876#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_744# mdo 'di las ni dang po las kyi  stobs ma gtogs pa skye ba gzhan rnams las brtsams nas bstan PA YIN NO // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column23: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231593#231593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column24: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237122#237122#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2956;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2957# longs spyod chen po thob pa dang bad 'gror 'gro ba dang  khon med cing dbye ba med pa dang  bde ba dang yid bde ba mang ba dang  sems can gyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa dang  lus la gnod pa med pa dang  dbang che bar grags pa ni go rims bzhin du sbyin pa la  sogs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221973#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1018# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228563#228565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235756#235759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236133#236136#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs PA'I MTSHAN NYID RNAM PA lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236460#236470#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236470#236485#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2885# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column11: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388442#2388448#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9186# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column12: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222894#222898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column13: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226463#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /

column15: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223706#223709#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column16: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214243#214246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column17: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222909#222912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column18: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224790#224793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1415# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column19: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226477#226478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column20: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228595#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column21: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231631#231634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column22: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237177#237178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2963# 'di ni dang po dang  rgyu dang     'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column23: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237242#237243#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2971# rgyu dang rkyen des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub par 'gyur bas so // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column27: 0.018#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117956#3117956#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3802;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3803# theg pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa ni dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo  las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste / / +bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhu ba zhus pa / /
column28: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231592#231593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: sa bon yongs su 'dzin pa dang ldan pas zhes bya ba ni sa bon yongs su 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355498#2355502#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5208# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246111#246114#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4101# sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs  su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271486#271488#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7231# sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang yin PA'O ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column15: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345637#2345640#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4036# rigs kyi bu tha dad pa    yang ma yin tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa bstan to // /
column16: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372588#2372588#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7363# rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yid la BYED PAS ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column18: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269557#269557#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6994# dngos po 'di ni sprul pa lta bur rig par BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column20: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221203#221204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_897# ngas brtson 'grus thams    cad du 'gro ba yin par bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column21: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253448#253449#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4931# sems can du gdags    pa'i dngos po dang  de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po dang  de 'byung ba'i dngos po dang  de 'byung ba gnas pa'i dngos po dang  de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i dngos po dang  de'i bye brag gi dngos po dang  ston par byed pa'i dngos po dang  bstan par bya ba'i dngos po dang  'khor gyi dngos PO'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column22: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342707#2342708#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3698;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3699# gnyis ni gnyi ga'i yul gyi dmigs pa'i dngos po yin te 'di lta ste dngos po'i mtha' dang dgos pa yongs su grub pa'o     // / +zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /

column24: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396297#2396297#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10124# rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di la khyod kyis bslab par BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa zhus pa'i lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /

column28: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535693#535693#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11232;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11233# 'di lta ste chos thams cad la ming dang brdar rnam par gzhag pas rang gi ngo bo nyid dang bye brag tu ji tsam du rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa gang yin PA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ltar  chos thams cad la yang dag par rang gi ngo bo nyid med kyang / /
column29: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237211#237211#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2967# yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa'i byang chub rgya chen pos ni phan yon don chen po byed DO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column3: de la sa bon yongs su 'dzin pa dang ldan pa 'di ni gang skye ba can rnams dang lhan cig byung    ba dang 'gag pa myong ba ste / /

column6: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230975#230976#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2173# 'di ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las de dag brda sprod pa yin no //// /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321273#2321274#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1208;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1209# bstan bcos shin tu rgyas pa brgyab la sogs pa las bstan pa dang sbyar na ni tshig bzhi char yang ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang po las brtsams nas bstan PA YIN NO // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni / /
column8: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368545#2368545#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6837# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa    las ni tshig rnam pa gnyis 'byung bas / /
column9: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343029#2343029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3737# gal te ston par mi byed na bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las  btus pa las bstan pa de ji ltar go zhing rnam par bshad par bya / /
column10: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344902#2344903#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3945# mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi po de dag kyang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste / /
column11: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392557#2392558#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9681;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9682# kun  gzhi rnam par shes pa de yang 'dod pa'i khams su ni rgyu chung du'i dmigs pa rnam par rig pas dmigs pa chung du'i dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan PA YIN NO // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column12: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#501678#501680#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6862;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6863# zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las  btus pa las ni de la mthong ba dang thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa'i don ni 'di lta ste / /
column13: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387971#2387971#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9130# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs  kun las btus pa las / /
column14: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224342#224342#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1349# gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column15: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546877#546879#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12634;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12635# theg pa chen  po'i rigs pa dang sbyar nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes bstan pa'o zhes bstan to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column16: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367676#2367678#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6725;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6726# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni mdor bsdus nas ming bdun gyis bstan te / /
column17: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381665#2381666#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8471;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8472# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni dge ba'i phyogs  gsal bar mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni sgrib pa'i don to zhes bshad de / /

column20: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230858#230859#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2156;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2157# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni go rims nor ba dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las 'bras bu bdun bstan pa dang  mi gsal bar 'gyur ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha DAD PA'I PHYIR RO // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni  pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag so so nas 'bras bu lnga lnga thob par ston to // /
column21: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237018#237020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2944# byang chub kyi tshogs yang dag pa nyid du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i ni rtog pa'i rgyu byed pa'i phyir dang  sku gnyis po dag  ni skyed pa'i rgyu byed pa'i phyir dang  bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column22: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237048#237049#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2948;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2949# mthong ba'i chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /

column31: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321562#2321563#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1250;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1251# gdags pa 'jig pa'i lta ba dang  kun du rtog pa 'jig pa'i lta ba dang  de kho na nyid 'jig pa'i lta ba'o // / +de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las mdo de nyid bshad pa'i phyir / /
column32: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392454#2392454#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9673# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang  byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po thob pa ni ji ltar bzhed cing 'dod pa bzhin du skad cig skad cig la ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa dag la snyoms  par 'jug pas rab tu dbye ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column33: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2394211#2394211#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9882# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang mig la sogs pa'i dbang pa dag yongs su longs spyod pa'i mthu'i phyir dbang po drug  skyes par gyur te zhes bshad pas tshor ba gnyis po 'di ni nang gi dbang po drug la brten nas phyi rol gyi yul drug po dag la dmigs par byed pas yul las ming thob pa yin pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yul rig pa zhes gsungs te // /

column40: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#531566#531566#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10720;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10721# de la bsten pa mtshungs pa ni yul mtshungs pa nyid  kyi don gyi phyir bsten pa mtshungs pa'o // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa las bstan pa dang don mthun par 'byung ste / /

column3: de ma  thag pa la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams kyang ma yin te / / +de dag ni phan 'dogs pa yin gyi rgyu ma yin te / / +gtso bo'i rgyu'i sa bon yongs su 'dzin pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236569#236584#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2894;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2895;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2896;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2897# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / / +ma 'ongs pa na  gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phel zhing gcig gis gcig bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: gtso bo'i rgyu ni sa bon te / / +de yongs su 'dzin par byed pas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni rgyu mtshan yin  gyi ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236582#236593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2895;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2896;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2897# ma 'ongs pa na  gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phel zhing gcig gis gcig bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes bshad do // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236701#236701#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2911;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2912;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2913# zhu ba'i tshig 'di yang mdo 'di nyid kyi dpe mi mthun pas / / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / / +ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha  rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa tha dad par bgyid ces 'byung ngo // /

column3: phan 'dogs par byed pa ni ma yin no // / +rgyu'i mtshan nyid smos pas de skye ba'i rgyu mtshan nyid 'brel ba can gyi mtshan nyid ma yin nam zhe na ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236594#236606#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2897;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2898;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2899# ci'i slad du rtag par pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yid du mchi  bas ma 'tshal ba dang  pha rol tu phyin pas 'tshal ba thob lags / /
column5: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117998#3117999#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3807;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3808;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3809# sa de dag rnam par dag pa du dag dang  yan lag du dag gis bsdus pa lags // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / +spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi dang  yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.018#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120366#3120367#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4081;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4082;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4083# bcom ldan 'das pha rol  tu phyin pa de dag rgyu gang las byung ba dang  'bras bu gang dang ldan pa dang  don gang dang ldan pa lags / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / +spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa  dang ; /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220016#220016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_766# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa  spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: dngos po'i rkyen gyis byed pa'i nus pa ma byung ba rgyu mtshan tsam du brjod pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sa bon thams cad pa de kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos de dag nyid kyi rgyu nyid du dus thams cad du nye bar gnas pa yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397095#2397095#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10215# de nas byang  chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397270#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column31: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223706#223709#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column32: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226477#226478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column33: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237122#237122#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2956;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2957# longs spyod chen po thob pa dang bad 'gror 'gro ba dang  khon med cing dbye ba med pa dang  bde ba dang yid bde ba mang ba dang  sems can gyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa dang  lus la gnod pa med pa dang  dbang che bar grags pa ni go rims bzhin du sbyin pa la  sogs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column34: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238710#238710#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3176;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3177# de lta bu de dag ni zas dang skom la sgrib pa med pa'i yi dvags rnams zhes bya ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column35: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216362#216362#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_287;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_288# bam po lnga bcu drug pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column39: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244719#244719#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3938;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3939# lam gyi  grangs su gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams dpag tu med pa skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
