column3: 'bras bu nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni de nyid kyi las kyi nus pa nyid  du byung ba ste / / +gang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pas bsdus pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kun du 'byung ba de dag gis bag chags skyed par byed pa de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236648#236660#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2906;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa rnams las shin tu dad pa de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la ni ma lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad     // /

column3: phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bur byed pa'i phyir ro // / +'og nas kyang / / +chos rnams brjod pa'i bag chags las // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388442#2388448#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9186# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222894#222898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236659#236670#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2906;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa rnams las shin tu dad pa de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la ni ma lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad     // / +ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column7: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221967#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column8: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225870#225870#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column9: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226463#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column10: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228563#228563#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column11: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235756#235756#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column12: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236133#236133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column13: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236479#236486#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2885# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi RGYU DANG 'BRAS BU ZAD mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column14: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237159#237163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column15: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239244#239249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3246# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column16: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237278#237280#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column17: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238742#238743#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / /
column18: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236863#236864#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2926# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di la yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231003#231004#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang LAGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506496#506496#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7490# rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa sha stag yin pas don dam pa'i  bden pa shin tu phra ba shin tu zab pa 'du byed rnams dang gcig pa tha dad pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du mi chud DO ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar ston to // /

column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378999#2379001#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8145# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams  pa la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di ltar don zab mo 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i ched du'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column36: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348628#2348630#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4333# rigs kyi bu rgyun chags su yid la byed pa gang gis sems kyi mtshan ma yid la byed PA'O ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ste / /
column37: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247759#247759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4297# rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku zhes brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column40: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396297#2396297#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10124# rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di la khyod kyis bslab par BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS pa zhus pa'i lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /

column44: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380427#2380427#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8311# rigs kyi bu ngas ji skad du nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dpag tu med pa ji snyed bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad  'dis bsdus pa yin par rig par BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column3: dper na til rnams sna ma'i me tog la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu yun ring du skye ba dang 'gag pa rnyed par gyur nas me tog bsal kyang de'i dri 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan nyid yin pa dang   dper na 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod pa rnams kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bag chags lhan cig 'byung ba rnams dang 'gag pa'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang  mang du thos pa rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i bag chags kyang thos pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang 'gag pa las 'byung ste / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236782#236797#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2922# pha rol tu phyin pa ni ches lhag par bde ba dang  yid bde ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang gzhan  thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma la de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnas kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni mthar rnam par 'gyur zhing  'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.024#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120284#3120284#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4076# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni ches lhag par bde ba dang  yid bde ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang     phyi ma la de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir dang  mi 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506496#506496#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7490# rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas PA TSHUL BZHIN MA YIN PAR spyod pa sha stag yin pas don dam pa'i  bden pa shin tu phra ba shin tu zab pa 'du byed rnams dang gcig pa tha dad pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du mi chud do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354620#2354621#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5095;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5096# zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ma 'dres pa'i chos la  dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355500#2355502#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5208# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359981#2359981#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5714# kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba mthun par chos rnams yid la byed ba dang  bar chad med pa'i sems de yid la byed pa gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379001#2379001#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8145# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams  pa la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di ltar don zab mo 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i ched du'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381238#2381238#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8412# 'phags pa'i bstan pa rnams la 'dod pa bzhin du ma thob pa ni lhag mthong gi gags yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388512#2388513#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9190# ci ltar thos pa dang bsams pa'i chos dag la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems khyad par can gyis  legs par gtan la 'bebs pa dang  legs par bsams pa dang  legs par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid nang du yang dag par yid la byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to / /

column25: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264976#264977#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6445# de las gzhan pa mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mthun  par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grags pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  shin tu rnam PAR DAG PA MA YIN pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pas  ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column5: 0.0#TD4053E.TXT.r#2991379#2991381#TD4053E.TXT.r_3591# ji ltar 'di dag gi rang gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong  ba bral ba'i 'bras bu dang  mthong ba'i chos la bdag dang gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang  phyi ma la gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phags pa mchog dam pa 'byung ba rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang  byang chub chen po dbang gi 'bras bu dang  longs spyod chen po dang   bde 'gror 'gro ba dang  khon med pa dang  dbye ba med pa dang  bde ba dang yid bde ba mang ba dang  sems la dbang ba dang  lus la gnod pa med pa dang  dbang che bar grags pa ni go rims bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1035126#1035128#TD4054E.TXT.r_7157# skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang  phyi ma la  gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phags pa mchog dam pa 'byung ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang  byang chub chen po dbang gi 'bras bu dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba dang  'khon med pa dang  dbye ba med pa dang  bde ba dang yid bde ba mang ba dang  sems la dbang ba dang  lus  la gnod pa med pa dang  dbang che bar grags pa ni go rims bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4009E.TXT.r#330522#330523#TD4009E.TXT.r_1427;TD4009E.TXT.r_1428# chos la bdag med pa mi mthong ba'i sngon rol du 'du byed la gnas nas mi rtag pa dang  bdag med par 'dzin par 'byung  ngo ; / / +byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med par gzigs par sbyor ba rnams ni chos la bdag med par rab tu rtogs pa'i sngon rol du sgro 'dogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir sgro 'dogs pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du byas nas gnyen po ston to // /

column3: bag chags bskyed pa med par ni skal ba mnyam pa dang  kun  du 'gro ba dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'das pa rnams rgyu nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402925#2402929#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10945;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10946;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10947# ci'i slad du  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa'i ming gi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237138#237149#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2959;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960# 'bras bu ni gang dang ldan  lags ; / +phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237149#237165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2962# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237279#237286#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2975# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388442#2388449#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9186# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column9: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222894#222899#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226463#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238742#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / /
column12: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239244#239247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column13: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244131#244133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3861# bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa dang  skyon dang yon tan rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column14: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221967#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column15: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235756#235756#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column16: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236133#236140#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2845# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column17: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236479#236483#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column18: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380776#2380778#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8355;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8356# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis las gang dag bgyid lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi las ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column19: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236863#236866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2926# byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di la yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column20: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359883#2359890#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5699;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5700;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5701;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5702# btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad bcu gcig pa zhi gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang  btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column21: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247723#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column22: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245239#245241#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column23: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221158#221165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_891;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_892# du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column24: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231616#231619#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2245# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam pa du mchis pa lags zhes bya ba ni 'di man chad ni dgu pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column25: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358808#2358813#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5586;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5587;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5588;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5589# bcom ldan 'das 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gang las rtogs shing gang las thob par 'tshal bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni gsum pa rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i sa'i gnas skabs rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column26: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246079#246081#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4097# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan  te ; /
column27: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359037#2359037#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5614;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5615# ji ltar na rtog ba ma mchis pa dang dpyod pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu po rtog pa dang dpyod pa la sogs pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column28: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382133#2382133#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8517;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8518# bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems  dpa' rnams zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du gyur pa na sems rnam par gyeng bar 'gyur ba'i chos du zhig khong du chud bar bgyi 'tshal lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rnam par gyeng ba rnam pa lnga rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column29: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385108#2385108#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8845# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du sgrib pa gang dag gi gnyen por gyur pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrib pa bcu gcig gi gnyen por gyur pas bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston te / / +'di yang  rnam pa gnyis te / /
column30: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391883#2391883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9596;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9597# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sgrub par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang  yon tan yangs shing rgya cher  rab tu 'dren par 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa mthu dang yon tan yangs shing rgya che ba'i bar du 'dren pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la brten pa'i sa bon med par ni nus pa mi 'thad do // / +lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid ni btags pa pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361725#2361726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5946;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5947# de dag bsdus pa las so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lnga pa 'dris pa rnam par bshad pa bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237162#237178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2963# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272668#272669#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7386# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus la ni dngos  po 'di dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku dang  theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380776#2380777#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8355;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8356# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis las gang dag bgyid lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi las ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388445#2388446#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222897#222898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column10: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226465#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239246#239247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column12: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264934#264934#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6443# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa  bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column13: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398352#2398356#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10369;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10370;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10371# ji ltar yan lag rnam pa bcu gcig gis sa rnams bsdus par  'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa yan lag bcu gcig sdud par ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361674#2361675#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5942;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5943# de dag so so las yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa ma  'dres par rnam par bshad pa bston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol pa'o // /
column15: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238743#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pa dang  gal du gsol ba dang  rung ba nyid du sgrub pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column16: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244132#244132#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3861# bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa dang  skyon dang yon tan rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column17: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397356#2397358#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10236;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10237;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10238# yan lag bcu gcig las brtsams  nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  sa'i ming gi don bstan pa dang  kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad kyis sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye  ba dang  smon lam rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba'o // / +dang po yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column18: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247722#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column19: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381357#2381361#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8426;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8427;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8428# sgrib pa lnga po dag zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong la sgrib par bstan pa dang  bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba man chad kyis zhi  gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa nyid bstan pa'o // / +dang po yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column20: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248433#248433#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4377# bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis  pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +dang po zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column21: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253419#253419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4929;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4930# dngos po gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa dngos po dgu phye ste bshad par ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column22: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374381#2374382#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7550;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7551# de la dang por mtshan ma bsal ba dka' ba rnam par 'byed pa yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column23: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225874#225874#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column24: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229979#229979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2056# 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column26: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231005#231005#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column3: dus gcig tu 'byung ba rnams la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po mi rung ba'i phyir ro // / +kun gzhi rnam  par shes pa phyi dang nang gi sa bon thams cad pa yin pa'i yang phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397570#2397572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10265;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# gnyis pa ni yan lag bcu gcig las ni du dag gis bsdus par 'gyur zhes zhu ba'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214243#214246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216181#216185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_265;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_266# 'di ltar gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gnas skabs su kun tu rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len rnams yongs  su SPONG BA'I PHYIR RO // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220198#220204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_788# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222909#222912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223706#223709#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224790#224794#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1415;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1416# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226438#226442#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226477#226478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228595#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231631#231634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236634#236637#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2905# gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gya nom pa bskyed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad PA'I PHYIR RO // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: de la ma gtogs par rgyu'i rkyen gzhan mi dmigs so // / +bag chags tha dad pa ma yin zhig sna tshogs ma yin pa chos tha dad pa sna tshogs dag gi rgyur ji ltar rung zhe na zhes bya ba ni rigs pa med par rgol ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237187#237196#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2964;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2965;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2966# rigs kyi bu pha rol tu phyin pa de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos ni rgyu byed do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237196#237207#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2965;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2966;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2967# shin tu gya nom pa yid du 'ong ba rnam par smin pa'i 'bras  bu dang ; / +sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pas ni 'bras bu byed do // /

column3: dper na tshi gu'i rtsi sna tshogs kyis bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ni 'thad par smras pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237208#237224#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2968# yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa'i byang chub rgya chen pos ni phan yon don chen po byed DO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238793#238793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3184# rigs kyi bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi  ngo bo nyid med pa 'dzin par byed DO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381383#2381384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8431# 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang gnod sems ni gnyi ga'i sgrib pa yin par rig par BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221204#221204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_897# ngas brtson 'grus thams    cad du 'gro ba yin par bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535693#535693#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11232;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11233# 'di lta ste chos thams cad la ming dang brdar rnam par gzhag pas rang gi ngo bo nyid dang bye brag tu ji tsam du rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa gang yin PA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ltar  chos thams cad la yang dag par rang gi ngo bo nyid med kyang / /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236533#236533#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2889# rigs kyi  bu gcig la gcig brten nas bsgom pa bskyed pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column3: tshi gu'i rtsi ni tshon gyi bye brag ste / / +sna tshogs su mi snang ba dag go // /
'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa nyid tshon gyi snod yin pas 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa'i tshon gyi snod do // /

column12: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391851#2391851#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9594;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9595# 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam la brten  nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column13: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345564#2345565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4028;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4029# gzhan yang mdo'i tshig 'dis ni gang du nang gi sems rgyun chags su yid la byed PA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pa nyid la de'i sbyor ba yin no zhes bstan pa yang yang dag pa'i don  nyid du gyur pa yin no // / +byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column14: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354513#2354513#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5080;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5081# yang dad pas mos pa la sogs pa logs shig na rnam par gzhag PA'I PHYIR RO // / +byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column15: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380367#2380367#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8304;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8305# kha cig na re stong pa nyid bsdus pa 'dis ni kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par  sel bar byed la snga ma'i stong pa nyid bcu bdun po dag gis ni gzugs brnyan rnam par sel bar byed pa'i phyir bye brag yod do zhe'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column16: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348519#2348520#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4317;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4318# rnam par rig pa tsam du rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang  bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column17: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360486#2360487#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5782# chos  dang don so so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column18: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340326#2340327#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3439# de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column20: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371474#2371474#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7213;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7214# rigs kyi bu 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa  rnam pa gsum gyi bye brag ces BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS pa spyi'i mjug bsdu bar rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: mchog tu zab pa zhes bya ba ni    nyan thos la sogs pas gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir ro // / +rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu las rgyu dang ldan pa 'byung zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237259#237266#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2972;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973# bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams longs spyod pas ma 'tshal ba dang ldan pa dang  snying rje chen pos yongs su grub pa lags  na ; / +ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237267#237275#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // /

column3: ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa can zhes bya ba la rang gi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid do // / +rnam par 'byed par byed pa ni rnam par 'byed  pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381357#2381361#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8426;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8427;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8428# sgrib pa lnga po dag zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong la sgrib par bstan pa dang  bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba man chad kyis zhi  gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa nyid bstan pa'o // / +dang po yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264933#264934#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6443# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa  bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column6: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226463#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column7: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239244#239247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column8: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238743#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad KYI NGO BO NYID MA mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pa dang  gal du gsol ba dang  rung ba nyid du sgrub pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column9: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244132#244132#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3861# bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa dang  skyon dang yon tan rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column10: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236669#236670#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column11: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221967#221967#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column12: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225870#225874#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column13: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228563#228563#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column14: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235756#235756#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column15: 0.013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236480#236481#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol  tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column16: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398355#2398356#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10370;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10371# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column17: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348253#2348254#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4288;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4289# zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba ste / /
column18: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381007#2381009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8384;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8385;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8386# dang po la yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol pa  dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba ste / /
column19: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397356#2397358#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10236;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10237;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10238# yan lag bcu gcig las brtsams  nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  sa'i ming gi don bstan pa dang  kun du rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad kyis sa rnams rnam par dbye ba dang  skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa las brtsams nas sa rnams rnam par dbye  ba dang  smon lam rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas sa rnams RNAM PAR DBYE BA'O // / +dang po yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column20: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248433#248433#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4377# bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis  pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +dang po zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column21: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229978#229979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2055;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2056# 'di ni dang po pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po bstan pa'o // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column22: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230654#230655#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2140;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2141# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu gang  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi rnam par smin pa 'bras BU RNAM PAR 'BYED PA'O // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column23: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253206#253206#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4892;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4893# 'di ni dang po'i dngos po bzhi RNAM PAR BSHAD PA'O // / +'di  yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column24: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345476#2345477#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4020;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4021# zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba ste / /
column25: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271457#271458#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7226# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol pa dang   lan du gsungs pa bstan te / / +'di ni dang po zhu ba GSOL BA NYID DO // /
column26: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345375#2345376#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4009# dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba ste / /
column27: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345596#2345597#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4032;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4033# zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba ste zhi gnas dang lhag mthong rnam pa gnyis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bgrod par bya ba'i gnas  dang 'phags pa rnams kyi lam gyi chos rab tu 'dren pa'i phyir lam zhes bya ste / /
column28: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360585#2360585#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5794;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5795# zhu ba gsol ba  dang lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column29: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220345#220348#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_793;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_794# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column30: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239835#239836#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3317;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3318# 'di ni dang po'i bag la nyal gyi rnam pa'i grangs mang nyung rab tu dbye ba'o // / +'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column31: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248703#248703#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4402# bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column32: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253710#253710#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4968# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba GSOL BA NYID DO // /
column33: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340603#2340604#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3461# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // / +'di ni dang po byang chub sems dpa' zhu ba gsol ba ste / /
column34: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374381#2374382#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7550;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7551# de la dang por mtshan ma bsal ba dka' BA RNAM PAR 'BYED PA YANG ZHU ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column35: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231005#231005#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column36: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247723#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  RNAM PAR BSHAD PA'O // /

column3: rnam par 'byed par nus pa'am / / +rnam par 'byed par dgos pa ni rnam par 'byed pa can te / / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin skye ba can thams cad rnam par 'byed par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237287#237304#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2975;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2976;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2977# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs PAS BSTAN TE / / +'di ni dang po zhu ba  gsol ba nyid do // /

column3: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa rnam par  'byed pa can zhes bya ba ni bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dang  'dod pa dang  mi 'dod pa'i lus sna tshogs 'grub pa la gtso bo'i rkyen gyis rab tu phye ba'i ma rig pa la sogs pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang  kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las 'du byed la sogs pa 'byung ba na ma  rig pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis bsod nams dang  bsod nams ma yin pa dang  mi gyo ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506496#506498#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7490;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7491# rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa sha stag yin pas don dam pa'i  bden pa shin tu phra ba shin tu zab pa 'du byed rnams dang gcig pa tha dad pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du mi chud do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar ston to // /

column62: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345522#2345524#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4024# lhag mthong gi rjes su mthun pa'i  mos pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid la byed pa yin par brjod par BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ste / /

column3: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di nyid la rmongs pa dag kha cig ni sngon byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba nyid rtog ces bya ba ni skyes bu'i byed pa la skur pa'i phyir  ro ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237340#237363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2982;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2983;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2984;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2985;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2986;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2988# don 'di yang dag par bstan pa dang  dpe nye bar mtshon pa dang  dpe dang don du sbyar ba ste / /

column3: de dag ni ma rig pas ldongs pas dmus long dper byas so // /

sna la reg ces bya ba ni sna la reg ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +mdor bsdu na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa sa bon thams cad pa ste zhes bya ba la mdor  bsdu na sngon gyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi bag chags dang  gzung ba dang 'dzin par rnam par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams kyis rnam par smin pa'i bdag nyid sems can gyi rdzas kyi dngos gzhi kun gzhi rnam par shes pa bsgrub pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237364#237374#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2988;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2989# byang chub sems dpa' longs spyod dang  snying rje chen po dang ldan mod kyi / / +sems can rnams kyi rang gi las kyis nyes pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237374#237388#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2989;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2990;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2991# byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod la spyod par mi nus par gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha  tshig go ; / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237389#237398#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2990;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2991;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2992# gal te de lta ma yin na byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par gzhan la phan par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang  gzhan yang rtag par longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang ldan pas / / +gal te sems can rnams rang gi nyes pa'i las gnas su gyur pa med du zin na / /
column7: 0.012#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2558444#2558444#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_2692# de'i rgyu med par byas pas longs spyod kyis phongs par byas pas de la gnod pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.012#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2003366#2003368#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3662;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3663# rdzas kyi dbang gis gzi byin can du gyur na de'i rgyu med par byas pa'i phyir te / / +longs spyod kyis  phongs par byas pas de la gnod pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1126111#1126111#TD4047E.TXT.r_693;TD4047E.TXT.r_694# rtag tu chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pas 'chi 'pho dang bral ba'i phyir mi gyo ba'o // / +de las gong mar gyur pa med pas bla na med pa'o // /
column10: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355049#1355051#TD4037E.TXT.r_5218# sdug bsngal rnam pa drug ni ngan song gi rgyu rten pa'i phyir rgyu'i sdug bsngal dang  ngan song du skyes pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i sdug bsngal dang  longs spyod las  brtsams te yongs su tshol ba'i sdug bsngal dang  bsrung ba'i sdug bsngal dang  chog mi shes pa'i sdug bsngal dang  med par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal te / /
column11: 0.021#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1994385#1994388#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2262;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2263# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rdzogs par byed pa'i LAS NI RNAM PAR SMIN PA'I phyir gyo ba yin no // /
column12: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983028#983028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11866;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11867# sbyin pas longs spyod bsgrubs nas longs spyod sems can la gtong bar byed pa'i phyir ro // / +lus la sogs pa'i las sbyangs pa'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column13: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355323#1355323#TD4037E.TXT.r_5240;TD4037E.TXT.r_5241# gsod pa dang  phyir rgol ba dang  dgra bor gyur pa dang  'khor bar 'khor ba na longs spyod ma  nges pas / / +longs spyod chen por gyur pa las phyis dus gzhan du mchog tu dbul por 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.023#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2072325#2072330#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13652;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13653# mi 'dod dam zhes bya ba ni khas mi len nam zhes bya ba'o // / +yang ma  rig pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA NI langs par gyur pa na bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i ma rig pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#967894#967894#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9992;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9993# dam pa'i chos kyis kyang mngon PAR SHES PA LA SOGS pa'i nor dang longs spyod mi zad pa'i rgyu byed pas na / / +mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos la nor du 'du shes pa zhes bya'o // /
column16: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1138161#1138161#TD4047E.TXT.r_2428;TD4047E.TXT.r_2429# 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang  mthong ba'i chos kyi lam dang  tshogs su gyur pas  lus dang sems rjes su sdud par byed pa'i phyir mthong ba'i chos kyi don to // / +phyi mar yang skye bar gyur pa med pa'i phyir pha rol med pa zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column17: 0.024#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2887360#2887360#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_2738# sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la ni  mi dmigs pa dang rtog pa yod na lus dang ngag gnyis ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pas rtog pa med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i byams par gzhag go // /
column18: 0.025#TD4052E.TXT.r#2863024#2863025#TD4052E.TXT.r_2469;TD4052E.TXT.r_2470# KUN GZHI'I RNAM PAR SHES PA'I phyogs la ni gzugs na spyod pa'i sems kyi sa bon 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas chos nyid kyis gnas pa'am bskyed pa'ang rung rnam  par bar ma chad par brgyad de 'ongs PA RNAM PAR SMIN PAR gyur pa gzugs na spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir / /
column19: 0.025#TD4069E.TXT.r#641420#641420#TD4069E.TXT.r_2641# pa dang  tshangs par gyur pa yin no zhes de lta bur rgyas par gsungs pa'i phyir 'dir ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa la bya bar mngon te zhes bya bar grub bo // /
column20: 0.025#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529742#1529745#TD4061E.TXT.r_2346;TD4061E.TXT.r_2347# rgud pa rnams la rgud pa las yongs su bskyab pa dang  dgos pa bsgrub pa'i phyir don byed pa'o // / +rang gi las la 'tsho ba log par ma yin pas legs par sbyor ba'i phyir bya ba byed pa'o // /
column21: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#281964#281964#TD4026E.TXT.r_1194# bdag nyid ye shes kyi mchog la dbang thob pas 'gro ba nyon mongs pas rang dbang med pa rang dbang yod pa la 'gong pa'i phyir dbang gi che    ba'i bdag nyid dang  rtag tu gzhan la phan par bya ba la gcig tu mngon par dga' ba'i phyir mngon par dga' ba'i che ba'i bdag nyid dang  srid pas mi 'jigs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid do // /
column22: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#200909#200909#TD4035E.TXT.r_13249# 'di ltar 'di na la la rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyu 'di gnyis dang ldan pas chos ma yin pas bab col du log pa'i longs spyod rnams la sogs pa'i phyir yongs su tshol bar byed pa lta bu'o // /
column23: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2445161#2445161#TD4019E.TXT.r_5006# sems kyi de bzhin nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por gyur pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir // /
column24: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1129651#1129651#TD4047E.TXT.r_1222;TD4047E.TXT.r_1223# zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas mi dge ba'i grogs pos mi gyo ba'i phyir ro // / +snying por gyur pa ni snying rje dman par gyur  pas ldog pa med ba'i phyir ro // /
column25: 0.028#TD4064E.TXT.r#423726#423726#TD4064E.TXT.r_1061;TD4064E.TXT.r_1062# gang la nyon mongs pa'i sa bon gnas pa de dag gnyen pos spong na de'i tshe na ni gnyen po las  gzhan ci yang rung ba ma blangs pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ste gnyen po'i sems nyid nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang ldan par 'dod na ni de nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang ldan pa nyid pas de'i gnyen por 'gyur ba ni mi rigs te / /
column26: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1126040#1126040#TD4047E.TXT.r_684;TD4047E.TXT.r_685# phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor bas blu ba med pa'i phyir dge ba'o // / +sbyin pa la  sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i gnas skabs na / /
column27: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1169088#1169088#TD4047E.TXT.r_7061;TD4047E.TXT.r_7062# sems nye bar brtan par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed pa mdor bsdus nas bstan pa'i phyir / /
column28: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2750676#2750677#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_7023# chad pa mchog gis kyang rjes su ston par mi byed par de dag la nyes pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chad pas rjes su ston par byed pa yin te / /
column29: 0.028#TD4050E.TXT.r#1120869#1120869#TD4050E.TXT.r_3433;TD4050E.TXT.r_3434# kha cig ni kha dog sngon PO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pa rgyas par 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin du longs spyod  rdzogs pa'i sku ni MA NGES PA'I NGO BO NYID DU snang ba yin gyi / /
column30: 0.028#TD4062E.TXT.r#2963630#2963630#TD4062E.TXT.r_399# de yang yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa dag na lus nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'i rnam par  shes pa zhes bya'o // /
column31: 0.029#TD4018E.TXT.r#3010331#3010331#TD4018E.TXT.r_842;TD4018E.TXT.r_843# de dag yod pa nyid de 'bras bur 'brel bar byed pa  nges pa'i phyir ro // / +de dag don dam par yod pa ma yin par ji ltar yid ches par bya zhes 'dri ba la / /
column32: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155760#1155760#TD4047E.TXT.r_5094;TD4047E.TXT.r_5095# rang bzhin gyis brling ba ni rab tu dang ba'i shugs kyis kun du bskyed pa'i phyir brling ba'o // / +rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i    sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir gsal ba'o // /
column33: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2081060#2081060#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14934;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14935# gzhan dag na re mthong ba'i chos la zhen pa rnams 'dod  pa'i bde ba la 'dun pa bzlog nas bsam gtan gyi bde ba la sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir te / / +tshe phyi ma'i bde ba mthong ba'i chos la rag las pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: des  khams gsum pa'i lus thams cad dang  'gro ba thams cad bsdus so zhes bya ba la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lus thams cad dang  sems can gyi rgyud 'gro ba thams cad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237399#237408#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2991;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2992;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2993# gal te sems can rnams rang gi nyes pa'i las gnas su gyur pa med du zin na / / +'jig  rten na dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ltar snang bar ga la 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bzlog ste bshad pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237409#237417#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2992;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2993;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2994# 'jig  rten na dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ltar snang bar ga la 'gyur zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bzlog ste bshad pa'o // / +gal te sems can rnams rang gi las kyi dbang gis gyur ba ma yin pa lta na 'jig rten na dbul po dag snang bar ga la 'gyur te / /

column3: lha la sogs pa bsdus pa ni 'brel pa can gyi     // / +mtshan nyid do // / +ji ltar gzugs dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa yul kha cig dang  res 'ga'i dus su rgyun chad pa de ltar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni gnyen po ma byung gi bar du ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237418#237426#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2993;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2994;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2995# gal te sems can rnams rang gi las kyi dbang gis gyur ba ma yin pa lta na 'jig rten na dbul po dag snang bar ga la 'gyur te / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar rtag tu  gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237427#237440#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2995;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2996;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2997# de ltar dbul po dag dmigs pa'i phyir rang gi las yin par mngon te / /

column3: khyab pa'i phyir thams cad 'dzin par byed  pa'o // / +sa bon thams cad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dir sa bon zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237439#237450#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2996;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2997;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2998;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2999# de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel ba las / / +sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'i tshe yang sems can bkres pa dang  skom pa la sogs pa'i  sdug bsngal dang ldan te / /

column3: phyi dang nang dang mi gsal ba // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas ni de rab tu dbye ba dang bcas pa ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237451#237461#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2998;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3001;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3002# sangs rgyas kyis kyang bskyab par mi spyod na / / +byang chub sems dpa' dag gis ji ltar skyob par nus she na / /

column3: phyi rol gyi sa bon ni nas la sogs pa'o // / +nang gi sa bon ni kun gzhi  rnam par shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237460#237469#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3001;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3002;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3003# byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang tshad med la / / +bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa yang tshad med mod kyi / /

column3: mi gsal ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'o // / +gnyis ni phyi dang nang gi'o // / +yang na 'bras bu dang rgyu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237470#237478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3003;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3004# sems can skal pa  tshad med pa nas byas pa'i nyes pa shin tu stug po dag gis bsgribs pa'i phyir 'thob par mi nus te / /

column3: de gnyis kyi rgyu mtshan kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang gnyis so // / +de las rgyu dang gzhi'i dngos pos kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par  byang ba'i chos 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237479#237494#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3003;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3004# sems can skal pa  tshad med pa nas byas pa'i nyes pa shin tu stug po dag gis bsgribs pa'i phyir 'thob par mi nus te / / +dper na 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu'i slob ma dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus can zhig bsod snyoms blangs pa las / /

column3: gang dag gnyis dag ces 'don pa de dag gi ltar na rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ces bshad do // / +kun rdzob ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi nas la sogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237495#237507#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3004;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3005;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3006# dper na 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu'i slob ma dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus can zhig bsod snyoms blangs pa las / /

column3: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro // / +dam pa'i don ces bya ba la don  dam pa'i sa bon ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237508#237525#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3006;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3007;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3008# zhag bdun    la srog chad la thug pa dang  tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa zhig gis bsod snyoms blangs nas sbyin par bya ba las / /

column3: sa bon thams cad kyi rkyen yin pa dang de'i bdag nyid yan lag yin pa'i phyir ro // / +sa bon de gnyis ni chos tha dad pa'i phyir rnam pa drug tu dbye bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237526#237534#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3008;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3009# 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus mood gal gyi bu chen po la smras pa / / +khyed rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas zas 'di bsrungs la 'dis thob par gyis  shig ; /

column3: skad cig pa zhes bya ba ni byung ma thag tu rnam par 'jig  pa'i phyir te bye brag med pa'i phyir sa bon rtag pa med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237533#237544#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3009;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3010# khyed rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas zas 'di bsrungs la 'dis thob par gyis  shig ; /

column3: skad cig pa yang 'gags zin pa ni ma yin te bya shi ba'i skad bzhin du 'gags nas 'bras bu mi rung ba'i phyir lhan cig 'byung ba'i // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237545#237558#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3011# de nas 'phags pa mood gal gyi bus de la zas sbyin pa dang des khar zos pa las 'jim par gyur to // /

column3: de lta bas na 'bras bu'i dus dang 'gal ba med pa'i phyir bon ni 'bras bu dang  lhan cig gnas par 'dod de autpala'i rtsa ba la sogs pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237557#237570#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3011;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3012;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3013# de nas yang 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis bsod snyoms blangs nas byin pa las kyang / /

column3: lhan cig 'byung ba yang glog bzhin du skad cig gcig dang gnyis dang gsum du gnas pa ma yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237571#237578#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3013# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems  can thams cad kyi re ba bskang bar 'dod kyang de dag nyid kyis nyes pa'i phyir thob par ma gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: skad cig gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas yun ring du rgyun chags su 'byung ba'i phyir rgyun chags    su 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237579#237589#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3013;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3014# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems  can thams cad kyi re ba bskang bar 'dod kyang de dag nyid kyis nyes pa'i phyir thob par ma gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ni nyes pa med do // /

column3: de ci mngon zhe na / / +rtsa ba la phan pa dang gnod pa ni yal ga la sogs pa la yang phan gnod du 'gyur te de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237590#237601#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3014;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3015;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3016# gzhan yang dper na klu'i rgyal pos char phab pa mi rnams la ni chur snang la / /

column3: gal te rgyun chags su 'byung ba na btags pa'i phyogs kyang sa bon du khas blangs pa'i phyir thams cad las thams cad cig  car ci'i phyir mi 'byung zhe na lan btab pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237602#237618#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3017;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3018;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3019;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3020# gzhan yang  'on pas 'brug sgra thos par mi nus pas 'brug la ni nyes pa med pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: nges pa zhes bya ste nus pa nges pa'i phyir rgyun chags su 'byung du zin kyang thams cad las thams cad cig car mi 'byung ngo // /

column15: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column16: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316431#2316432#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_649;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650# zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column17: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403883#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column18: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406127#2406127#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /
column19: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527912#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column21: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column22: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227065#227065#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column23: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228204#228204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816# phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column24: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535457#535458#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11198;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir mchog    gi don gyis yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column25: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314614#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_418;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# ces 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column26: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314669#2314669#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_428;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_429# ces 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column27: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221079#221079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_879# nges pa'i tshig gzhan ni go sla'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs 'bras bu gtogs par bstan to // /
column28: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238297#238297#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3115# de ma yin pa'i sems can ches mang po dag la gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du sems so zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bshad do // /
column29: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244505#244505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914# ces bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel    pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to // /
column30: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475264#475264#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column32: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226753#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column33: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235701#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2789;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# 'di ltar bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis sems kyi kun tu spyod pa la dbang thob par byed cing de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column35: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214117#214117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig ces ston te / /

column37: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477883#477883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3627# 'di nyid dang sbyar te yon tan gyi ming bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par bstan pa rnams yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: gzhan ni res 'ga' rgyun chad pas ma yin no // / +de nyid gcig tu lung du ma bstan pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te / / +dge ba dang mi dge ba yang yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237805#237816#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3041;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3042;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3043;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3044# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can de dag longs spyod la / / +las kyi sgrib pa lci ba yod par mthong ba'i phyir ro / /

column3: de nyid bag chags bsgo bar 'os pa dang bsgo bar nus pa yin te / / +rtag la lung du ma bstan pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237817#237825#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3044# sbyin pa'i 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba dang  gal te byin par gyur na yang de longs spyod par mi nus pas sbyin pa btang bas ci zhig bya snyam pa'i phyir te / /

column3: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams ni ma yin te / / +'di ltar drug po dag la 'brel med de / / +ji lta zhe na / /
