column3: tha dad gsum dang 'gal ba'i phyir / / +zhes bya ba smos pa'o // / +gal te 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug po dag lhan cig 'byung bar 'gyur na gnas dang  dmigs pa  dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237834#237848#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3046;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3047;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3048;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3049# dper na ma mas bu chung nu ma bsnun // / +zla gcig lon yang ngal ba med mod kyi // /

column3: yid la byed pa gsum sa so so rang gi tha dad par mi 'gyur ro // / +gang gi phyir gsum tha dad par 'gal bar med de tha dad pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir drug po dag cig car 'byung ba med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473462#473464#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3136;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137# go rims bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis su skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu ba'i lam zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473556#473558#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3149;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3150# de la lam ni spyi'i gnas yin la gnas las zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bye brag tu bzhon pa zhes bstan pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las na zhi gnas dang lhag     // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357708#2357711#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5461# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las ni rnam par dag pa'i cha mthun pa  rnam par ma brtags pa'i mtshan ma med pa kun du 'byung ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di lta ste / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385673#2385675#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8906;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni sems can gyi lus la sogs pa'i las  la spyod pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405365#2405369#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11181;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11182# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'di'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la blo gros zhes bya ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220983#220985#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_871# lta bar gyur ba dang   'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba dang  yang dag par rnam pa thams cad du chos rnams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom nas sbyin pa btang bas 'bras bu'i  dus su dbul ba thams cad 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher sogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238005#238008#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3072# de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa mi byed do zhes  'byung ngo ; / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni / /
column11: 1.788#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536820#536820#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11387;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11388# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni grong dang kun dga' rab la sogs pa lta bur snang ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa ni 'di lta ste / /
column12: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226114#226117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1563# rnam pa drug po dag go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533779#533782#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10974;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975# bdag tu rnam par rtog pa de dag gis de la 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa  de srid du rnam pa gcig pa 'gyur ba med pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536669#536672#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11360;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# 'di ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column15: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357137#2357139#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5395;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5396# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las kyang sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang bral zhing chos kyi kun dpa' la dga' ba thob pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa  las ni / /
column16: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357533#2357535#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5440;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5441# chos kyi snang ba chen po thams cad du tshad med cing rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par shes pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni phyogs bcu mtha' med pa rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan  nyid yang dag par shes pa dag ni / /
column17: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357963#2357966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5490;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5491# gong ma bas ches gong ma'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column18: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385163#2385164#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8851;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8852# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo'i bdag  nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo nyid kyi sgrib pa'o zhes bshad do // /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385917#2385918#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8930;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8931# bsags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa la sogs pa la kun du rmongs shing chos rnams brjed par gyur pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  ni thos pa dang  bsams pa dang bsgoms pa dag la rmongs rtul zhing brjed ngas pa dang bcas pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386197#2386199#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8961# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang  bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pas bsdus pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386810#2386811#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9023# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las ni rnam par rig pa tsam gyi mtshan ma rags pa kun du 'byung ba dag ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o // /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387048#2387049#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9043;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9044# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba zhes bshad  do // /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403320#2403323#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10992;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10993# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404779#2404782#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11127;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11128# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sa 'di la sbyor ba'i spyod pa'i  mthar phyin cing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mi gyo ba yin yang mtshan ma med pa la da dung rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column25: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406122#2406126#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11252;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes  'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /
column26: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220613#220615#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol  'gro bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /
column27: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475957#475957#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477178#477178#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column29: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238220#238223#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3102;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3104# ma 'ongs sdug bsngal snod gyur mi rung ngo // / +zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las kyang de skad du bshad do // /
column30: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405035#2405036#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11155;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11156# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni mtshan ma dang rtsol ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyo ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad ba'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'dir mtshan ma ji snyed yod pa rnams dang  mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyos shing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang gi dang gis 'jug pas so zhes bshad do // /
column31: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398087#2398088#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column32: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506127#506128#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7453;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7454# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa dang sbyar na ni de la gzugs dang stong pa nyid NI THA DAD PA MA YIN te zhes bya ba ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'byung ba dang mthun par  bshad de / /
column33: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535268#535269#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11181# skyes nas kyang skad cig las lhag par bdag nyid gnas par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column34: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238344#238345#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3123;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3124# 'di ni slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i spyi mjug bsdu ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column35: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#469112#469112#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2588;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2589# 'od zer gyis kun du gsal bar byed do zhes 'byung  ngo ;; / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sngar bstan pa'i rin po che sna bdun las 'od zer 'byung bas kun du gsal bar gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /
column36: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403595#2403595#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11023;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11024# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni ting nge 'dzin  dang  snyoms par 'jug pa nyams pa med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir dang  chos kyi snang ba chen po'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir 'od byed pa'i sa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /

column3: cig car me 'byung na phan tshun 'brel ba med do // / +'brel ba med na bsgo bar bya ba dang sgo bar  byed pa'i dngos por ga la 'gyur / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237865#237879#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3051;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3052# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la sgrib par byed pa'i las ngan pa yod    pas ; /

column3: ji ste skad cig snga mas phyi ma la bsgo bar 'dod na yang mi rung ste / / +skad cig lhan cig med pa'i phyir de gnyis cig car du med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237877#237893#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3052;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3053;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3054# las ngan pa des byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la sgrib par byed pa de'i phyir nus pa dang  dbul po dag yod kyang yongs su spong bar byed do // /

column3: 'brel ba med na bsgo bar bya ba dang sgo bar byed pa med do zhes ston to // / +ji ste rigs kyi dngos po la brten  nas rnam par shes pa drug car yang brjod par 'dod pa bye brag med pas rnam par shes pa rigs gcig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237892#237902#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3053;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3054;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3055# 'dir yi dags dang klu'i dpe khungs su bstan par bya ste / / +dper na klung gi chu sgrib pa med cing btung bar  bya ba yin mod kyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237902#237912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3054;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3055;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3056;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3057;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3058;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3059# dper na klung gi chu sgrib pa med cing btung bar  bya ba yin mod kyi / / +'on kyang yi dags rnams kyi nyes pas btung bar mi nus so // /

column3: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig gam skad cig 'ga' zhig la bsgos na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237913#237922#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3057;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3058;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3059;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3060# de la klung ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpe'o // / +chu ni longs spyod kyi dpe'o // / +yi dags ni sems can gyi dper bstan te / /

column3: thams cad la yang bsgos par 'gyur ro zhe na / / +de'ang mi rung ste / / +rigs la bya na  gzhan du thal / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237921#237931#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3059;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3060;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3061# yi dags ni sems can gyi dper bstan te / / +ji ltar yi dags de dag klung gi chu  yongs su dag pa la btung zhing spyod par mi dbang ba de bzhin du / /

column3: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi sems kyang rnam par shes pa'i rigs las ma 'das te / / +de la yang mi dge ba'i bag chags bsgos par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237932#237950#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3060;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3061;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3062;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3063# ji ltar yi dags de dag klung gi chu  yongs su dag pa la btung zhing spyod par mi dbang ba de bzhin du / / +sems can rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod la spyod par mi dbang ngo zhes bshad do // /

column3: yang na gzhan du yang thal bar 'gyur te / / +rigs gzhan la yang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

ji lta zhe na / / +mig la    sogs pa'i dbang po dbang po'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams ni gzugs dang ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas dbang po nyid thun mong pa'i phyir yid kyi dbang po yang 'byung ba las gyur ba nyid du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237951#237961#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3063;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3064;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3065;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3066# dge ba'i chos skye ba'i bar du  gcod pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir dang zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237961#237971#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3065;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3066;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3067# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel ba las / / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can de dag gi longs spyod la nyes pa lci ba med par mthong yang / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238076#238084#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3080;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3081;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3082;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3083# gzhan yang bstan bcos de las sems can de dag dbul por gyur na kun tu skyo ba mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i phyir dang zhes 'byung ste / / +'di ni rgyu gsum pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238255#238259#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3109;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3110# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel ba las / / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can de dag longs spyod thob par gyur na / /

column3: bsgo bar bya na yang bsgo ba ni 'dir zad de / / +yang na phan tshun du'am skad cig snga mas skad cig phyi ma  la'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237970#237983#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3066;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3067;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3068;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3069# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can de dag gi longs spyod la nyes pa lci ba med par mthong yang / / +de gal te longs spyod dag 'thob par  'gyur na ; /

column3: rnam par shes pa'i rigs la bsgo grang na / / +rnam pa thams cad du mi rung bas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa la sgo bar byed pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni legs par bshad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237984#237998#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3068;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3069;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3070;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3071# des bag med pa mang zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skye bar mthong na / / +de 'di snyam du de dag tshe 'di la cung zad cig dbul bor gyur pa ni bla'i / /

column3: phyi dang nang gi sa bon 'di gnyi ga yang skyed par byed pa dang 'phen par  byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#469112#469112#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2588;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2589# 'od zer gyis kun du gsal bar byed do zhes 'byung  ngo ;; / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sngar bstan pa'i rin po che sna bdun las 'od zer 'byung bas kun du gsal bar gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357708#2357711#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5461# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las ni rnam par dag pa'i cha mthun pa  rnam par ma brtags pa'i mtshan ma med pa kun du 'byung ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di lta ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357963#2357966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5490;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5491# gong ma bas ches gong ma'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385673#2385675#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8906;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni sems can gyi lus la sogs pa'i las  la spyod pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220982#220985#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_871# lta bar gyur ba dang   'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba dang  yang dag par rnam pa thams cad du chos rnams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom nas sbyin pa btang bas 'bras bu'i  dus su dbul ba thams cad 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher sogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237856#237859#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3050;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3051# zhes bstan pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la sgrib par byed pa'i las ngan pa yod    pas ; /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237999#238008#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3070;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3072# de dag ma 'ongs pa na tshe rabs mang po dbul bar ma gyur cig snyam pa'i phyir / / +de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa mi byed do zhes  'byung ngo ; / /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473462#473463#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3136;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137# go rims bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis su skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu ba'i lam zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // /
column12: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405367#2405368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11181;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11182# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'di'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la blo gros zhes bya ste / /
column13: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473557#473558#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3149;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3150# de la lam ni spyi'i gnas yin la gnas las zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bye brag tu bzhon pa zhes bstan pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las na zhi gnas dang lhag     // /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533781#533782#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10974;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975# bdag tu rnam par rtog pa de dag gis de la 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa  de srid du rnam pa gcig pa 'gyur ba med pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column15: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536671#536672#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11360;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# 'di ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357138#2357139#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5395;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5396# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las kyang sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang bral zhing chos kyi kun dpa' la dga' ba thob pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa  las ni / /
column17: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357534#2357535#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5440;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5441# chos kyi snang ba chen po thams cad du tshad med cing rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par shes pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni phyogs bcu mtha' med pa rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan  nyid yang dag par shes pa dag ni / /
column18: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385163#2385164#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8851;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8852# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo'i bdag  nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo nyid kyi sgrib pa'o zhes bshad do // /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385917#2385918#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8930;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8931# bsags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa la sogs pa la kun du rmongs shing chos rnams brjed par gyur pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  ni thos pa dang  bsams pa dang bsgoms pa dag la rmongs rtul zhing brjed ngas pa dang bcas pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386198#2386199#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8961# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang  bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pas bsdus pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column21: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386810#2386811#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9023# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las ni rnam par rig pa tsam gyi mtshan ma rags pa kun du 'byung ba dag ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o // /
column22: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387048#2387049#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9043;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9044# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba zhes bshad  do // /
column23: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403322#2403323#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10992;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10993# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404780#2404781#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11127;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11128# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sa 'di la sbyor ba'i spyod pa'i  mthar phyin cing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mi gyo ba yin yang mtshan ma med pa la da dung rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column25: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406125#2406126#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11252;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes  'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /
column26: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220613#220615#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol  'gro bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /
column27: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226115#226117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1563# rnam pa drug po dag go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536820#536820#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11387;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11388# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni grong dang kun dga' rab la sogs pa lta bur snang ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: phyir rol gyi sa bon ni myu gu mngon du skyed par byed pa'o // / +brgyud nas sdong bu la sogs pa'i 'phen pa yang yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238006#238018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3072;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3073;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3074# de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa mi byed do zhes  'byung ngo ; / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238223#238232#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3104;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3105;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3106# zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las kyang de skad du bshad do // /
column6: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314615#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column7: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387662#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238344#238345#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3123;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3124# 'di ni slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i spyi mjug bsdu ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column9: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478679#478680#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3731;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3732# 'di ni mi zad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni zad pa med de / /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506127#506128#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7453;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7454# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa dang sbyar na ni de la gzugs dang stong pa nyid ni tha dad pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'byung ba dang mthun par  bshad de / /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535268#535269#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11181# skyes nas kyang skad cig las lhag par bdag nyid gnas par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column12: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398087#2398088#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473918#473918#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3190# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las tshig 'di gcig gis gzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan te / /

column3: nang gi sa bon kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang ming dang gzugs mngon du skyed par byed pa'o // / +brgyud nas rga shi la thug pa'i bar du 'phen par byed pa yang  yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238019#238031#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3073;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3074;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3075;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3076# sems can kha cig la las kyi sgrib pa med mod kyi / / +byang chub sems dpa' de dag rgyun du dge ba'i chos skye bar mthong la / /

column3: skyed par byed pa ni yin grang na 'phen par byed par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na / / +ma btab shi ba 'phen pa'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238032#238041#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3076;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3077# longs spyod kyi bde ba myong  ba'i phyir de'i dge ba'i chos skye ba'i bar du gcod pa nyid du gyur na 'di snyam du sems te / /

column3: zhes bya ba smos so // / +gal te sa bon ni skyed par byed pa yin la / / +'phen par byed pa ma yin na sa bon du ma btab pa skyed pa la sogs pa'i nang du yod pa'i nas la sogs pa'i  sa bon rnams kyi rgyun yun ring por rjes su 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238042#238052#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3077;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3078# 'di dag dbul bzhin du dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni bla'i / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238053#238063#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3078;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3079;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3080# 'di dag longs spyod dang ldan par gyur nas dge ba skye ba'i bar du chod par gyur pa ni mi rung ngo snyam nas /// /
column6: 0.022#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2746656#2746656#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6391# gal te bdag pha rol gyi longs spyod dag las nyams par byas na mi rung ngo snyam nas 'jigs pas brdzun zer ba yang chags  pa las byung ba yin par brjod par bya'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810209#1810209#TD4082E.TXT.r_407# bsod nams ma yin pa mang du 'phel bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam zhing / /
column8: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1833688#1833688#TD4039E.TXT.r_2333# gang zad de dag nyid kyis 'dod pa'am gzhan dag la yang ston par byed pa'i rgyu 'dis 'gro ba ngan par skye bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa dang  bstan pa la dga' ba'i sgo nas dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa la brten pas bstan pa nub par  'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa'o // /

column3: shi ba'i ro rnams kyang rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur gyi shi ma thag tu rnam par 'jug par 'gyur ba'i rigs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238062#238074#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3079;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3080# rigs pa des longs spyod dag sbyin par mi byed do zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: ji lta zhe na / / +mda' ni bar du mi ltung bzhin / / +dper na  mnga' ni sngar bkang la 'phangs na 'gro ba de la 'gro ba de'i skyed par byed pa ni bkang ba ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237953#237962#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3063;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3064;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3065;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3066# dge ba'i chos skye ba'i bar du  gcod pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir dang zhes 'byung ste / / +'di ni rgyu gnyis pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238075#238092#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3080;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3081;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3082;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3083;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3084# gzhan yang bstan bcos de las sems can de dag dbul por gyur na kun tu skyo ba mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i phyir dang zhes 'byung ste / / +'di ni rgyu gsum pa'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536940#536940#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11400;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11401# rnam par rig pa 'di dag la bye brag yod pas / / +yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel     // /

column3: de med pa'i phyir ro // / +mi 'gro ba yang ma yin te / / +tshu rol du ltung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +ji srid du 'gro bar bya bar yang 'gro bas na de'i phyir bkang ba ni de la 'phen pa yin par mngon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238091#238106#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3083;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3084;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3085;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3086# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can de dag nor dag gi phung por gyur na / / +'khor ba la shin tu skyo ba'i sems mngon du gyur nas / /

column3: gang  dag rang gi ngang gis mthar 'jig phyir // / +zhes 'don pa de dag gi ltar na 'di ni 'phen par byed pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyi don yin gyi dpe ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238107#238120#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3086;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3087# gal te longs spyod dag thob par gyur na ni dregs par 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir zang zing dag  gtong bar mi byed de / /

column3: 'di ltar snying po dang ma zad pa'i mar me 'chi ba'i tshul du mtha' 'gyur ba'i rgyun 'chad pa'i bdag nyid phyir rol gyi rkyen la mi ltos par rang gi ngang     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238121#238129#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3087;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3088# de 'di snyam du de dag dbul zhing 'khor ba las skyo ba'i sems rtag par mngon du gyur pa bla'i / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238130#238137#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3088;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3089;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3090# de longs spyod thob nas bde ba myong zhing bag med par gyur te / / +'khor ba las skye ba med pas / /

column3: gis rnam par 'jig pa yin te / / +des na gang gis de ltar 'du byed rnams ji ltar sngon bzhin du rgyu na rgyas par mi byed pas nges par 'phen pas yongs su zad par rjes su dpag go //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323907#2323911#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1586;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1587# mthong ba'i chos dang  tshe rabs phyi ma la dge ba'i chos gong nas gong du 'phel ba dang  yongs su mi nyams pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad de / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238138#238155#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3089;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3090;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3091;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3092# 'khor ba las skye ba med pas / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bskyed pa ni mi rung ngo snyam mo zhes bshad de  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /

column8: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527910#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10230;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dmar po dang  dkar po de dag dang  grub pa dang bde ba gcig tu gyur ces  bshad de / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column9: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390581#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# der mngon sum du 'gyur zhing khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir skyes pa zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403882#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11053;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# bstan bcos theg pa chen po  bsdus pa las ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad bsreg pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404472#2404473#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11100;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11101# bstan bcos  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'i shes pa'i gnas yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di lta ste / /
column12: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226752#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1646;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rnam pa dgu po  de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa ni zang zing dang  chos dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba de 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad PA YIN NO // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column14: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /

column18: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /

column35: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column36: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column37: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: bam po gnyis pa / / +de ltar nang gi dang phyi'i sa bon gnyis mtshungs par  bstan nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238156#238165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3091;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3092;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3093# gzhan yang bstan bcos de nyid las / / +sems can de dag la longs spyod dag sbyin na mi dge ba'i chos la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir dang zhes 'byung sto / /

column3: phyi rol sa bon ma btab pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi mtshungs pa nyid brjod do // / +'am zhes bya ba ni nges pa med pa'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238163#238175#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3092;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3093;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3094;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3095# sems can de dag la longs spyod dag sbyin na mi dge ba'i chos la sogs pa'i rgyu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir dang zhes 'byung sto / /

column3: phyi rol gyi sa bon ni btab kyang rung ste sa bon nyid du rnam par rtog ste dper na sol ba dang ba lang gi lci ba dang  lug gi bal la sogs pa ni  til dang  autpala'i rtsa ba dang  rtsva d'ur pa la sogs pa la go rims bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238176#238185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3094;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3096# slob dpon ngo  bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can de dag la gal te longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dag byin na bag med par gyur cing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238186#238201#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3097;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3098;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3099;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3100# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can de dag la gal te longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dag byin na bag med par gyur cing / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: til la sogs pa sol ba la sogs pa la ma btab mod kyi 'on kyang de dag las skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238200#238211#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3098;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3099;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3100;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3101;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3102# tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad du / / +longs spyod dag gis phongs par gyur nas ni // /

column3: 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa'i sa bon btab pa ni s'a lu'i myu gu la sogs pa sa bon du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238210#238223#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3101;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3102;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3104# de dag phyug pas dbang po yengs gyur te // / +ma 'ongs sdug bsngal snod gyur mi rung ngo // /
column5: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244503#244505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914# ces bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel    pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to // /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473556#473557#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3149;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3150# de la lam ni spyi'i gnas yin la gnas las zhi gnas dang lhag mthong bye brag tu bzhon pa zhes bstan pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las na zhi gnas dang lhag     // /
column7: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237855#237859#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3050;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3051# zhes bstan pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la sgrib par byed pa'i las ngan pa yod    pas ; /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220613#220614#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol  'gro bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin PA LA SOGS PA'I PHA ROL tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /
column9: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226115#226116#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1563# rnam pa drug po dag go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386197#2386198#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8961# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la LTA BA LA SOGS PA'I MA RIG pa zhas 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang  bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pas bsdus pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column11: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357533#2357534#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5440;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5441# chos kyi snang ba chen po thams cad du tshad med cing rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par shes pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni phyogs bcu mtha' med pa rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan  nyid yang dag par shes pa dag ni / /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357708#2357708#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5461# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las ni rnam par dag pa'i cha mthun pa  rnam par ma brtags pa'i mtshan ma med pa kun du 'byung ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di lta ste / /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536820#536820#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11387;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11388# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni grong dang kun dga' rab LA SOGS PA LTA BUR snang ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: nges pa med pa'i sa bon nyid de ni nang  gi kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma yin te / / +de la ni btab pa nyid sa bon du rung gi ma btab pa ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535267#535269#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11181# skyes nas kyang skad cig las lhag par bdag nyid gnas par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323909#2323910#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1587# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397794#2397795#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10300# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238344#238352#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3123;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3124;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3125;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3126# 'di ni slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i spyi mjug bsdu ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column8: 0.007#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506127#506128#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7453;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7454# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa dang sbyar na ni de la gzugs dang stong pa nyid ni THA DAD PA MA YIN TE ZHES bya ba ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'byung ba dang mthun par  bshad de / /
column9: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535457#535458#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11198;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir mchog    gi don gyis yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238146#238152#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3090;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3091# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bskyed pa ni mi rung ngo snyam mo zhes bshad de  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /
column11: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238297#238300#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3115# de ma yin pa'i sems can ches mang po dag la gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du sems so zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bshad do // /
column12: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314614#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_418;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# ces 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column13: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314669#2314669#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_428;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_429# ces 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316431#2316431#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_649;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650# zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column15: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221079#221079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_879# nges pa'i tshig gzhan ni go sla'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs 'bras bu gtogs par bstan to // /
column16: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398086#2398088#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column18: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478679#478680#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3731;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3732# 'di ni mi zad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni zad pa med de / /
column19: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270050#270050#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7064;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7065# rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba dang bral ba yin yang gdul ba'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams  kyi mos pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du phan 'dogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs ston to zhes mngon par bsgrubs pa yin no zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba'i 'grel ba las kyang de skad du ston to // /

column3: de ci mngon zhe na / / +thos pa la sogs pa'i bag chags bskyed pa med na de'i 'bras bu mang du thos pa la sogs pa mi snang ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238233#238245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3105;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3106;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3107# gzhan yang bstan bcos de nyid las / / +sems can de dag la gal te longs spyod dag sbyin par gyur na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4051E.TXT.r#1261106#1261108#TD4051E.TXT.r_4207;TD4051E.TXT.r_4208# zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +sems can ches mang ba dag la gnod pa'i rgyu nyid du ma thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni su dbang  phyug thob nas sems can shin tu mang po dag la gnod par byed pa de la yang mi sgrub ste / /

column3: phyi rol gyi 'bras bu s'a lu la sogs pa'i sa bon  gang yin pa de ni btab kyang res 'ga' chud zos la sred la sogs pa ni ma btab kyang rung ste skye ba de ltar nang gi sa bon ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238246#238264#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3107;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3108;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3109;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3110;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3111# de ma yin pa'i sems can ches mang ba dag la gnod pa'i rgyu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +'di ni    rgyu lnga pa'o ; / /

column3: byas pa dang ma byas pa chud za ba dang skye ba med pas phyi rol dang mi 'dra'o // / +gal te nang gi sa bon las phyi'i sa bon tha dad pa yin na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sa bon  thams cad pa nyid du snga bshad pa la gnod par ji ltar mi 'gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238263#238272#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3110;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3111;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3112# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can de dag longs spyod thob par gyur na / / +des sems can mang po dag la gnod pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238273#238289#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3111;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3112;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3113;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3114# des sems can mang po dag la gnod pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir / / +de dag la longs spyod bdog pa dag sbyin par mi byed de / /

column3: lan btab pa / / +nang ni phyir rol rkyen yin te // / +'di ltar de ni bag chags rten // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238288#238297#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3115# de ma yin pa'i sems can ches mang po dag la gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du sems so zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533781#533783#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10974;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975# bdag tu rnam par rtog pa de dag gis de la 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa  de srid du rnam pa gcig pa 'gyur ba med pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535456#535457#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11198;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir mchog    gi don gyis yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314613#2314614#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_417;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_418# sangs rgyas rnams la mnga' dbang med // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /

column9: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316430#2316431#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_648;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_649# mthar phyin pas ni theg gcig bstan // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221079#221079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_879# nges pa'i tshig gzhan ni go sla'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs 'bras bu gtogs par bstan to // /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387661#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536671#536673#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11360;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# 'di ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357138#2357138#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5395;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5396# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las kyang sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang bral zhing chos kyi kun dpa' la dga' ba thob pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa  las ni / /
column14: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357965#2357965#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5490;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5491# gong ma bas ches gong ma'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385163#2385163#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8851;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8852# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo'i bdag  nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo nyid kyi sgrib pa'o zhes bshad do // /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385917#2385917#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8930;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8931# bsags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa la sogs pa la kun du rmongs shing chos rnams brjed par gyur pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  ni thos pa dang  bsams pa dang bsgoms pa dag la rmongs rtul zhing brjed ngas pa dang bcas pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column17: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386810#2386810#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9023# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las ni rnam par rig pa tsam gyi mtshan ma rags pa kun du 'byung ba dag ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o // /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387048#2387048#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9043;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9044# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba zhes bshad  do // /
column19: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403322#2403322#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10992;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10993# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column20: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404780#2404780#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11127;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11128# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sa 'di la sbyor ba'i spyod pa'i  mthar phyin cing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mi gyo ba yin yang mtshan ma med pa la da dung rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406125#2406125#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11252;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes  'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste // / +'di ltar 'bras s'a lu la sogs pa'i sa bon ni de la za ba'i srog chags rnams kyi las kyi bag chags kyi sa bon kun  gzhi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa rnams kyis der snang bar bsgrubs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238146#238148#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3090# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bskyed pa ni mi rung ngo snyam mo zhes bshad de  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238306#238315#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3115;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3116;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3117# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bshad do // / +gzhan yang bstan  bcos de las de'i phyir sems can brel phongs pa can dag snang ngo // /
column6: 2.980#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535457#535457#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11198;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir mchog    gi don gyis yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314614#2314614#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_418;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419# ces 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column8: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314669#2314669#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_428;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_429# ces 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316430#2316431#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_648;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_649# mthar phyin pas ni theg gcig bstan // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221079#221079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_879# nges pa'i tshig gzhan ni go sla'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs 'bras bu gtogs par bstan to // /
column11: 0.006#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387661#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.008#TD4048E.TXT.r#1695541#1695543#TD4048E.TXT.r_1749;TD4048E.TXT.r_1750# kun tu skye ba mngon du gyur par mthong ba dang  longs spyod de nye bar sgrub na mi dge ba'i chos sogs pa'i rgyu nyid du mthong ba dang  longs spyod de nye bar sgrub pa nyid de las gzhan pa'i sems can ches  mang ba dag la gnod pa'i rgyu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir / / +sems can brel phongs can dag snang ngo // /
column13: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535268#535269#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11181# skyes nas kyang skad cig las lhag par bdag nyid gnas par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column14: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227749#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column15: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column16: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475086#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column17: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column18: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen pa zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column20: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column21: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column22: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column23: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237796#237796#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3039;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3040# 'di ni rgyu dang po'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las / /
column24: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column25: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474728#474728#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261# chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i yon tan dang  mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa ston pa'i yon tan dang  sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su mchad pa'i yon tan dang  'khor ba'i mtha' ji snyam par sems  can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan dang  mi zad pa'i yon tan la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column26: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477883#477883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3627# 'di nyid dang sbyar te yon tan gyi ming bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par bstan pa rnams yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column27: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column29: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227064#227065#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688# tshul khrims phyi ma gnyis kyi bshad pa ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column30: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228204#228204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816# phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column31: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226753#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column32: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235702#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column33: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba de 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column34: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /
column35: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527912#527912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10231# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column36: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214117#214117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig ces ston te / /
