column6: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373063#2373063#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7408# rnal 'byor gyi sgo de dag kyang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224467#224468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1378# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /

column3: gzhan yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med du zin na ji ltar 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par 'gyur ba mi srid pa de ltar tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis 'dri ste tshigs su sbyar ba bsdebs nas brjod pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad  pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241740#241747#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3558;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3559# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // / +'di ltar bstan pa rnams tha dad par gyur cing lpags shun la yod pa lta bu la sogs pa gsum bstan pa yang don gyis spang bar bya ba la rags pa dang  phra ba'i don yod pa nyid du rab tu bstan pa'i phyir sgo rnam pa bzhi la  brten nas gnas ngan len gyi don bstan pas 'gal ba med de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241748#241761#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3559# 'di ltar bstan pa rnams tha dad par gyur cing lpags shun la yod pa lta bu la sogs pa gsum bstan pa yang don gyis spang bar bya ba la rags pa dang  phra ba'i don yod pa nyid du rab tu bstan pa'i phyir sgo rnam pa bzhi la  brten nas gnas ngan len gyi don bstan pas 'gal ba med de / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byang chub sems dpa' ni bshad zin to // / +bzang po zhes bya ba ni dge ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241762#241772#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3559;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3560;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3561# 'di ltar bstan pa rnams tha dad par gyur cing lpags shun la yod pa LTA BU LA SOGS PA gsum bstan pa yang don gyis spang bar BYA BA LA RAGS PA dang  phra ba'i don yod pa nyid du rab tu bstan pa'i phyir sgo rnam pa bzhi la  brten nas gnas ngan len gyi don bstan pas 'gal ba med de / /

column3: rnam par shes pa lnga spangs pa zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o // / +bstsal ba med pa las gzhan pa zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241771#241783#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3560;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3561;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3563# brtags na khong du chud par 'gyur ro // / +de yan chad du bag la nyal dang gnas ngan len gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan nas / /

column3: bstsal    ba ni mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa las grol ba zag pa med pa ste / / +zag pa med pa de las gzhan pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni bstsal ba de las gzhan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241782#241794#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3563;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3564# da ni mdo'i tshig gi don bshad par bya'o // / +de la 'dir zhu ba gsol ba'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te / /

column3: gnyen po nyid la ni mthun pa'i phyogs kyi bag la nyal du mi rung ngo // / +gal te gnyen po nyid 'gyur ba yin par 'dod  na de'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241793#241808#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3564;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3565;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3566# gnas  ngan len rnam pa gsum las rnam pa du zhig spangs PAS BAG LA NYAL DE DAG rab tu dbye ba lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: spangs pa min phyir mi rung ngo // / +zhes bya ba smos te / / +gnyen po ni spangs pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241806#241816#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3565;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3566;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3567# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / / +skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa de dag spangs pa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241838#241839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3569;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3570# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / / +skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas  nyon mongs pa rnams spong zhes 'byung ba yang mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa dang don mthun no // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242201#242208#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3602;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3603# spyir sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa la    bag la nyal rnam pa gsum gyi sa bon gtan du spong ba rab tu ston to zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column3: 'o na ci zhe na / / +spangs pa'i rgyu yin no // / +gyur pa ni spangs pa ste / / +'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro // / +gal te gnyen po nyid spangs pa yin par 'dod na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241813#241826#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3566;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3567;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3568# skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa de dag spangs pa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: rgyu 'bras tha dad med par  'gyur // / +spangs pa'i rgyu gnyen po 'bras bu nyid du khas len na gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241827#241839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3567;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3569;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3570# mdo las nyon mongs pa    zhes gsungs pa ni gnas ngan len la brtags pa tsam du nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes gsungs kyi yang dag pa'i don du ni ma yin te / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje lta bu'i bar du 'jog pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242204#242205#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3602;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3603# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / / +skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa de dag spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373965#2373966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7506;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7507# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chu rnyog ma'i snod kyi dpe dang  me long yongs su ma dag pa'i dpe dang  mtshe'u 'khrugs pa'i dpe rnam pa gsum po de dag gis rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gyi  mtshan ma so sor brtag par mi nus par GSUNGS PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#548086#548088#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12745;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12746# mdo sde'i tshig dang rjes su MTHUN PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#510349#510350#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7951;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7952# tha dad pa'i bdag nyid MED PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las pi pi ling dang tshab nyid ces 'byung ngo // /
column9: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522459#522461#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9479;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9480# mdo sde'i mjug gi tshig mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal tha mar 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220138#220139#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_779;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_780# de'i phyir dgongs pa zab mo rnam par grol ba'i mdo las / /
column11: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2310977#2310977#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_41;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_42# dad pa bcu po rnams te 'di ltar ci nus ci lcogs kyis sdig pa'i las rnams sbyang ba'i  phyir ro // / +de'i phyir dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#510240#510240#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7933;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7934# tha dad  pa'i bdag nyid MED PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang sbyar na de las ni rgyu'o rgyud mangs dang sgra las gcig pa dang  tha dad pa ma yin par rnam par 'byed de mdo de dang sbyar na rgyu'o // /
column13: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522155#522155#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9435;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9436# de la ngo bo nyid dang  mtshan nyid  tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid bye BRAG TU GYUR PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang  bye brag tu gyur pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column14: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385475#2385476#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8886;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8887# sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis STON PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311022#2311022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_46;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_48# shes pa bcu'i gang zag mngon par yid ches pa la sogs pas rgyud yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa'o // / +phyir dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column16: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387684#2387684#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9106;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9107# tha dad pa MED PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las rnam pa thams cad du chos bstan pa la dbang du ma gyur pa zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las rnam pa thams cad du tshig la mkhas pa la dbang du ma gyur pa'i sgrib pa zhes  gsungs pa la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /

column3: gal te sa bon bral ba'am // / +dngos po med par 'gyur 'dod na // / +zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241840#241847#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3569;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3570# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / / +skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas  nyon mongs pa rnams spong zhes 'byung ba yang mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa dang don mthun no // /

column3: 'gyur ba zhig yin na kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sa bon rnam pa mang po bsags pa'i  sems kyi sa bon dang bral bar 'gyur ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241848#241865#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3570;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3571;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3572# skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas  nyon mongs pa rnams spong zhes 'byung ba yang mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa dang don mthun no // /
column5: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216407#216409#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_294# zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235784#235787#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2799;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2800# 'di ltar mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag re re la yang  mos rnam pa du mchis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column7: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245280#245282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4004;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4005# de dag gi dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column8: 0.007#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402941#2402942#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10949# 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237316#237317#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2978# bcom  ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column10: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244149#244149#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3863# bcom    ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246092#246093#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4098;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4099# 'di ni dang po ji ltar gsungs pa'i don du zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column12: 0.014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222910#222912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column13: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223707#223709#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column14: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245349#245350#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4011# 'di ni dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ste / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column15: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220016#220017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_766# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa  spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column16: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231632#231634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column17: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236901#236901#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2931# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems  dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column18: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224791#224793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1415# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column19: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214244#214245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column20: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226478#226478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column21: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228596#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column22: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237177#237178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2963# 'di ni dang po dang  rgyu dang     'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column23: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236168#236170#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2849;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2850# zhu ba 'di gsol ba yin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column24: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219506#219508#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_699;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_700# de don gang la dgongs pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column25: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225901#225902#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1534# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems  dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column26: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223638#223638#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1262;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1263# mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad  ces gsol to // /
column27: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231593#231593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column28: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220199#220199#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column29: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226439#226439#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column30: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237243#237243#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2971# rgyu dang rkyen des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub par 'gyur bas so // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column31: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397223#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column32: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397243#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column33: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397267#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag LA NYON MONGS PA'I BAG la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column34: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219872#219872#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_744# mdo 'di las ni dang po las kyi  stobs ma gtogs pa skye ba gzhan rnams las brtsams nas bstan pa yin no // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: yang na sa bon rnams med par 'gyur grang na / / +de med par ni gnyis med de // /
column4: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219517#219520#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_701;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_702# rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa bzhi'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa  de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par len du gsungs pa ston to // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni yod na sa bon dang bral ba'am / / +dngos po med par 'gyur gyi / / +med na ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241866#241880#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3572;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3574;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3575# rigs kyi bu rnam pa gnyis kyis te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa  de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par len du gsungs pa ston to // /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239930#239932#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3330;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3331# rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa  dang ; /

column3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems mngon du gyur pa de'i  tshe ni de dag med na sa bon dang bral ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220389#220392#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_799# grangs smos nas lan du mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // / +'di ni dang po grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa ste / /
column5: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391951#2391952#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9606;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9607# grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming  bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o // / +'di ni dang po grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa ste / /
column6: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231050#231052#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2180;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2181# grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  rnam par phye ste bstan pa dang  gzhan dag gis rgol ba'i rjes su bzlas te bstan pa ste / / +'di ni dang po grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa'o // /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263937#263939#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6312;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6313# 'di yang mdor bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba bstan te / / +'di ni dang po grangs mdor smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa'o // /

column3: chad pa ji ltar 'gyur / / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'di'i rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don rab tu dbye dgos pas rab tu dbye ba 'dri ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241883#241902#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3575;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3576;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3577# 'di ni dang po grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa ste / /

column3: rnam pa gsum dang rnam pa bzhir blta bar bya'o // / +zhes bya ba la / / +mngon  par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag ces bya ba ni bdag dang chos dang  bya bar mngon par brjod par tha snyad btags pa rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241900#241924#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3576;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3577;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3578;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3579# 'di ltar lpags shun dang spri dang rkang la yod pa lta bu'i  gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum spangs pa'i phyir bag la nyal rab tu dbye ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +gnas ngan len spangs pa'i don ni gzhan nas bstan pa bzhin no // /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#489499#489499#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5319# rnam pa brgyad kyi dbu mar mi  'gyur ba'i don ni gzhan nas bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: lha dang mi dang mig dang  gzugs dang  'gro'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bag chags sna tshogs yin te / /
nus pa'i khyad par gang las  bdag dang  chos dang  bya ba'i mngon par brjod par 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368831#2368831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6876# don rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241925#241932#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3579;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3580# spri la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spangs pa'i phyir ni nges rab tu phye ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273676#273678#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7496;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7497# dngos po mod pa brgyad gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362656#2362656#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6059# 'du byed thams cad kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni  gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column8: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230034#230036#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2062# 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang  longs spyod dang  dbang phyug dang  'dod pa'i bsod nams las shin tu yon tan gyi phan yon du lta pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste  bshad pa ston to // /
column9: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239987#239989#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3341# de'i phyir grogs yang dag par bcom pa'i bag la nyal zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la  sogs pas ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214321#214322#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_33# 'di lta ste sa dang po la kun tu rmongs pa rnam pa gnyis yod de gang zag dang chos la mngon par zhen pa kun du rmongs pa  dang  ngan song gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i kun du rmongs pa dang  de'i gnas ngan len mi mthun pa'i phyogs so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column11: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257492#257492#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5399# gang zag bstan pa'i phyir dang  kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir dang  chos rnams kyi byed pa dang  gyo ba dang  las byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261701#261701#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5987# de la mngon sum dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste  bshad pa ston to // /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223853#223853#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1285# bzod  pas ni gnod pa dang  phongs pa dang  rnam par tho 'tshams pa de dag la ji mi snyam par bzod pas sems can la phan thogs so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /

column3: bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyi bye brag ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bzhis nyon mongs par gyur pa'i yid 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i dbang gis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la bdag go snyam pa'i bag chags kyi bye brag     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241933#241955#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3579;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3580;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3581;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3582# spri la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spangs pa'i phyir ni nges rab tu phye ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis kho na bstan pa dang  rkang la yod pa lta bu spangs pa nyid bstan cing logs shig tu rnam par phye ste ma bstan pa'o // /

column3: srid pa'i yan lag gi bag chags kyi bye brag ces bya ba ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang  mi gyo ba'i 'du byed kyi dbang gis lha la sogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams su ma rig pa nas rga shi la thug pa rnams kyi bag chags kyi bye brag go  rnam pa gsum bshad zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241955#241972#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3582;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3583;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3584;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3585# 'di ltar spyir bstan pa'i bag la nyal rnam pa gsum las shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnas ngan len rnam pa gnyis kho na rab tu phye ba yin te / /

column3: rnam pa bzhir brjod par bya ste / / +'phen pas rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba la / / +gang rnam par smin pa'i bag chags gsar du 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni bag chags 'byung ba brjod pas thog mar skye ba gang yin pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241973#241982#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3584;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3585# dang po ni sa rab tu dga' ba nas sa bdun pa'i bar gyis lpags shun la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spong bar  byed de ; / +gnas ngan len 'di gcig spangs pa'i don gyi phyir ni grogs yang dag par bcom pa dang  nyams stobs chung ba'i bag la nyal gyi gnas ngan len spangs pa'i DON RAB TU DBYE BA YIN no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241983#241990#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3586# gnas ngan len 'di gcig spangs pa'i don gyi phyir ni grogs yang dag par bcom pa dang  nyams stobs chung ba'i bag la nyal gyi gnas ngan len spangs pa'i DON RAB TU DBYE BA YIN no // /

column3: de 'phen pas rab tu dbye ba ste / / +des skye  ba 'phen pa'i phyir ro // / +de med du zin na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang  len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa mi rung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241991#242009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3586;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3587;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3588# gnas ngan len spangs pa'i phyir ni sa brgyad pa dang  dgu pa dang bcu pa'i shin tu phra ba'i bag la     // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal la ltos pa skye ba la mngon du phyogs par gnas pa de nyid srid pa zhes  bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242008#242020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3588;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3589# gal te de lta na bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gnas pa gsum gyis gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum spong bar byed do zhes bstan pa ji ltar go zhing rnam par bshad par bya zhe na / /

column3: rnam par smin pas rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ni gang 'du byed dang  srid pa'i rkyen gyis 'gro ba rnams su 'phangs pa rnam par smin pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242021#242031#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3588;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3589;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3590# gal te de lta na bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gnas pa gsum gyis gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum spong bar byed do zhes bstan pa ji ltar go zhing rnam par bshad par bya zhe na / / +mdo 'di dang  bstan bcos de las mi 'dra yang don mi mtshungs pas brda phrad cing rnam par bshad mi dgos so // /

column3: de med du zin na rgyu med par gyur pas yang 'byung ba'i mig la sogs pa'i chos rnams skye bar mi rung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242032#242046#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3589;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3590;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3591# mdo 'di dang  bstan bcos de las mi 'dra yang don mi mtshungs pas brda phrad cing rnam par bshad mi dgos so // / +yang na mdo 'di dang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa de don la bye brag med de / /

column3: rtsa ba med par yal ga la  sogs pa mi 'byung ngo // / +rgyu nyid du rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ni gang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i dbang gis bdag tu 'dzin pas dmigs pa de nyid ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rgyu nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242047#242054#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3591;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3592;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3593# 'di ltar lpags shun la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len ni sa dang po pas spong ngo // / +sa brgyad pas ni spri  la yod pa lta bu spong ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242055#242063#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3592;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3593;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3594# sa brgyad pas ni spri  la yod pa lta bu spong ngo // / +sangs rgyas kyi sa las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu spong bas so // /

column3: de med du zin na nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang  'brel ba can gyi ngar 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa med par 'gyur ro / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242064#242075#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3593;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3594# sangs rgyas kyi sa las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu spong bas so // / +grogs yang dag par bcom pa la sogs pa gsum gyi don gyi mtshan nyid rab tu ma phye bas sa dang po pas lpags shun la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spangs na grogs yang dag par bcom pa dang  nyams stobs  chung ba nyid kyi don gdod rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir lpags shun la yod pa lta bu spangs pa'i phyir ni dang po dang gnyis pa de dag rab tu phye ba yin no zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no // /

column3: mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba ni thun mong pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gi rnam pa du ma'o // / +de la thun mong ni snod kyi 'jig rten gyi sa bon gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242074#242089#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3594# grogs yang dag par bcom pa la sogs pa gsum gyi don gyi mtshan nyid rab tu ma phye bas sa dang po pas lpags shun la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spangs na grogs yang dag par bcom pa dang  nyams stobs  chung ba nyid kyi don gdod rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir lpags shun la yod pa lta bu spangs pa'i phyir ni dang po dang gnyis pa de dag RAB TU PHYE BA YIN no zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten du snang ba'i rnam par rig pa rnams  kyi byed rgyu'o // / +thun mong ba ni rang gi las dang mthun pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis de la spyod pa po thams cad la der snang ba'i rnam par rig pa skye ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242088#242106#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3594;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3595# grogs yang dag par bcom pa la sogs pa gsum gyi don gyi mtshan nyid rab tu ma phye bas sa dang po pas lpags shun la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spangs na grogs yang dag par bcom pa dang  nyams stobs  chung ba nyid kyi don gdod rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir lpags shun la yod pa lta bu spangs pa'i phyir ni dang po dang gnyis pa de dag rab tu phye ba yin no zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no // /
column5: 0.013#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#894383#894383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_715;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_716# stong pa zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang tshig gzhan la don gzhan 'byung bas brtag dka' ba'i phyir dka' ba'o // / +don rnams kyang rtogs par dka' bas na zab pa'o // /
column6: 0.013#TD4035E.TXT.r#135716#135716#TD4035E.TXT.r_1897;TD4035E.TXT.r_1898# rnam pa bcu'i phyir te / / +rjes su 'brel ba'i skye bo'i don dang  dmigs pa myong ba'i don dang  dmigs pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don dang  dmigs pa mngon par 'du byed  pa'i don dang  chos de dag nyid dus tha dad pa'i don dang  sgrib pa med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa dang bral ba'i don dang  mi rtag pa dang ma bral ba'i don dang  rtag pa phyin ci ma log pa'i don dang  bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i don dang  tshor ba dang bral ba ma    yin pa'i don dang  tshor ba dang bral ba'i don dang  nang dang phyi'i skye mched rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba de dag ni / /
column7: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1171486#1171486#TD4047E.TXT.r_7384;TD4047E.TXT.r_7385# mi lta ba dang  phyi sa dang 'dra ba'i 'dod pa rnams la nyon mongs pa'i phyi sa rul ba lta bu dang 'brel pa'i phyir mi lta ba'o // / +'tsho ba'i  bsam pas rab tu byung bas ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad spangs pa rnams la mi lta ba de bas ni byang chub sems dpa' mi'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams la mi lta ba khyad par du byas nas / /
column8: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155287#1155287#TD4047E.TXT.r_5020;TD4047E.TXT.r_5021# legs par bslabs pa ni las de la mkhas par byas pas de lta bu'i rang bzhin ston pa'o // / +bcol ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir / /
column9: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235652#235652#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2782;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2783;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2784# bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab de ting nge 'dzin gyi sems kyi rgyud la SPYOD PA'I PHYIR RO // / +'phel bar byed pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni / / +de la spyod pa'i don bstan te / /
column10: 0.016#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2606440#2606440#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8755;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8756# du zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nyes pa  snga ma BSAL BA'I PHYIR RO // / +don de rnam par grol ba'i phyir de la 'jig rten pa'i bral ba'i thob pa med du zin kyang zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te / /
column11: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#794952#794952#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4720;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4721# rigs mthun pas mtshungs pa'i phyir te / / +de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column12: 0.018#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2919785#2919785#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7265;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7266# sogs par skye ba la ni sogs pa don med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pa skye ba la yang sogs pa don med par  mi 'gyur ba'i gtan tshigs kyis na nang gi 'du byed rnams skad cig mar rig par bya'o // / +sogs pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir / /
column13: 0.018#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2036030#2036030#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8389;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8390# rgyu mthun las byung ZHES BYA BA NI SKAL ba mnyam pa'i rgyus bskyed ces bya ba'i don to // / +lus rgyas par  'grib par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyas pa las byung ba ma yin la / /
column14: 0.019#TD4061E.TXT.r#1528158#1528158#TD4061E.TXT.r_2157;TD4061E.TXT.r_2158# brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin pa ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams lta bu ste / / +de rnams ni mdzes par bya ba'i bsam pa nyid kyis cha ba'i phyir dang  brgyan pa'i phyir za'o // /
column15: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#904072#904073#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1805;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1806# nyon thos kyi rigs kyis ni bdag gi don tsam sgrub par zad kyi gzhan gyi don mi sgrub pas dge ba don chen po'i rgyu mi byed la byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis ni bdag dang gzhan gnyi ga'i don sgrub pas dge ba'i don chen po'i rgyu BYED PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column16: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1161810#1161812#TD4047E.TXT.r_5974;TD4047E.TXT.r_5975# nad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par zhi bar bya  ba'i phyir ZHES BYA BA NI NAD pa rnams kyi nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // / +phan gdags pa'i phyir ro ZHES BYA BA NI NAD med PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR RO // /
column17: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#659832#659832#TD4069E.TXT.r_5244;TD4069E.TXT.r_5245# nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis ni mtshungs pa dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / +rgyas pa'i  phyir na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni go ba yin no // /
column18: 0.019#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2062258#2062259#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12193# 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o ZHES BYA BA NI SDUG bsngal med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o // /
column19: 0.019#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2074427#2074427#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13960# 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column20: 0.019#TD4010E.TXT.r#2286247#2286247#TD4010E.TXT.r_7100;TD4010E.TXT.r_7101# gzhan yang gzhon nu zhes bya ba la sogs    pas ni yid kyi sdom pa rnam pa gzhan bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // / +log par lta ba spang ba'i phyir log par lta ba dang 'grogs par mi byed ces bya ba ni log par lta ba'i bag chags spang ba'i don to // /
column21: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1157630#1157630#TD4047E.TXT.r_5377# de la mig ltar gyur pa bshad pa'i phyir don gsal ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir zhes bya bas so // /
column22: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136733#1136734#TD4047E.TXT.r_2234;TD4047E.TXT.r_2235# bdag gi don las brtsams nas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur bas skye ba la yang mthun zhing zhes bya ba'o // / +de'i phyir mthun zhing 'phrod pa zhes bya bas gnyi ga'i don sgrub par byed pa'i  phyir ro // /
column23: 0.020#TD4051E.TXT.r#1250240#1250241#TD4051E.TXT.r_2527;TD4051E.TXT.r_2528# bsnyen bkur byed pa la sogs pa tshe 'di'i 'bras bu la chags par mi sems pa'i phyir dang  byang chub chen po thob par bya bar SEMS PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column24: 0.020#TD4061E.TXT.r#1527743#1527743#TD4061E.TXT.r_2099;TD4061E.TXT.r_2100# rin po che lta bu yang yin te / / +rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir dang  don chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i  phyir dang  dga' bar byed pa'i phyir te / /
column25: 0.020#TD4046E.TXT.r#2196648#2196649#TD4046E.TXT.r_103;TD4046E.TXT.r_104# snying brtse ba ni ji ltar na 'di na la la dge ba dang gnod pa med pa'i spyod pas gzhan dag la snying brtse bar byed pa lta bu'o // / +don ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir dang  don dang ldan pa'i  phyir te 'dod par bya ba dang  kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa'o // /
column26: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1170383#1170384#TD4047E.TXT.r_7250;TD4047E.TXT.r_7251# snying brtse ba ni ji ltar 'di na la la dge ba dang  gnod pa med pa'i spyod pas gzhan dag la    snying brtse bar byed pa lta bu'o // / +don ni don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir dang  don dang ldan pa'i phyir te / /
column27: 0.020#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#864496#864496#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15862;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15863# 'gro ba la gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir ZHES BYA BA NI 'GRO ba mi 'gog pa'i phyir te / / +thogs par byed pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column28: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#794927#794927#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4714;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4715# pa des na rgyun dngos por mtshungs pa'i phyir te / / +'dra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column29: 0.021#TD4035E.TXT.r#199266#199266#TD4035E.TXT.r_12980# rab tu dben par gnas pa  de dag gis dngos po'i 'dod pa spangs pa dang  nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa spangs pa'i phyir spong ba'i don la bsgrim par bya'o zhes / /
column30: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#266687#266687#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6638;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6639# nges par dam bcas pa'i don bsgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // / +yang de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dpe dang bcas pa las yang thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid yod pas zhes bya ba la  sogs pas ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid de las gzhan pa dang ni mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ste / /
column31: 0.021#TD4019E.TXT.r#2412385#2412385#TD4019E.TXT.r_645;TD4019E.TXT.r_646# stong pa'i dngos pos gnas par bya // / +zhes zab mo'i don smras pa'i phyir ro // /
column32: 0.021#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2911644#2911644#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6118# thabs la mkhas pas theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po'i don rtogs par bya bar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste / /
column33: 0.021#TD4010E.TXT.r#2246652#2246653#TD4010E.TXT.r_2023;TD4010E.TXT.r_2024# gzungs kyi sgo dang  dga' ba dang  bde ba gang lha yul gyi dga' ba dang bde ba thob po zhes bya bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyis reg pa'i mthu khyad par du  'phags par rig par bya'o // / +de dag nyid kyi don tshigs su bcad pas so sor bstan pa'i phyir / /
column34: 0.021#TD4053E.TXT.r#2998739#2998739#TD4053E.TXT.r_4506;TD4053E.TXT.r_4507# yod pa'i sgra ni dngos po'i don yin pa'i phyir ro // / +dngos por rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas / /
column35: 0.022#TD4009E.TXT.r#340989#340989#TD4009E.TXT.r_2757;TD4009E.TXT.r_2758# sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column36: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235249#235249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2723# sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i  phyir ro // /
column37: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096155#3096155#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_610# ji ltar ming rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rgyu mtshan la de'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang  rgyu mtshan gcig la yang nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang  sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas /// /
column38: 0.022#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201119#2201119#TD4046E.TXT.r_710;TD4046E.TXT.r_711# de la nyes pa dang bcas pa ni kha na ma THO BA SKYE BA'I PHYIR RO // / +'gal ba dang bcas pa  ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column39: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155762#1155762#TD4047E.TXT.r_5095;TD4047E.TXT.r_5096# rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i    sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir gsal ba'o // / +yang bsam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir brling ba'o // /
column40: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162313#1162313#TD4047E.TXT.r_6047;TD4047E.TXT.r_6048;TD4047E.TXT.r_6049# gang gi tshe mngon par mtho ba las brtsams nas chos ston par byed pa'i tshe sbyin pa dang  tshul  khrims dang  mtho ris kyi gtam byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'jug sla zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column41: 0.022#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847926#2847926#TD4052E.TXT.r_771;TD4052E.TXT.r_772# rnam pa gcig tu na thos  pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba dang  skyes nas thob pa'i shes pa dag gis mngon sum du ma byas pa'i phyir zab pa'o // / +'jig rten pa'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir phra ba'o // /
column42: 0.022#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530640#1530640#TD4061E.TXT.r_2466# gzhan yang rtag tu bsgom pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  bar chad med par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  chog mi shes par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /
column43: 0.022#TD4069E.TXT.r#632114#632114#TD4069E.TXT.r_1331# lhag mthong la zhugs pa'i ni rnam par ma zhig pa dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ni rnam par ma zhi ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column44: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078526#1078526#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4380# bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang  bde ba'i snying POS SKYED PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column45: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2035129#2035129#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8256# mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul la nges par rtog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don yin gyi de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // /
column46: 0.022#TD4071E.TXT.r#399571#399571#TD4071E.TXT.r_73# de'i bsam pa ni rnam par dbye ba gang yang rung ba zhig bstan pas don rtogs pa'i phyir de  las gzhan pa'i sgrub pa med pa'i phyir ji ltar na de lus kyis byas pa'i las zhes bya zhes smos nas lus kyi zhes bya ste / /
column47: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#958421#958421#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8812;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8813# bcas ZHES BYA BA NI BAG chags de gnyis dang ldan zhing 'brel bas zhes bya ba'i don to // / +bdag tu lta ba'i zhags pas  zin // /
column48: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2917061#2917062#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6927# de ltar yang mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir 'dra ba rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir / /
column49: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2918399#2918399#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7102;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7103;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7104# gong du bshad pa ltar na 'du byed rnams sems kyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams skad cig mar rig par bya'o // / +don de nyid bstan pa'i phyir / / +de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir  skad cig ma las 'bras bu skad cig ma med par mi rung ngo zhes smos te / /
column50: 0.025#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1648715#1648715#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_8684;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_8685# zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'i phyir legs par spyad pa'o // /
column51: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162145#1162145#TD4047E.TXT.r_6020;TD4047E.TXT.r_6021# chos kyang don dang nye bar ldan pa ni rjes su mthun pa dang zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +brjod par bya ba'i don phyin ci ma log pa dang ldan pa'i phyir don dang ldan pa'o // /
column52: 0.025#TD4069E.TXT.r#639943#639943#TD4069E.TXT.r_2432# zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi  mig de ni don mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir log par lta ba'i gnyen po yin no // /
column53: 0.028#TD4041E.TXT.r#1274553#1274553#TD4041E.TXT.r_861;TD4041E.TXT.r_862# kun shes pa thob pa dang  lung ston pa'i the tshom spong ba dang  rgyu ba na spyod pa brjed pa'i chos nyid spong ba dang  ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu spong ba dang  da ltar gyi sdug bsngal rgyu gnas ngan len SPONG BA'I PHYIR RO // / +de la    don gyi skabs 'dir ni 'byung ba ni khams gsum par gtogs pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pa yin par blta bar bya'o // /
column54: 0.029#TD4053E.TXT.r#2970254#2970255#TD4053E.TXT.r_785;TD4053E.TXT.r_786# zag pa'i rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir ZHES BYA BA NI SA pa gzhan rnams kyang sa pa gzhan gyi  zag pa'i gnas ngan len dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // / +zag pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ZHES BYA BA NI NGES par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams nyon mongs pa'i gnas ngan len dang ldan du zin kyang zag pa med pa nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir te / /

column3: thun mong ma yin pa ni so so rang gi skye mched kyi sa bon gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la rang rang la yod pa ni so so rang rang gi    ste ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242106#242118#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3595;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3596# gnyis pa ni sa brgyad pa la spri la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spangs pas shin tu phra ba'i don gsal bar 'gyur ba'i  phyir spri la yod pa lta bu spangs pa'i phyir ni gsum pa de rab tu dbye ba YIN NO ZHES BYA BA gsungs pa yin no // /
column5: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2078378#2078378#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14524# nyon mongs pa can gyi bzhi pa la de bkag pa'i phyir don gyi gsum pa yang de bkag par shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: nang gi skye mched drug gi sa bon zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +thun mong ma yin pa de ni tshor ba med pa 'byung ba'i sa bon no zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas phan 'dogs pa dang gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242119#242127#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3596# len gsungs pa la bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod pa bzhin du zhu ba gsol ba yang dgos pa rnam pa gnyis yod pa ni lan du gsungs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242127#242136#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3596;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3597# len gsungs pa la bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod pa bzhin du zhu ba gsol ba yang dgos pa rnam pa gnyis yod pa ni lan du gsungs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: snod kyi 'jig rten la bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba med  do ; / / +gnyen po byung ste lam gyi bden pa skyes pa na mi mthun pa'i phyogs nang gi skye mched drug gi sa bon 'gags te mi mthun pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242137#242152#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3597;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3598# rkang la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len  spang ba gang yin pa de ni ngas bag la nyal thams cad gtan du spangs pa'i gnas skabs sangs rgyas kyi sa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa rkang la yod pa lta bu spang ba nyid du bstan cing / /

column3: thun mong ba gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pas yongs su zin pa la ni mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242153#242160#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3597;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3598;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3599# rkang la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len  spang ba gang yin pa de ni ngas bag la nyal thams cad gtan du spangs pa'i gnas skabs sangs rgyas kyi sa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa rkang la yod pa lta bu spang ba nyid du bstan cing / / +logs shig tu rnam par phye ste rnam par ma bstan to // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa nang gi skye  mched kyi rnam par rtog pa 'gags pa rnams kyang thun mong ba snod kyi 'jig rten sems can gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pas zin pas gang yin pa de la mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242161#242168#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3598;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3599# logs shig tu rnam par phye ste rnam par ma bstan to // / +de ni 'di skad du shes bya'i sgrib pa  las rkang la yod ba lta bu'i gnas ngan len ni shin tu phra ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi tshe gdod spong BAS ZAD PAR 'GYUR TE / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242169#242186#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3599;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3600;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3601# de ni 'di skad du shes bya'i sgrib pa  las rkang la yod ba lta bu'i gnas ngan len ni shin tu phra ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi tshe gdod spong BAS ZAD PAR 'GYUR TE / /

column3: de dag gis de nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong bas chus kyang mi 'khru'o // / +sas kyang mi  'dzin to // /
mes kyang mi tshig go // / +rlung gis kyang mi bsgul to // / +don yod pa la mthong ba rnam par dag par ji ltar 'gyur zhes gzhan gyi klan ka'i skabs rig nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242187#242200#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3600;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3602# gnas skabs 'di ni bag la nyal rnam pa gsum gyi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i don logs shig tu rnam par phye nas mi ston gyi / / +spyir sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa la    bag la nyal rnam pa gsum gyi sa bon gtan du spong ba rab tu ston to zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /

column3: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mos pa tha dad pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / / +mos pa gang dang gang yin  pa ji ltar mos pa bzhin du gser la sogs pa'i bye brag gis blta bar bya ba sna tshogs pa dmigs pa lta bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241806#241811#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3565;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3566# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / / +skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa de dag spangs pa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241838#241839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3569;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3570# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / / +skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas  nyon mongs pa rnams spong zhes 'byung ba yang mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa dang don mthun no // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242201#242218#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3602;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3603;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3604;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3605# spyir sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa la    bag la nyal rnam pa gsum gyi sa bon gtan du spong ba rab tu ston to zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220355#220355#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_795# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221173#221173#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_893# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / /
column9: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121026#3121026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4184;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4185;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4186# 'di ji  ltar gzung bar bgyi / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa / / +spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa yin te / /
column10: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117999#3117999#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3807;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3808;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3809# sa de dag rnam par dag pa du dag dang  yan lag du dag gis bsdus pa lags // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / / +spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi dang  yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o // /

column3: gser dang  dngul dang  rtsva dang shing la sogs pa'i bye brag gis dmigs pa sna tshogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242219#242234#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3604;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3606;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3607# bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba / / +rnam pa gsum gyis te dang po ni lpags shun la yod pa lta bu'i skyon spangs pa'o // /
column5: 0.023#TD4032E.TXT.r#1961710#1961712#TD4032E.TXT.r_6562;TD4032E.TXT.r_6563# chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs pas zag pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mngon par khong du chud ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste  dang po ni sgrub pa'i dmigs pa'o // / +gnyis pa ni sgrub pa'i dmigs pa'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4009E.TXT.r#348404#348404#TD4009E.TXT.r_3838;TD4009E.TXT.r_3839# dang po dang gnyis pas ni mi bzod pa'i nyes pa'o // / +gsum pa  dang bzhi pas ni sdig pa 'chab pa'i nyes pa'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#125421#125421#TD4035E.TXT.r_110;TD4035E.TXT.r_111# de yang zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba dang  ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba dang  zin pa dang ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba'o // / +de la dang po ni gang nang rkyen du gyur pa nyid do // /

column3: thun mong 'ching ba spang dka' dang / / +yongs shes bya bar dka'  bar 'dod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242225#242238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3606;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3608# rnam pa gsum gyis te dang po ni lpags shun la yod pa lta bu'i skyon spangs pa'o // / +gnyis pa ni spri la yod pa lta bu'i skyon spangs pa'o // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242299#242299#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3614# de'i 'og tu rkang la yod pa lta bu'i sgrib pa spangs pas  ni skyon gsum pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: ces bya ba la / / +thun mong zhes bya ba ni thun mong gi rgyu las byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242237#242248#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3609# gsum pa ni rkang la yod pa lta bu'i skyon spangs pa'o // / +nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kho na la bskal pa gsum du  bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533913#533913#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# de dag gi 'di la rnam par rtog pas bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa     // / +zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /

column3: 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o // / +spangs par dka' zhing yongs su zhes par bya ba dka' bas na spang dka' dang yongs shes bya bar dka' ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242248#242263#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3610;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3611# nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kho na la bskal pa gsum du  bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533913#533913#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# de dag gi 'di la rnam par rtog pas bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa     // / +zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /
column6: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256224#256224#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228651#228651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1878# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni don rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258661#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column9: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405615#2405616#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384463#2384464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column13: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385684#2385684#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334726#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column17: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column19: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228866#228866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column20: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column21: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column22: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column23: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247471#247471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column24: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260979#260979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column25: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273162#273162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column3: phyi rol mtshan ma chen po  las // / +zhes bya ba ni gnas pa chen po snod kyi 'jig rten las zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242264#242278#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3610;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3611;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3612# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba / / +rkang la yod pa lta bu rnam pa gnyis spangs pas nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar  'gyur te ; /

column3: tha dad sems zhes bya ba ni mos pa sna tshogs rnams kyi'o // / +de ni 'gags par ma gyur kyang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242279#242297#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3612;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3613;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3614# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang po lpags shun la yod pa lta bu'i sgrib pa spangs pas ni skyon dang po dang bral bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.014#TD4019E.TXT.r#2417679#2417679#TD4019E.TXT.r_1335;TD4019E.TXT.r_1336# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi dang  yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o // / +spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la sa dang po ni bsam  pa rnam par dag pas bsdus pa'o // /
column6: 0.017#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3118012#3118014#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3809;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3810# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sa de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi dang  yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o // / +spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug de las dang po ni bsam pa rnam par dag pas bsdus so // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni sems can gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pas yongs su zin pa'i phyir ma 'gags pa'o //// /
dag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni gnas gyur pa rnams kyi'o // / +sangs rgyas gzigs pa rnam dag phyir // /

zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma spangs pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams kyis zhing gang dag 'dam rdzab dang  rdo dang ba tsha can  dang  mi mnyam pa dang  sdong dum dang  tsher ma dang  mi gtsang ba dang  ldan par mthong ba de dag nyid gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gser la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gzigs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242298#242308#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3614;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3615# de'i 'og tu rkang la yod pa lta bu'i sgrib pa spangs pas  ni skyon gsum pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242308#242317#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3615;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3616# ngas nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas sa la bskal pa gsum mo zhes bstan to zhes 'byung ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242318#242328#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3616;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3617;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3618# mdo de gnyis mdo 'di nyid dang tha dad par 'gyur ba ni / / +lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: mya ngan la shing du mthong ba bzhin no // / +thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i sa bon te zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i tshor ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242329#242345#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3618;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3619;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3620# bshad pa'i rnam pa  gzhan du na 'dis gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum bstan pa yin te / /

column3: de med du zin na zhes bya ba ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med du zin na 'di ni  sems can gyi 'jig rten no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242344#242357#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3619;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3620;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3621;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3622# rkang la yod pa la sangs rgyas kyi sa la mnga' bar gsungs pa ni rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi gnas ngan len spong ba'i phyir ro // / +yang na 'dir gnas ngan len rnam  pa gsum gsungs pa ni sngar gong du rnam pa gnyis ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib par gtogs so // /

column3: 'di ni snod kyi 'jig rten no // / +'di ni bde bas can no // / +'di ni sdug bsngal can no zhes bya ba'i bye brag med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242358#242368#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3621;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3622;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3623;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3624# gsum pa ni shes bya'i sgrib par gtogs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir te / / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235146#235148#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2713# byang chub sems dpas rig pa'i gnas lnga yongs su tshol ba'i dgongs pa ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa  bzhin te / /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323157#2323159#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1471;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1472# stong pa nyid la  log par bzung ba'i nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid ni / / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2317964#2317965#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_843;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_844# 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i 'grel ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // / +de las 'byung ba yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las nyan thos rnam pa  bzhi bstan pa nyid yin te / /

column3: gnas ngan len gyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba la ngan pa ni sdig pa'o // / +de len pa ni gnas ngan len no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242369#242377#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3623;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3624# sgrib pa gnyis po dag so so nas bag la nyal     // / +dang gnas ngan len dang ldan pa yin nam zhe na ci'i phyir mdo 'di las bag la nyal bstan pa'i skabs su ni nyon mongs pa kho na bzung la gnas ngan len bstan pa'i gnas skabs su ni shes bya kho na bzung / /

column3: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon  mongs pa'i sa bon no // / +gnas ngan len ni las su mi rung ba nyid do // / +shin tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242376#242392#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3624;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3625;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3627# dang gnas ngan len dang ldan pa yin nam zhe na ci'i phyir mdo 'di las bag la nyal bstan pa'i skabs su ni nyon mongs pa kho na bzung la gnas ngan len bstan pa'i gnas skabs su ni shes bya kho na bzung / /

column3: shin tu sbyangs pa ni ji skad smos pa las bzlog pa ste / / +las su rung ba nyid dang yang ba dang  zo mdog bde ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242393#242400#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3625;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3627# 'di la dgongs pa ci yod ce na / / +smras pa / / +'phags pa  rnams kyi bstan pa la chos bstan pa'i sgo mang bas dang po de kho na nyid las brtsams pa don mthar thug pa'i sgo ste / /

column3: spyad zin pa'i mtshan  nyid ni gang dge ba dang mi dge ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par smin zin pa yang smin par mi nus te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242397#242410#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3627;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3628;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3629# 'phags pa  rnams kyi bstan pa la chos bstan pa'i sgo mang bas dang po de kho na nyid las brtsams pa don mthar thug pa'i sgo ste / /

column3: spyad zin pa'i phyir ro // / +dper na sa bon gyis myu gu bskyed nas yang bskyed mi nus pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242409#242420#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3628;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3629;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3630# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +'di ltar nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnas ngan len rnam pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum so sor phye nas bstan pa lta  bu ste ; /

column3: ma spyad pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon te / / +zhes bya ba ni rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon rgyas par 'gyur ba la thog ma'i mtha' med pa'i spros pa rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242421#242437#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3629;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3630;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3631;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3632# 'di ltar nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnas ngan len rnam pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum so sor phye nas bstan pa lta  bu ste ; / +sngar bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +gnyis pa ni phan tshun gcig gis gcig bstan pa'i sgo ste / /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221435#221435#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_936;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_937# bslab pa gsum rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  bstan  bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  lung sna tshogs dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +de la phan tshun gcig gis gcig bsdu ba'i bye  brag bstan pa yang legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo las / /

column3: de med du zin na zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga'i mtshan nyid kyi kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242438#242452#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3632;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3633;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3634# 'di ltar mdo 'di nyid kyi nang nas bag la nyal bstan pa'i sgo nas nyon mongs pa pa 'ba' zhig yin par bstan gyi / /

column3: re zhig spyod zin pa'i mtshan nyid med na dge ba dang sdig pa zhes bya ba la    sogs pa ni 'bras bu byin pas spyad zin pa 'jig pa de med par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242453#242460#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3633;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3634# shes bya'i ni ma yin par bstan pa lta bu ni gcig gis gcig bstan pa yin pas  shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam pa gsum yod par bstan to // / +gnas ngan len gyi don bstan pa'i skabs su shes bya'i sgrib pa kho na yin par bstan pa yang gcig gis gcig bstan pa yin pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la yang rnam pa gsum yod par bstan to // /

column3: 'bras bu byin nas yang 'bras bur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / +ma spyad pa'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med du zin na mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags gsar du 'byung bar yang mi rung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242459#242476#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3634;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3635# gnas ngan len gyi don bstan pa'i skabs su shes bya'i sgrib pa kho na yin par bstan pa yang gcig gis gcig bstan pa yin pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la yang rnam pa gsum yod par bstan to // /

column3: mngon par  brjod pa sngon gyi rnying bar ma gyur pa sngon ma byung ba la da ltar gyur pa ni 'jig rten na gang med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242475#242489#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3635;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3636;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3637# sgrib pa gnyis po de dag re re la yang  gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum yod par bstan pa ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya ste / /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349073#2349073#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4381;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4382# zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi la gnyi ga cig car 'jug pa rgya    cher bshad pa ni / / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: dpe mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni / / +dpe sgyu ma la sogs pa dang bstun par bya bar mtshon pa ste / /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235828#235830#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2805;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2806# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / / +bcom ldan  'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239772#239781#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3310;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3311;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3312;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3313# nyon mongs pas zil gyis gnon pa ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gis nor to //// / +bam po drug cu bzhi pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240666#240671#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3435# bshad pa rnam pa gsum las ni bshad pa ni gsum pa bzang po // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom  ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column10: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245242#245245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4001# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /

column16: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225873#225873#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column18: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236136#236136#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column36: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402927#2402927#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10945;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10946# ci'i slad du  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa'i ming gi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column37: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222898#222898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /

column39: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237163#237163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column40: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239247#239247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /

column3: yang dag pa ma mthong ba'i rgyu nyid du rtog par 'gyur ro // / +de ltar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i don rnam  grangs dang  nges pa'i tshig dang  mtshan nyid dang  rab tu dbye bas bshad zin te // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383886#2383886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8710# lang gi tshe bsgyur ba theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386554#2386555#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387235#2387236#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /

column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241245#241246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3510# lpags shun dang snying po la yod pa lta bu gsum po dag ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las sa'i mdun rol dang sa bcu po dag tu sa re re la yang 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba dag yod pa la brten nas lpags shun  dang  spri dang  snying po la yod pa lta bur rags pa dang  phra ba'i don GYI RNAM PA GSUM DU dbye'o zhes bshad do // /

column14: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358185#2358185#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5520# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column16: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385730#2385730#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8913# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las lus kyi las kyis sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i ma rig pa zhes bstan pa yang don rnam pa gnyis te / /
column17: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385936#2385936#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8932# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni sems rtse gcig pa myur du mi shes pa'i ma rig pa dang  thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa brjed  par byed pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column18: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386182#2386182#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba LAS NI NYON MONGS PA phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // /

column36: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387387#2387387#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib pa zhes bstan pa ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /
column37: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398936#2398936#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10434# de la mos pa'i bzod pa shin du bsgoms pa'i phyir ZHES BYA BA NI THEG pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column38: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229361#229362#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1969# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'khor gsum kas yongs su dag pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa las ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column41: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229716#229716#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column5: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120755#3120760#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4140;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4142# dus tshigs dang  zla ba dang  zla ba phyed dang  zhag dang  nyi ma dang  thun dang  thun phyed dang  skad cig dang  thang cig     // /

column3: de yongs su shes pas kun du brtags pa yod pa yin par yongs su gcod de mi mthun pa yod pa'i phyir ro // /

yul gyi dngos por khas blangs pas  yongs su gcod pa ni ma yin no // / +lus dang lus can dang za ba po'i rnam par rig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de la lus kyi rnam par rig pa ni dbang po gzugs can du snang ba ste / /

column3: de bzhin du 'og ma rnams la yang snang ba'i sgra sbyar bar bya'o // / +lus can gyi rnam par rig pa ni yid  do ; / /

column3: za ba po'i rnam par rig pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i // / +des nye bar spyad par bya ba'i rnam par rig pa ni phyi'i skye mched rnams so // /

column3: de la nye bar spyod pa'i rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa lnga po dag go // / +dus kyi rnam par rig pa ni dus gsum du snang ba'o // /

column9: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270341#270341#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7096# 'di ltar 'gog pa la ma zhugs pa'i sngon rol  na bdag phyis ldang bar bya'o snyam du mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba lta bu ste / / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /

column3: grangs  kyi rnam par rig pa ni gcig la sogs par bgrang bar snang ba'o // / +yul gyi rnam par rig pa ni grong dang kun dga' ra ba la sogs par snang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242775#242792#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3674;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3675;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3676# bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / / +de'i phyir de nyid las skad cig la sogs pa'i 'og tu nyin zhag mngon par 'grub bo // /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343069#2343069#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3743;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3744# don 'di'i bshad pa ni bstan BCOS RNAM PAR RIG PA TSAM du grub pa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / / +de'i phyir de nyid las 'di ni rtog pa'i gnas skabs yin te / /

column3: tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa ni mthong ba dang thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o // / +bdag dang gzhan    gyi bye brag gi rnam par rig pa ni ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin par chad pa lus la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242793#242806#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3676;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3677;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3678# nyin zhag bsags pa las ni zla ba phyed dang  zla ba la  sogs pa mngon par 'grub bo // / +zla ba phyed dang  zla ba la sogs pa bsags pa las ni bskal pa chen po mngon par 'grub pa yin na / /

column3: nga'o nga'i'o // / +'di ni nga'i ma yin gyi 'di ni gzhan gyi'o // /
