column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bye brag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // / +bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dang  'chi 'pho dang  skye  ba'i rnam par rig pa ni lha dang  mi dang  sems can dmyal ba dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  skye ba dang  'chi bar snang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242823#242832#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3682;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3683;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3684;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3685# kha cig 'di skad  du chos mngon pa dag gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos tshol bar byed kyi / / +snga ma ni ma yin te / / +chos kyi mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal na / /

column3: de la lus dang lus can dang  zhes bya ba nas tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon las  byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242833#242848#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3684;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3685# ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bshad kyang nyes pa med do zhes zer ro // / +slob dpon gzhan kha cig ni 'di skad du bstan bcos byed pas sngar rags pa bstan la phyis phra ba bstan  par 'dod ba rnams rim gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: zhes bya ba'i bar ni de'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin du bdag dang gzhan gyi bye brag gi rnam par rig pa ni bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyi rgyu las byung ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242847#242861#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3685;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3686;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3688# slob dpon gzhan kha cig ni 'di skad du bstan bcos byed pas sngar rags pa bstan la phyis phra ba bstan  par 'dod ba rnams rim gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid sa bon yin pa'i phyir ro // / +bde 'gro la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa ni ma rig  pa la sogs pa srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bag chags kyi rgya las byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242860#242869#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3688;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3689;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3690# mdo'i tshig 'di yang mas yar bshad par bya ste / / +de la skad cig ces bya ba ni skad cig dang de'i skad cig ces pa la bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242870#242877#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3689;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3690;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3691# de la skad cig ces bya ba ni / / +'phags pa shes rab kyi  pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: rnam par rig pa 'di rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni brda phrad par zad do // / +rnam par rig pa 'di rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni ji skad smos pa rnams kyi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242878#242896#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3691;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3692;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3693;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3694;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3695# dus kyi nang nas mchog tu thung ba ste / / +thang cig drug cu'i cha gcig go zhes bshad do // /

column3: rnam par rig pa tsam nyid ces bya ba ni  log par yongs su rtog pa'o // / +yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pas bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por rnam par 'jog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242896#242904#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3694;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3695;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3696# skad CIG CES BYA BA NI 'DI lta ste / / +skad cig ma gcig gi nang na mchog tu thung ba'i skad cig yin pa'i phyir skad cig la  dus kyi tshad du bstan pa yin no // /

column3: yod pa ma yin pa dang nor ba'i don snang ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni / / +gzugs la sogs pa yod pa ma yin pa dang  der rnam par rtog  pa nor bar snang ba rab tu gsal ba'i rgyu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242903#242912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3695;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3696# skad cig ma gcig gi nang na mchog tu thung ba'i skad cig yin pa'i phyir skad cig la  dus kyi tshad du bstan pa yin no // / +de la skad cig gi tshad kyi dngos po ni kha cig na re dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas shin tu myur bar lus bsgyur nas skar ma mang po lta ba ji ltar skar ma gcig kho na la lta ba'i tshad de ni skad cig go zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242913#242920#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3696# de la skad cig gi tshad kyi dngos po ni kha cig na re dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas shin tu myur bar lus bsgyur nas skar ma mang po lta ba ji ltar skar ma gcig kho na la lta ba'i tshad de ni skad cig go zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: 'di ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni rtogs par bya ba zlos te ston pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242921#242929#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3696;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3697;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3698# de la skad cig gi tshad kyi dngos po ni kha cig na re dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas shin tu myur bar lus bsgyur nas skar ma mang po lta ba ji ltar skar ma gcig kho na la lta ba'i tshad de ni skad cig go zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: gang don med kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin rnam par rig pa tsam nyid sems dang sems las byung ba 'khrul pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi  don gyi rnam par rig pa'i cha la dngos por byed pa ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242930#242941#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3697;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3698;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3699;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3700# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan    yang bstan bcos bye brag tu smra ba chen po las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242942#242952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3699;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3700;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3701# skad cig gi tshad de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na / / +kha cig na re bstan bcos gdags pa byas pa las / /

column3: de nyid kun brtags pa de dang gtan du bral ba ni yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +dper na smig rgyu la rang gi rgyud sngon du btang ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242953#242962#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3701;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3702# dper na bud med dar la bab pa bal 'khal ba 'bring gis ha cang yang mi ring / /
column5: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#1296699#1296704#TD4086E.TXT.r_2106# bud med bal 'khal ba 'bring gis ha cang mi ring ha cang mi thung bar bal bsnyad pa de tsam gyi yun ni skad cig gi  tshad yin no // /

column3: chur gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por rnam par 'jog pa'i log par     // / +yongs su rtog pa ni gzhan gyi dbang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242963#242972#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3702;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3703# ha cang yang mi thung bar bal bsnyad pa de tsam gyi yun gang yin pa de ni de'i  skad cig gi tshad yin no zhes bshad de / /

column3: chur snang ba la dngos por byed pa ni kun brtags pa'o // / +de dang gtan du bral ba ni yongs su grub pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242973#242981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3703;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3704# de las bstan pa yang bal dang skud pa'i ring thung la bya ba ma yin gyi / /

column3: rnam par rtog pas brtags pa'i don // / +kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid // / +rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi  dbang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242982#242991#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3704;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3705# bal de lag pa nas 'byin cing bsnyad pa'i tshad la de'i skad cig ces bstan pa yin no // /

column3: de yi stong nyid yongs su grub // / +rnam par rig pa 'di dag gi // / +zhes bya ba ni lus la sogs pa nas de la nye bar spyod pa la thug pa'i bar gyi rab tu dbye ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242992#243007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3705;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3706;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3707;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3708# sngar skad cig gi tshad dris pa yin na ci'i phyir bstan bcos gdags pa byas pa las bstan pa de'i skad cig gi  tshad khungs su bstan ce na / /

column3: de dag las byung ba'i phyir ro // / +rnam par rig pa rnam par don med pa'i dper rmi lam smos te grub pa'i phyir ro / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243006#243018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3707;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3708;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3709;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3710# 'dir ni rags pa smos nas phra ba bstan pa yin te / / +'di ltar phra ba ni khong du chud par dka' zhing gsal bar bstan par mi NUS PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column3: dper na rmi lam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tshig de nyid kyis bshad zin to // / +lung dang rigs pas zhes bya ba brjod pas ni lung las 'byung ba'i don rjes su dpag pa'i yul nyid du ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243019#243036#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3710;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3711;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3712# skad cig brgya nyi shu la ni skad cig gcig go zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // /

column3: sa bcu pa zhes bya ba ni mdo gang las byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu bstan pa de sa bcu rnam par gzhag  pa'i rnam pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243037#243047#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3712;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3713;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3714# bdag gis bshad pa'i don lta na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i se gol gtogs pa gcig la ni skad cig drug cu rtsa bzhi yod do zhes zer ro // /
column5: 0.020#TD4097E.TXT.r#2215771#2215771#TD4097E.TXT.r_1534# de bas na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas se gol gtogs pa tsam la skad cig drug cu rtsa lnga 'da'o // /

column3: ming dang  tshig dang  yi ge'i tshogs su snang ba'i rnam par rig pa 'dus pa 'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po'i dbang gis nyan pa po'i sems kyi rgyud la yod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243048#243063#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3712;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3713;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3714;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3715;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3716# bdag gis bshad pa'i don lta na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i se gol gtogs pa gcig la ni skad cig drug cu rtsa bzhi yod do zhes zer ro // / +kha cig na re de ni de lta ma yin te / / +bdag gis bshad pa de lta na / /

column3: de brjod pa yid ches par rung ba nyid du ston to // / +sems tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la  sems ni rnam par rig pa dang don gcig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243064#243077#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3715;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3716;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3717;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3718# dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa  gnyis kyis ka shi ka'i skud pa phra mo mang po phan tshun drangs nas gcod pa / / +skud pa ji tsam chad pa skad cig kyang de snyed do zhes zer ro // /

column3: tsam gyi sgras ni don sel bar byed de / / +de med pas 'dzin pa yang sel te / /

column3: brtags pa'i phyir ro // / +de sems las 'byung ba med par mi 'byung ba'i phyir sems las byung ba rnams ni mi dgag ste / /

column3: ji skad du sems las byung ba rnams med  par sems nam yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o // /

column5: 0.025#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1903388#1903389#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2399;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2400# de nas dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal  nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste / / +bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column6: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1795005#1795005#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_12002# bcom ldan 'das gang na ba ba der nye bar song ste nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go // /

column3: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa de'i sems ji lta bu zhe na / / +'di ni phyogs can la nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: kho bo cag la ni de na sems gang yod pa de mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas par yod do // /

column3: gang  med pa de ni mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas su med de / / +khams gsum pa ni khams gsum du snang ba'i rnam par rig pa rnams so // /

column3: khams gsum pa smos pas ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i sred pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa khams gsum par gtogs pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams    rnam par rig pa tsam nyid du dam bca' ba ste // /

column3: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang / / +gzhan gyi dbang la dmigs pa lam gyi bden pas bsdus pa rnams dang rjes las thob pa rnams ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243150#243161#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3730# dper na 'phong la shin tu mkhas pa'i skyes bu bzhi zhig so so nas mda' thogs shing phan tshun rgyab sprad de 'greng nas phyogs bzhir mda' 'phang bar 'dod pa las yang skyes bu shin tu skyen myur che ba zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad du / /

column3: khams gsum na spyod pa'i sred pa rnams kyis bdag gir ma byas pa dang  gnyen  po yin pa dang  ma 'khrul pa'i phyir ro // / +mdo sde pa'i gzhung ltar na gzugs med pa'i khams ni sems dang sems las byung ba tsam du zad pas khams gnyis pa zhes mi bya'am zhe na ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243160#243169#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3730# dper na 'phong la shin tu mkhas pa'i skyes bu bzhi zhig so so nas mda' thogs shing phan tshun rgyab sprad de 'greng nas phyogs bzhir mda' 'phang bar 'dod pa las yang skyes bu shin tu skyen myur che ba zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad du / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243201#243213#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3734;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3735;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3736;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3737;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3738# dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba / / +bcom ldan 'das shin tu myur ba lags so // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis  bka' stsal pa / /

column3: de'i spyod yul ni yul lo // / +gzugs brnyan ni gzugs dngos ltar snang ba'o // /

column3: dmigs pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyis rab tu phye ba can zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi dmigs pa med pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243213#243238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3737;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3738;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3739;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3740# gang zag de'i myur ba ni gnod sbyin sa la 'gro ba tsam gyi myur bar mi phod do // / +gnod sbyin sa la 'gro ba'i myur ba ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnod sbyin gyi myur ba tsam mi phod do // /

column3: rnam par shes pa dmigs pa yin par ngas  bshad do // / +zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar dmigs pa de rnam par rig pa tsam gyis rab tu phye ba ni de'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243239#243256#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3741;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3742;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3743# lha de  dag gi myur ba ni nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bdag gi myur ba tsam mi phod do // /

column3: rnam par shes pa ni dmigs par snang ba tsam gyis rab tu phye ba yin par bshad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
sems de nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni  bdag nyid la byed pa 'gal bar ston pa'o // / +byams pa chos gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan 'debs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243257#243269#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3742;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3743# de ni nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dren par byed pa'o // / +lha 'di DAG LA SOGS PA NI GONG nas gong du ches myur ba  yin pas srog dang ldan pa'i skye ba dag 'jig pa ni de dag las ches shin tu myur ba yin pas skad cig ma 'jug pa re zhig tsam du yang mi gnas pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / /

column3: chos thams cad ni byed pa med pas byed pa dang byed pa po mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar skyes pa zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i che ba nyid kyis ni gcig kho na rnam  pa gnyis su snang ba'i tshul brjod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243270#243295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3744;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3747# lha 'di dag la sogs pa ni gong nas gong du ches myur ba  yin pas srog dang ldan pa'i skye ba dag 'jig pa ni de dag las ches shin tu myur ba yin pas skad cig ma 'jug pa re zhig tsam du yang mi gnas pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / /

column3: dper na gzugs kyi gzhi po rang gi bzhin nyid la brten nas me long la sogs pa'i nang du de nyid snang yang gzugs brnyan mthong ngo snyam du log par sems te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243296#243306#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3747;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3748# ci'i phyir bcom ldan  'das kyis gzhan dag la yang dag pa'i skad cig ma'i tshad ma gsungs she na / / +smras pa / / +sems can gang yang shes par nus pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.020#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2627851#2627851#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11435# 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi zhig thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par bltas na / /
column6: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1482265#1482265#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9605# gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pas don de bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: me long la sogs pa rgyu'i mthus don gzhan du med kyang snang ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243307#243322#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3748;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3749;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3750;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3751;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3752# ci 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus kyang shes par mi nus sam / / +smras pa / /

column3: de bzhin du     // / +dran pa dang kun du rtog pa la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis mthus gang tha dad pa ma yin yang tha dad par snang ba ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gzugs brnyan de de bzhin du skyes so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243322#243335#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3752;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3753;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3754;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3755# bcom ldan 'das don med par chos ston par mi mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384263#2384263#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8754# snga ma'i zlas khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdor bsdus nas gsungs te / /

column3: lung de ni tshad ma dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gtan la phab po // / +'di ltar  sems mnyam par gzhag pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rigs pa gzhan nye bar 'god do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392372#2392381#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9664;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9665# mdzod kyi bstan bcos las skad cig brgya nyi shu la de'i skad cig gcig go // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243336#243349#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3755;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3756;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3757# yang na dbugs dbyung ba tsam gyi don to // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las skad cig brgya nyi shu la ni    de'i skad cig gcig go // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243562#243568#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3783;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3784;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3785# de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos las / / +skad cig brgya nyi shu la de'i skad cig gcig go // /
column7: 0.012#TD4091E.TXT.r#716328#716331#TD4091E.TXT.r_3983;TD4091E.TXT.r_3984;TD4091E.TXT.r_3985;TD4091E.TXT.r_3986# de'i skad cig / / +skad cig ma brgya nyi shu de'i skad cig go // /
column8: 0.014#TD4086E.TXT.r#1296648#1296650#TD4086E.TXT.r_2094;TD4086E.TXT.r_2095;TD4086E.TXT.r_2096;TD4086E.TXT.r_2097# skad cig dang  de'i skad cig dang  thang cig dang  yud tsam rnams so // / +skad cig brgya     // / +nyi shu la ni de'i skad cig go // /
column9: 0.015#TD4086E.TXT.r#1296715#1296716#TD4086E.TXT.r_2107;TD4086E.TXT.r_2108# de lta bu'i skad cig brgya nyi shu la de'i skad cig go // / +de'i skad cig de lta bu drug cu la thang cig go // /

column3: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du snang ba'i phyir rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa ni sems las gzhan ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243350#243359#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3756;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3757;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3758;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3759# bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las skad cig brgya nyi shu la ni    de'i skad cig gcig go // / +de'i skad cig drug cu la ni thang cig gcig ste / /

column3: rnam 'byor pa'i rmi lam du rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa rmis pa bzhin no // / +dran  pa'i rnam par shes pa'ang mi rung ste zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir smos pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243358#243375#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3758;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3759;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3760;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3761# de la ni skad cig bdun stong nyis brgya yod do zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243510#243511#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3777# de la nyi ma dang  zhag ces bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las yud tsam sum cu la ni nyin zhag gcig ste / /

column3: su 'di snyam du ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gzugs brnyan ni dur khrod la sogs pa na mthong ba'i keng rus mong po myong ba'i rgyu las byung bas dran no snyam du sems pa de la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243376#243394#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3760;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3761;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3762# thang cig sum cu la ni yud tsam gcig ste / / +'di la skad cig khri phrag nyi shu  rtsa gcig dang drug stong yod do zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284401#1284401#TD4086E.TXT.r_628# de mi'i  ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang  lo sa ya drug yod de / /

column3: 'di ni de lta ma  yin no zhes sel to // / +dmigs pa de mdun du gzhag na snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gal te de dran pa yin na ni ji ltar yul na mthong ba de'i yul nges par 'di ji ltar myong ba bzhin du dran pa'i rigs na de ni de lta yang ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243395#243409#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3762;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3763# de la thun phyed ces bya ba ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  nyin dang zhag la so so nas dus gsum yod pas drug tu 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243409#243418#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3763;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3764;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3765# 'dir thun phyed ces gsungs pa ni dus gcig gi dus phyed la bya'o // /

column3: de'i phyir de ltar mngon sum du grub pa bsgoms pa las byung ba'i  shes pa de ni dran pa ma yin no // / +'o na thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba'i dngos po la rnam par shes pa gang 'byung ba de dran pa yin pas de'i spyod yul ni rnam par shes pa dang tha dad par 'grub par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243419#243440#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3764;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3765;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3766;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3768;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3769# de la thun  zhes bya ba ni dus drug las dus gcig go // / +bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni lo gcig la dus gsum du 'byed de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243595#243602#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3790;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3791;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3792;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3788;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3789;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3793# lo gcig la dus gsum du dbye ba 'di lta ste / / +grang ba dang  tsha ba dang  char gyi dus so // /

column3: zhe na / / +de yang de ltar ma yin te / / +'di ltar thos pa la sogs pa las byung  ba la dran pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522692#522694#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9522;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9523;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9524# yang na 'dir bye brag gi ming gi gi don rnam pa gsum bstan par bya ste / / +de ltar rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yod kyang / / +bshad pa ni snga ma bzang ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243441#243453#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3768;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3769;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3770;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3771# re re la yang zla ba bzhi bzhi ste / / +thun phyed ces gsungs pa ni char gyi dus so // /
column6: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391806#2391806#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9591;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9592# sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas skabs kyi ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ste / / +de ltar rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yod kyang bshad pa ni snga ma bzang ngo // /

column3: 'das pa ni med pa'i phyir der snang ba ni rnam par rig pa tsam nyid du 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243454#243461#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3771;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3772# de ltar rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yod kyang bshad pa ni snga ma bzang ste / /

column3: dran par byas pas stong pa'i phyir ro // / +de lta bas na de ltar snang ba'i phyir 'di ni rnam par rig pa tsam ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243462#243472#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3772;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3773# de'i phyir mdo 'di'i dgongs pa ni thung du nas ring por brtsegs te bstan pa yin no // /

column3: rnal 'byor pas mdun du keng rus  dmigs pa de'i gzugs brnyan bzhin no // / +rjes su dpag pa 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsal ba'i phyir rnam par dgrol bar mi 'bad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243471#243486#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3773;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3774# mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni dus ring po gang yin pa de ni nyin zhag gcig go zhes ston  pas de'i phyir bshad pa snga ma ni yang dag pa yin no // /

column3: gang rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par rig pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni lus dang lus can la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243487#243498#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3774;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3775;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3776# 'phags pa padma dka' po'i mdo'i 'grel pa las ni dus ring po gang yin pa ni zla ba'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: de dag las    mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa rnams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni lus can dang za ba po'i rnam par rig pa bsdu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243497#243511#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3775;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3776;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3777# de'i phyir 'grel ba de nyid las / / +nyi ma dang  zhag dang  zla ba dang  dus dang  lo bgrang bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa  yin no ; / /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243365#243368#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3759;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3760# de la yud tsam zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /

column3: de dag ni rnam par rig pa tsam nyid du rigs te rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243512#243520#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3777;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3778# de la nyi ma dang  zhag ces bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las yud tsam sum cu la ni nyin zhag gcig ste / /
column5: 0.006#TD4086E.TXT.r#1296729#1296736#TD4086E.TXT.r_2109;TD4086E.TXT.r_2110;TD4086E.TXT.r_2108;TD4086E.TXT.r_2111;TD4086E.TXT.r_2112# thang cig de lta bu sum cu la yud tsam gcig go // / +yud tsam de lta bu sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go // /

column3: mig la sogs pa'i rnam  par rig pa gzugs can rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni dpyad par bya ba'i rnam par rig pa bsdu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243519#243533#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3777;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3778;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3779# de la nyi ma dang  zhag ces bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las yud tsam sum cu la ni nyin zhag gcig ste / / +'di la skad cig ma 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dang  khri phrag brgyad yod de zhes bshad de / /

column3: ji ltar rnam par rig pa tsam nyid du zhes bya ba ni gzugs can yin pas mi srid pa 'dzin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243532#243541#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3778;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3779;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3780# 'di la skad cig ma 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dang  khri phrag brgyad yod de zhes bshad de / / +phung po lnga'i lus 'di ni nyin zhag gcig la skye shi'i mi  rtag pa de snyed dang ldan no // /

column3: de dag kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lung ni sa bcu pa dang   dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las gsungs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243542#243552#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3779;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3780;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3781;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3782# phung po lnga'i lus 'di ni nyin zhag gcig la skye shi'i mi  rtag pa de snyed dang ldan no // / +de la zla ba phyed ces bya ba ni zhag bco lnga'o // /

column3: rigs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gzugs brnyan dang rmi lam la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392370#2392373#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9663;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9664# de la thang cig dang yud tsam zhes bya ba ni / / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos las skad cig brgya nyi shu la de'i skad cig gcig go // /

column3: snga ma bzhin no zhes bya ba ni mtshungs par sbyar ba'o // / +gal te de dag kyang zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa la / /

column3: brtan par rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i  rgyu 'dri ba ste / / +de la mtshungs pa ni 'dra ba'o // / +brtan pa ni bar ma dor rgyun chad par mi mthong ba'o // /

column19: 0.009#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283852#1283852#TD4086E.TXT.r_543;TD4086E.TXT.r_544# mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni yi dags rnams kyi nyin gcig ste / / +nyin zhag    de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column20: 0.010#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767597#1767599#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8607;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8608;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8609# de nyid dmyal ba chen po  bsdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column21: 0.010#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767712#1767713#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8626;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8627# de nyid dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi zhag gcig yin la des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column22: 0.010#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767790#1767791#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8639;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8640;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8641# dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des nyid zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column23: 0.010#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767969#1767971#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8666;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8667;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8668# de nyid dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column24: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767440#1767445#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8579;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8580;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8581# dge slong dag yang mi rnams kyi tsha lo brgya gang yin  pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column25: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767477#1767478#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8586;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8587# des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig yin la / /
column26: 0.011#TD4035E.TXT.r#136798#136800#TD4035E.TXT.r_2078;TD4035E.TXT.r_2079;TD4035E.TXT.r_2080# mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +de lta bu'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column27: 0.011#TD4035E.TXT.r#136860#136863#TD4035E.TXT.r_2088;TD4035E.TXT.r_2089;TD4035E.TXT.r_2090;TD4035E.TXT.r_2091# sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +de lta bu'i nyin zhag sum cu la     // /
column28: 0.013#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767316#1767320#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8557;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8558# dge slong dag gang mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des na nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba  bcu gnyis la lo 'khor ba gcig yin la / /
column29: 0.013#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767351#1767353#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8562;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8563# de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin  zhag gcig yin la des na nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column30: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1762987#1762992#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7970;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7971# mi rnams  kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig yin zhing zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig yin te / /
column31: 0.015#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767827#1767827#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8644;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8645;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8646# de nyid sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba  gcig / / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i stong phrag brgyad na sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin no // /
column32: 0.015#TD4086E.TXT.r#1296661#1296662#TD4086E.TXT.r_2098;TD4086E.TXT.r_2099# thang cig sum cu la ni yud tsam cig go // / +yud tsam sum cu la ni nyin zhag gcig go // /
column33: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767675#1767679#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8621;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8622# dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin    pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la // / +de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig / /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni nyon mongs pa  dang las dang skye ba bsdu'o // / +mig la sogs pa'i rnam par reg pa rnams ni phyin ci log la sogs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi'i gnas nyid yin te / /
rgyu'i dngos por gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // / +phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dgos pa 'dri ba la ltos nas lan btab pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243603#243613#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3792;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3793;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3794# re re la  yang zla ba bzhi bzhi'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: gang  gi phyir mig la sogs pa dang gzugs la sogs pa'i don med bzhin du de dag tu snang ba'i rnam par rig pa rnams mtshungs pa dang  brtan par rgyun gyis 'jug pa de kho na'i phyir phyin ci log rnams 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243612#243622#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3794;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3795# skad CIG LA SOGS PA LA bskal pa zhes bstan pa ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ji skad bstan pa bzhin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243623#243632#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3796;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3797;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3798# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las ci'i phyir bskal pa zhes bya / / +bskal pa zhes bya  ba'i don ci yin zhe na / /

column3: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni gal te ji ltar mi 'byung na don med pa la don du phyin ci  log tu mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243633#243643#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3799# dus gsum gyi cha rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir bskal pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: phyin ci log med na rgyu med pa'i phyir / / +nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243642#243653#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3799;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3800# 'di ltar skad cig dang  thang cig dang  yud tsam gyi dus kyi cha rab tu dbye ba las ni nyin zhag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro // /

column3: kun nas nyon mongs pa med du zin na / / +rnam par byang ba yang med par 'gyur te / / +de ldog pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243646#243661#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3799;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3800;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3801# 'di ltar skad cig dang  thang cig dang  yud tsam gyi dus kyi cha rab tu dbye ba las ni nyin zhag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro // /

column3: de'i phyir     // / +de ltar 'di dag ces bya ba'i don ni brda phrad par zad do // / +dgos pa'i dbang gis 'byung ba ni ma yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243660#243671#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3800;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3801;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3802# nyin zhag gi dus kyi cha rab tu dbye ba las ni zla ba phyed dang  zla ba dang  dus dang   lo mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro // /

column3: rgyu'i dbang gis 'byung ba ma len nam zhe na ma yin te / / +ji ltar dris ba bzhin lan btab pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243672#243682#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3801;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3802;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3803# zla ba phyed la sogs pa'i dus kyi rab tu dbye ba las ni bskal pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te / / +bskal pa'i tshad kyi cha ni dus rab tu dbye ba'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir spyi'i ming thob pa yin no // /

column3: gzhan gyis ni dgos pa dris kyi / / +sa bon zhes  bya ba'i rgyu ni ma dris te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243683#243690#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3802;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3803;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3804;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3805# bskal pa'i tshad kyi cha ni dus rab tu dbye ba'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir spyi'i ming thob pa yin no // / +sgrar smra ba dag ni gnas skabs rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir bskal pa zhes bya'o zhes  zer te ; /

column3: de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa thog ma med pa can yin par shes pas ma dris so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243691#243698#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3803;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3804;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3805# sgrar smra ba dag ni gnas skabs rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir bskal pa zhes bya'o zhes  zer te ; / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +bskal pa ni 'dus byas kyi 'du byed rnam par 'byed pa'i nang na mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: 'khrul pa'i rgyu ni gzugs su snang ba'i rnam par rig par 'dod do // / +'khrul pa ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i rnam par rig par 'dod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243699#243708#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3805;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3806;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3807# bskal pa ni 'dus byas kyi 'du byed rnam par 'byed pa'i nang na mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: de bas na gal  te gzugs su snang ba gzugs can gyi rnam par rig pa med du zin na 'khrul pa gzugs can ma yin pa'i rnam par rig pa yang med par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243709#243722#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3806;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3807# de la aa sa khya zhes bya ba la bsgyur na grangs med pa zhes zer te / / +grangs med pa de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun  pas mdzod kyi bstan bcos las grangs kyi 'gres drug cu las grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni gcig gi ming yin te / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528619#528621#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10343# len pa zhes bya ba yang 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni / /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371633#2371635#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7236;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7237# shes pa dang mthong ba de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun to / /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229576#229577#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1997# pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun bas kha cig las mtshan nyid rnam ba bzhis pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan pa yod de / /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#515259#515260#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8538# mngon par rtogs pa 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519350#519350#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9037;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9038# de la ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni chos drug gis ngo bo nyid byed de / /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530330#530330#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10563# bsten pa mtshungs pa dang   de dang mtshungs pa de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / /

column3: yul med pa'i yul can ni mi rung ngo // / +ci'i phyir lus la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa lhan cig 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni  snga ma bzhin du 'dri bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243723#243740#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3807;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3808;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3809;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3810;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3811# grangs med pa de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun  pas mdzod kyi bstan bcos las grangs kyi 'gres drug cu las grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni gcig gi ming yin te / /

column3: skye ba dang nye bar spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par mngon pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lan 'debs pa ste / / +snga ma bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243739#243748#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3810;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3811# 'jig pa dang  chags pa dang  bar ma chen po'o // / +de la 'jig pa ni sems can dmyal ba dag tu mi  skye ba nas phyi rol gyi snod ci yang ma lus pa'i bar gang yin pa'o // /

column3: 'di ltar rnam par rig pa lnga po 'di dag lus thams cad la zhugs na nye bar spyad pa dang bcas pa'i lus mtha' dag mngon te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243747#243758#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3811;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3812# de la 'jig pa ni sems can dmyal ba dag tu mi  skye ba nas phyi rol gyi snod ci yang ma lus pa'i bar gang yin pa'o // /

column3: yan lag gang yang rung ba zhig mtshang na der mi 'gyur ro // / +ci'i phyir dus kyi rnam par rig pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dri ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243759#243779#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3812;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3813;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3814# chags pa'i bskal pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor langs pa nas sems can dmyal bar dang por skye ba'i bar gang yin pa'o // /

column3: snga ma bzhin no // / +sogs pa smos pa ni grangs dang  yul dang  tha snyad dang  bdag dang  gzhan dang  bde 'gro dang  ngan  'gro dang  'chi 'pho dang  skye bar snang ba'i rnam par rig pa drug bsdu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243780#243789#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3814;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3815;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3816# mar 'grib pa bco brgyad dang  tha mar yar skye ba nas lo brgyad khri la thug pa ste / /

column3: thog ma med pa'i dus kyi 'khor ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas / / +skye ba dang rga shi myong ba'i rab tu dbye ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243787#243802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3815;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3816;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3817# de ltar chags nas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bar gyi bskal pa zhes bya'o // / +chags pa dang  'jig pa dang  zhig nas stong par gnas pa'i dus kyang 'dra bas gnas pa'i bskal pa ni bar gyi bskal pa  brgyad cu'o ; / /

column3: zhes bya ba'i bar ni dgos pa drug po dag gis  dus la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa 'chi 'pho dang  skye ba'i rnam par rig pa la thug pa dag 'byung bar ston te go rims bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243803#243818#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3816;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3817;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3818# chags pa dang  'jig pa dang  zhig nas stong par gnas pa'i dus kyang 'dra bas gnas pa'i bskal pa ni bar gyi bskal pa  brgyad cu'o ; / / +de la bskal pa chen po ni bskal pa grangs med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: ji ltar rnam par rig pa 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pas rigs pa'i skabs kyis 'thad pa gzhan dang sgrub pa 'dri ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243817#243828#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3818;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3819# gzhan yang de las de ltar bstan pa'i chags pa dang  gnas pa dang  'jig pa dang  stong pa yang so so nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu nyi shu yod pa las brgyad cur 'gyur ro // /

column3: de tsam du zad pas zhes    bya ba ni don med ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste / / +don med pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243829#243839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3818;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3819;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3820;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3821;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3822;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3823# gzhan yang de las de ltar bstan pa'i chags pa dang  gnas pa dang  'jig pa dang  stong pa yang so so nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu nyi shu yod pa las brgyad cur 'gyur ro // / +brgyad cu po  dag bsdus pa las ni bskal pa chen po'i tshad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro // /

column3: de ltar na tsam smos pas ni don dgag pa'i don bshad pa yin no // / +ji ltar don med pa de ltar lung gis kyang bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243840#243851#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3821;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3822;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3824# bskal pa zhes bya ba'i ngo bo nyid ci yin zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +phung po lnga po dag nyid kho na'o // /

column3: rigs pa ni kha cig ni bshad zin kha cig ni 'chad par 'gyur ro / / +gnyis kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyu mtshan dang lta ba ni rgyu mtshan dang lta ba dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243852#243859#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3824# mdo dag las ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum po dag tu nan tan brtson 'grus spyad  nas gdod sangs rgyas su 'grub bo zhes gsungs na sngar bstan pa'i bskal pa bzhi po dag las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243860#243867#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3824;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3825;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3826# mdo dag las ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum po dag tu nan tan brtson 'grus spyad  nas gdod sangs rgyas su 'grub bo zhes gsungs na sngar bstan pa'i bskal pa bzhi po dag las / / +bskal pa gang dag brtsegs pa las / /

column3: de gnyis dang lhan cig pa ni rnam par rig pa rgyu mtshan dang lta ba dang bcas pa ste / / +mig la sogs pa zhes bya ba nas lus kyi rnam par rig pa la thug pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243866#243881#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3825;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3826;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3827;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3828# bskal pa gang dag brtsegs pa las / / +bskal pa grangs med pa gsum mngon par 'grub par 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: bdag  nyid ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs la sogs par snang ba'i rnam par rig pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis ni rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243880#243892#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3827;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3828;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3829;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3830;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3831# snga ma'i bskal pa chen po dag bcu dang  brgyad stong du brtsegs pa nas / / +de bzhin  du bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du brtsegs pa las so // /

column3: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yul so sor rnam par rig pa snang ba'i lta bas ni lta ba dang bcas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243893#243902#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3830;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3831;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3832# ci'i phyir gsum zhes kyang brjod ce na / / +grangs med pa ma yin pa'i tshig gis bgrang du med pa rab tu ston pas so // /

column3: yang na gzung ba'i cha ni rgyu  mtshan / / +'dzin pa'i cha ni lta ba ste gnyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243903#243911#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3832# rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni grangs rnam pa drug cu las  grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni grangs gcig gi ming ngo zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du 'byung ste / /

column3: sna tshogs kyi rnam pa 'byung ba'i phyir te zhes bya ba ni ri mo'i gding ba la sogs pa la sna tshogs kyi rnam pa'i rnam par shes pa gcig kho na cha gcig ni gzung ba dang  cha gcig ni 'dzin par cig car 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243912#243940#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3832;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3833;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3834;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3835;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3836# rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni grangs rnam pa drug cu las  grangs med PA ZHES BYA BA NI grangs gcig gi ming ngo zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#545474#545474#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12468# med ces byar yang mi rung ngo zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du 'byung ste / /

column3: gang dag  de'i skye ba rim gyis 'byung bar 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na gzhi chen po la yang nyin gcig tu yang sna tshogs kyi blo 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243941#243950#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3836;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3837;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3838# grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni grangs drug cu las lnga bcu gnyis pa yin no zhes bstan to // /

column3: yid kyi rnam par rig pa ni mig la sogs pa nas chos la thug pa'i rnam par rig pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don  thams cad dmigs pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dbang byed pa mig la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa nas chos kyi rnam par rig pa la thug pa'i bar dag rgyu mtshan nyid du rnam par gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243949#243963#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3837;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3838;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3839# yang na grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni grangs drug cu'i ming yin te / / +'don pa brgyud pa dag gis snga ma dag gi ming brjod pas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243964#243978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3839;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3840;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3841;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842# 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i nang nas grangs med kyi le'u las ni grangs     // / +kyis bsgyur ba brgya nyi shu las / /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404549#2404551#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11106;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11107# bstan BCOS RNAM PAR RIG PA TSAM du grub pa las kyang theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa dang mthun bar byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni mngon du gyur pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column7: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267590#267591#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6752;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6753# gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las spyi dang bye brag gi sgo ni sngar tshig gcig mdor bstan nas tshig phyi ma gzhan gyis rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526930#526930#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10097;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10098# 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba rnams  dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  lha rnams dang  mi rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang sbyar na ni drug tu gzhag pa yang dag pa'i don yin par ston te / /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517309#517310#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8749;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8750# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dbang gis de rab tu sel ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las shes rab kyi rjes su 'brang zhing dmigs pa la yang dag par gnas pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405515#2405518#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11195;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11196# so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su grub pas phyogs bcu kun du legs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i shes pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216914#216916#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_367;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_368# mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa na chos rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las  kyang don rnam pa drug gis de nyid kyi bye brag ston pa yang / /
column12: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2365554#2365557#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6435# 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo'i nang nas grangs bstan pa'i le'u las  grangs brgya nyi shu bstan pa las brgya rtsa gsum pa gang yin pa de ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2315275#2315275#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_504;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_505# tshig de lta bu mi 'byung ba'i phyir de yang tshad mar mi rung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403941#2403943#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11057# bstan BCOS RNAM PAR RIG PA TSAM du grub pa las kyang byang chub kyi phyogs  kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas pas nyon mongs pa'i shing bsregs nas shes rab kyi 'od 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'od 'phel bar byed pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column15: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518805#518805#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8958;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8959# choms par dka' ba'i phyir ni stobs zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2365394#2365394#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6407;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6408# ma ta phrag bcu la au snu ta zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab  kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /

column3: de dag gis de rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o // / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par  rig pas ni lta ba dang bcas pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243979#243989#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3841;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842# brgya rtsa gsum pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: 'di ltar de dag thams cad la rnam par rtog par byed pa dang  rnam par rig pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'byung ba'i tshul can yang yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243988#244000#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3844# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367865#2367865#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6752;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6753# de la yang bcos ldan 'das kyis mdo'i sde la ni tshig 'bru rgyas pa yin la don bsdus pa yin pa dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la ni don rgyas pa yin la tshig 'bru bsdus pa yin par yongs su bstan pa yin bar rig par bya'o zhes bstan to // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222647#222647#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1124# spong pa'i lam du gyur pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518536#518537#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919# rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa  las / /
column8: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367368#2367368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6679# 'di ni rnal 'byor pas 'du byed rnams la mi mthun par bsgom pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264276#264276#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6359;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6360# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang phal cher bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba dang mthun par bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523096#523096#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9576;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9577# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las legs so zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i  phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518360#518360#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8891;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8892# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang  'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las log pa'i chos 'dzin cing yang dag pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i spong ba zhes bya'o // /
column12: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222417#222419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1086# brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  thos pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245133#245133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3989# bdag gis lan cig tsam  sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column15: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#488182#488182#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5107;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5108# de las bzlog pa ni  'dus ma byas su rig par bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las gang dmigs su yod pa ni 'dus byas zhes bya'o // /
column16: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519021#519024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8992;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8993# bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po las bstan pa dang don mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column17: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2376979#2376979#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7916# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang phal cher 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'gyur ste / /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216995#216995#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_375# snying rje chen po de yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni bstan bcos byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las bstan pa dag  dang mthun par byang chub sems dpa' la yang snying rje chen po yod par ston to // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column20: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#488009#488009#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5081# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  'phags pa stug po bkod pa'i mdo las lnga kho na'i ming smos kyi / /

column3: de lta bas na yid kyi rnam par shes pa de 'dir lta ba zhes bya'o // / +'dir tshigs su bcad pa zhes     // /

column5: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2365556#2365556#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6435# 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo'i nang nas grangs bstan pa'i le'u las  grangs brgya nyi shu bstan pa las brgya rtsa gsum pa gang yin pa de ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: bya bas ni de tsam nyid dang gnyis dang sna tshogs nyid du rtogs pas / / +de tsam gnyis dang sna tshogs nyid // /

rnal 'byor pa rnams rtogs par 'dod // / +ces bya ba ste / / +rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis yongs su shes par 'dod do // / +de dang bral na zhes bya ba la sogs  pa la bral bar gyur pas bral ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244017#244028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3845;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3846# bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdo khungs su bstan pa las ni grangs brgya nyi shu rtsa gnyis la grangs med PA ZHES BYA BA NI grangs brgya bdun pa'i ming 'byung ste / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las bshad pa bzhin du  bshad par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228525#228529#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1862;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1863# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las byung ba  bzhin du rig par bya'o //// /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516409#516410#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8657# phung po lnga'i don rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353393#2353393#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4942# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361652#2361652#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5940;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5941# zhib tu ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin no / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234919#234920#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2682;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2683# de ni 'jig rten pa las 'das pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni / / +mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367192#2367192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6651;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6652# nga 'di ltar de'i mtshan nyid las rgyu dang 'bras bu de dag snang ba ni rigs pa nyid kyis de ltar rab tu phye ba yin pas mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pa dbu ma'i lam  khong du chud par 'gyur zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343869#2343871#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3847;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3848# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bcu gnyis po 'di dag rgya gar skad du ma bsgyur bar so nas 'byung ste / / +rgya cher bshad pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359848#2359848#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5695# rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i  ting nge 'dzin 'di'i bye brag gi mtshan nyid kyi don zhib tu mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: dmigs pa med pa'o // / +dmigs pa rnam par bshig pa de med na rnam par rig pa tsam nyid dang bral ba nye bar gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244029#244037#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3845;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3846;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3847;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3848;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3849# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las bshad pa bzhin du  bshad par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' byang chub chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum dgos sam / /

column3: rnam par rig pa rnam par shes par byed pa nyid du med pa'i phyir ro // / +shes bya med na shes par byed pa mi rung  ste ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244038#244047#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3847;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3848;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3849# 'on te ma nges she na / / +smras pa / / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  'phags pa legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan  pa'i mdo dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni / /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241356#241356#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3520# 'phags pa legs pa'i tshul khrims kyi mdo las bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu ste / /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226237#226237#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1576# 'phags pa legs pa'i  tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du gnyen po'i phyir dang  'byung ba'i phyir dang  'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / /

column3: rgyu yul med pa'i yul can du 'gyur du 'ong ngo // /

column5: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251716#251716#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4701# rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni 'phags pa rgya cher rnam par rol ba'i mdo dang  kun tu  gsal ba'i mdo dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i mdo dang  sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo dang  bkod pa chen po'i mdo la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa    bshad pa'am mjug bsdu ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o //// /

column3: yid kyi rnam par shes pa de nyid ces bya ba la  sogs pas ni lta ba'i bye brag brjod de / / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa gcig kho na mig la sogs pa rten de dang de nas skye ba na mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar de dang de'i ming 'thob ste / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397271#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column16: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226478#226478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column17: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228596#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column18: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245349#245350#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4011# 'di ni dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ste / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236901#236901#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2931# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems  dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column20: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241854#241854#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3570;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3571# skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas  nyon mongs pa rnams spong zhes 'byung ba yang mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa dang don mthun no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column21: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219508#219508#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_700# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: rten thams cad du 'byung ba na zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs te / / +mig la sogs pa gnas thams cad du 'byung ba ni skye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244161#244178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3864;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3865;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3867# rigs kyi bu kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid DU'O ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI / / +gnyis pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228610#228610#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1872# rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa lnga'i phyir ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa de bzhin    gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385136#2385136#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8848# rigs kyi bu zhi gnas dang lhag mthong de dag sa dang po la ni ngan song pa'i nyon mongs pa dang las ngan skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa lnga'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa YIN NO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS  par ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380559#2380559#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8326# rigs kyi bu sems shin tu rnam par dag pa dang  shes rab  shin tu rnam par dag pas de dag gi 'bras bu byed DO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ston to // /

column3: sna    tshogs kyi rnam pas gnyis su snang ba 'byung ste / / +zhes bya ba ni 'dzin par rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs kyi rnam pas gnyis su snang ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244178#244187#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3867;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3868;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3869# 'di yang gong ma zhus  tshig gsum gyi lan bstan pa nyid las rnam pa gsum du dbye ste / / +'di ni zhu ba dang po'i lan bstan pa'o // /

column3: rnam par shes pa gcig po las cha gcig ni don tsam du snang bar 'gyur / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244188#244204#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3869;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3871;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3872# 'di ni dang po ming smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa'o // /

column3: de'i cha gcig ni don la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par  'byung ngo // /
de lta bas na rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi skyon du mi 'gyur ro // / +gzugs can gyi khams na zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i khams na ma yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244205#244214#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3871;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3872;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3873# byang chub sems dpa' de dag  sa dang po la so sor nges pa kho nar chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu rtogs pas / / +rgyu dang rkyen des na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa ni shes bzhin kho nar skye ba yin gyi / /
column5: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120804#3120805#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4149;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4150# chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i  phyir te / / +des na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa ni shes bzhin kho nar skye ba yin gyi / /

column3: de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa lus la gnas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +dper  na mig la sogs pa'i dbang po lus la gnas pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni des byas pa'i phan pa dang gnod pa lus kyi yang yin pa de bzhin du gzugs can gyi khams na yid kyi rnam par shes pa lus la gnas pa'i phyir des byas pa'i myong ba lus kyi yang yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244215#244238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3872;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3873;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3874;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3875# rgyu dang rkyen des na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa ni shes bzhin kho nar skye ba yin gyi / / +mi shes pa ni ma yin PA ZHES BYA BA NI GSUM pa yang dag par rnam par bshad pa bstan pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244239#244246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3875;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3876# yang dag pa'i don du na kun nas nyon mongs pa yin yang shes pa las skyes pa nas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: gnas thams cad  du yang reg bya la 'dzin par snang ba yang 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa khong lci ba dang  yang na myong ba yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244245#244260#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3875;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3876# yang dag pa'i don du na kun nas nyon mongs pa yin yang shes pa las skyes pa nas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa bla na med pa'i  gnas bstan pa'i mdo las kun dga' bo sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu'i gnas skabs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ched du khams gsum dag tu 'jug kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la skye ba dang   rga ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal ni yang dag par yod pa ni ma yin no // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250826#250826#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4618# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa kun du gsal ba'i mdo las / /

column3: gcig bur smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' lung smos pa / / +gang zhig lus med ces bya ba la sogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244261#244273#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3876# gzhan yang 'phags pa bla na med pa'i  gnas bstan pa'i mdo las kun dga' bo sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu'i gnas skabs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ched du khams gsum dag tu 'jug KYANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DE dag la skye ba dang   RGA BA LA SOGS PA SDUG bsngal ni yang dag par yod pa ni ma yin no // /

column3: lus med ces bya  ba ni khog pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +phug gnas zhes bya ba ni nang na yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244272#244284#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3876;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3879# gzhan yang 'phags pa bla na med pa'i  gnas bstan pa'i mdo las kun dga' bo sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu'i gnas skabs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ched du khams gsum dag tu 'jug kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la skye ba dang   rga ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal ni yang dag par yod pa ni ma yin no // /

column3: ring du 'gro zhes bya ba ni shes bya thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir ro // / +gcig pu rgyu zhes bya ba de ni khungs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244285#244294#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3879;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3880# de kho na nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings mthong BA'I PHYIR RO // / +nyon mongs pa dang ldan yang kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: gnyis pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +gdul dka' zhes bya ba ni dmu rgod do // / +'dul  byed ces bya ba ni dbang du byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244295#244305#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3879;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3881# nyon mongs pa dang ldan yang kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +de'i phyir  kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI BZHI pa mjug bsdu ba ste brda phrad par zad do // /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546363#546363#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12575# rang  bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI BZHI pa mjug bsdu ba ste brda phrad par zad do // /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547423#547423#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12682# rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan to zhes bya ba bzhi pa mjug bsdu ba ste / /

column3: lung gnyis pa yang dbang po lnga po 'di dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / / +spyod yul gyi yul ni yid kyis myong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244306#244318#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3881;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3882;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3884;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3885# de'i phyir  kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI bzhi pa mjug bsdu ba ste brda phrad par zad do // / +rang gi rgyud la sdug bsngal bskyed par mi nus pa'i phyir skyon med pa yin no // /

column3: zhes bya ba la yid kya rnam par shes pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +yid ni 'di dag gi rton pa'o // /

column5: 0.018#TD4047E.TXT.r#1142892#1142892#TD4047E.TXT.r_3127;TD4047E.TXT.r_3128# de ltar sngar dngos po med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ro // / +de lta bu'i skyon spangs pa'i phyir sngon nas  de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes smras na / /
column6: 0.019#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068250#1068255#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2560;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2561;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2562# me gsum zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'o // / +'tshe  ba med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o // /

column9: 0.019#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#970575#970575#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10293# chos kyi sbyin pa chen po ston pa rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba dang don gcig tu sbyar ba'i phyir / / +de la dang pos ni mang du thos pa'i phyir gsal bar ston par 'gyur ro ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column10: 0.020#TD4069E.TXT.r#636004#636004#TD4069E.TXT.r_1851;TD4069E.TXT.r_1852# gyo ba dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir te / / +skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA'I THA TSHIG GO // /
column11: 0.022#TD4010E.TXT.r#2269906#2269906#TD4010E.TXT.r_5099;TD4010E.TXT.r_5100;TD4010E.TXT.r_5101# de dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde la 'dod par mi 'gyur te lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +mos par yang mi 'gyur te zab mo'i     // / +chos la goms par ma byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.022#TD4068E.TXT.r#584994#584994#TD4068E.TXT.r_1816;TD4068E.TXT.r_1817# 'gyod pa skyes nas gdon mi za bar yid mi bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi bde bar gnas par yang 'gyur ro // / +'tshig pa'i rang bzhin bstan par bya ba'i phyir / /
column13: 0.022#TD4018E.TXT.r#3075297#3075298#TD4018E.TXT.r_9256# rgyu zhig par rgyu'i dngos po med pa'i phyir chad par lta bar 'gyur te zhes pa ni rgyu 'jig pa'i phyir skad cig pa'i gnyis po la 'bras  bu'i dngos po med pas skad cig pa snga ma rgyu ma yin no // /
column14: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#197928#197928#TD4035E.TXT.r_12763;TD4035E.TXT.r_12764# des chos de thos pas dad pa rnyed par 'gyur te / / +dngos po'i 'dod    pa spang ba'i phyir dang  nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do // /
column15: 0.025#TD4052E.TXT.r#2845978#2845978#TD4052E.TXT.r_512;TD4052E.TXT.r_513# bdag po'i rkyen yin te mi mthun pa'i phyogs med par gnyen po  med pa'i phyir ro // / +de bas na bdag po'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'ang thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs so // /
column16: 0.025#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2541870#2541871#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_892;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_893# des sdig pa las so sor thar pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma dang po kho nas sdig pa las so sor thar par 'gyur ro // / +spang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bor ba'i PHYIR ZHES BYA BA'I THA TSHIG GO // /
column17: 0.026#TD4079E.TXT.r#758436#758436#TD4079E.TXT.r_281;TD4079E.TXT.r_282# don dam par yod par 'gyur la kun brtags pa'i  rang bzhin gyis dmigs na ni kun rdzob tu yod par 'gyur te / / +kun nas nyon mongs pa'i don du dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.027#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068587#1068587#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2617;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2618;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2619# de la 'di lta bur gyur cig  snyam pa dang  de 'dra bar gyur cig snyam pa dang  de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang  gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang  'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang  'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang  de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur     // / +ro zhes gsungs pa yin no // / +'jug pa med pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o // /
column19: 0.029#TD4066E.TXT.r#2116836#2116836#TD4066E.TXT.r_2068# de ltar mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rgyun chad nas yang dang yang 'byung ba'i phyir gnas de yang dang yang nye bar len pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni de'i dbang gis  'grub pa'i phyir ro // / +yang khungs gsum pa smos so // /

column3: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ni yid kyi skye mched do zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i skye mched ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244335#244345#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3887;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3888# sdug bsngal 'dren par mi byed pa'i phyir kha na mtho ba med pa yin no zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna  tshogs kun las btus pa las byang chub sems dpa' de dag nyon mongs pa ma spangs su zin kyang sngags dang sman gyis bsad pa'i dug lta bur nyon mongs pa'i nyes ba thams cad mi skyed de / /

column3: gang du yang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa ni don gyi rnam par rig par rnam par 'jog pa zhes     // /

column5: 5.960#TD4049E.TXT.r#2309534#2309537#TD4049E.TXT.r_3732;TD4049E.TXT.r_3733;TD4049E.TXT.r_3734# cig car dgra bcom pa dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro // / +de nyon mongs pa ma spangs su zin kyang / / +sngags dang sman gyis song ba'i dug lta bu dang dper na spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa ltar sa thams cad du nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa mi skyed  do ; / /

column6: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224662#224663#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1400# mdo 'di las gsungs pa'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las  btus pa dang  RNAM PAR RIG PA TSAM du grub pa las ni ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te / /
column7: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346496#2346496#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4122# gzhan yang 'dir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa gsar rnying rnam pa gnyis dang  RNAM PAR RIG PA TSAM du grub pa dang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa LAS RNAM PAR RIG PA  tsam du bstan pa'i rigs pa dag kyang brjod par bya'o //// /

column3: rnam par byang ba yin pa'i  phyir ro // / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa rten dang bcas pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa'i yid dang nyon mongs pa can dang bcas pa ste / /

column5: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518886#518886#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8969# bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa la sogs pa las kyang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang don mthun par ston to // /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258806#258806#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5591# don gzhan la sogs pa'i dgongs  pa de dag ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon dbyeg gnyin dnyig gnyen dang  ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  mdo sde'i rgyan dang  chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa    la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: de gnyis skyed pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro // / +lta ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro // /

column5: 0.021#TD4051E.TXT.r#1266344#1266345#TD4051E.TXT.r_5028;TD4051E.TXT.r_5029;TD4051E.TXT.r_5030# 'di ltar / / +sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug dang 'dra // / +dper na sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug ni nad pa rnams kyi yo byad du 'gyur pa de bzhin du de dag gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyang kun nas dkris pa med cing bag la nyal lus pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.028#TD4050E.TXT.r#1119405#1119406#TD4050E.TXT.r_3199;TD4050E.TXT.r_3200;TD4050E.TXT.r_3201# sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug dang 'dra // / +zhes bya ba ni ji ltar / / +sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug gis ni 'chi bar mi nus pa de bzhin du de dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pas kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o / / +phan tshun mi mthun pa 'gal pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po ni rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244435#244453#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3902;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3905# zhes bya ba ni dper na / / +sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug ni ngo bo nyid ma spangs kyang nang du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang de bzhin te / /

column3: phyi rol gyi  don ni rgyu mtshan nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir de shes pas ni don med par khong du chud par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244454#244465#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3905;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3906# 'di ltar dran pa dang  shes rab kyi stobs kyis kun nas dkris pa zil gyis mnan kyang bag la nyal ni lus pa'i  phyir ro ; / / +ci'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal lhag ma 'jog ce na / /

column3: yi dags dang  dung 'gro dang mi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chu klung gang la yi dags rnams kyi rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis rnag la sogs pas gang bar mthong ba de nyid la dud 'gro nya la  sogs pas btung ba dang gnas yin pa'i blos gnas par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244464#244473#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3906;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3907# nyan thos kyi theg pa dang 'dra bar myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244474#244489#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3908;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3909;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3910;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3911# rigs pa des na nyon mongs pas rgyu byas pas nyon mongs pa zad na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te / /

column3: mi rnams ni dngar ba dang dad ba dang bsil ba'i chur rtog cing khrus byed do // / +'thung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244490#244498#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3910;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3911;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3912;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3913# nyan thos byang chub dag ni thob par 'gyur // / +ji ltar dug ni sngags kyis bsad pa bzhin // /

column3: 'jug go // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'i lha rnams kyis ni nam mkhar mthong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244499#244508#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3912;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914# skyon ni yon tan nyid du mngon par 'grub // / +ces bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 2.980#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535456#535458#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11198;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir mchog    gi don gyis yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314613#2314615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_417;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_419;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_418# sangs rgyas rnams la mnga' dbang med // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rigs med pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste / /
column7: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314668#2314669#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_427;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_429;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_428# sangs rgyas rnams la mnga' dbang med // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
