column9: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221079#221079#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_879# nges pa'i tshig gzhan ni go sla'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs 'bras bu gtogs par bstan to // /
column10: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228202#228203#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1815;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1816# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i  'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column11: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238296#238297#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3115# de ma yin pa'i sems can ches mang po dag la gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du sems so zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bshad do // /
column12: 0.006#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387662#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238221#238223#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3104# zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las kyang de skad du bshad do // /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535268#535268#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11181# skyes nas kyang skad cig las lhag par bdag nyid gnas par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column15: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474727#474728#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261# chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i yon tan dang  mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa ston pa'i yon tan dang  sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su mchad pa'i yon tan dang  'khor ba'i mtha' ji snyam par sems  can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan dang  mi zad pa'i yon tan la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475086#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column17: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477882#477883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3627# 'di nyid dang sbyar te yon tan gyi ming bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par bstan pa rnams yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column18: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478759#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3747# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529705#529706#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10481;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482# gnas kyi khyad par gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column20: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533783#533783#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column21: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235701#235702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2789;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# 'di ltar bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis sems kyi kun tu spyod pa la dbang thob par byed cing de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column22: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227748#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column23: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column24: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475263#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column25: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column26: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen pa zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column27: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column29: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column30: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237796#237796#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3039;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3040# 'di ni rgyu dang po'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis 'grel pa las / /
column31: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column32: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537006#537007#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11409;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11410# de nyid la zab po'i rnam par rig pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis bshad pa ni 'di dang mi mthun pas nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni lus can gyi rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya'o // /
column33: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478551#478551#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3713;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3714# 'di ni 'khor ba'i mtha' ji tsam par sems can thams cad la phan pa dang  bde ba nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i yon tan nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column34: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540238#540238#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11832# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyigs  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las ming ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid du rtogs so // /
column35: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403883#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column36: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226753#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column37: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba de 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column38: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /
column39: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227064#227064#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688# tshul khrims phyi ma gnyis kyi bshad pa ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column40: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214117#214117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_15# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang  gnas ngan len bcu gcig ces ston te / /
column41: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397795#2397795#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10300# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan te / /
column42: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238147#238147#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3090# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bskyed pa ni mi rung ngo snyam mo zhes bshad de  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /
column43: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475847#475847#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3401;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3402# zhes bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang  nye ba'i 'od kyis 'grel pa las kyang don 'di dang mthun par bshad do // /
column44: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536673#536673#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column45: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270049#270049#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7064;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7065# rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba dang bral ba yin yang gdul ba'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams  kyi mos pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du phan 'dogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs ston to zhes mngon par bsgrubs pa yin no zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba'i 'grel ba las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column46: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387048#2387048#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9043;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9044# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba zhes bshad  do // /
column47: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406127#2406127#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /

column3: gzugs kyi 'du shes  rnam par bshig pa'i phyir ro // / +dngos po gcig la phan tshun mi mthun pa'i rnam par shes pa du ma 'byung ba de ni mi rung ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244509#244521#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3915# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel    pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to // /

column3: chu klung de nyid rnag dang gcin dang phyi sa sa gang ba dang  dbyug pa dang ral gri thogs pa'i mis bsrungs pa yin pa dri zhim pa dang bsil ba'i chu dang  gnas dang     btung ba la sogs pa'i bya ba'i 'os dang nam mkha'i bdag nyid du ji ltar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244520#244530#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3915# byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa de lta bu bskyed nas sems can gyi khams su sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bzlog par nus pas de'i phyir de dag yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni zhus tshig gsum pa'i lan bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244530#244540#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3915;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3916;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3917# byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa de lta bu bskyed nas sems can gyi khams su sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bzlog par nus pas de'i phyir de dag yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni zhus tshig gsum pa'i lan bstan to // /

column3: phyi rol gyi don med do // / +brtags pas der snang bar ni rung ste / / +ji skad du // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244541#244548#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3917;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3918;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3919# de bzhin gshegs pas lan du gsungs pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa brjod pa'o // / +'di ni dang po ste / /

column3: bud med lus ni gcig pu la // / +ro dang 'dod bya za ba zhes // / +kun rgyu 'dod can khyi rnams kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244549#244559#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3919# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ched du nyon mongs pa bskyed nas sems can gyi sdug bsngal brlag par byed  pas na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa la sdug bsngal spong ba'i rgyu zhes bshad do // /

column3: rnam par rtog pa rnam  gsum mo // / +zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la ni mdo sde pa'i ltar na rnam par shes pa dmigs pa med par grub po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244560#244572#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3920;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3921# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ched du nyon mongs pa bskyed nas sems can gyi sdug bsngal brlag par byed  pas na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa la sdug bsngal spong ba'i rgyu zhes bshad do // /

column3: rmi lam yang grags so // / +ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gzugs brnyan ni brjod zin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244571#244581#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3920;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3921;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3922# bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' ni ched du sems can gyi nyon mongs pa gcod par byed pas / / +sems can gyi nyon mongs pa nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rgyu zhes bshad de / /

column3: mdun na snang ba'i phyir de ni dran par mi rung ngo zhes bshad pa  yin no // / +me long la sogs pa'i nang du bzhin la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan snang ba yang ji ltar ci yang ma yin pa de ltar sngar bshad zin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244582#244593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3922;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3923;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3924# skye shi'i sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub pa ni nyon mongs pa las 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244594#244601#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3923;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3924# sa dang po nas sa bdun pa'i bar du nyon mongs pa bskyed pa la yang dgos pa gnyis yod de / / +dang po ni rang gi shes pa la dbang gi stobs yod par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ched du nyon mongs pa bskyed nas zil gyis  mnan cing rab tu sel bar byed de / /

column3: de dag la rnam par shes pa dmigs pa med pa nyid du grub bo // / +'bad pa med par yang phyin ci log med par 'gyur ba ni gsal ba'i phyir  rnam par dgrol bar kho bos 'bad pa ma byas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244602#244616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3924;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3926# dang po ni rang gi shes pa la dbang gi stobs yod par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ched du nyon mongs pa bskyed nas zil gyis  mnan cing rab tu sel bar byed de / /

column3: gal te ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin // / +don rnams yang dag nyid rtogs na // / +yang dag mthong bas lus can rnams // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244617#244625#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3926;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3927;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3928# dper na byi las byi ba la rtsed mo byed pa bzhin no // / +de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473482#473483#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3138# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni dran pa chen po zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537408#537408#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11476;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11477# chos thams cad las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum spyir ston par mdzad de / / +de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228123#228124#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1807;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1808# 'dogs pa'i bya ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /

column3: 'bad pa med par dgrol bar 'gyur // / +bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams  te ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244626#244633#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3926;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3927;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3928# de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / / +ched 'ga' ni zil gyis gnon par yang mi byed de / / +de'i mthu nyams sad pa'i phyir ched du sems bskyed nas re zhig ldang bar byed do zhes bstan pa  yin no ; / /

column3: bsam gtan ni sems rtse gcig pa dge ba'o // / +'di dag la bsam gtan byed pa'i ngang tshul yod pa ni bsam gtan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244634#244644#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3928;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3929# de'i mthu nyams sad pa'i phyir ched du sems bskyed nas re zhig ldang bar byed do zhes bstan pa  yin no ; / /

column3: sems la dbang thob pas rnams la zhes bya ba ni sems las su rung ba nyid thob pa rnams so // / +mos pa ni mo par byed pa ste / / +yid ches pa'o / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244645#244652#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3929;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3930# gnyis pa nyon mongs pa bskyed de dngos po can gyi lus blangs nas sems can la phan 'dogs par byed pas / /

column3: de'i dbang  gis zhes bya ba ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin dus la sogs pa chu la sogs pa'i dngos por snang ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244653#244664#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3929;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3930;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3931;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3932# gnyis pa nyon mongs pa bskyed de dngos po can gyi lus blangs nas sems can la phan 'dogs par byed pas / / +des na de'i phyir yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te / /

column3: zhi gnas thob pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnams te / / +zhi gnas dang ting nge 'dzin ni don gcig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244665#244673#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3932;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3933# 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi  nyon mongs pas sems can thams cad kyi phan pa'i bya ba dag byed pas bsod nams dpag tu med pa dag skyed do zhes bshad pa yin no // /
column5: 0.026#TD4046E.TXT.r#2199841#2199841#TD4046E.TXT.r_536# bsod nams kyi 'bras bu dpag tu  med pas bsdus pas na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1173601#1173603#TD4047E.TXT.r_7651;TD4047E.TXT.r_7652;TD4047E.TXT.r_7653# bsod nams kyi 'bras bu dpag tu med par  bsdus pas na / / +bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'o // /

column3: 'dis sems gyengs pa zhi bar byed pas zhi gnas so // / +rnal 'byor  pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244674#244682#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3932;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3933;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3934;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3935# 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi  nyon mongs pas sems can thams cad kyi phan pa'i bya ba dag byed pas bsod nams dpag tu med pa dag skyed do zhes bshad pa yin no // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las / /

column3: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel par 'jug pa rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa dang ldan pa ni rnal 'byor pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244683#244692#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3934;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3935# byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i las rnam pa bcu     // / +byas kyang kha na ma tho ba med pa la bsod nams dpag tu med pa yang skye bar 'gyur zhing byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // /

column3: de su dag la yod pa de dag ni rnal 'byor pa'o // / +de dag gi rjes la thob pa med pa     // / +la sogs pa'i chos la lhag mthong zhes bya ba ni shes rab bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244693#244704#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3935;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3936;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3937;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3938# byas kyang kha na MA THO BA MED PA LA bsod nams dpag tu med pa yang skye bar 'gyur zhing byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228123#228124#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1807;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1808# 'dogs pa'i bya ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475460#475461#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3358;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ltar gsum po de dag ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams  cad mtshungs shing tha dad PA MED PAS DE DAG brnyes par gyur pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las gnas tha dad pa mi mnga' ba ni thams cad kyang ye shes rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475605#475605#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3374;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3375# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa las 'di ltar dus thams cad du shes rab yongs su sbyangs pas sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen po 'phags pa'i  lam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba'i bdag nyid goms par byas pas bag chags thams cad dang gtan du bral ba'i gnas su byon pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537106#537106#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11423;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11424# de'i phyir de nyid las las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la grangs tshad med pa'i phyir dang  'chi 'pho dang skye ba myong ba la grangs tshad med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni / /
column9: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403347#2403348#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10995;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10996# tshul khrims yongs su grub pa'i phyir dang  'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma rnams yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don gyis  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column10: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346574#2346575#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4132;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4133# mtshon gyis ni rang nyid la mi gcod do zhes brjod pa dag dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404512#2404513#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11103;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11104# sa brgyad pa ni mngon par 'du byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang don gyis de skad du ston to // /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475710#475712#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3384;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3385# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig las lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang  dag par gsungs pa'i chos 'jig par nus pa med pa'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227023#227023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1682# de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrubs nas byang chub la 'jug PA THOB PAR BYED PA dang  gzhan yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par 'jog par byed pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid  med kyis 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405056#2405057#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11156;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11157# slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad ba'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'dir mtshan ma ji snyed yod pa rnams dang  mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyos shing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang gi dang gis 'jug pas so zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar mtshan ma thams  cad dang mngon bar 'du byed pa thams cad kyis de'i sems gyo bar mi nus pa'i phyir dang  sa bdun pa la mtshan ma thams cad kyis mi gyo zhing kun du mi 'byung mod kyi / /
column15: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536721#536721#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11369;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11370# yid kyi khams so zhes bshad de / / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas yid kyi khams gang yin pa de ni zab po'i rnam par rig pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: de la brtson pa rnams zhes bya ba ni mngon par brtson pa rnams so // / +mdo la sogs pa'i chos la lhag mthong byed pa na mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i don gcig pu la yang ji lta ji ltar skad cig mar 'jig  pa la sogs pa'i dngos por yid la byed pa rnams kyi yul du 'gyur ba de lta de ltar rnam pa du mar snang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397095#2397097#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10215# de nas byang  chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397270#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397571#2397572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10266# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan  ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /

column32: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236838#236839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2924;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2925# dpe nyid las kyang phal cher 'di dang mthun par 'byung bas 'dir ma brjod do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi so  so'i mthu mchog tu gyur pa du zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bzhi pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column33: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237122#237122#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2956;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2957# longs spyod chen po thob pa dang bad 'gror 'gro ba dang  khon med cing dbye ba med pa dang  bde ba dang yid bde ba mang ba dang  sems can gyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa dang  lus la gnod pa med pa dang  dbang che bar grags pa ni go rims bzhin du sbyin pa la  sogs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob ste / / +de la gnas pa rnams la don thams cad mi snang ngo zhes bya ba la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni 'og nas 'chad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244731#244744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3940# bcom ldan 'das bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub gang yon tan gyi phan yon chen po de lta  bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che ba lags PAS ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pas ni gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa brjod pa ston to // /

column3: don de yod na  rnam par mi rtog par mi rung ste / / +rnam par brtag par bya ba yod na rnam par mi rtog pa nyid du mi 'thad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244745#244763#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3940;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3941;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3942;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3943# bcom ldan 'das bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub gang yon tan gyi phan yon chen po de lta  bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che ba lags pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa brjod pa ston to // /

column3: gal te don yang dag pa yin du zin na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes byung yang de mi snang bar mi 'gyur te / /
yang dag pa'i don la dmigs pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar na zhes bya ba ni  rigs pa smos ma thag pa dang rgyud sngar bshad pa rnams kyis kyang don med do zhes mjug sdud pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244762#244777#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3942;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3943;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3944;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3945# 'di ni  sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa ste / / +'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma 'ongs pa na bla na med pa'i byang chub gnyer bar byed pas / /

column3: de ji ltar na gzhan gyi dbang yin zhes bya ba ni bdag rang gis shes par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244778#244788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3944;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3945;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3946# yon tan gyi phan yon de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa'o // / +yang na da ltar gyi'am / / +yang na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi  byang chub kyi phan yon gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ba'o // /

column3: ci'i phyir zhe na / / +zhes bya ba ni gzhan la brjod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de bzhin  du ngo bo nyid gnyis po la yang dri ba gnyis gnyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244789#244801#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3946;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3947# yang na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi  byang chub kyi phan yon gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ba'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3120835#3120837#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4155;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4156;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4157# bcom ldan 'das gang la da ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa skye ba dag gis kyang / / +ji tsam du sems can dang  nyan thos  dang ; /

column3: dri ba de dag gi lan kyang gnyis gnyis so // / +rang gi bag chags kyi sa bon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kun brtags par brjod pa'i bag chags su bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244802#244815#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3947;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3948;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3949# byang chub sems dpa' rnams las nyon mongs pa skye ba dag gis kyang sems can dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las khyad par du  'phags par bgyid na / /

column3: rang gi sa bon des dbang du byas pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang ste / / +bdag rang  gis shes par bya ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244816#244825#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3948;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3949# de las gzhan pa'i yon tan rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa skye ba dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang so so'i skye bo dang theg pa gnyis po thams cad kyi  dge ba'i rtsa ba las khyad par du 'phags na / /

column3: skad cig las lhag par mi gnas pa'i phyir gzhan la brjod do // / +sa bon gyi gzhan gyi dbang dang  skye ba dang 'jig pa gzhan gyi dbang gi phyir te go rims bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244826#244836#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3949;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3951# byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa skye ba dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang so so'i SKYE BO DANG THEG PA gnyis po thams cad kyi  dge ba'i rtsa ba las khyad par du 'phags na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244837#244844#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3951;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3952# de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te / / +so so skye bo las sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis pa las khyad par du 'phags pa yin na / /

column3: de la gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang la brten pa'o // / +don med pa zhes bya ba gal te  med na don zhes ji skad bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244845#244860#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3951;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3952;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3953;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3954# so so skye bo las sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis pa las khyad par du 'phags pa yin na / / +sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan 'dogs    pa'i ched du nyon mongs pa bskyed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: len 'debs te / / +snang ba zhes bya ba ni de mngon par brjod pa'i sa bon las yod pa ma yin yang don bzhin du snang ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244859#244871#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3953;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3954;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3955;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3956# de'i 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: des na don zhes brjod do // / +snang ba ni gsal ba dang mngon pa dang rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244870#244881#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3955;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3956;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3957# byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa tsam mi phod de / / +dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bu mngal na gnas kyang / /

column3: dpag tu med pa'i rnam    pa can gyi zhes bya ba ni bdag dang chos rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa yul du snang ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba kun du rtog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244880#244896#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3957;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3958;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3959;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3960# gzhan dag gi bu las khyad par du 'phags pa dang  gzhan yang dper na rgyal po'i bu rgyal por dbang ma bskur mod kyi / /

column3: phyin ci log ces bya ba ni 'khrul pa ste / / +gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i don gyi rnam par 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir kun du brtags pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244897#244908#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3961;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3962# sems can ni rang gi bde ba gnyer ba dang  bdag nyid kyi lus kyi phyir gnyen bshes la sred par byed do // /

column3: de la don du  kun du rtog pa'i phyir ro // / +rang gi mtshan nyid med la kun du rtog pa tsam du dmigs pas zhes bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244909#244920#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3961;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3963;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3964# theg pa gnyis po dag ni 'jig rten pa bde ba la srid pa med kyang / / +rang gi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.021#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2033262#2033263#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8003# bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i mjug thogs su bde ba so sor myong ba'i phyir sdug bsngal ma mthong bas gang gi tshe dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khyad par las skyes PA'I ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pa smos te / /
column6: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1013808#1013812#TD4054E.TXT.r_3846;TD4054E.TXT.r_3847;TD4054E.TXT.r_3848# bsams bzhin du srid par     // / +skye BA'I PHYIR RO // / +sems can du ma'i rgyud la yod pa'i sdug bsngal gsal bar nye bar GNAS PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column7: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#910137#910137#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2494# sems can sdug bsngal las 'byin par  BYED PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column8: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#218299#218299#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_535# pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis shin tu gnod par 'gyur ba'i sems can dag la ni chos bzhin du snyoms par 'jug pa thabs la mkhas pas pha rol gyi dmag  tshogs kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1372526#1372526#TD4037E.TXT.r_7493;TD4037E.TXT.r_7494# pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis shin tu gnod par gyur pa'i sems can dag la ni chos bzhin du snyoms par thabs mkhas pas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi  gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir / / +stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1221565#1221565#TD4047E.TXT.r_14221;TD4047E.TXT.r_14222# bya ba  mngon du gyur pa na don mthun par bstan pa'i phyir / / +sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang dag dang mtshungs par byed do zhes bya ba'o // /
column11: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1192704#1192704#TD4047E.TXT.r_10208;TD4047E.TXT.r_10209# phyogs kyi dbye ba dang  gnas kyi dbye ba'i dbang du byas nas zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o // / +sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i sems can rnams bdag gi phyogs la sogs pa rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te / /
column12: 0.025#TD4047E.TXT.r#1220779#1220779#TD4047E.TXT.r_14091;TD4047E.TXT.r_14092# snying brtse ba sngon du 'gro BA ZHES BYA BA NI SEMS can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir skye bar 'gyur ba'o // / +de dang skal ba mnyam par mthun par 'jug pa'i skye ba ni phan tshun mi mthun pa'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes nas rang nyid kyi byams pa'i sems kyis  khon rnams zhi bar byed do // /

column3: bdag dang chos dag med pa la rtog pa'i de'i rnam par snang bas kun brtags pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244921#244929#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3963;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3964;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3965;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3966# mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba tshol bar  sems can la phan mi 'dogs te / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongs su bzla ba'i ched du sems bskyed pa yin pas / /

column3: gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ni 'gyur ba med par yongs su grub pas yongs su grub par  shes par bya'o // / +rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa yin pa dang  dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin pa gnyis kyi yongs su grub pa zhes brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244930#244943#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3964;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3965;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3966;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3967# byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongs su bzla ba'i ched du sems bskyed pa yin pas / / +de'i phyir khyad par du 'phags so // / +gzhan ji skad du dper na mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa zhig gis / /

column3: yang kun du rtog pa yod cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun brtags pa dpyod do // / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni kun du rtog  pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244944#244954#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3968;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3969# dge tshul gcig la chos  gos dang lhung bzed bskur nas / / +lam du zhugs te song ba las dge tshul de 'di snyam du / /

column3: rnam par rtog pa can gyi phyir ro // / +zhes bya ba ni nges par rtog pa dang rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244955#244964#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3969;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3970# bdag gis theg pa gang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya zhes bsams pa las / /

column3: rang brjod pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes thog ma med pa'i 'khor  ba na tha snyad du brjod pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244965#244979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3971;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3972# sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog dam pa yin pas bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su  mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes sems bskyed pa de'i bsam pa slob dpon gyis rig nas / /

column3: de'i bag chags ni 'di'i sa bon no // / +rnam par rig pa thams cad kyi brjod pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar gzugs la sogs pa mtha' yas par snang ba'i rnam par rig pa brjod pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu las byung ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244980#244991#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3971;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3972;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3973# chos gos dang lhung bzed slar blangs te / / +bdag nyid kyis khyer nas dge tshul mdun du gtong ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244992#245000#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3974# dge tshul de yang 'di snyam du bla na med pa'i byang chub ni shin tu thag ring ste / /

column3: der snang bar 'byung ba'i tshul can yin pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam par mtha' yas pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis 'byung ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245001#245013#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3974# yun ring por  'khor ba na gnas shing sdug bsngal tshad med pa dang du blangs dgos pas re zhig theg pa chung du'i mya ngan las 'das pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das na rung ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa dang  slob dpon gyis rig nas chos gos dang lhung bzed de dag dge tshul la bskur nas phyi bzhin 'gror     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4051E.TXT.r#1266369#1266370#TD4051E.TXT.r_5032# nyan thos kyi theg pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das na mi rung ngo snyam mo // /

column3: gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid ni kun du brtags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de'i phyogs gcig mig la sogs pa yul  du gyur pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245014#245027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3974;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3975# yun ring por  'khor ba na gnas shing sdug bsngal tshad med pa dang du blangs dgos pas re zhig theg pa chung du'i mya ngan las 'das pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das na rung ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa dang  slob dpon gyis rig nas chos gos dang lhung bzed de dag dge tshul la bskur nas phyi bzhin 'gror     // /

column3: rnam pa gang du gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid la kun du brtags pa de ni de la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba ni rnam par rgyur gyur pa kun brtags pa nyid du bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245028#245036#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3974;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3975;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3976;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3977# yun ring por  'khor ba na gnas shing sdug bsngal tshad med pa dang du blangs dgos pas re zhig theg pa chung du'i mya ngan las 'das pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das na rung ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa dang  slob dpon gyis rig nas chos gos dang lhung bzed de dag dge tshul la bskur nas phyi bzhin 'gror     // / +bcug go // / +de ltar lan gsum du byas pas dge tshul des slob dpon la smras pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245036#245044#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3976;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3977;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3978# de ltar lan gsum du byas pas dge tshul des slob dpon la smras pa / / +slob dpon bgres pas byis pa chung du dang 'dra ste / /

column3: kun du rtog pas ji ltar kun du rtog ces bya ba ni rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba dris nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245045#245054#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3977;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3978;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3979;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3980# slob dpon bgres pas byis pa chung du dang 'dra ste / / +res 'ga' ni bdag mdun du btang / / +res 'ga' ni bdag phyi bzhin du mchir gsal ba ci lags / /

column3: kun brtags pa'i rab     // / +tu dbye ba ston to // / +ming gis dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni lha sbyin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming thos nas don la kun du rtog par byed kyi ming ma thos par ni don la rnam par rtog par byed mi nus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245055#245068#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3979;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3980;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3981;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3982;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3983# res 'ga' ni bdag phyi bzhin du mchir gsal ba ci lags / / +slob dpon gyis smras pa / / +khyod dang  po ni sangs rgyas mngon par bsgrub par sems bskyed pas sems de btsun par byas pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245069#245077#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3982;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3983;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3984# de ni slob dpon gyi lam la gnas pa yin pas / / +gang zag de lta bu de la ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang mchod par bya ba yin na dgra bcom pa lta ci smos te / /

column3: gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid lus la sogs pa la der mtshan mar 'dzin  pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan ma la mngon par zhen zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245078#245093#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3983;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3984;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3985;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3986# gang zag de lta bu de la ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang mchod par bya ba yin na dgra bcom pa lta ci smos te / / +de'i phyir khyod mdun du btang ba yin no // / +khyod yang  sems 'gyod par gyur nas / /

column3: mtshan mar 'dzin pa ni 'du shes te / / +ji ltar 'du shes su 'gyur ba de ltar rjes su tha snyad 'dogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245094#245110#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3986;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988# theg pa chung ngu gnyer bar 'dod pa ni khyod dang nga'i bar na thag shin tu ring bas de'i phyir khyed phyi bzhin du 'gror bcug pa yin no // /

column3: yang na gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid mig la sogs pa la'o // /

lta ba rnam pa lnga nges par rtog pa'i rnam par  'jug pas so // / +de la mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan mar byas pas mngon par zhen pa'i phyir te mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245111#245134#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3989# dge tshul de skad du thos pas shin tu skrag pa skyes te bdag gi slob dpon ni bdag gi sems shes te / / +bdag gis lan cig tsam  sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519928#519928#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9128;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9129# shin tu phra ba la sogs pa ro gcig pa'i don dam pa'i bdag nyid kyang thugs su chud par gyur pa yin la / / +gzhan dag la yang go bar mdzad par gyur TO ZHES BYA BA'I THA TSHIG GO // /
column6: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897062#897062#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1007# zab pa'i chos bsgoms pas ni bdag nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur te / /
column7: 0.029#TD4053E.TXT.r#2965309#2965309#TD4053E.TXT.r_84# rjes su 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid ni  'byung ba gyur na de la gnas pa'i rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyang 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: lta bas nges par brtags pa'i don las 'di ni de bzhin no zhes mngon par zhen nas gzhan dag la ston  par 'dod pa na rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag gis ngag kun nas slong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222417#222419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1086# brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  thos pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245135#245146#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3989;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3990# gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270686#270689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7128;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7129# gnod pa med kyang langs pa gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen des na gdon mi za bar ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518536#518537#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919# rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa  las / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367368#2367368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6679# 'di ni rnal 'byor pas 'du byed rnams la mi mthun par bsgom pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367865#2367865#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6752;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6753# de la yang bcos ldan 'das kyis mdo'i sde la ni tshig 'bru rgyas pa yin la don bsdus pa yin pa dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la ni don rgyas pa yin la tshig 'bru bsdus pa yin par yongs su bstan pa yin bar rig par bya'o zhes bstan to // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380259#2380259#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8292# gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216995#216995#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_375# snying rje chen po de yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni bstan bcos byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las bstan pa dag  dang mthun par byang chub sems dpa' la yang snying rje chen po yod par ston to // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243996#243996#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3843# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222647#222647#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1124# spong pa'i lam du gyur pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253668#253668#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4964;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4965# 'dod pa'i khams kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir dang  ngag gi 'du byed kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir ni lhar gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column15: 0.027#TD4001E.TXT.r#1973630#1973630#TD4001E.TXT.r_151# 'di dag thams cad ni phan tshun rang bzhin tha dad na ji ltar mi 'dra ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong bas chos mthong bar 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224165#224165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1329# bla na med pa mi skye ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column17: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379457#2379457#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8194# zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang / /
column18: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1936851#1936851#TD4032E.TXT.r_2716;TD4032E.TXT.r_2717# rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am / / +rnam par dag par 'gyur  ba'i chos de gang yang med par rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: ma brtags ma dpyad par tshig mi smra'o zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +mthong ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba dang thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa tha snyad rnam par bzhi po dag gis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245147#245163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3990;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3991;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3992# stong  gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gang ba'i theg pa pa gnyis 'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gyur pa la mchod pa byas pas // /

column3: ji ltar sprul gyi ming la dmigs pa na thag pa la sprul gyi mtshan ma kyag kyog la sogs pa mtshan mar byed cing de la mngon par zhen nas gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir sprul mthong ngo zhes tshig tu smra ba de dang mtshungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245164#245171#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3991;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3992;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3993# gang gis sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pa bsod nams che'o // / +theg pa pa gnyis ni de kho na nyid kyi mtha'  mngon du gyur pas sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi gzhi yin na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245172#245190#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3992;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3993;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3994;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3995;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3996# theg pa pa gnyis ni de kho na nyid kyi mtha'  mngon du gyur pas sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi gzhi yin na / / +ci'i phyir sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tsam mi phod ce na / /

column3: tha dad pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa dang gzhan gyi  dbang gnyis yod pa dang med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245191#245200#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3996;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3997# thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la spyad pa dang  rtag par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la  sogs pa'i yon tan dang mi 'bral ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum gyi nyes pa spang zhing theg pa gsum po dag 'byung bar byed pa yin la / /

column3: yod pa las yod pa nyid ni gzhan ma yin te / / +ri bong gi rva la sogs pa med pa ni yod pa las gzhan ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397095#2397097#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10215# de nas byang  chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397227#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column26: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#485007#485007#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4644# byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don zab mo dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba dang  byang chub sems dpa'  sems dpa' chen po tshul bzhin kun tu 'dri ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros shin tu rnam par dag pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yangs pa'i blo gros dang  byang chub  sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan 'byung gnas dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam yang dag 'phags dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang    byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la sogs pa ni gtso bor gyur te zhes bya bas ni gsum pa gtso bo'i dbang du mdzad nas ming smos pa zhes bya ba bstan te / /

column3: 'dir dgongs pa'i rnam grangs la brten nas ni 'di dag gcig par yang 'gyur / /

column3: du mar yang 'gyur bas rnam grangs kyis gzhan gyi dbang nyid kun brtags par bstan te / /

column12: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253710#253713#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4968# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272277#272282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7352;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7353# de bzhin gshegs pa dang de dag tu rgyu dang rkyen ci zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column15: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273602#273603#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7486# dngos po gang ni dka' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa zhing yongs su dag pa dang zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag na gang    dag rnyed par dka' ba dang  gang dag mod pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column16: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228565#228565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1867# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /

column21: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361054#2361056#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5854;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5855;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5856# yi ge gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa yi ge'i rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column22: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380539#2380540#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8323;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8324;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8325# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong de dag gi 'bras bu gang lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi 'bras bu ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column23: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235758#235759#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2795;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2796# bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las  rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column24: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402925#2402926#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10945;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10946# ci'i slad du  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa'i ming gi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column25: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371505#2371505#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7217;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7218;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7219# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / / +'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column26: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378249#2378249#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8064;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8065;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8066# dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / / +'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column27: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385110#2385113#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8845;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8846;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8847# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du sgrib pa gang dag gi gnyen por gyur pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrib pa bcu gcig gi gnyen por gyur pas bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston te / / +'di yang  rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column28: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391885#2391888#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9596;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9597;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9598;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9599# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sgrub par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang  yon tan yangs shing rgya cher  rab tu 'dren par 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa mthu dang yon tan yangs shing rgya che ba'i bar du 'dren pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column29: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236868#236868#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2926;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2927# 'di la yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / / +'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column30: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239837#239837#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3318;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3319# 'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / / +'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column31: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238743#238744#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3180# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid 'dzin par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid  med pa yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pa dang  gal du gsol ba dang  rung ba nyid du sgrub pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column32: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247723#247723#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4294# bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to // / +'di  yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column33: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221160#221165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_891;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_892# du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu  lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column34: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240695#240696#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3438# bcom ldan 'das bag la nyal de dag gnas ngan len de dag spangs pa rnam pa dus rab tu dbye ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa gnas ngan len spangs pas rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan  du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column35: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271454#271458#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7226# bcom ldan 'das de  bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gang lags pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang lags pa de nyid la bye brag tu bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol pa dang   lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column36: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388445#2388445#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column37: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222897#222897#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column38: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226465#226465#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column39: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237162#237162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2961# phan yon gyi don ni gang dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don rab tu phye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan to / /
column40: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239246#239246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column41: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244131#244132#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3861# bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa dang  skyon dang yon tan rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column42: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272671#272671#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7386;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7387# 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / / +'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /

column3: kun du rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa dang des kun brtags pa'i phyir ro // / +zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bdag dang gzugs la sogs pa kun brtags pa'i rten yin pa dang  kun du rtog pa zhes bya ba yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag dang gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos por kun du rtog ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245247#245260#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4001;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4002;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4003# 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / / +'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // / +'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sngar nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes gang gsungs pa dang  theg pa chen po'i mdo dag  las ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245261#245271#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4003;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4004# byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa zhes gang gsungs pa de dag ni theg pa gcig go zhes dam pa'i chos padma dkar po'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste / /

column3: dgongs pa des kun brtags pa zhes nye bar 'dogs par mdzad do // / +rnam grangs kyis ni de nyid yongs su grub pa'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar snang ba gtan du med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216405#216409#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_294# 'di ltar sa bcu gcig po de dag rnam pa du dag gis rnam par gzhag pa     // / +zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231591#231593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2242;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2243# nor dang  zas dang  skom tsam gyis phan btags pas  bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column22: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226438#226439#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /

column31: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226477#226479#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: kun nas nyon  mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i ngo bo nyid yongs su ma grub pa gzhan gyi dbang zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar rnam par brtag par bya ba'i tshe ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506496#506496#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7490# rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa sha stag yin pas don dam pa'i  bden pa shin tu phra ba shin tu zab pa 'du byed rnams dang gcig pa tha dad pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du mi chud do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar ston to // /

column5: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220031#220031#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_768# rigs kyi bu rkyen rnam pa bzhi'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te // / +'di yang RNAM PA GSUM DU DBYE ste / /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225918#225918#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1535;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1536# rigs kyi bu phyi ma phyi ma'i rab tu 'dren pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // / +'di yang RNAM PA GSUM DU DBYE ste / /

column3: tha dad pa ma yin pa yang ma yin te / / +bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba la sogs pa la ltos pa gang gis gzhan gyi dbang yin pa de nyid kyis gnyis po dag ni ma yin no / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245337#245350#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4009;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4011# dgongs pa yang dag par bshad pa dang   rmongs pa dag gi nor pa 'dzin par bstan pa dang  dgongs pa bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column5: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214244#214245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_27;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_28# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni mdo 'di dag rgya cher ston par 'dir ni de dang sbyar nas mdo 'di nyid las  gsungs pa'i tshig de dag bshad par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222910#222910#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1167# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column7: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223707#223707#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1270# 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column8: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224791#224793#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1415# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226478#226478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1609;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1610# 'di ni dang  po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column10: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228596#228596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1871# 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen  gang gi phyir dang  don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231632#231634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2247# 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag  la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column12: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237178#237178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2963# 'di ni dang po dang  rgyu dang     'bras bu dang  phan yon gyi don zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column13: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225901#225901#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1534# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems  dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column14: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236168#236168#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2849;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2850# zhu ba 'di gsol BA YIN NO // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column15: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216407#216408#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_293;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_294# zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column16: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235784#235785#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2798;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2799# 'di ltar mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag re re la yang  mos rnam pa du mchis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column17: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245280#245284#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4004;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4005;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4006# de dag gi dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs  dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column18: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241854#241854#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3570;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3571# skyon rnam pa du zhig spangs pas  nyon mongs pa rnams spong zhes 'byung ba yang mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa dang don mthun no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column19: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219506#219506#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_699;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_700# de don gang la dgongs pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa / /
column20: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224732#224732#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1407# brtags na khong du chud par 'gyur bas zhib tu ma  bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column21: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244719#244719#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3938;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3939# lam gyi  grangs su gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams dpag tu med pa skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bshad do // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column22: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397223#2397223#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10229# sa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to / /
column23: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397243#2397243#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10230# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'  rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa du zhig mchis zhes bya ba man chad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column24: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397267#2397267#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10231# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag la nyon mongs pa'i bag la  nyal du mchis lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sgrib pa bstan pa dang  byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column25: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219871#219872#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_744# mdo 'di las ni dang po las kyi  stobs ma gtogs pa skye ba gzhan rnams las brtsams nas bstan PA YIN NO // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column26: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220199#220199#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_787# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang  smon lam gya nom pa dang  smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras  gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column27: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226439#226439#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1605;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1606# phyi ma phyi ma ni PHRA BA YIN PA DANG  bsgom par sla ba dang  dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol  to // /
column28: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237243#237243#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2970;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2971# rgyu dang rkyen des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub par 'gyur bas so // / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column29: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244097#244097#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3855;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3856# bskal pa dpag tu med pas 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs  so ; / / +byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: kun du rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan dang  des kun brtags pa nyid la / / +ltos pa gang gis kun brtags pa yin pa de nyid kyis gnyis po dag ni ma yin no // /
