column3: gdul ba rnams kyi rigs tha dad  pa'i phyir ci rigs su theg pa la 'dul ba la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249032#249041#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4438;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4439;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4440# bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i mnga' ba zhes bya ba smos so // / +gdul ba de dag nyid la skal pa yod pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249042#249051#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4440# byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho    brang na bzhugs shing rtag par lta ba mthu bo che rnams mchod par byed pa rab tu ston pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las dga' ldan gyi lha ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi nang na mchog yin te / /

column3: skal pa med pa la mkhas pa'i dbang du byas nas / / +chos la nem nur mi mnga' ba'i  mkhyen pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249052#249062#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4440# byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho    brang na bzhugs shing rtag par lta ba mthu bo che rnams mchod par byed pa rab tu ston pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las dga' ldan gyi lha ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi nang na mchog yin te / /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343118#2343118#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3752# spros pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi  mtshan ma mi len pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du bstan pa yin no // /

column3: yang dag pa dang  log pa dang  de gnyi ga sgrub pa dag ldan pa'i gdul ba de dag la dga' ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ba'i dbang du byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249063#249075#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4440;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4441# byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho    brang na bzhugs shing rtag par lta ba mthu bo che rnams mchod par byed pa rab tu ston pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las dga' ldan gyi lha ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi nang na mchog yin te / /

column3: rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba zhes bya ba smos so // / +ma  nges pa'i rigs kyi nyan thos dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnams drang ba dang  yang dag pa gzung ba'i phyir dang  theg pa chen po yang dag par bsngags pa'i dbang du byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249076#249084#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4441# lha 'og ma  dag ni bag med pa dang ldan pa yin lha gong ma dag ni mi gsal zhing rmongs rtul ba yin pas sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni gong ma dang 'og ma'i lus thob par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249085#249093#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4442# lha 'og ma  dag ni bag med pa dang ldan pa yin lha gong ma dag ni mi gsal zhing rmongs rtul ba yin pas sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni gong ma dang 'og ma'i lus thob par 'gyur ro // /

column3: ye shes byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249094#249102#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4443# sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas ni dga' ldan gyi lus thob par 'gyur bas / /

column3: thams cad mkhyen pa yin nam ma yin zhes ston pa la 'dul ba rnams the tsom za ba'i skabs kyi dbang du byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249101#249110#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4444# de'i phyir mchog ces bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270690#270690#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7129# gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224163#224163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1329# bla na med pa mi skye ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250699#250699#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4609# tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis spyod par nus so zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341448#2341448#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3545;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3546# des ni sems can yongs su bzla bar mdzad // / +ces gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380257#2380258#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8291;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8292# sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du rab tu dbye bar bya'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273888#273889#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7525;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7526# de'i phyir mdo 'di nyid las 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba zhes gsungs pa yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel  pa las ; /
column11: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379456#2379456#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8194# zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang / /

column3: sangs rgyas kyis gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba smos te / / +sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa zhes gsungs  pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249111#249122#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4445;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4447# byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kho na nas skye zhing / /

column3: thams cad gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ba spangs pa'i phyir / / +de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa'i rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249123#249137#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4447# smras pa / / +sangs rgyas ni  rtag par dbu ma'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir dga' ldan gyi lha ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris drug dang  tshangs pa'i gnas gong ma gsum dang  'og ma gsum gyi bar na gnas te / /

column3: gal te gcig pa yang ma yin / / +tha dad pa yang ma yin na mtshan nyid ci 'dra zhe na / / +mtha' dang dbus  med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249136#249150#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4447;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4448# sangs rgyas ni  rtag par dbu ma'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir dga' ldan gyi lha ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris drug dang  tshangs pa'i gnas gong ma gsum dang  'og ma gsum gyi bar na gnas te / /

column3: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa thams cad mtha' yin na de'i mtshan nyid med pa spangs pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa zhes bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249151#249163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4448# lha de las babs la gdon mi za bar yul gyi dbus su skye ba dang  nam gyi gung thun la  lhums su zhugs pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la rab tu 'byung ba dang  dbu ma'i lam la spyad de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyes nas kyang dbu ma'i lam gyi chos ston pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang  chos dbu ma legs par rtogs  par 'gyur ba'i phyir lha'i gnas bar mar skye ba yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / /

column3: chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid yongs     // / +su dag pa ste / / +spros pa dang bral pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249164#249172#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4448# lha de las babs la gdon mi za bar yul gyi dbus su skye ba dang  nam gyi gung thun la  lhums su zhugs pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la rab tu 'byung ba dang  dbu ma'i lam la spyad de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyes nas kyang dbu ma'i lam gyi chos ston pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang  chos dbu ma legs par rtogs  par 'gyur ba'i phyir lha'i gnas bar mar skye ba yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / /

column3: de lta yin na dus ji srid cig tu sems can gyi don mdzad ce na / / +nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa zhes bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249171#249182#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4448# lha de las babs la gdon mi za bar yul gyi dbus su skye ba dang  nam gyi gung thun la  lhums su zhugs pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la rab tu 'byung ba dang  dbu ma'i lam la spyad de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyes nas kyang dbu ma'i lam gyi chos ston pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang  chos dbu ma legs par rtogs  par 'gyur ba'i phyir lha'i gnas bar mar skye ba yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251528#251528#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4686;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4687# dbu ma'i chos dam pa la gnas pas na / / +nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o zhes zer te zhes 'byung ba lta bu yin  no ; / /

column3: don sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag ni / / +las bcu drug gis rab tu  dbye bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249183#249194#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4448;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4449;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4450# lha de las babs la gdon mi za bar yul gyi dbus su skye ba dang  nam gyi gung thun la  lhums su zhugs pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la rab tu 'byung ba dang  dbu ma'i lam la spyad de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyes nas kyang dbu ma'i lam gyi chos ston pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang  chos dbu ma legs par rtogs  par 'gyur ba'i phyir lha'i gnas bar mar skye ba yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518534#518534#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919# rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa  las / /

column3: las nyid ni bya ba yin pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba la phan pa ni phyi ma la bde ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249193#249205#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4449;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4451;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4452# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las / /

column3: dper na 'dod chags kyi shas che ba tshangs bar spyod pa lta bu'o // / +bde ba ni da ltar gyi dga' ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249206#249216#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4453;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4454# gzugs med pa'i khams  su ni gzugs med pas chos bstan du med pa'i phyir der mi skye'o // /

column3: dper na 'dod pa can rnams kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i yul la nye bar spyod pa lta bu'o // / +phan pa dang bde ba ni da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa na dga' ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249217#249227#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4454;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4455;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4456# der chos bshad du yang bsam gtan la mngon par zhen pas der mi skye'o // /

column3: dper na 'dod chags chung ngu'i tshangs par spyod pa de nyid lta bu'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa  na lus can rnams bde ba bla na med pa la brten par ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu snyam du dad pa dang 'dun pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsam pa shas che ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249228#249237#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4455;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4456;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4457# 'dod pa'i lha'i ris 'og ma gsum po dag ni nyon mongs pa stug cing     // / +sems rnam par gyeng ba dag yin la 'dod pa'i lha'i ris gong ma rnams kyang nyon mongs pa stug cing sems mnyen pa yin yang rno ba yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249238#249259#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4456;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4457;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4458;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4460;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4461# sems rnam par gyeng ba dag yin la 'dod pa'i lha'i ris gong ma rnams kyang nyon mongs pa stug cing sems mnyen pa yin yang rno ba yin te / / +dga' ldan gyi lha ni nyon mongs pa yang srab / /

column3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa zhes bya ba ni gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i las kyis ston te / /
mar me las mar  me stong du mched par byed pa bzhin du gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i las kyis phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bstan pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249260#249270#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4460;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4461;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4462;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4463# gzhan yang bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / / +ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas kho nar skye zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249270#249284#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4463# dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas chad kho nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang  'dzam bu gling  gi mi rnams sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i las yongs su smin pa'i dus kyi cha gcig gis gcig bsdus pas 'di ltar mi yul na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang stong phrag bcu na 'dul bar byed pa dang  'dul bar bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gdod yongs su smin par  'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i tshe'i tshad yin pas / /

column3: de bzhin du tshig 'og ma thams cad la yang phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bshad pa sbyar bar bya'o // /
la la ni phan pa dang bde  bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can yin yang phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba yod pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249285#249295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4463# dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas chad kho nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang  'dzam bu gling  gi mi rnams sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i las yongs su smin pa'i dus kyi cha gcig gis gcig bsdus pas 'di ltar mi yul na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang stong phrag bcu na 'dul bar byed pa dang  'dul bar bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gdod yongs su smin par  'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i tshe'i tshad yin pas / /
column5: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767854#1767858#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8647;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8648# de nyid mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad du brtsis na lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa drug dang  lo 'bum phrag bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa lnga dang  stong phrag bye ba phrag     // /
column6: 0.018#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1505165#1505165#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12227# de ltar dpag tshad stong phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag lnga dang bdun cu rtsa lnga dag gis bsnan na / /
column7: 0.025#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767502#1767502#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8590# de mi rnams kyi tshe tshad kyi grangs su brtsis na lo 'bum phrag bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang  lo stong phrag bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ste / /
column8: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767740#1767740#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8628# de mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad du brtsis na lo bye ba phrag drug cu dang  lo 'bum phrag bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gcig dang  lo stong phrag bye ba phrag bzhi bcu ste / /

column3: bdag ci ri zhes bya ba'i shes pas phyin ci log med pa'i las bstan te / / +bdag shes pa ni phyin ci ma log par sbyor ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249294#249307#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4463# dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas chad kho nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang  'dzam bu gling  gi mi rnams sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i las yongs su smin pa'i dus kyi cha gcig gis gcig bsdus pas 'di ltar mi yul na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang stong phrag bcu na 'dul bar byed pa dang  'dul bar bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gdod yongs su smin par  'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i tshe'i tshad yin pas / /

column3: ji skad du / / +bdag shes pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa med / / +bdag mi shes  pa'i dri ma mtshungs pa med / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249306#249317#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4463;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4464;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4465# dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas chad kho nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang  'dzam bu gling  gi mi rnams sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i las yongs su smin pa'i dus kyi cha gcig gis gcig bsdus pas 'di ltar mi yul na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang stong phrag bcu na 'dul bar byed pa dang  'dul bar bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gdod yongs su smin par  'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i tshe'i tshad yin pas / /

column3: lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di / / +cha 'di gnyis kyis brgyad cing gnod par 'gyur zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249318#249329#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4464;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4465# de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gnas de 'ba' zhig tu skye'o // / +gal te lha'i gnas 'og ma dag tu skye bar gyur na tshe'i tshad ni zad la dge ba'i rtsa ba da dung yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir der mi skye'o  zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: de skad du / / +bdag shes pa ni snying gi rtsa lag gyur pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249330#249339#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4465;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4466;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4467# gal te lha'i gnas 'og ma dag tu skye bar gyur na tshe'i tshad ni zad la dge ba'i rtsa ba da dung yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir der mi skye'o  zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526992#526992#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10105;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10106;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10107# mi dge ba yang rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yod par sems can dmyal ba dang  yi dags dang  dud 'gro'i 'gro ba yod do zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang de nyid las bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba lnga kho na'o zhes gsal bar gsungs pa med de / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371753#2371753#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7253;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7254;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7255# rnam par shes pa lnga dang  mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab dang  zag pa med pa'i bzod pa ma gtogs pa gzhan yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bzod pa rnams so zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang de nyid las  ci mthong ba rnams shes pa yin zhe na / /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2339132#2339132#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3292# dge sbyong gi 'bras bu mthun par thob pa'i  phyir ro zhes 'byung ste rgya cher de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // /

column3: nga rgyal bcom pa zhes bya ba ni / / +gzhan gyis byed du ma bcug par bdag nyid sbyor ba'i las kyis bshad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249340#249349#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4467;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4468# gzhan yang de nyid las ci'i phyir lha'i gnas de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi'i nang du gshegs she na / /

column3: gsol ba 'debs pa la mi sdod par chos ston par 'jug pa'i phyir ro // / +lhag pa'i bsam pa bstan pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'khrugs pa'i las kyis ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249350#249361#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4467;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4468;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4469;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4470# gzhan yang de nyid las ci'i phyir lha'i gnas de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi'i nang du gshegs she na / / +srid pa tha ma'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi za bar mngal nas skye ba 'dzin pa yin la / /

column3: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis sems  skyo bar byed mi nus pa'i phyir ro // / +bcos ma yin par byams pa dang  mdza' ba dang  mi mdza' ba la sems snyoms pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' bar du gtan du mdza' ba zhes bya ba gsum ni zang zing med pa'i las rnam pa gsum gyis 'chad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249360#249369#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4468;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4469;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4470# srid pa tha ma'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi za bar mngal nas skye ba 'dzin pa yin la / / +lha'i 'gro ba dag ni gcig tu rdzus te skye ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249369#249385#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4470;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4471;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4472# gzhan yang lha dang mi ni chos kyi snod yin pas gnyi ga bsdu ba'i phyir mi'i nang du gshegs pa yin te / /

column3: de la zang zing  dang ma 'brel pa zhes bya ba la / / +zang zing gi phyir byams pa de ni bcos pa ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249383#249394#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4471;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4472;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4473;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4474# gal te lha'i nang du skyes par gyur na mis der 'gro bar mi nus pas so // / +gzhan yang lha'i gnas su mngon par  rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mi'i nang du gshegs te / /

column3: rnyed pa yod kyi bar du byams pa'i phyir ro // / +zang zing med par byams pa ni bcos ma ma yin pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249392#249403#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4473;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4474;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4475# mi rnams gdul bar mdzad pa yang mi rung ste / / +de dag 'di snyam du sangs rgyas ni sprul pa yin no zhes chos yang dag par 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: dus thams cad du med par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +su gang zang zing la rag lus te mdza' ba ni  mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang ldan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249400#249414#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4474;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4475;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4476;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4477# de dag 'di snyam du sangs rgyas ni sprul pa yin no zhes chos yang dag par 'dzin PAR MI 'GYUR BA'I PHYIR RO // / +de nas byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams kyi nang nas mngon par rdzogs par    sangs rgyas pa yin no zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252600#252601#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4807;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4808# 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528587#528587#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10340# phan tshun ltos nas skye ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252311#252312#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4770;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4771;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4772# don rnam pa bdun gyis ston te / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526746#526746#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10070;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10071# mdo sde las ni 'gro ba ni lnga kho na'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321960#2321960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1304;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1305# 'di ltar chos thams cad bdag nyid med pa'i phyir ni stong pa nyid ni yang dag par yod pa'i chos ma yin pas mngon par  zhen par mi bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: sems snyoms par mi 'gyur ro // / +zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni gnyi ga la yang sems snyoms par 'jug go // / +zang zing gis byas pa'i mdza' ba la mthun par byed pa ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mthun par  byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249413#249428#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4476;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4477;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4478# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bskyur ba las / /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401889#2401889#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10817;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10818# rgyu dang rkyen des yan lag de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las / /

column7: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402428#2402428#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10892;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10893# rgyu dang rkyen des yan lag de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402669#2402669#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10922;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10923# yan lag bcu gcig pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383886#2383886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8710# lang gi tshe bsgyur ba theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column10: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386555#2386555#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column11: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387236#2387236#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397727#2397727#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10290# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni / /

column14: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222227#222227#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1055# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las mngon par grub par byed pa'i don gyi phyir / /

column16: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241246#241246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3510# lpags shun dang snying po la yod pa lta bu gsum po dag ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las sa'i mdun rol dang sa bcu po dag tu sa re re la yang 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba dag yod pa la brten nas lpags shun  dang  spri dang  snying po la yod pa lta bur rags pa dang  phra ba'i don gyi rnam pa gsum du dbye'o zhes bshad do // /
column17: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242616#242616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3654# de'i phyir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column3: gtan du ma yin no // / +byang chub sems dpa' ni zang zing med par byams pa ste / / +tshe rabs gzhan dag na yang rjes su mthun par byed pas mya ngan las 'das pa la thug gi bar du gtan du byams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249427#249439#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4478;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4479# 'phags pa sa bcu'i 'grel pa las bshad pa'i rnam grangs mang po 'byung ba ni mngas kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /

column3: tshigs ran pa dang 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis gsod por smra ba zhes bya ba  'di gnyis ni phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mthun pa'i ngag dang lus kyis las kyis bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249440#249448#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4479;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4480;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4481# de la mngal du 'jug PA ZHES BYA BA NI 'phags pa kun du khyab par gsal ba'i mdo las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249448#249458#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4480;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4481# bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa / / +de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas lha rnams la chos bshad zin nas lha'i bu rnams la kye nga ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis yum gyi  lhums su 'jug par rigs zhes dris pa dang  de dag las kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis so // /
column6: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2029073#2029074#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7396;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7397;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7398# yang gang nas spangs pa yongs su shes pa'i sgrar bstan ce na / / +mdo las te / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos rnams dang zhes bya ba nas yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2331837#2331837#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2484;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2485# de'i phyir de nyid las mdo las ji skad du / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / /
column8: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#164420#164420#TD4035E.TXT.r_6927;TD4035E.TXT.r_6928;TD4035E.TXT.r_6929# bcom  ldan 'das kyis kyang / / +phyin ci ma log pa'i mdo las / / +de la dge slong gis yid mi bde ba'i dbang po skyes pa la skyes so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs te / /
column9: 0.028#TD4017E.TXT.r#2693488#2693488#TD4017E.TXT.r_5247;TD4017E.TXT.r_5248# mdo las rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i sras po zhes pa nas rgyun  mi 'chad pa rab tu bsil to zhes pa'i bar du ni rol mos dgyes pa bskyed cing mchod pa'o // / +mdo las de na dge slong rnams la zhes pa nas mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes pa'i bar du ni 'bras bu brnyes pa bstan to // /

column3: snying rje chen po yongs su ma chad pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gnyis su med par mnyam pa nyid kyi las kyis bshad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249459#249467#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4481# de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas lha rnams la chos bshad zin nas lha'i bu rnams la kye nga ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis yum gyi  lhums su 'jug par rigs zhes dris pa dang  de dag las kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis so // /

column3: su dag sdug bsngal ba nyid dag la snying  rje 'jug gi / / +bde ba rnams la ni ma yin pa de'i las ni ma snyoms pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249468#249486#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4481;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4482;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4483;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4484# de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas lha rnams la chos bshad zin nas lha'i bu rnams la kye nga ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis yum gyi  lhums su 'jug par rigs zhes dris pa dang  de dag las kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis so // /

column3: gzhan du mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa bde ba yang ma yin pa yang rung / /
sems can du bsdus pa rnams 'du byed kyi sdug     // / +bsngal nyid dang ldan pas de dag la bye brag med par snying rje ba'i phyir las mnyam pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249487#249498#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4483;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4484;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4485# kha cig ni bya gser 'dab can gyi gzugs kyis so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // / +de nas tshangs pa'i mchog tu dar ba  zhes bya ba sngon drang srong gi lam nas 'ongs pa zhig gis lha rnams la smras pa / /

column3: khur blangs pa rnams la sgyid lug pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mi zhum pa'i las kyis brjod do // / +sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i bur la brtson par byas pa'i  rtsol ba yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ji ltar dam bcas pa sgrub pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249499#249509#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4484;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4486# de nas tshangs pa'i mchog tu dar ba  zhes bya ba sngon drang srong gi lam nas 'ongs pa zhig gis lha rnams la smras pa / / +bdag gis bram ze'i smrang brtags pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249509#249517#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4487# de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' yul gyi lhums su 'jug pa ni glang po che'i gzugs mchog go zhes bsngags te / /

column3: yid yongs su mi skyo ba zhes bya ba ni mi bzlog pa'i las kyi rnam par 'grel te / / +sems can log pa bsgrubs pas phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mthun pa'i las las bzlog  par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249518#249527#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4488;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4489# de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' yul gyi lhums su 'jug pa ni glang po che'i gzugs mchog go zhes bsngags te / / +glang po che de yang dkar zhing so  drug dang ldan pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249528#249537#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4488;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4489;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4490;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4491# mgo shin tu legs pa gzi byin dang ldan pa / / +gzugs khyad par du 'phags pa'o zhes bram ze'i smrang las byung ba ni de lta bu zhes gsungs te / /

column3: thos pa dang don gyis ngoms mi myong zhes bya ba ni / / +thabs yongs su 'dzin pa'i las kyis rnam par 'byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249538#249548#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4489;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4491;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4492;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4490;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4493# gzugs khyad par du 'phags pa'o zhes bram ze'i smrang las byung ba ni de lta bu zhes gsungs te / / +'jig rten srog chags gsum pa / / +ri bong dang rta dang glang po che yod de / /

column3: mnyan pa yin pas thos pa ste / / +mdo la sogs pa'i chos rnams yin gyi mnyan par bya ba gang ci yang rung ba ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249547#249556#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4493;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4494# de la ri bong chu long las bsgral  ba ni bdag gcig pu thar par zad do // /

column3: don ni de dag nyid kyis  brjod par bya ba'o // / +thos pa dang  don gnyis la ngoms mi myong ba ni chog mi shes pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249557#249565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4494;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4495# rta ni dpa' ba'i shugs dang ldan chu'i gting zab bam mi zab dpag par mi nus so // /

column3: de ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs yongs su 'dzin pa'i las te / / +thos pa dang don gyis mi ngoms pa ni skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshig dang yi ge 'brel pa rnams kyis chos ston pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249566#249580#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4494;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4495;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4496;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4497;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4498# rta ni dpa' ba'i shugs dang ldan chu'i gting zab bam mi zab dpag par mi nus so // / +glang po che ni gting zab tu rtogs pa'i phyir / /

column3: tshig gnyis kyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs las 'dun pa bzlog pa'i las zhes bya ba ni / / +bdag gi 'khrul pa rnams la nyes par lta ba dang  gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams la mi gshe bar bsgo ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249581#249597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4497;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4498# 'khor ba las yang dag par 'das kyang chos kyi rtse  ba nyid mi rtogs so // / +byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po ni dper na glang po che dang 'dra bas khams gsum na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis bsgrags nas 'byung ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rtogs par byed pas gang la yang mi skyob pa'am / /

column3: de la mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni 'dod chags sogs pa'o // / +de las 'dun pa bzlog pa ni phyir bzlog pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249598#249605#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4498;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4499;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4500;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4501# byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po ni dper na glang po che dang 'dra bas khams gsum na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis bsgrags nas 'byung ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rtogs par byed pas gang la yang mi skyob pa'am / /

column3: bdag gi 'khrul pa'i skyon yang dag par mthong na de las ldog go // / +legs pa bsdams pas kyang tshig gzung bar 'os pas gzhan dag bya ba ma yin pa las bzlog par nus kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249606#249620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4500;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4501;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4502;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4503;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4504# med pas so ;; / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos rnying 'gyur las // /

column3: ji skad du / / +gnas ma yin zhing go skabs  med de / / +gang bdag log par zhugs pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249621#249635#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4503;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4504;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4505;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4506;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4507# rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i dper bstan pa'o // / +yan lag bdun ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi dper bstan pa yin no zhes  bshad do ;; /

column3: 'jig rten na yang // / +rang gi nyes la nyes shes na // / +dus zhig na ni 'bral bar 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249636#249644#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4506;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4507;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4508# byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i gzugs su ston pa ni / / +don rnam pa gsum gyis te / /

column3: de la yon tan 'dzin pa yi // / +nga rgyal can la 'bral mi 'gyur // / +zhes brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249645#249659#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4508;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4510# lus che ba dang  so drug dang ldan pa dang  rkang pa bzhi'i nang nas mchog tu gyur pas so // /

column3: su zhig ltung    ba 'byung ba la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin gyi / / +khros te gleng na de'i tshig de yang gzung bar 'os pa ma yin pas je mi mthun zhing log par sgrub par 'gyur gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249660#249671#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4510;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4511;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4512# lha'i ris na yod pa'i glang po che'i lus kyi tshad dpag tshad dgu yod do // /

column3: bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar byams pa skyes pa ni lhung ba yang gleng bar byed la / / +phyin cad mi bya ba'i sdom pa yang 'dzin tu 'jug  go ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249672#249685#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4511;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4512;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4513# 'dir che ba zhes bya ba ni lha'i ris na yod pa'i glang po che la bya ste / / +'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams che bar bstan to // /

column3: spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba ni / / +rgyun mi 'chad par de yid la byed pa'i las kyis de shes par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249684#249695#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4513;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4514# de la rkang pa bzhis  ni spyod pa bzhi po ye shes dang  bden pa dang  'gog pa dang  rab tu bden pa bstan to // /

column3: de zhes bya ba ni phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang sbyar ro // / +byed pa thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba'i  phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249696#249706#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4514;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4515;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4516;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4517# so drug gis ni bla na med pa drug po rnyed pa dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bslab pa dang  rjes su dran pa dang  rim gro dag bstan pa'o // /

column3: spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo las ji skad du / / +'dug pa na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249707#249716#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4516;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4517;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4518# ci'i phyir seng ge'i gzugs su mi ston ce na / / +seng ge ni gcig tu grogs med pas 'khor rjes su 'brang ba med pa yin la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249717#249726#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4518;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4519;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4520# byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi za bar 'khor bzhi po dag rjes su 'brang bas so zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo dang 'bras bu  ston pa'i mdo las kyang / /

column3: tshig bdun gyis khyad par du 'gro ba'i las zhes bya ba ni / / +rnam par smin pa  la mi re ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249727#249745#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4519;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4520;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4521;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4522# 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo dang 'bras bu  ston pa'i mdo las kyang / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni glang po che dkar po la bcibs pa lta bur dmigs nas yum gyi lhums su 'jug go zhes bshad do // /

column3: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis zin pa'i thabs zhes bya ba'i bar ro // / +gong nas gong du rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa'i gnas skabs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ji skad smos pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus par bsal ba rnams dang  bsdu ba'i  dngos po rnams ni khyad zhugs par khyad par du 'gro ba 'phel ba 'thob pa'i rgyu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249745#249762#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4522;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4523;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4524# 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo'i nang nas lhums su gnas  pa'i le'u las / /

column3: las ni bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // / +pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi ni tshig de nyid kyis bshad zin to / / +gang la khyad par yod pa de bshad par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249763#249773#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4524;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4525# chu mnyam par dpag tshad sum brgya yod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa / /

column3: de na sems can gyi don bya ba mi mthong ba'i phyir byang chub sems  dpa' ni gzugs med pa'i khams su mi skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249774#249781#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4525;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4526;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4527# 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris drug yod pa dag gis mthong bar mi nus    pa'o ; / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba / /

column3: de na byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gang yin pa ni / / +gzugs med pa'i khams rnam pa bsal ba ste / / +spangs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249782#249798#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4526;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4527;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4528# bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba / / +byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lhums su 'jug pa na sngar yum gyi lhums kyi gyas phyogs su gzhal med khang rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkod pa de lta bu yod par 'gyur la / /

column3: thams la mkhas pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa'i shes rab ste / / +des sems can gyi don  byed pa'i phyir ro // /
de med na sems can gyi don med par 'gyur te / / +sangs rgyas nyid ni sems can gyi don no // / +ji skad du khyod ni shes rab thugs rje zung 'brel bas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249799#249811#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4527;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4528# byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lhums su 'jug pa na sngar yum gyi lhums kyi gyas phyogs su gzhal med khang rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkod pa de lta bu YOD PAR 'GYUR LA / / +de'i 'og tu gdod byang chub  sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs nas gzhal med khang der skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go // /

column3: zin nas gzhan la phan pa mdzad par gyur // / +gzhan gyi don du yang dag spyod pa ni // / +byang chub bgrod pa     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249812#249821#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4528;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4529# de'i 'og tu gdod byang chub  sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs nas gzhal med khang der skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go // /

column3: gcig pu'i lam lags so // / +zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni sbyin pa dang  snyan par smra ba dang  don spyod pa dang  don mthun pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249820#249831#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4528;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4529# de'i 'og tu gdod byang chub  sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs nas gzhal med khang der skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go // / +'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang  gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi dang  gnod sbyin gyi sde  dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu nang par byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing / /

column3: sbyin pa ni phan 'dogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa la 'jug pa'o // / +snyan par smra ba ni bye brag tu rtogs pa'i  phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249825#249839#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4529# 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang  gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi dang  gnod sbyin gyi sde  dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu nang par byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing / /

column3: chos ston pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // / +don spyod pa ni dge ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir te / / +yang dag pa len du 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249840#249851#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4530;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4531# 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang  gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi dang  gnod sbyin gyi sde  dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu nang par byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing / /

column3: don mthun pa ni mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir te / / +yon tan mtshungs pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na sbyin pas  ni chos kyi snod du byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249852#249863#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4530;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4531# chos yang dag par nyan par byed do // / +brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang su sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dag dang rtag par nyi ma gung la byang chub sems dpa' la mchod par byed  cing ; /
column5: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1720208#1720209#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3021# de nas dge slong de rgyas par ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang  de bzhin du 'thab bral dang lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang   'phrul dga' dang  lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang  dbang sgyur gyi lha'i bu dang  tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi nang du phyin te / /
column6: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1293689#1293690#TD4086E.TXT.r_1686# ji ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de bzhin du / /
column7: 0.028#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1893581#1893581#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1224# de nas lha'i dbang po  brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la bos te / /

column3: snyan par smra bas ni chos la mos par byed do // / +don spyod pas ni chos la mos pa sgrub par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249864#249872#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4531;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4532# brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang su sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dag dang rtag par nyi ma gung la byang chub sems dpa' la mchod par byed  cing ; / +tshangs pa chen po lha'i rgyal po la yang tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang rtag par nyi ma gung la byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing / /

column3: don mthun pas ni zhugs pa sbyor bar byed de / / +yang dang yang du bkra bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249873#249880#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4532;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4533;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4534# tshangs pa chen po lha'i rgyal po la yang tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang rtag par nyi ma gung la byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing / /

column3: de dag nyid thabs te / / +ngo bo nyid kyis bsdud sdud pa'i phyir ro // / +tshig drug  gis grub par sbyor ba'i las zhes bya ba la grub par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba ni grub par sbyor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249881#249890#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4533;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4534;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4535# chos yang dag par nyan par byed do // / +phyogs bcu thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa mchod pa byed cing  chos nyan pa'i phyir der 'ongs te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249891#249898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4534;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4535# phyogs bcu thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa mchod pa byed cing  chos nyan pa'i phyir der 'ongs te / / +de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri tshad med pa sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas de'i steng du 'dug ste / /

column3: gang gis grub pa de ni las so // / +skyes bu dam pa la brten pa dang zhes bya ba nas / / +grogs kyi yon tan zhes bya ba de dag ni mdo'i tshig brgyad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249899#249912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4535;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4536# de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri tshad med pa sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas de'i steng du 'dug ste / /

column3: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang  tshul khrims  'chal pa rnams la gnyis su med pa'i byams pa zhes bya ba nas / / +dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bshad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249913#249925#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4536;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4537;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4538# phan tshun dris lan dag gis theg pa chen po bstan par byed cing dri bar byed kyang / / +btsun mo sgyu mas mthong bar mi nus  so ;; /
column5: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#622568#622568#TD4069E.TXT.r_86# ngag gi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir rang gis don go bar byed mi nus kyi brgyud pas go bar byed DO ZHES BYA BA NI bstan pa'i chos gang dag gi don de go bar byed pa de dag kun du slong bar byed do // /

column3: yid la byed pa'i yon tan dang grogs kyi yon tan gnyis tshig gnyis gnyis kyis bshad pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249926#249935#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4538;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4539# kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu lhums su gnas pa na yang lha dang mi sa ya sum cu rtsa drug theg pa chen po la dgod par byed do zhes gsungs so // /

column3: 'di dag la tshul khrims yod pa'i phyir  tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o // / +tshul khrims sdig pa can ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249936#249945#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4538;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4539;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4540# kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu lhums su gnas pa na yang lha dang mi sa ya sum cu rtsa drug theg pa chen po la dgod par byed do zhes gsungs so // / +de la btsas pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo las / /

column3: de dag las chos nyan pa na chos la gus pa'i phyir de gnyi ga la yang bshes gnyen bzang por 'du shes nas de dag la brten to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249946#249958#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4540# bltams pa bstan pa'i le'u  las de'i tshe btsun mo'i sgyu ma byang chub sems dpa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' ring por mi thogs par bltams par rig nas lum pa'i tshal du zhugs te / /

column3: tshul khrims 'chal pa la skyes bu tha shal zhes brnyas par mi byed de / / +ji skad du // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249959#249966#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4540;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4541# bltams pa bstan pa'i le'u  las de'i tshe btsun mo'i sgyu ma byang chub sems dpa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' ring por mi thogs par bltams par rig nas lum pa'i tshal du zhugs te / / +shing rnams kun tu bltas nas rin po che'i shing bla ksha'i drung du phyin pa dang  shing la gyen du bltas lag pa gyas     // /

column3: mkhas pa tshul khrims ngan yang mi dman zhing // / +phan par smra la gsal bar smra ba la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249967#249975#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4541;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4542# shing rnams kun tu bltas nas rin po che'i shing bla ksha'i drung du phyin pa dang  shing la gyen du bltas lag pa gyas     // /

column3: bla ma ci 'dra de bzhin gus par byed // / +de yis legs par smra la byams de 'dra // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249976#249984#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4541;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4542;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4543# shing rnams kun tu bltas nas rin po che'i shing bla ksha'i drung du phyin pa dang  shing la gyen du bltas lag pa gyas     // / +shar phyogs kyi yal ga la 'jus te / /

column3: zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +gus par byas te chos nyan zhes bya ba ni ji skad du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249985#249992#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4543# lus btsir nas glal ba tsam gyis sku drang por 'greng ba bzhin du yum gyi mchan khung gyas phyogs nas bde bar bltams so // /

column3: don rnam pa bcu    drug gis chos mnyan par bya'o // / +zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +gnas nas rgyang grags gcig phan chad ni dgon pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249993#250006#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4543;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4544# lus btsir nas glal ba tsam gyis sku drang por 'greng ba bzhin du yum gyi mchan khung gyas phyogs nas bde bar bltams so // /

column3: gus par byas te zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa'o // / +rnam par rtog pa bzang po ma yin pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250005#250017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4544;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4545# de'i tshe su la yang mi rten par shar phyogs su gom pa bdun por ba las gom pa bor pa'i  rjes re re la padma re re skyes te / /

column3: gar byed pa dang  gar  byed du 'jug pa dang  glu len pa la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs la mi dga' bas de dag yongs su spong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250016#250030#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4545;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4546# de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su gom pa bdun bdun bor ba las padma bdun bdun skyes so // /

column3: yid la byed pa'i yon tan ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa 'dor ba dang  theg pa chen po'i yon tan 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250031#250041#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4546;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4547;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4548# 'di skad du nga ni 'jig rten na mchog tu btsun zhing mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa yin te / /

column3: grogs kyi yon  tan ni sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang  dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'o // / +gsum gyis grub pa las zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i rtags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250042#250055#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4548;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4549;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4550# sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags par gyur to zhes gsungs so // /

column3: las kyi sgra ni 'dir rtags kyi rnam grangs su gtogs pa ste / / +tshad med pa dang  mthu dang  rtogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis  de dag bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250056#250068#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4550;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4551# brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang  lha'i rgyal po yang de ma thag tu 'ongs nas spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chus  chub sems dpa'i sku bsil to // /

column3: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang  snying rje dang  dga' ba dang  btang snyoms ni tshangs pa'i gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250067#250077#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4550;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4551# brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang  lha'i rgyal po yang de ma thag tu 'ongs nas spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chus  chub sems dpa'i sku bsil to // / +klu'i rgyal po dgus steng nas spos kyi chu phab nas 'phags pa'i sku bsil to zhes gsungs so / /

column3: de dag ni grub pa na rnam par dag pa bag la zha ba bzhin du shes par byed  pas rtags kyi sgra 'thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250078#250090#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4551;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4552;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4553;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4554# klu'i rgyal po dgus steng nas spos kyi chu phab nas 'phags pa'i sku bsil to zhes gsungs so / /

column3: mthu zhes bya ba ni mthu stobs te / / +mngon par shes pa lnga po dag gis rnam par rol pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul che ba nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250089#250098#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4553;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4554# bltams ma thag tu sa la ma reg par brgya byin lha'i dbang pos blangs so // /

column3: zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa ni mthu ma yin te / / +shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba rdzu 'phrul che ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250099#250107#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4554;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4555# klu'i rgyal po  dga' bo dang nye dga' bos chu'i rgyun phab nas sku bsil to // /

column3: yang  na byang chub sems dpa'i skabs yin pas de ma smos te / / +'di yang grub pa'i rtags so // / +rtogs pa ni mngon sum du byed pa dang  de mngon sum du byed pa'i dbang ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250106#250117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4555;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4556# lha'i rgyal po nor bu bzang gis rin po che'i gdugs thogs nas zham 'bring byas so // /

column3: ye shes la rton pa zhes bya bas ston te / / +so so rang gis rig pa bdag nyid kyis mngon sum pa'i ye shes so / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250118#250127#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4556;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4557;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4558# sa'i lha dag gis ni padma sprul nas zhabs nas bteg ste / / +phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun gshegs so zhes bshad do // /

column3: rton pa ni phug ste tshad mar bshad pa yin gyi / / +don tsam rnam par shes pa ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250128#250138#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4558;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4559;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4560# 'phags  pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las ni / / +ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun bdun du bor zhe na / /

column3: des zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +tshig bzhis des 'jog pa'i las zhes bya ba ni phan ba dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa des 'jog pa ni des 'jog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250134#250152#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4559;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4560;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4561;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4562# ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun bdun du bor zhe na / / +rin po che sna bdun rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gom pa bdun bdun bor ro // /

column3: de nyid las te / / +sgrub pa dang     // / +log par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams zhes bya ba nas rdzogs pa'i bar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250153#250163#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4563# byang chub kyi  yan lag bdun gyi mtshan nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gom pa bdun bor ro zhes bshad do // /

column3: 'di dag gi bshad pa ni / / +tshogs yongs su sdud pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nas bzung ste / / +tha mar thug gi bar te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250162#250172#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4563;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4564# de la cher skyes PA ZHES BYA BA NI 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo las yi ge bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /

column3: tshul khrims 'chal ba mi dge ba'i gnas las  bskyod de / / +dge ba la 'jog gi / / +phyug bar ni mi byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250169#250180#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4563;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4564# de la cher skyes pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo las yi ge bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /

column3: tshig gcig tu chad pa ni the tshom med par gyur pa'i gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa tshig gzung bar 'os pa yin pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250181#250189#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4564;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4565# lo bdun lon nas yi ge bslab pa'i rkan du phyin pa dang  slob dpon gyis    bdag nyid byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon du mi ldom pa mthong ngo // /

column3: the tshom can gyi tshig ni gzung bar 'os pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // / +bden pa gces su byed pa zhes bya  ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250190#250199#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4565# de nas rgyal bu yi ge rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi las yi ge zhig bdag la slob par byed ces smras pa dang  de'i tshe sngon slob dpon ma thos pa thos pas ngo mtshar cher skyes nas / /

column3: chos dang zang zing gi sdud pa zhes bya bas 'chad de bsgo ba dang  gang yang rung ba dang  gnyi ga las yang dag par bgo bsha' bya bar dam bcas nas chos dang zang zing gnyis kyis de bzhin du sgrub pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250200#250209#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4565;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4566# de nas rgyal bu yi ge rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi las yi ge zhig bdag la slob par byed ces smras pa dang  de'i tshe sngon slob dpon ma thos pa thos pas ngo mtshar cher skyes nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250210#250221#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4565;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4566;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4567# de nas rgyal bu yi ge rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi las yi ge zhig bdag la slob par byed ces smras pa dang  de'i tshe sngon slob dpon ma thos pa thos pas ngo mtshar cher skyes nas / / +rgyal bu la bshad par gsol  ba btab po zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang zhing las byed pa la rtog pa'i le'u las / /

column3: 'di yang las yin no // / +byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ni  des yongs su bzung bas sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250220#250232#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4566;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4567;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4568# rgyal bu la bshad par gsol  ba btab po zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang zhing las byed pa la rtog pa'i le'u las / / +byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis cher skyes nas dus gzhan zhig na 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing drung na skyil mo krung bcas te / /

column3: bsnyen bkur byed pa la sogs pa tshe 'di'i 'bras bu la chags par mi sems pa'i phyir dang  byang chub chen po thob par bya bar sems pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250231#250249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4567;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4569# byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis cher skyes nas dus gzhan zhig na 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing drung na skyil mo krung bcas te / / +bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa las shing gzhan  rnams kyi grib ma ni nyi ma'i rjes su 'phos so // /

column3: tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni brda sprad par zad do // / +de lta bu'i las dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas shes bya'i mtshan nyid ji ltar mngon par rtogs par byed pa de ltar brjod par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250249#250258#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4569;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4570# byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pa'i shing gi grib ma ni mi bskyod par gnas so zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang rtsal bstan pa'i le'u las / /

column3: mang du thos pas bsgos pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro // / +theg pa chen po'i chos dang don mang du thos pas  sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyud bsgos pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250259#250272#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4570;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4571;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4572# de'i tshe rgyal bu sh'akya lnga brgya dang  'phong dang yi ge dang grangs dang / /

column3: mang du ma thos pa la ni mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa sgra gcan zin gyis gsol pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250273#250283#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4572;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4574# thams cad rgyal bar gyur to zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las gsungs pa bzhin no // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du / / +gdams  su gsol / / +bka' stsal pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250284#250291#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4574;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4575# de la 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo nas rtsal bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad  du ; /

column3: sgra gcan zin khyod kyis phung po pa bzung ngam / / +des gsol pa // / +bcom ldan 'das ma bzung lags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250292#250302#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4574;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4575# de la 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo nas rtsal bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad  du ; / +de nas sh'akya rnams kyis rgyal po la rgyal bu ni cher skyes te mtshan mkhan dag gis gal te rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur na ni gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub par 'gyur ro // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa // / +sgra gcan zin de lta bas na phung po ba nyid je zung shig / / +kun chub par gyis shig ces bya ba la    sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250301#250314#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4575;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4576# de nas sh'akya rnams kyis rgyal po la rgyal bu ni cher skyes te mtshan mkhan dag gis gal te rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur na ni gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub par 'gyur ro // /

column3: kun gzhi rnam par shes pas bsdus pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings shin du rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang  de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250315#250325#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4576;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4577# gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas btsun mo  btsal to mngon par zhen par bgyis nas rgyu dang rkyen des rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol to // /

column3: de'i rang bzhin ma yin te // / +'gal ba'i phyir des bsdus pa ma yin no // / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ltar sa  bon yin pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar kun gzhi rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyu yin pa de bzhin du gnas 'di yang rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams kyi rgyu yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250326#250333#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4576;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4577# gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas btsun mo  btsal to mngon par zhen par bgyis nas rgyu dang rkyen des rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol to // / +de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya nyid na blon po la gan dbyig pa thogs PA ZHES BYA BA ZHIG gnas pa de la bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba mtshan gyis brgyan pa mchog tu byad bzhin bzang ba  zhig yod de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250334#250347#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4577# de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya nyid na blon po la gan dbyig pa thogs PA ZHES BYA BA ZHIG gnas pa de la bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba mtshan gyis brgyan pa mchog tu byad bzhin bzang ba  zhig yod de / /

column3: rgyu'i dngos po tsam du dpe dang bstun pa yin gyi / / +gzhan du ni ma yin no // / +chos ni mdo la sogs  pa'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250348#250357#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4577;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4578# de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya nyid na blon po la gan dbyig pa thogs pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de la bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba mtshan gyis brgyan pa mchog tu byad bzhin bzang ba  zhig yod de / / +de nas rgyal po'i yab kyis de rgyal bu'i btsun mor blangs te khab tu bzhes so // /

column3: don ni de dag nyid kyi brjod par bya ba bdag med pa la sogs pa'o // / +'di dag ni de'i rnam par 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can yin pas der snang ba 'byung ba'i tshul can no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250358#250372#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4578;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4579;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4580# de nas rgyal po'i yab kyis de rgyal bu'i btsun mor blangs te khab tu bzhes so // / +de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i chos dang mthun par btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang na bzhugs shing / /

column3: gzung ba'i dngos po'i gnas lta bu zhes bya ba ni de dang 'dra bar snang ba'i phyir ro // / +lta ba dang bcas pa zhes  bya ba ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250373#250385#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4579;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4580;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4581;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4582;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4583;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4584# de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i chos dang mthun par btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang na bzhugs shing / / +'dod pa la longs spyod par bstan te / /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2375642#2375644#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7735;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7736;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7737# phyis ni bzhir bsdus te bstan pa yin no zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las ni / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2315762#2315762#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_563;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_564# byang chub sems dpa' sh'a ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni gtan du mya ngan las    'das pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: yid kyi brjod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams so // / +yang na lta ba'i cha dang bcas pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por rnam par gzhag pa rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250386#250398#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4583;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4584;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4585;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4586# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i mdo las / /
column5: 0.008#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#480797#480798#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4015;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4016# rgya cher de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las / /
column6: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#504454#504455#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7238# rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  de kho na grub pa dang  lung gcig las 'phros pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i  sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig dang 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: ji skad sngar bshad pa bzhin no // / +'jug pa su zhe na / / +zhes bya ba ni 'jug par byed pa mngon par rtogs par byed pa po dpyod pas 'dri ba gleng slong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250397#250412#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4585;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4586;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4587# byang chub sems dpa' ni btsun mo drug khri dang lhan cig tu pho brang na bzhugs te / /

column3: sems kyi rgyud theg pa chen po chos mang du thos pas bsgos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +sangs rgyas 'byung ba tshad med pa mnyes par bya ba ni mngon du byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250413#250424#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4587;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4588# de la mngon bar 'byung BA ZHES BYA BA NI 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo las ji skad du / /

column3: 'dis de thob  pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba tshad med pa mngon du byed pa thob ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250425#250434#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4588# byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer gyi phyi rol du byung ste gshegs pa las grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor mi rgan po zhig dang phrad pa dang  lho phyogs  kyi sgor nad pa dang phrad pa dang  nub phyogs kyi sgor shi ba dang  byang phyogs kyi sgor dge sbyong rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang phrad nas rab tu byung ba'i phan yon gyi yon tan rgya cher bshad pa thos nas / /

column3: gcig tu mos pa can zhes bya ba ni gang theg pa chen po'i chos la mngon par yid ches te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250433#250443#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4588# byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer gyi phyi rol du byung ste gshegs pa las grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor mi rgan po zhig dang phrad pa dang  lho phyogs  kyi sgor nad pa dang phrad pa dang  nub phyogs kyi sgor shi ba dang  byang phyogs kyi sgor dge sbyong rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang phrad nas rab tu byung ba'i phan yon gyi yon tan rgya cher bshad pa thos nas / /

column3: bshes gnyen ngan pa gang gis kyang dbyer mi phyed pa'o // / +theg pa chen po mang du thos pa la sogs pa rnam  pa 'di gsum gyis / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250444#250456#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4588;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4589# byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer gyi phyi rol du byung ste gshegs pa las grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor mi rgan po zhig dang phrad pa dang  lho phyogs  kyi sgor nad pa dang phrad pa dang  nub phyogs kyi sgor shi ba dang  byang phyogs kyi sgor dge sbyong rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang phrad nas rab tu byung ba'i phan yon gyi yon tan rgya cher bshad pa thos nas / /

column3: dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par bsags pa'i phyir bsod rnams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250455#250465#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4588;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4589;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4590# byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer gyi phyi rol du byung ste gshegs pa las grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor mi rgan po zhig dang phrad pa dang  lho phyogs  kyi sgor nad pa dang phrad pa dang  nub phyogs kyi sgor shi ba dang  byang phyogs kyi sgor dge sbyong rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang phrad nas rab tu byung ba'i phan yon gyi yon tan rgya cher bshad pa thos nas / / +rab tu byung bar gsol ba las rgyal po yab kyis ma gnang ngo zhes gsungs  pa dang ; /

column3: gang du 'jug ce na zhes bya ba ni yul dmigs kyis dbye ba lhur len pas 'dri ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250466#250473#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4589;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4590;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4591# rab tu byung bar gsol ba las rgyal po yab kyis ma gnang ngo zhes gsungs  pa dang ; / +gzhan yang rab tu byung ba'i le'u las / /

column3: lta ba dang bcas pa'i chos zhes     // / +bya ba la sogs pa la / / +theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rgyu las de'i rnam par 'byung ba 'jug pa po'i yid kyi brjod pa ni 'jug par bya ba'i yul yin pas gzhi nyid du brjod par 'dod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250474#250482#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4591;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4592# de'i byang chub sems dpa' la lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung thun las myur du 'byung bar bskul bas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250483#250496#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4592# mos pa can la bcibs pa gtod ces bsgo ba dang  mos pa can gyis ched du pho brang gi nang mi rnams kyis thos par bya ba'i phyir skad  cher phyung ba las nam mkha'i lha rnams kyi mthus de dag thams cad gnyid log par gyur te gang gis kyang ma tshor ro // /

column3: yid kyi brjod pa de la 'jug pa kha cig ni / / +mos pas spyod pa'i sa la  'jug ste / / +thos pa tsam gyis chos thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam nyid du mos pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250497#250512#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4592;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4593# mos pa can la bcibs pa gtod ces bsgo ba dang  mos pa can gyis ched du pho brang gi nang mi rnams kyis thos par bya ba'i phyir skad  cher phyung ba las nam mkha'i lha rnams kyi mthus de dag thams cad gnyid log par gyur te gang gis kyang ma tshor ro // /

column3: kha cig ni mthong ba'i lam la 'jug ste / / +ji lta ba bzhin du yid kyi brjod pa rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250513#250520#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4593;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4594# mos pa can gyis bcibs pa gtad nas byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo // /

column3: de la ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa ni 'di yin te / / +'di ltar sems  can med pa dang  chos med pa dang  gzung ba med pa dang  'dzin pa med par rab tu rtogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250521#250536#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4594;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4595;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4596# der rta'i rgyal po la bcibs nas dang por 'byung ba'i tshe phyogs bcur sa chen po  rnam pa drug tu rab tu gyos so // /

column3: kha cig ni bsgom pa'i lam la 'jug ste / / +nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen po nyid du bsgoms pas de rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250535#250547#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4595;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4596# nam mkha' la gshegs pa'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhis ni rta'i rkang pa la bteg ste gshegs so // /

column3: kha cig ni  mthar phyin pa'i lam la 'jug ste / / +sgrib pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar na rab tu rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250546#250555#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4596# de nas byang chub sems dpa'i yul ni mi shes bya ba nas sngon gyi drang srong rnying ba rnams dka' thub spyad pa'i tshal yod par byon nas chibs pa las gshegs  te mos pa che la spro ba bskyed nas khyod kan da ka khrid la slar song shig ces bsgo ba dang  de nas mos pa can skad cher phyung ste dus so // /

column3: gang gis 'jug ce na zhes bya ba ni rgyu yongs su 'dri ba ste / / +thab gang gis 'jug ce na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250556#250566#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4596# de nas byang chub sems dpa'i yul ni mi shes bya ba nas sngon gyi drang srong rnying ba rnams dka' thub spyad pa'i tshal yod par byon nas chibs pa las gshegs  te mos pa che la spro ba bskyed nas khyod kan da ka khrid la slar song shig ces bsgo ba dang  de nas mos pa can skad cher phyung ste dus so // /

column3: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas  ni de ston to // / +dge ba'i rtsa pa'i stobs can du gyur du zin kyang sems zhum pa yang yod do snyam pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250564#250580#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4596;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4597# de nas byang chub sems dpa'i yul ni mi shes bya ba nas sngon gyi drang srong rnying ba rnams dka' thub spyad pa'i tshal yod par byon nas chibs pa las gshegs  te mos pa che la spro ba bskyed nas khyod kan da ka khrid la slar song shig ces bsgo ba dang  de nas mos pa can skad cher phyung ste dus so // /

column3: rnam pa gsum gyis sems sbyong ba zhes bya ba smos so // / +'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems sbyong ba dang po'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250581#250593#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4597;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4598# ka na da ka yang mgo smad lag pa gnyis bkug nas sa la btsugs te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la lces bldags nas skad phyung nas dus so // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni gsal  bar byed pa ste / / +bshad pa nyid kyis gsal bar byas zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250594#250601#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4598;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4599# byang    chub sems dpa' gal te skra dang kha spu ma bregs na ni rab tu byung ba'i chos ma yin no snyam nas / /

column3: bsam pa de bdag gis thob pa ste zhes bya ba ni bgegs med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250602#250610#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4598;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4599# byang    chub sems dpa' gal te skra dang kha spu ma bregs na ni rab tu byung ba'i chos ma yin no snyam nas / / +mos pa can las ral gyi rin po che ral gyi bzhes te nyid kyi dbu skra bregs so // /

column3: gang gi phyir de ser sna med pa dang  'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  gnod sems med pa dang  le lo med pa dang   gnyid dang rmugs pa med pa dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250609#250627#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4599;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4600;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4601# mos pa can las ral gyi rin po che ral gyi bzhes te nyid kyi dbu skra bregs so // /

column3: ma rig pa med pa de'i phyir / / +tshegs chung dus pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam pa ni sems sbyong ba gnyis pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250628#250636#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4601# rngon pa gos dur smrig gyon pa lta bur sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i  spyan sngar 'greng ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i na bza' bsnams nas de rnams kyi gos dur smrig de dang brjes so // /

column3: bsam pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob na sbyin pa la sogs pa rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir    ro ;; /

column3: dge ba sgrib pa dang bcas pa yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba ste / / +de dang ldan pa'o // / +de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma spangs pa'i phyir sgrib pa dang bcas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250641#250653#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4601;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4602;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4603# rngon pa gos dur smrig gyon pa lta bur sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i  spyan sngar 'greng ba dang  byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i na bza' bsnams nas de rnams kyi gos dur smrig de dang brjes so // / +de nas byang chub sems dpa' dbu skra bregs chos gos dur smrig mnabs nas 'di skad du / /

column3: bdag ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa sgrib pa med pa'i dge bas dge ba can yin nam / /

column3: sangs rgyas  nyid du phun sum tshogs par ci'i phyir mi 'gyur snyam pa ni sems sbyong ba rnam pa gsum pa ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222477#222478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1095# dge bsnyen gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i mdo'i nang nas bkod pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /

column6: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229483#229485#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1984# yongs su bsngo pa rgya cher bshad pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed ba'i mdo dang  sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo'i nang nas yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222683#222683#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1129;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1130# 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo'i nang nas / / +seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i le'u las ji skad du / /

column3: gang phyir sems can dpag med pa // / +mir 'gyur skad cig re re la / /

column3: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob gyur pa // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +zhum pa zhes bya ba ni sems gang ba'o // /

column3: de mi bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / / +bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so snyam du bdag la nus pa med  par bsam par mi bya ba ste / /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250708#250717#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4610# mu stegs can la sogs pa ni dka'  thub la mngon par yid ches shing mngon par zhen pas na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gi bar du dka' thub rnams spyad par ma gyur na gzhan dag mngon par yid ches par mi 'gyur te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250746#250756#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4612# gang yang lo drug gi bar du nyi ma gcig la til 'bru gcig tsam za zhing dka' thub spyod pa byed pas mu stegs can rnams 'di ni dka' thub spyod pa'i  mchog yin no snyam du sems pas / /

column11: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1831043#1831044#TD4039E.TXT.r_1989# des na 'du byed rnams la bdag gam bdag gir khas len pa  dang  rtsa ba de las byung ba de de ma yin pa'i phyi rol pa'i lta bar gyur ba rnams khas len pa'o // /
