column16: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2125714#2125714#TD4029E.TXT.r_741;TD4029E.TXT.r_742# gal te  gang zag dang  tshig 'bru dang  drang ba'i don gyi mdo dang  rnam par shes pa la rton par gyur na chud za ba'i rgyu yin no // / +bzlog na chud mi za ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas chud mi za ba'i rgyu zhes bya'o // /
column17: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1220686#1220686#TD4047E.TXT.r_14082# phan tshun mi mthun pa rnams la ni bdag nyid la tshig gzung bar 'os pa dang  sdums byed par nus par gyur nas 'khor rnams zhi bar byed pa'i tshad mar gyur par skye bar 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.028#TD4053E.TXT.r#2966313#2966313#TD4053E.TXT.r_239;TD4053E.TXT.r_240# bdag gzugs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas  bdag rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i bar du lhag ma bco lnga ni bdag gir lta ba'o // / +'brel bas bdag gir gyur ba ni 'di ltar de de dang 'brel bas de dang ldan par 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#58777#58777#TD4036E.TXT.r_8721;TD4036E.TXT.r_8722# kye ma 'du byed  'di dag ni mi rtag pa yin no snyam du sems te / / +de ltar nang gi dngos po'i spyod lam las gyur pa'i 'gyur ba'i mi rtag pa nyid yongs su tshol bar byed do // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de lta ma yin te / / +bla na med pa yang dag par  rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro // / +bsam pa de thob ces bya ba ni rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba'i bsam pa ji skad smos pa gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom pa de thob pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250778#250789#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4613;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4614;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4615# mngon par yid ches par gyur nas yang dag pa'i lam la 'jug par 'gyur bas rgyu dang rkyen nges na lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa yin no zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +de la dka' ba spyad pa btang nas mngon PAR RDZOGS PAR BYANG CHUB pa zhes bya ba ni /// /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250789#250798#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4615# 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad kyang dka' ba spyad pa des lam rtogs par mi 'gyur bar rig nas de dag spangs te / /

column3: brtan rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ste / / +gang gi phyir / / +sbyin     // / +pa la sogs pa nyid du brjod pa yin gyi de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni ma yin par nges par byas bas mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong bas bsgrim mi dgos par 'jug pa nyid bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250799#250808#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4615;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4616# 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad kyang dka' ba spyad pa des lam rtogs par mi 'gyur bar rig nas de dag spangs te / / +chu bo neeranydza nar sku bsil nas ba lang rdzi bo mo las 'o thug gsol te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250809#250826#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4616;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4617;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4618# chu bo neeranydza nar sku bsil nas ba lang rdzi bo mo las 'o thug gsol te / /

column3: sogs pa smos pa ni tshul khrims la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud par bya'o // / +dge ba dang ldan  pa shi ma thag ces bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dge bas dge ba can shi ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250827#250836#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4618;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4619# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa kun du gsal ba'i mdo las / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244247#244247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3876# gzhan yang 'phags pa bla na med pa'i  gnas bstan pa'i mdo las kun dga' bo sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu'i gnas skabs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ched du khams gsum dag tu 'jug kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la skye ba dang   rga ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal ni yang dag par yod pa ni ma yin no // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#456748#456749#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_900;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_901# zhes gsungs so // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las / /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#456767#456767#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_904# zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo las / /

column3: 'dod bzhin phun sum tshogs lus thob // / +ces bya ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du yang skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250835#250851#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4619# khyim bdag gis bu khye'u 'dod pa'i phyir 'o thug gis ri dang shing  gi lha dag la mchod pa byas pa las de bzhin du khye'u btsas par gyur nas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bstod bzhos nas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de blud / /

column3: spangs pa dge ldan zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa spangs pa'i dge bas dge ba dang ldan pa rnams zhes  bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250852#250862#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4619;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4620# khyim bdag gis bu khye'u 'dod pa'i phyir 'o thug gis ri dang shing  gi lha dag la mchod pa byas pa las de bzhin du khye'u btsas par gyur nas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bstod bzhos nas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de blud / / +de nas tha ma'i 'o ma ska ba las thug pa btsos pa las zangs kyi kha nas 'dom do lhag tsam du 'phags pa dang  bu  mo de yang ya mtshan du bzung ngo // /

column3: phun sum tshogs de zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas nyid do // / +gnas bzhi spong ba zhes gang smos pa'i spang bar bya ba de dag ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250861#250875#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4620;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4621# de nas tha ma'i 'o ma ska ba las thug pa btsos pa las zangs kyi kha nas 'dom do lhag tsam du 'phags pa dang  bu  mo de yang ya mtshan du bzung ngo // /

column3: yid la byed pa spangs pas zhes bya ba ni / / +nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yid la byed pa 'dor ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250876#250885#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4621;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4622# bram ze zhig der 'ongs nas bu mo de la 'o thug de ni so so skye bos btung bar bya ba ma yin gyi / /

column3: yid gnyis dang som nyi spangs  zhes bya ba ni / / +theg pa chen po'i zab pa nyid dang rgya che ba nyid la yid gnyis phyin ci log dang theg tsom med par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250884#250898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4621;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4622;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4623# bram ze zhig der 'ongs nas bu mo de la 'o thug de ni so so skye bos btung bar bya ba ma yin gyi / / +gang de nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba des 'o thug 'di nyu bar nus so zhes smras so // /

column3: chos la mngon par zhen pa spangs pas zhes bya ba ni / / +thos pa dang bsams pa'i chos la ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin par mngon par zhen pa spang bar bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250899#250913#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4623;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4624# bu mo des khyer nas drang srong byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba dang  des  gsol ma thag tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /

column3: mngon par rtogs pa'i bar du gcod pa'i phyir  ngas nyan to // / +ngas khong du chud do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250912#250921#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4623;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4624;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4625# bu mo des khyer nas drang srong byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba dang  des  gsol ma thag tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /
column5: 0.013#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#500932#500933#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6769;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6770# ces gsungs te rgya cher ni de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /

column3: nga'i thos pa'o // / +nga'i don to zhes mngon par zhen par mi bya'o // / +rnam par rtog pa spangs pas zhes bya ba ni gang mdun na bstsal mi dgos par rang gi ngang gis gzugs la sogs pa gnas pa dang  gang yang ting nge 'dzin 'dod pas bsgrims te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250920#250929#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4624;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4625;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4626# gzhan yang bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / / +ngas mu stegs can gyi dka' ba spyod ma nus pa'i spangs pa ma yin gyi / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250930#250942#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4626;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4627# dka' ba spyod pa de dag las brtags na mthar nyon mongs pa  rnams spangs nas yang dag pa'i phan yon thob par mi nus pa'i phyir / /

column3: rnam par byang ba ba'i keng rus  la sogs pa bzhag pa dmigs par gyur pa'i mtshan ma de thams cad yid la mi byed pas rnam par mi rtog par spong ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250940#250952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4626;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4627# dka' ba spyod pa de dag las brtags na mthar nyon mongs pa  rnams spangs nas yang dag pa'i phan yon thob par mi nus pa'i phyir / / +ngas spangs nas yang de kho na nyid kyi dbu ma'i spyod pa gya nom pa spyad pas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob nas sems can 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa las drangs pa yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas dang  byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan ma'i bar la / / +de ni 'di yin no zhes mngon par zhen nas rnam par rtog par mi byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250953#250966#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4627;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4628;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4629# ngas spangs nas yang de kho na nyid kyi dbu ma'i spyod pa gya nom pa spyad pas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob nas sems can 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa las drangs pa yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: tshigs  su bcad pa ni tshig de nyid kyis bshad zin to // / +gang gis ji ltar 'jug ce na // / +zhes bya ba ni byed pa dang 'di ltar bya ba 'dri ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338853#2338855#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3254;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3255# phan yon rnam pa  'di gnyis kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250965#250978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4628;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4629;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4630;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4631# de  la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba ni sngar gong du bstan pa las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252406#252406#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4783# de'i phyir bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526709#526709#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10065;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10066# de'i phyir bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / / +mdo sde las ji skad du 'gro ba lnga  zhes gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: 'di ltar 'jug par byed pa po las 'jug par byed pa na / / +byed pa po dang mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ltar bya ba gdon mi za bar dgos    par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250977#250986#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4629;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4630;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4631# de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / / +mdo las ji skad du / / +bcom ldan 'das grong khyer rtsva can gyad kyi    shing s'a la zung cig gi drung du mya ngan las 'das so zhes gsungs pa de la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250987#250995#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4631;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4632# bcom ldan 'das grong khyer rtsva can gyad kyi    shing s'a la zung cig gi drung du mya ngan las 'das so zhes gsungs pa de la / /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#463199#463200#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1806# bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe grong khyer rtsva can shing s'a la zung cig gi drung du dbu byang phyogs su bstan te gzims nas mya ngan las 'das par bzhugs so // /

column3: des na gnyi ga ston to // / +thos pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu las byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni byed pa ston to / /

column3: yongs su tshol ba bzhi dang  yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa bzhi zhes bya bas ni 'di ltar bya ba ston to // /

column3: sbyor ba'i dus na ni yongs su tshol ba ste / / +nges par rtog  pa'i rnam pa'i lta ba dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par 'jug pa'i yongs su rtog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251014#251026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4634;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4635# grong khyer rtsva can na gnas pa'i gyad rnams gdul bar bzhed pa'i phyir dang  gzhan yang mu stegs  can su bha dra bsdu zhing 'dul bar bzhed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dmigs pa med par nges pa'i ye shes ni 'bras bu'i rang bzhin te / / +yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'o // /

column3: de la ming ni gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tha tshig go // / +ming de yongs su tshol ba ni yid kyi  brjod pa tsam nyid du rtog pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251034#251049#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4635;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4636;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4637;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4638;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4639# kha cig na re gnas der bcom ldan 'das yang nas yang du sku lus btang ba'i phyir te / / +mdo las ji skad du / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: yid kyi brjod pa las gud na med pas brtags par yod pa'i phyir ro // /

column5: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1419751#1419751#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_2276;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_2277# rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag las gzhan zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag ni chos kyi khams mtshungs pa dang ldan pa'i ngo bo yin te / / +de gnyis 'dir bsdus par thal bar 'gyur bas yongs su spang     // /

column3: dngos po yongs su tshol ba ni ji ltar ming gi tshogs la sogs pas phung po dang khams la sogs par brjod pa de bzhin du yongs su grub pa med par rtog pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251060#251068#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4639;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4640;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4641# 'dir bdun pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su btang ba yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // / +gzhan yang de las bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la  bka' stsal pa / /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#495921#495922#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6165;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6166# zhib tu de nyid las 'byung ba bzhin no // / +gzhan yang de nyid las bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#456549#456550#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_873;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_874# bcom ldan 'das tha dad par gsungs so // / +zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // /

column3: rigs dang rigs can gyi 'brel pa tha dad na de  dang ldan pa'i brjod pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251069#251080#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4640;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4641# gzhan yang de las bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la  bka' stsal pa / / +khyed shing s'a la zung cig gi drung du song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir khri shoms la sngas byang phyogs su ston cig / /

column3: ming gi dngos po brjod par bya ba'i don gang yin pa ming la brten pa'i brjod par bya ba de la yang yid kyi brjod pa tsam du zad par rtog par byed de / /

column5: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3132068#3132068#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5509# byang chub tu yongs su 'gyur ba de yang gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa kho nar gyur nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i  dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o // /

column3: phyi rol gyi rnam par 'dzin pa las zlog cing / / +nang gi yan lag tu nye bar rtog par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251095#251105#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4642;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4643# de bzhin gshegs pa ni deng gi nam gyi gung thun la lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad  pa'i bar du'o // /

column3: gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya  ba'i tshig de yang yang na ni ngo bo nyid du brtags pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251104#251114#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4642;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4643;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4644# de bzhin gshegs pa ni deng gi nam gyi gung thun la lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad  pa'i bar du'o // / +bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir khri stan bting la sngas byang phyogs su ston cig ces bka' stsal zhe na / /

column3: lus dang tshor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / / +gang zag brtags pa ltar med bzhin du yang ngo bo nyid du 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251115#251126#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4643;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4644;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4645# bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir khri stan bting la sngas byang phyogs su ston cig ces bka' stsal zhe na / / +yul de'i smra ba'i slob dpon rnams chos de yin par bstan pa'i phyir te / /

column3: yang na ni khyad par du gdags pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251127#251134#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4645# 'di ltar yul de smra ba'i slob dpon sngas byang phyogs su bstan pa'i khri stan bshams  nas nyal bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyang de bzhin te / /

column3: mi  bzhin du khyad par 'dogs pa'i phyir ro // / +ming dang bcas pa'i don zhes bya ba ni ming dang brjod par bya ba dang bcas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251135#251145#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4645;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4646# 'di ltar yul de smra ba'i slob dpon sngas byang phyogs su bstan pa'i khri stan bshams  nas nyal bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyang de bzhin te / /

column3: ngo bo nyid dang khyad par du btags pa dang bcas shing zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid dang khyad par gyi sgra gnyis dang bcas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251146#251157#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4646;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4647# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa rnams gdul bar spyod pa'i phyir dang  bla na med pa'i ston pa mchog yin pa'i phyir 'dir bdag gi rjes su gdan shoms shig ces gsungs pa yin no zhe'o // /

column3: ngo bo nyid dang khyad par du bcas pa zhes bya ba ni don gnyis dang bcas pa ste / / +'di thams cad don gyi mtshan nyid du mi dmigs pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kun brtags pa'i don mi dmigs par nges par sems pa'i rnam pa yongs su tshol ba bzhi po thabs su gyur pa rnams kyi 'bras bu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa rnam pa bzhi nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251158#251165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4646;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4647# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa rnams gdul bar spyod pa'i phyir dang  bla na med pa'i ston pa mchog yin pa'i phyir 'dir bdag gi rjes su gdan shoms shig ces gsungs pa yin no zhe'o // / +kha cig na re 'jig  rten pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa la bkra shis kyi dngos po 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin par rab tu bstan par bzhed pa'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251166#251174#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4647;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4648# kha cig na re 'jig  rten pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa la bkra shis kyi dngos po 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin par rab tu bstan par bzhed pa'i phyir te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251175#251187#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4648;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4649# 'di ltar yul de na gang shi ba de dag khri'i steng du bzhag nas mgo byang du bstan nas nyal bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag ma yin pa la bkra     // /

column3: de dag mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni     // / +ming la sogs par mi dmigs par nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251185#251197#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4648;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4649;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4650# 'di ltar yul de na gang shi ba de dag khri'i steng du bzhag nas mgo byang du bstan nas nyal bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag ma yin pa la bkra     // / +shis kyi dngos por 'dzin pa zhig par mdzad pas de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das par sngas byang du shoms shig ces gsungs pa yin no zhes zer ro // /

column3: nges par rtog pa'i yongs su tshol ba'i 'bras bu ni mi dmigs pa ste / / +ming yongs su tshol ba'i 'bras bu ni ming mi dmigs pa'i shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251198#251207#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4649;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4650;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4651# shis kyi dngos por 'dzin pa zhig par mdzad pas de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das par sngas byang du shoms shig ces gsungs pa yin no zhes zer ro // / +kha cig na re bcom ldan 'das chos yang dag pa la shin tu bkur bar yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir te / /

column3: dngos po yongs su tshol ba'i 'bras bu ni  dngos po mi dmigs pa'i shes pa'o // / +de bzhin du ngo bo nyid dang khyad par du gdags pa la yang brjod par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251207#251218#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4650;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4651# kha cig na re bcom ldan 'das chos yang dag pa la shin tu bkur bar yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir te / / +'di  ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis snga nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgron ma byang phyogs su rab tu dar zhing yun ring du gnas par thugs su chud pa'i phyir dbu byang du bstan nas gzims pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // /

column3: gal te don med pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa tsam nyid la 'jug na / / +rnam par rig pa tsam nyid de la 'jug ces ji skad bya zhes bya bas spong bar byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251219#251226#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4651# 'di  ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis snga nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgron ma byang phyogs su rab tu dar zhing yun ring du gnas par thugs su chud pa'i phyir dbu byang du bstan nas gzims pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251227#251234#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4651;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4652# 'di  ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis snga nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgron ma byang phyogs su rab tu dar zhing yun ring du gnas par thugs su chud pa'i phyir dbu byang du bstan nas gzims pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // /

column3: de nyid 'di'i don yin par  bsams pa'o // / +de dgag pa'i phyir de tsam nyid ces bya ba smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251232#251249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4651;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4652;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4653;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4654# 'di  ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis snga nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgron ma byang phyogs su rab tu dar zhing yun ring du gnas par thugs su chud pa'i phyir dbu byang du bstan nas gzims pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // / +gzhan yang de nyid  las 'di skad du / /

column3: rnam par rig pa'i don gyis kyang don med pa nyid yin gyi / / +phyi rol 'ba' zhig gis ni ma yin no // / +gal te don med pa nyid yin na skye mched bcu gnyis la sogs pa bshad pa dang  'jig rten pa'i don gyi tha snyad kyi rjes su zhugs  pa ji lta bu zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251250#251263#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4654;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4655# rtsib logs gyas pa sa la phab nas zhabs gzhibs te dbu byang du bstan nas snang ba'i 'du shes dran pa dang yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang ldan par gzims so zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan dang lta ba dang bcas pa gnyis zhes bya ba 'di smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251264#251272#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4654;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4655;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4656;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4657# rtsib logs gyas pa sa la phab nas zhabs gzhibs te dbu byang du bstan nas snang ba'i 'du shes dran pa dang yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang ldan par gzims so zhes bya ba nas / / +rgya  cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // /

column3: don med bzhin du yang phyir rol gyi don du snang ba'i rnam par rig pa ni don mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi dbang gis 'grub la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251273#251286#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4656;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4657;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4658;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4659;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4660# ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das glo gyas pa phab ste gzims she na / / +smras pa / / +sangs rgyas rnams ri dags kyi rgyal po seng ge dang 'dra bar gzims par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir te / /

column3: rnam par rig pa snang ba yang lta ba zhes bya ba btags pas 'gal ba med do / / +ci rgyu mtshan dang lta bar snang ba'i rnam par rig pa 'di dag rigs gzhan du gyur ba nyid ces 'jug par byed dam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251287#251305#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4659;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4660;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4661;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4662# mdo las ji skad du / / +nyal ba ni rnam pa bzhi po 'di lta ste / /

column3: 'on te ma yin zhe na / / +de'i phyir sna tshogs kyi rnam pa nyid la 'jug ces bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251306#251313#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4662;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4663;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4664# de la seng ge'i nyal ba ni glo gyas pas nyal bar byed do // / +lha ni gan rkyal du nyal bar byed do // /

column3: rnam par shes pa gcig nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por rnam pa tha dad pas dus gcig tu rnam  pa sna tshogs su snang ngo zhes 'jug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251314#251324#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4663;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4664;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4665;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4666# lha ni gan rkyal du nyal bar byed do // / +yi dags ni kha bub tu nyal bar byed do // /

column3: sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni shes pa gcig nyid rnam pa mang por rang gis rig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251325#251338#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4665;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4666;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4667# 'dod pa la  zhen pa ni glo gyon pa sa la phab nas nyal bar byed do // / +bcom ldan 'das ni bla na med pa'i seng ge yin pa'i phyir glo gyas pas gzims so // /

column3: rtog pa rnam pa 'di gsum rnam par dgrol ba'i skabs kyis ming la sogs pa don rnam pa drug don med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsum bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251338#251347#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4667;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4668;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4669# bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir gzims nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mdzad kyi bzhugs nas ni ma yin zhe na / /

column3: ci 'dra bar ni 'jug ces  gang smos pa de'i dper / / +mun khung na sprul du snang ba'i thag pa bzhin du 'jug ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251348#251363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4669;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4670;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4671;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4672# bcom ldan 'das rgyu spangs pa yin par rab tu spangs par bzhed pa'i phyir te / /

column3: dpes ngo bo nyid gsum rtogs par ston to // / +dper na med pa'i phyir thag pa la sprul ni nor pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251364#251374#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4671;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4672;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4673# ma dad pa dag 'di skad du 'di sgyu byed pa yin te / / +shi ba'i ro la tsog pur 'dug pa ga la yod ces zer bas so // /

column3: de bzhin du ming la sogs pa don rnam pa drug gis yi ge dang don du snang ba'i yid kyi    brjod pa gzhan gyi dbar la ming la sogs pa yang nor ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251375#251390#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4673;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4674;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4675# kha    cig na re ma 'ongs pa na 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dgag pa'i phyir te / /

column3: de la ji ltar thag pa'i blo la brten nas med pa la 'khrul pa'i phyir sprul gyi blo ldog pa med pa de bzhin du gzhan gyi dbang la brten nas ming la sogs pa kun brtags pa'i don rnam pa drug gi blo rnam par ldog go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251391#251399#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4675;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4676# da ltar gyi dgra bcom pa lus kyi nyams stobs chung ba nyal nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag la 'jig rten pa dag dgra  bcom pa ma yin no zhes skur bar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251399#251415#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4675;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4676;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4677# da ltar gyi dgra bcom pa lus kyi nyams stobs chung ba nyal nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag la 'jig rten pa dag dgra  bcom pa ma yin no zhes skur bar 'gyur te / / +gal te dgra bcom pa yin na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba ci'i phyir 'dug bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das zhes zer bas so // /

column3: ji ltar kha dog dang dri la  sogs pa la brten nas cha shas su bshig na thag pa'i blo yang ldog ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251416#251426#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4676;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4677;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4678;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4679# gal te dgra bcom pa yin na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba ci'i phyir 'dug bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das zhes zer bas so // / +bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nam gyi gung thun cha las yongs su mya ngan las 'das she  na ; /

column3: de skad du // / +thag pa sprul du shes pa las // / +thag par mthong nas don med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251425#251434#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4677;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4678;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4679;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4680# bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nam gyi gung thun cha las yongs su mya ngan las 'das she  na ; / +smras pa / /

column3: de yi cha mthong de la yang // / +shes pa sprul ltar rnam par 'khrul // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251435#251442#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4679;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4680# dus de'i tshe mchog tu dben par gyur pa'i phyir te / / +'di ltar yul de na tsha ba'i dus su las byed mi nus pas phal cher nam gyi cha stod la las rnams byed de / /

column3: ces bshad do // / +de bzhin du rnam pa drug la yang dag pa'i don bstsal  na zhes bya ba la / / +bstsal ba ni phral ba ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251443#251450#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4680;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4681# 'di ltar yul de na tsha ba'i dus su las byed mi nus pas phal cher nam gyi cha stod la las rnams byed de / / +nam gyi gung thun kho na la thams cad dben pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa yang rtag par dben pa la  dgyes shing / /

column3: med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +don yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam pa drug po med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su grub pa la brten nas gzhan gyi dbang 'khrul pa yang bzlog par bya ba yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251451#251465#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4681;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4682# nam gyi gung thun kho na la thams cad dben pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa yang rtag par dben pa la  dgyes shing / /

column3: bstsal bar bya ba yin no // / +yid kyi brjod par snang ba'i don  gyi mtshan nyid la 'jug pas zhes bya ba ni yid kyi brjod pa 'di don du snang gi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251466#251480#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4682;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4683;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4684# dben pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'i phyir nam gyi gung thun la mya ngan las 'das so zhes zer ro // / +kha cig na re bcom ldan 'das dus gcig na dbu ma'i spyod pa la dgyes pa'i phyir te / /

column3: kun brtags par bya ba'i don ni med do // / +zhes kun brtags pa la 'jug go // / +rnam par rig pa tsam la 'jug pas zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig pa tsam 'di ma rig pa'i dbang gis 'khrul te don med bzhin du 'khrul pa  don gyi rnam par snang ngo zhes gzhan gyi dbang la 'jug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251481#251497#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4684# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa na  lhar skye ba'i nang na tha ma kho nar dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas pa bar mar skyes pa dang  mir skye ba'i nang na tha ma yul gyi dbus grong khyer ser skyar skyes te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251497#251508#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4684;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4685# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa na  lhar skye ba'i nang na tha ma kho nar dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas pa bar mar skyes pa dang  mir skye ba'i nang na tha ma yul gyi dbus grong khyer ser skyar skyes te / /

column3: yongs su grub pa la 'jug pa'i skabs kyi don gyi 'du shes rnam par bshig pa zhes bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251509#251517#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4685# nam gyi gung thun la mngon par byung nas dbu ma'i spyod pa bsgoms pas bla na med pa'i byang chub brnyes nas sems can  la phan gdags pa'i ched du yod pa dang  med pa dang bral ba nyid du gsungs shing / /

column3: don gyi 'du shes bstsal zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +don du snang ba thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas skabs med pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251518#251530#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4685;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4686;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4687# nam gyi gung thun la mngon par byung nas dbu ma'i spyod pa bsgoms pas bla na med pa'i byang chub brnyes nas sems can  la phan gdags pa'i ched du yod pa dang  med pa dang bral ba nyid du gsungs shing / /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249172#249172#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4448# lha de las babs la gdon mi za bar yul gyi dbus su skye ba dang  nam gyi gung thun la  lhums su zhugs pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la rab tu 'byung ba dang  dbu ma'i lam la spyad de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyes nas kyang dbu ma'i lam gyi chos ston pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang  chos dbu ma legs par rtogs  par 'gyur ba'i phyir lha'i gnas bar mar skye ba yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / /

column3: zhes bya ba ni don du snang ba gang  gis kyang skyed mi nus so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251529#251538#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4686;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4687# dbu ma'i chos dam pa la gnas pas na / / +nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o zhes zer te zhes 'byung ba lta bu yin  no ; / /

column3: des na rnam par rig pa tsam du snang ba yang mi 'byung zhes bya ba ni gzung ba med na 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251537#251548#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4688;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4689# nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o zhes zer te zhes 'byung ba lta bu yin  no ; / /
column5: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#804606#804607#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6324;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6325# de'i phyir ma rig pa la sogs pa dang  ngag la  sogs pa rnams dbang po nyid du kha bskang bar mi bya ste / / +mdo nyid las bshad pa'i dbang po'i don mi srid pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: rnam par rig pa tsam don du byas nas mi 'byung zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +don thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ming la gnas shing  zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ming gi spyod yul mdo la sogs pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag gis ma 'bags pa la 'di thams cad ni ming tsam mo zhes bya bar rnam par gnas shing ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251549#251560#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4688;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4689;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4690;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4691# 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las ni / / +don rnam pa bcu'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan pa yin no zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251560#251579#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4691;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4692# 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang  'dus byas thams cad bde ba ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa'i     // /

column3: ji skad du // / +thams cad ming tsam kho na ste // / +rtog pa thams cad 'jug pa med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251580#251589#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4692# phyir dang  mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu bde ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang  'jig rten pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dang  lha dang mi rnams ni gzugs kyi lus la mngon par zhen pas na gzugs su lus mi rtag cing 'jig  pa'i chos can nyid du bstan cing rtag par gnas pa'i rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi sku gnyer du gzhug pa'i phyir dang  mi rtag pa'i mthu stobs che zhing bsgyur du mi rung ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang  'dus byas kyi chos ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mi 'gyur zhing rang dbang med pa  nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang  khams gsum gyi chos rnams ni so ma btang ba'i snod dang 'dra bas mi brtan pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni de kho na nyid mchog yin te / /

column3: ming du snang ba'i rnam rig la //// / +ming zhes nye bar 'dogs par byed // /

column3: dmigs par bya ba dang  dmigs par byed pa mnyam pas mnyam pa'i ye shes bya ba  ni ji ltar dmigs par bya ba med pa de bzhin du dmigs par byed pa yang med pas dmigs par bya ba dang dmigs par byed pa gnyis mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid do // /

column3: chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab mdo sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la sogs pa'o // / +don zhes bya ba ni de'i brjod par  bya ba ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251681#251692#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4699;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4700# gzhan yang lha dang mi kha cig yongs su rdzogs pa'i rab tu dben pa thos par mos pas na byang chub  sems dpa' de dag gi ched du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bstan to zhes gsungs so // /

column3: pha dang ma ni gsad byas shing // / +rgyal po gtsang sbra can gnyis dang / /

column3: yul 'khor 'khor dang bcas bcom nas // / +mi ni dag pa nyid du 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251702#251718#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4700;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4701# de yan chad du de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ston pa'i mtshan nyid mdo tsam du bstan te / / +rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni 'phags pa rgya cher rnam par rol ba'i mdo dang  kun tu  gsal ba'i mdo dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i mdo dang  sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo dang  bkod pa chen po'i mdo la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa    bshad pa'am mjug bsdu ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o //// /

column4: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526823#526825#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10081# la lar ni lnga kho na'o zhes gsungs te 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo dang dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa'i mdo la sogs pa las bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin zhes bya ba la / / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni chos kyi dbyings yin te / / +de rtogs pa dang de la dmigs pa'i ye shes khyad par can bskyed pa dang  sngon gyi gnas gyur pa dang gnas gzhan bskyed pa'i phyir der skyes pa yin  te ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251765#251774#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4705# gsung des 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su ma smin pa ni yongs su smin par mdzad la yongs su smin pa ni de dmigs pa de nyid kyis myur du rnam par grol ba thob par bgyid PA LAGS ZHES BYA BA 'di man chad ni gsum pa gsung gi bye brag gi mtshan nyid  bstan pa zhes ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251775#251798#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4705;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4706;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4707;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4708;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4709# gsung des 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su ma smin pa ni yongs su smin par mdzad la yongs su smin pa ni de dmigs pa de nyid kyis myur du rnam par grol ba thob par bgyid PA LAGS ZHES BYA BA 'di man chad ni gsum pa gsung gi bye brag gi mtshan nyid  bstan pa zhes ston to // /

column3: phal pa rigs mthun par skyes pa bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid du nying mtshams sbyor ba'o // /
column4: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374421#2374423#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7555# grangs    smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  brtag pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pas rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ste 'di ni dang po'o // /

column3: gang gi phyir sa dang po mngon par rtogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su sangs rgyas kyi sras su skyes pa de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa byams pas bcu la gnas pa sh'akya thub pas sras kyi thu bo nyid du bye brag  tu byas te spobs pa'i rgyan gyis bstod pa las // /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251808#251815#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4710;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4711# de yang 'jam dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhu ba gsol ba'i gleng bslangs pa'o // /

column3: gang phyir khyed ni da ltar yon tan gyis // / +de dag bstan pa kun gyi spyi bor gnas // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251816#251835#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4710;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4711;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4712;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4713# de yang 'jam dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhu ba gsol ba'i gleng bslangs pa'o // / +rnam pa du zhig mchis na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam pa'i grangs su mang nyung zhus pa'o // /

column3: de phyir khyod nyid sh'akya thub pa yi // / +sras kyi thu bo yon tan rnams kyis legs // /
column4: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544238#544240#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12308;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12309# zhu ba gsol ba la phan yon yod par bsngags  pa dang  mnyan par bskul zhing bshad par gnang ba'o // / +zhu ba gsol ba la phan yon yod par bsngags pa yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523194#523194#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9587# 'di nyid 'dri bar  sems sam zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa zhu ba gsol ba la phan yon yod par bsngags pa'o // /

column3: zhes rgya cher 'byung ngo // / +sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa thob  pa yin zhes bya ba ni thams cad la bdag med par mnyam par nyid du mthong ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251836#251855#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4713;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4714# zhu ba gsol ba'i dgongs pa ni 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sku la brten nas bskyed pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'phags pa'i bstan pa rnam pa du zhig mchis na gsung des yongs su ma smin par yongs su smin par mdzad la / /

column3: ji skad du / / +sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la sems mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni de dag gi gnas gang yin pa de  bdag gi yang yin no snyam pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251856#251872#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4714;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4715;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4716;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4717# gang  yongs su smin pa ni rnam par grol bar mdzad ces bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343654#2343654#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3811;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3812# da la gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis po de yang bstan pa rnams las rgya cher ston par mdzad de / / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las mdo'i sde ni 'di lta ste gang bsdu ba'i tshul gyis rkyang par gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362247#2362247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6003# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321564#2321564#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1251# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las mdo de nyid bshad pa'i phyir / /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338920#2338920#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3264# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /

column3: sangs rgyas thams cad la sems mnyam pa thob pa yin te zhes bya ba ni de dag chos kyi sku gang yin pa de bdag gis kyang thob bo snyam pa'i phyir ro de ni de'i mthong ba'i lam yin no zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi mthong ba'i lam bzhin du chos kyi dbyings sngon ma mthong ba  mthong ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251872#251887#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4716;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4717;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4718# don gyis mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to // / +bstan bcos yang dag par rig pa dang rjes su mthun par las ni tshig yongs  su rdzogs pas gsung gi bye brag rnam pa gsum ston te / /

column3: ci'i phyir yang rnam par rig pa tsam de la 'jug ce na zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa 'dri ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251888#251896#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4718;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4719# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las sde snod gsum po de dag gis bye brag gang zhe na / /

column3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa'i rigs pa las de'i go rims smos pa ni byang bar bya ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251895#251909#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4719;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4720;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4721# dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang  don dam pa la spro ba med pa rnams spro bar byed pa'i phyir ni mdo sde gsungs pa yin no // /

column3: ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes  gdul ba'i tshogs skal ba yod pa la phan 'dogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251908#251919#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4721;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4722# bskyed pa dang  spro bar 'gyur ba dag yongs su smin cing rgyun chad pa med par bya ba rnams med par bya ba'i phyir ni 'dul ba gsungs pa yin no // /

column3: 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas theg pa chen po bstan pa'i chos thams cad bsdus te dmigs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251918#251937#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4721;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4722;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4723;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4724;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4725# bskyed pa dang  spro bar 'gyur ba dag yongs su smin cing rgyun chad pa med par bya ba rnams med par bya ba'i phyir ni 'dul ba gsungs pa yin no // / +yongs su smin cing bya ba byas pa rnams rnam par grol ba'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba khong du chud par bya ba'i  phyir ni chos mngon pa gsungs pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: gzhan du na ni dus ring mo zhig tu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye bar mi     // / +'gyur ro // /

'jig rten las 'das pa ni zag pa med pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro // / +zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi shes pa zhes bya ba ni de skad ces bya ba'i mnyam par gzhag pa phyin ci ma log pa'i shes pas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251938#251949#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4724;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4725;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4726;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4727# bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes la tshig gsum yod par ston te / / +'phags pa'i bstan pa la gzud pa dang  yongs su smin pa dang  rnam par grol bar mdzad pa ste / /

column3: sna tshogs kyi rnam par rig pa'i  shes pas zhes bya ba ni chos rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po bla na yod pa dang  bla na med par rnam par 'jog pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251950#251966#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4726;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4727;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4728;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4729;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4730;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4731# de'i phyir  mdo de nyid las / / +bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes thabs la mkhas pa des kyang 'phags pa'i bstan pa la gzud par mdzad / /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#480245#480245#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3934;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3935# mdo sde 'di nyid dang  sangs rgyas kyis la sogs pa las gsungs pa nyid do // / +slob dpon nye ba'i 'od kyis 'grel pa las / /

column3: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa can gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i sa bon rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs  la sogs par snang ba'i bag chags sgo bar byed pa dang bcas pa rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251967#251979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4730;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4731;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4732# rnam grangs 'dis mdo'i tshig gsum bshad de / / +de la dang  po ni thog ma kho nar yid ches pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir sems can rnams 'phags pa'i bstan pa la 'jug par mdzad pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i sa bon rnams spangs pa bstan to // / +chos kyi sku la rig pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po mang du thos pa'i bag chags rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251980#251992#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4731;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4732;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4733# de la dang  po ni thog ma kho nar yid ches pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir sems can rnams 'phags pa'i bstan pa la 'jug par mdzad pa zhes bya ste / / +ji ltar rdzu 'phrul mngon par bstan nas 'od srungs la sogs pas btul ba lta bu ste / /

column3: de ni chos kyi sku thob pa'i sngon du 'dren pa'i  phyir ro // / +gnas gyur nas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid rtog pas sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dri ma med par 'byung ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251993#252009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4733;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4734;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4735# 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi spyod pa bstan pa'i  mdo las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pas te / / +stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa / / +sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub pa'i sgo nas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252008#252019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4735;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4736# dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'phel zhing brtas par bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba dang cha mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  nges par 'byed pa dang cha mthun pa'i dge ba'i  rtsa ba dang ; /

column3: thams cad  mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dri ma med cing thogs pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252018#252030#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4735;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4736;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4737# dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'phel zhing BRTAS PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR RNAM par grol ba dang cha mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang  nges par 'byed pa dang cha mthun pa'i dge ba'i  rtsa ba dang ; / +khams gsum pa dang  ngan 'gro las rigs dang ldan pa dang  rigs med pa dag go rims bzhin du rnam par grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba mdzad pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: rjes la thob pa'i ye shes de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa thams cad rab tu skye ba zhes bya ba ni rgyur gyur pa rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252029#252042#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4736;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4737# khams gsum pa dang  ngan 'gro las rigs dang ldan pa dang  rigs med pa dag go rims bzhin du rnam par grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba mdzad pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: rnam par rig pa'i  mtshan ma thams cad la zhes bya ba ni 'bras bur gyur pa rnams la ste / / +gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin par snang ba rnams la phyin ci log dang nor ba med par rtog go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252040#252059#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4737;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4738;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4739# 'di ltar bstan pas btul ba'i stobs kyis rigs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag ni  'phags pa'i lam skyes pas khams gsum pa las rnam par grol bar mdzad la / /

column3: ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan ni de la glang po che la sogs pa med par mthong  ba'i phyir rtsva la sogs pa sgyur ma'i rgyu rnams la phyin ci log med kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252060#252067#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4739;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4740# dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi phyir chos yang dag par bstan pas ni khams gsum    las rnam par grol bar mdzad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252067#252076#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4739;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4741# dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi phyir chos yang dag par bstan pas ni khams gsum    las rnam par grol bar mdzad do // / +'od zer bkye nas sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar mdzad pas ni bde 'gro la 'jog par mdzad do // /

column3: gzhan dag ni rtsva la sogs pa la glang po che la sogs par mthong ba'i phyir 'khrul pa de bzhin du de kho na mthong bas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yongs su grub pa mngon sum du byas nas langs pa na yang    rjes la dag pas dag pa ston pa'i dus na chos rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu ston pa kun nas slong bar byed pa kun rdzob kyi shes pa dus thams cad du phyin ci ma log par gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252075#252084#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4741;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4742# 'od zer bkye nas sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar mdzad pas ni bde 'gro la 'jog par mdzad do // / +gzhan yang de dag thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i shes rab skyed par mdzad pas go rims bzhin du tshig gsum gsungs so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252084#252092#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4741;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4742# gzhan yang de dag thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i shes rab skyed par mdzad pas go rims bzhin du tshig gsum gsungs so // / +gzhan  yang rnam par grol ba dang cha mthun pa dang  nges par 'byed pa dang cha mthun pa dang  'phags pa'i lam skyed par mdzad pas go rims bzhin du tshig gsum gsungs so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252092#252108#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4742;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4744# gzhan  yang rnam par grol ba dang cha mthun pa dang  nges par 'byed pa dang cha mthun pa dang  'phags pa'i lam skyed par mdzad pas go rims bzhin du tshig gsum gsungs so // /

column3: nyan pa po dag ni phyin ci log ste / / +de dag kyang sems kyi rgyud la thos pa'i bag chags bsgos te / / +des bya ba  sgrub pa'i phyir rim gyis khad kyis khad kyis phyin ci log med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396936#2396937#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10200# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252107#252123#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4743;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4744# gzhan yang de dag mthong ba'i lam dang  bsgom pa'i lam dang  mi slob pa'i lam la gzung pa'i  phyir go rims bzhin du tshig gsum gsungs so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2339018#2339019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3274# yongs su shes par gyur pa'i phyir dang gtan du spangs  pa'i phyir lam dang thob pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di la brten nas rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral na zhes gsungs so zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las kyang de skad bshad de / /
column7: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406838#2406839#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11322# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni 'phags pa sa bcu'i 'grel pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //// /
column8: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216500#216501#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_301# 'phags  pa mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang bkod pa phal cher mthun te / /
column9: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341391#2341392#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3539# legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs  su 'dzin pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni don rnam pa drug dang  bdun gyis theg pa chen po zhes bya'o zhes ston to // /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399695#2399695#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10537# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#501678#501678#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6862;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6863# zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las  btus pa las ni de la mthong ba dang thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa'i don ni 'di lta ste / /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346753#2346753#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4152# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa    lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni chos gang gis kyang chos gzhan 'dzin par byed pa med do zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391026#2391027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9511# gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba yang spong bar byed do zhes bstan pa dang  gzhan yang theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las gal te rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur na / /
column14: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383886#2383886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8710# lang gi tshe bsgyur ba theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column15: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386555#2386555#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /
column16: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387236#2387236#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9062# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las mtshan ma med pa'i mngon bar 'du byed pa zhes bshad pa dang  bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column17: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397727#2397727#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10290# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni / /
column18: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397826#2397826#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10307# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column19: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222227#222227#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1055# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las mngon par grub par byed pa'i don gyi phyir / /
column20: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230367#230367#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2110# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column21: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241245#241246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3509;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3510# lpags shun dang snying po la yod pa lta bu gsum po dag ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las sa'i mdun rol dang sa bcu po dag tu sa re re la yang 'jug pa dang  gnas pa dang  'byung ba dag yod pa la brten nas lpags shun  dang  spri dang  snying po la yod pa lta bur rags pa dang  phra ba'i don gyi rnam pa gsum du dbye'o zhes bshad do // /
column22: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242616#242616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3654# de'i phyir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /
column23: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358529#2358529#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5560;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5561# pa dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan ma tshang med pa yang dag par shes pa dang  rnam par dag pa dang cha mthun pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan ma kun du 'byung ba dang  gong ma bas kyang ches gong ma sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang  yongs su 'grub  par bya ba'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa yang dgongs pa mi mthun pas de'i phyir de la mdo sde khongs su bzhag nas bstan pa las 'di ltar rnam pa lnga po de dag kyang byang chub sems  dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i yon tan rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas bstan pa yin te / /
column24: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228167#228167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1812;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1813# bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan ni sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir mu ge dang nad kyi 'jigs pa la  sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column25: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382821#2382821#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8600# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las / /

column3: rjes la thob pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa yang ma yin / / +rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin te / / +nyon mongs pa can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340846#2340847#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3489# chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa bstan pa'i mdo dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo dang  'dus pa chen po'i mdo dang  mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las 'di gnyis  kyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa 'byung ba ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252124#252132#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4744;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4745# bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /

column3: de'i phyir lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa bstan  pa'i gnas su rnam par mi rtog pa rjes dang dngos dang 'jug pa'i bye brag gis rnam par mi rtog pa rnam pa gsum du 'chad par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252133#252147#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4745;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4746;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4747;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4748# rnam pa  sna tshogs su bshad pa 'byung ba ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248444#248445#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4379# 'di ni dang po sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269532#269533#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6990;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6991# de'i 'og tu sprul pa'i sems mnga' ba yang yin mi mnga' ba yang yin par ston pa'i phyir  'dir sems bstan pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273327#273327#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7460# bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / / +rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i mthus byin gyis brlabs nas lam gang dang bsgrub pa gang gis thams cad du  sems can rnams lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag ci rigs par de dag la lam de dang bsgrub pa de yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273620#273620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7488# 'di ni dang po zhing yongs su dag pa dang ma dag pa dag na dngos po gang dkon pa dang mod pa cig car zhus pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column9: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271465#271466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7226;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7228# 'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column10: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271072#271072#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7172;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7173# 'on te sems mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column11: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272715#272715#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7390;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7391# theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus las ni dngos po 'di  dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column12: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263912#263912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6309;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6310# phug ron shin tu yun ring po'i dus su sangs rgyas su 'grub par  'gyur ro zhes bstan pa la sogs pa'i bstan pa dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub pa yin pas khungs su brjod par bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /
column13: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#452444#452444#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_302;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_303# zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni mdor bsdu na / / +rnam pa gsum yod de /// / +'di lta ste mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / /
column14: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274698#274698#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7639# bcom ldan  'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: mngon par rtogs pa thams cad la nges par 'byed ba'i cha dang mthun pa rnams 'byung ste / / +de ni snga ma'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de dag bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252145#252158#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4747;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4748;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4749;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4750# rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum yod de / / +mdo sde dang  'dul ba dang   ma mo'o zhes bya bas ni de bzhin gshegs pas lan mdor gsungs pa ston to // /

column3: yongs su tshol ba bzhi po dag gis zhes bya ba ni ming dang don dang ngo bo nyid dang khyad par du brtags pa nges par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can ji skad bstan pa rnams kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252157#252175#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4748;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4749;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4750;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4751;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4752# mdo sde dang  'dul ba dang   ma mo'o zhes bya bas ni de bzhin gshegs pas lan mdor gsungs pa ston to // / +mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste / /
column5: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#950103#950103#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7684# gang gis mdo sde la sogs pa'i ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i grangs nye bar rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: don med par bzod pa chung ngu'i tshe zhes bya ba ni don med par bzod pa chung ngu'o // / +snang ba ni gsal ba ste / /
column4: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361946#2361946#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5967# ji snyed yod pa nyid shes pa dang  ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid shes pa dang  'dzin pa'i don shes pa dang  gzung ba'i don shes pa dang  rnam par gzhag pa'i don shes pa dang   longs spyod kyi don shes pa dang  phyin ci log gi don shes pa dang  phyin ci ma log pa'i don shes pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa'i don shes pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i don shes pas SO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220413#220413#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_802# sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims  dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin PA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260955#260955#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5875# ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs PA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o / /
column7: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#950103#950103#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7684# gang gis mdo sde la sogs pa'i ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i grangs nye bar rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: don med par  shes par bya'o // / +de 'dod pa'i phyir thob pa ste / / +des na snang ba thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni snang ba thob ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252176#252189#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4752;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4753# de la  mdo sde zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar rigs pa dang mthun zhing sems can gyi dbang po dang 'tsham par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdo sde zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1936949#1936949#TD4032E.TXT.r_2729;TD4032E.TXT.r_2730# de bas na mtshan ma med pa'i phyir bdun pa la tha dad pa med pa'i don du rab tu rtogs so zhes bya'o // / +don de nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pas mdo la sogs pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad pa mi 'byung ba'i  phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so // /

column3: dro bar gyur pa zhes bya ba ni dro ba lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ste / / +gtsub shing gtsubs pa las me 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin du de kho na shes pa'i me'i snga rol gyi yang rang  bzhin gyi gnas rgyu zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252188#252197#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4752;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4753# de la  mdo SDE ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI ltar rigs pa dang mthun zhing sems can gyi dbang po dang 'tsham par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdo sde zhes bya'o // / +mdo zhes bya ba'i don de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas mi mthun pas 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252198#252211#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4753;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4754;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4755# mdo zhes bya ba'i don de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas mi mthun pas 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#453832#453832#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_493;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_494# slob dpon nye ba'i 'od la sogs pas gzhan yongs su longs spyod pa'i sku dang  sprul pa'i skus chos 'chad do zhes bshad pa de yang dag pa'i don yin te / / +de'i phyir 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362680#2362680#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6062;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6063# so so nas mi mthun par bstan te / / +'phags pa  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa dang  bstan bcos ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan pa dang  stong ba nyid bco brgyad bstan pa las ni de bzhin nyid kho na las brtsams nas rnam pa bdun du 'byed de / /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546912#546912#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12638# thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas ngo bo nyid med pa la sogs pa bstan pa de yang bstan pa rnams las ngo bo nyid med par ston pa so so nas mi mthun pas 'phags pa'i gsung  rab kha cig ni ngo bo nyid med pa dang po las brtsams nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa la sogs par ston pa yang yod de / /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396664#2396664#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10162# sa zhes bya ba'i don de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / /

column3: nges par 'byed pa ni mngon par rtogs pa'o // / +de'i cha ni chos bdag med par bzod pa'o // / +de la phan pa dag ni de'i cha dang mthun pa dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252212#252221#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4755;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4756# de'i phyir mdo sde de nyid las brgyus pa sdud par byed pa'i phyir mdo zhes bya ste / / +'di ltar 'phags pa'i gsung rab kyis bshad par bya ba'i phyir dang  gdul bar bya ba'i sems can brgyus shing sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: rtse mo ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gyo ba'i rtse mor phyin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252222#252229#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4756;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4757;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4758;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4759# 'di ltar 'phags pa'i gsung rab kyis bshad par bya ba'i phyir dang  gdul bar bya ba'i sems can brgyus shing sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes  pa bzhi po ming la sogs pa mi dmigs par nges pa gong du smos pa rnams la gnas pa ni ming la sogs pa ni rnam par rig pa tsam du zad kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252230#252238#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4758;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4759;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4760# dum bu bzhi pa las kyang / / +'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252238#252246#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4759;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4760;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4761# 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // / +bstan bcos sems sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni don rnam pa lngas ston te / /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236565#236565#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2893;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2894# zad mi shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338919#2338919#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3263;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3264# 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mthong ba'i dbang gis chos kyi MIG RNAM PAR DAG PA skyes par gyur pa'o zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392599#2392599#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9688;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9689# kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni rgya chen por 'gyur ba'i dmigs PA RNAM PAR RIG PAS dmigs pa rgya chen po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang rgya chen por gyur pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: don ni gang yang med do zhes bya bar nges par ni de kho na'i don gyi phyogs gcig la zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252247#252256#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4760;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4761;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4762# bstan bcos sems sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni don rnam pa lngas ston te / / +de'i phyir de nyid las mdo sde zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa  lnga dang ldan te / /

column3: gzung ba tsam gyi dngos po 'gog pa'i     // / +phyir phyogs gcig nyid de / / +'di ltar don med par khong du chud pa yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252257#252267#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4761;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4762;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4763# de'i phyir de nyid las mdo sde zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa  lnga dang ldan te / / +dang po ni 'byung gnas te don rnams 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: rnam par rig pa tsam yang med par ni ma yin no // / +de nyid kyi phyir de ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'i gnas yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252268#252275#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4763;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4764;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4765# gnyis pa ni chu mig lta bu ste don gyi ro la zad pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +gsum pa ni rab tu bstan pa ste don rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: rjes su mthun pa ni nye ba'i phyir te / / +des gzung ba med pa la brten  nas 'dzin pa yang med par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252276#252287#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4764;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4765;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4766;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4767# gsum pa ni rab tu bstan pa ste don rab tu ston PA'I PHYIR RO // / +bzhi pa ni thig lta bu ste log par yang dag par rab tu 'byed  PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni mngon par rtogs pa dang nye ba yin par zhes bya ba ni mngon par rtogs pa'i dus na 'byung ba yin par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252288#252300#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4766;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4768;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4769# lnga pa ni phreng ba brgyus pa lta bu ste / / +chos rnams rab tu brgyus pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: ji ltar rnam par gnas pa bstan pa zhes bya ba ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang  rtags  la sogs pa spros pa gang dang gang gis sa bcu par sa rnams bstan pa de dag la 'dres pa'i chos ma dmigs pa nyid ni 'dres par byas nas dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222164#222168#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1047# legs pa'i tshul khrims  bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252299#252308#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4768;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4769;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4770;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4771# don rnam pa lnga po 'di dag ni mdo'i don ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos legs par mthong ba las ni / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252309#252319#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4770;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4771;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4772# don rnam pa bdun gyis ston te / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column7: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487057#487059#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4937;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4938# gsum pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan SNGAR ZHES BYA BA NI DRI ba dris pa'i gnas bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las ji skad du / /
column8: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#505987#505989#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7435;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7436# 'di ltar gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid du rnam par rtog pa 'di'i gnyen po yang bstan bcos rnams so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las / /
column9: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546764#546765#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12623# de la thun mong DU BSTAN PA ZHES BYA BA NI SLOB dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ji skad du / /
column10: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346440#2346442#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4118;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4119# logs shig na bdag nyid du gyur pa ni med do zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa mdzad pa las kyang 'di lta ste / /
column11: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347849#2347851#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4246# gzhan yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa mdzad pa las // /
column12: 2.384#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403597#2403598#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11024# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column13: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221310#221311#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_914# de la bslab pa GSUM ZHES BYA BA NI THEG pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las / /
column14: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226994#226995#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1678# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column15: 2.384#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252946#252947#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4853;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4854# ma mo de dag la yang ming mang du yod pas     // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las / /
column16: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387392#2387392#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9079# nges pa'i tshig bstan pa yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las mtshan ma med pa la rtsol pa'i sgrib PA ZHES BSTAN PA NI bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /
column17: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249412#249412#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4476;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4477# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bskyur ba las / /
column18: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230625#230625#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2139# rgya cher ni slob dpon yang dag bden pas theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel par bshad pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227734#227734#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1766;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767# rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du bstan pa'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column20: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529705#529705#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10481;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482# gnas kyi khyad par gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column21: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540238#540238#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11832# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyigs  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las ming ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid du rtogs so // /

column3: gzhan du na tshogs bsags su zin kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mi srid pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252320#252328#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4772;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4773# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / /

column3: 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba  ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o // / +de'i rjes la thob pa rnams par 'jog par byed pa dang  rjes la dag pas dag pa 'jig rten pas kyang de yul du byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252327#252342#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4772;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4773;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4774# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las / / +sde snod gsum po 'di dag re re la yang bshad pa mang po 'byung ba ni 'dir mangs kyis dogs nas ma bshad do // /

column3: de gnas gyur nas zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa dang rjes la thob pa gnyis kyis gnas sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyud rnam  par dag nas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252341#252356#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4774;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4775;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4776# de la 'dul BA ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI ltar rnam par dag  pa'i sdom pa dag gis nyes pa rnam pa bdun 'dul bar byed pa 'am / /

column3: sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa gsum thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes 'og nas 'chad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252357#252365#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4776;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4777;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4778# de'i phyir bstan bcos legs par mthong ba las / / +lus dang ngag gi las 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni 'dul ba'i don du zhes bstan pa  dang ; /

column3: khyad par gyi gnas skabs nas bcus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +dmigs pa'i khyad par ni theg pa chen po'i chos la byang chub sems dpa' thos pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i shes rab gsum  gyis dmigs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252364#252373#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4777;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4778;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4779;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4780# lus dang ngag gi las 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni 'dul ba'i don du zhes bstan pa  dang ; / +gzhan yang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252374#252383#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4779;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4780;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4781# de la 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni don gyis 'dul ba bstan pa yin te / / +'di'i dbang gis dbang po rnams shin tu 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#255710#255710#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5179# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang  yang dag pa'i rig pa dang  rjes su mthun pa las kyang / /

column3: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos la ni ma yin no // / +bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa la sbyor ba rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252381#252391#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4780;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4781# 'di'i dbang gis dbang po rnams shin tu 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan PA YIN NO // / +bstan bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang  yang dag pa'i rigs  pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang phal cher mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#255718#255719#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5180# bstan bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang  yang dag pa'i rig pa dang  rjes su mthun pa las kyang / / +phal cher mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par ston to // /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364465#2364468#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6292# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang phal cher mdzod kyi bstan bcos las    'byung ba dang mthun par bshad do // /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390421#2390421#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9440;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9441# gnyis  pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yongs su ma smin pas ni skyon zhes bya'o zhes bstan to // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  rjes su mthun pa dang gzhung rab tu bstan pa las kyang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las 'byung ba dang mthun par bstan to // /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351482#2351482#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4696# mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  gzhung rab tu bstan pa las kyang 'di dang mthun par bshad do // /

column3: ye shes kyi tshogs ni thos pa la sogs pa ste / / +de dag bskal pa mi nyung bar bsags pa dag gis bstan nas khyad sar des byang chub  dpa' la byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252392#252401#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4781;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4782;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4783# bstan bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang  yang dag pa'i rigs  pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang phal cher mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252401#252409#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4782;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4783;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4784# 'dul ba ni 'di la'ang ming gi don mang po yod pas so // / +de'i phyir bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /
column6: 0.010#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#482137#482137#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4224# sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa dang  rnal 'byor  spyod pa'i sa las kyang phal cher mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de / /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250973#250973#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4629# de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /
column8: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338852#2338853#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3254# phan yon rnam pa  'di gnyis kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /

column3: rtogs pa'i khyad par ni nyan thos ni gang zag la bdag med pa tsam mngon par rtogs par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252410#252417#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4783;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4784;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4785;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4786# de'i phyir bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / / +mdo las tshul khrims la sh'i la / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa mngon par rtogs par byed do // / +mya ngan    las 'das pa'i khyad par ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252418#252430#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4786;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4787;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4788;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4789# rkang pa dang  gzeb ces dang  bya zhes gang gsungs pa de la / / +sh'i la zhes bya ba ni bsil bar byed pa'i don yin te / /

column3: shes rab dang snying rjes thabs kyis yongs su zin pas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
