column7: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271622#271622#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7252;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7253# dpag tu med pa lnga po 'di dag ni bstan bcos rnal  'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las / /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239125#239125#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3228# 'dis dris pa dang lan ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste / / +de'i phyir de nyid las gal te chos thams cad brjod du med  pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na / /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2369757#2369758#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7004# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las dpag tu med pa'i dngos po lnga yang dang po ni 'dul ba'i dngos po dpag tu med pa ste / /
column10: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#135966#135966#TD4035E.TXT.r_1936;TD4035E.TXT.r_1937;TD4035E.TXT.r_1938# de la sems can gyi dngos po ni / / +nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams so // / +de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po ni skye mched bcu gnyis po rnams so // /
column11: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#213535#213535#TD4035E.TXT.r_15095;TD4035E.TXT.r_15096# gang la brten na sems rnams 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar rjes su 'jug pa'o // / +bar du gcod pa'i phung po lnga gang zhe na / /

column3: rab tsam du mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro // / +tshul khrims la mi sbyor na ni skyon 'di 'byung na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253482#253491#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4937;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4938;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4939;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4940# de la sems can gyi dngos po ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag rnams so // / +de la longs spyod pa'i dngos po ni  skye mched bcu gnyis rnams so // /
column5: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#135971#135975#TD4035E.TXT.r_1938;TD4035E.TXT.r_1939# de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po ni skye mched bcu gnyis po rnams so // / +skye ba'i dngos po ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'o // /

column3: rab tsam du mi sbyor ba'i phyir nyes pa ma yin te / / +'di ltar bstan pa la mos pa la sogs pas sbyor bas de'i phyir nyes pa med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253490#253503#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4939;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4940;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4941;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4942;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4943# skye ba'i dngos po ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'o // / +skye ba'i zas bzhi po'i dngos po ni zas bzhi po rnams so // /

column8: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011480#1011482#TD4054E.TXT.r_3451# sa'i dkyil 'khor la ri rab dang   gser gyi ri bdun dang  gling bzhi dang  bar gyi gling brgyad dang  nang gi rgya mtsho dang  phyi'i rgya mtsho bzhi dang  ri rab kyi bang rim bzhin dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas gzhan rnams dang  khor yug gi ri dang  nam mkha' la gzhal med khang dang   'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang  lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i  sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dgas de dag kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang  nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun du rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gi 'jig rten na / /

column3: zhes bya ba ni gnyen pos so // / +'dod pa dang ni mos pa dag / / +ces bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyis te / / +dad pa dang 'dun pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253606#253616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4958;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4959;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4961# rgyu rnam pa bdun gyi phyir 'khor rnam pa brgyad rnam par gzhag pa yin no zhes bshad de / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253646#253658#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4962;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4963;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4964# bdag po'i mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa rnams yon gnas su  bkur ba'i phyir dang  gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i longs spyod kyi 'tsho ba'i phyir dang  longs spyod thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dang  rgyu 'di bzhi ni mir gyur pa'i nang na 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#182300#182311#TD4035E.TXT.r_9913;TD4035E.TXT.r_9914;TD4035E.TXT.r_9915# sbyin pa las byung ba dang  tshul khrims las byung ba chung ngu yin no // / +rgyu bzhis ni mi rnams kyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.013#TD4035E.TXT.r#182332#182334#TD4035E.TXT.r_9916;TD4035E.TXT.r_9917# bdag po'i mchog tu gyur pa dang  yon gnas su bkur ba dang  gzhan la rag ma las pa'i longs spyod kyis 'tsho ba dang  longs spyod yang dag par spangs pas 'tsho ba'i rgyu  'di bzhis ni / / +mir gyur pa'i nang nas 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o // /

column3: snga logs  su yang chos rgyun der // / +sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong bas na // / +zhes bya ba ni rtags kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253615#253625#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4960;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4961;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4962# rgyu  bzhis ni mi rnams kyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnam bzhir gzhag par rig par bya'o // /

column3: gang gi snga logs su zhe na / / +dag pa'i snga rol du'o // / +chos rgyun ces bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin nyid du bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253624#253637#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4961;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4962# rgyu gsum gyis ni lhar gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya ste / / +bdag po'i mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa rnams yon gnas su  bkur ba'i phyir dang  gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i longs spyod kyi 'tsho ba'i phyir dang  longs spyod thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dang  rgyu 'di bzhi ni mir gyur pa'i nang na 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o // /

column3: der zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin la ste / / +mnyam par gzhag pas sangs rgyas  mthong ngo // / +de mthong ba'i phyir byang chub dang nye bar rtogs so // /
column4: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1161840#1161840#TD4047E.TXT.r_5978# byang chub sems dpa' dbul por gyur na yang tshogs chung dus longs spyod bsgrub pa'i phyir dang  longs spyod kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i bya bas phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i dbang du byas nas smras pa / /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253611#253613#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4959;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4960# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las / / +rgyu  bzhis ni mi rnams kyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnam bzhir gzhag par rig par bya'o // /

column3: nye bar rtogs kyang tshegs chen pos 'thob pa'am snyam pa bzlog pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.021#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2079006#2079007#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14612# de'i rten dang dmigs pa 'og ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ni chos shes pa 'dod pa'i khams la brten pa'i phyir dang  'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa'i phyir chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs med par snyoms par mi 'jug go // /
column5: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162344#1162344#TD4047E.TXT.r_6052;TD4047E.TXT.r_6053# ngan 'gro dang  'khor ba nas 'don pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ston par ni chos dang ldan pa'o // / +'khor rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir 'khor ji lta ba zhes bya bar bstan te / /

column3: tshegs med par ni thob phyir ro // / +zhes bya ba smos te / / +'di ni phan yon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253657#253666#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4963;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4964;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4965# sa gzhi la brten pa'i mthar gyur pa'i phyir  dang ; / +'dod pa'i khams kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir dang  ngag gi 'du byed kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir ni lhar gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no // /
column5: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#182345#182346#TD4035E.TXT.r_9918# sa gzhi la brten pa'i mthar gyur pa dang  'dod pa'i khams kyi mthar gyur pa dang  ngag gi 'du byed kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir ni lhar gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor bzhir rnam par  gzhag par rig par bya'o // /

column3: de'i gnas skabs ni de thob par bya ba'i thabs rnyed pas byang chub     // / +dang nye bar yang mthong la / / +tshogs goms par byas pas yongs su smin pa'i shugs kyi mthus tshegs med par yang 'thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253665#253679#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4964;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4965;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4966# 'dod pa'i khams kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir dang  ngag gi 'du byed kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir ni lhar gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519023#519025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8992;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8993;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8994# bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po las bstan pa dang don mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222417#222420#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1086;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1087# brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  thos pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#492676#492677#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5735;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5736# don med pa la dmigs pa las kyang sems skye bar bshad pas / / +de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2376476#2376477#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7849;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7850# phyi rol gyi skye mched drug po gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa'o // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las phyi stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column9: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379458#2379458#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8194;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8195# zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang / / +chos rnams ni dmigs su med pa'o zhes bya bas na  chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang dmigs su med par shes par bya'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245133#245133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3989# bdag gis lan cig tsam  sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270688#270688#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7128;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7129# gnod pa med kyang langs pa gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen des na gdon mi za bar ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2339333#2339334#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3317;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3318# rgya cher de nyid las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: de bas na tshigs su bcad pa gsum po 'di dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa rnam pa brgyad bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253401#253402#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4928# dngos po bzhi ji ltar rgya cher  bstan pa nyid yin te mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253680#253687#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4966;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967# logs shig  tu dge sbyong dang  bram ze dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang  bdud dang tshangs pa'i 'khor rgya cher bstan pa ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /

column3: de dag grangs dang de yi  mtshan nyid dang / / +go rims nges tshig goms bya yon tan dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253688#253702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4966;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967# logs shig  tu dge sbyong dang  bram ze dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang  bdud dang tshangs pa'i 'khor rgya cher bstan pa ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // / +dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / /
column5: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253410#253410#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4929# dngos po gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa dngos po dgu phye ste bshad par ston to // /
column6: 0.018#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121368#3121369#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4234;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4235# sems can du gdags pa'i dngos po dang  de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po dang  de 'byung ba'i dngos po dang  de 'byung ba la  gnas pa'i dngos po dang  de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i dngos po dang  de'i sna tshogs kyi dngos po dang  ston pa'i dngos po dang  bstan par bya ba'i dngos po dang  'khor gyi dngos po'o // / +dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na / /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i don gleng slong ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253697#253705#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253733#253733#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4970# kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs las brtsams te 'du byed rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po'o ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA NI gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs    pas dngos po nyi shu rtsa lnga rnam par phye ste / /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#254014#254014#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5001# rnam par byang ba'i phyogs las brtsams te dmigs pa la nye bar gtod pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi dngos po nyi shu rtsa lnga ston  to ; / /

column3: grangs rnam par gzhag pa'i dbang du byas nas / / +mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa  smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236673#236675#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2908;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2909# ni bcu gsum pa pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi srid par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245242#245245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3999;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4000;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4001# bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang  theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs PA ZHES BYA BA STON to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa bstan te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248702#248705#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4402;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4403# bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253206#253208#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4892;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4893;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4894# 'di ni dang po'i dngos po bzhi rnam par bshad pa'o // / +'di  yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253706#253713#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4968# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang ZHE NA ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264930#264934#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6443# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang ZHE NA ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa  bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272278#272282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7352;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7353# de bzhin gshegs pa dang de dag tu rgyu dang rkyen ci zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin  gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273238#273242#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7451;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7452# bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa lta bu zhig mchis dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems dang  byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems  can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column12: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221970#221973#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1017;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1018# du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang  ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba  ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste / /
column13: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242523#242525#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3639;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3640;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3641# bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa du dag gis gnas ngan len de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa gnas ngan len spong ba'i dus rab tu dbye ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs  pa bstan te ; /
column14: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257344#257348#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5386;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5387# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig gang ZHE NA ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // / +'di'i zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du  gsungs pa ston to // /
column15: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360974#2360975#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5843;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5845# tshig gang ZHE NA ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa tshig rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column16: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361055#2361056#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5854;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5855;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5856# yi ge gang ZHE NA ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gsum pa yi ge'i rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column17: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380539#2380540#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8323;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8324;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8325# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong de dag gi 'bras bu gang LAGS ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi 'bras bu ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column18: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225873#225873#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1529;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1530# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column19: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231004#231004#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2176# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column20: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236136#236136#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2844# shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston  to ; / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column21: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246080#246080#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4097# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan  te ; /
column22: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273603#273603#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7486# dngos po gang ni dka' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa zhing yongs su dag pa dang zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag na gang    dag rnyed par dka' ba dang  gang dag mod pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te / /
column23: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371505#2371505#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7217;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7218;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7219# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / / +'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column24: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378249#2378249#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8064;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8065;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8066# dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / / +'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
