column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256061#256068#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5219;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5220# rigs bdun po dag yang dag par blangs pa'i sdom pa dag gis so so nas nyes pa srung bas lam dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i sdom pa gnyis dang 'dra bar rigs bdun po dag yang dag par blangs pa'i sdom pas nye bar  bsrungs pa'i tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir so sor thar pa zhes bya'o // / +thar PA ZHES BYA BA NI nyes pa bdun las thar cing mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir thar pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: sa gcig kho na la thams cad ngon par bsdus te goms par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256069#256083#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5220;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5221;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5222# thar pa zhes bya ba ni nyes pa bdun las thar cing mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir thar pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: gzhan yang sgom pa na dmigs  pa keng rus la sogs pa la thams cad 'des par byed do snyam pa de bsal ba'i phyir mtshan ma med par sgom pa zhes bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256084#256091#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5221;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5222;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5223# gang du yang tha dad pa'i 'byung ba chen po so sor thar pa zhes  bstan pa ni med do // / +de la so sor thar pa dang ldan pa'i chos yongs su BSTAN PA ZHES BYA BA NI 'di la bshad pa gnyis yod de / /

column3: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro // / +mtshan ma med pa sgom pa yang rtsol ba dang bcas shing 'bad  pas 'jug par 'gyur ro snyam pa gsal ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256092#256109#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5222;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5223;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5225# de la so sor thar pa dang ldan pa'i chos yongs su bstan pa zhes bya ba ni 'di la bshad pa gnyis yod de / / +kha cig na re yang dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyu dang  rkyen dang  rjes su mthun pa gang yin pa de ni ldan pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes so // /

column3: lhun gyis grub par sgom pa zhes bya ba smos te bsgrim mi dgos par rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256110#256118#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5226# kha cig na re lus la sogs  pa'i las gsum po dag las ni tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin yin la / / +sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ni ldan pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes pa'o // /

column3: lhun gyis grub par sgom pa yang mchog dang mchog ma yin pas rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro snyam pa bsal ba'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256119#256127#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5226;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5227# sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ni ldan pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes pa'o // / +chos kyi gsung rab de la ni 'dul ba zhes bstan to // /

column3: 'bar  bar sgom pa zhes bya ba smos te / / +'bar ba dang mchog ces bya ba ni don gcig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216386#216388#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_289;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_290# bcom ldan 'das sa de dag khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa du dag gis rnam par gzhag lags zhes bya ba 'di man  chad ni bzhi pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad kyis sa rnam par dbye BA ZHES BYA BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219476#219480#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_695;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_696;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_697;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_698# bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba ni srid par skye ba rnams kyi nang na rab mchog ces bgyi lags zhes  bya ba 'di man chad lnga pa skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa las brtsams nas sa rnams rab tu dbye BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256128#256137#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5228;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5229# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni so  sor thar pa rnam pa du ma dag gis bsdus pa lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis ba zhus pa dang lan dag gis rnam par dbye BA ZHES BYA BA STON TO // /
column7: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240694#240694#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3438# bcom ldan 'das bag la nyal de dag gnas ngan len de dag spangs pa rnam pa dus rab tu dbye ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa gnas ngan len spangs pas rab tu dbye BA ZHES BYA BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan  du gsungs pa bstan to // /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345591#2345598#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4030;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4031;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4032;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4033# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas kyi lam dang lhag mthong gi lam tha dad ces bgyi'am tha dad pa ma lags zhes bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong  gi lam gnyis gcig pa dang tha dad pa rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo ZHES BYA BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343461#2343461#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3789;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3790;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3791# na byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi dmigs pa'i dngos po bzhi po de dag la brten nas zhi gnas yongs su tshol bar bgyid pa dang lhag mthong la mkhas pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su tshol ba  rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo ZHES BYA BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column10: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354544#2354544#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5083;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5085;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5086# gzhan yang 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas ngang lhags thong zhes kyang gsungs na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa 'dres pa dang ma 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston     // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column11: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393884#2393884#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9841;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9842;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9843# ni bco brgyad pa lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su tshor ba 'gag par 'gyur ba bstan pa'i sgo ZHES BYA BA STON TO // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /

column3: la la 'bar bar bsgom pa thob nas 'dis thams cad byas zin na gzhan gyis ci zhig bya zhes chog par 'dzin par 'gyur ro snyam pa bsal ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340601#2340602#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3461# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353542#2353543#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4964;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4965# 'di ni dang po ste / / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye bas zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358810#2358813#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5586;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5587;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5588;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5589# bcom ldan 'das 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gang las rtogs shing gang las thob par 'tshal bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad  ni gsum pa rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i sa'i gnas skabs rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359885#2359888#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5699;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5700;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5701;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5702# btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad bcu gcig pa zhi gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang  btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382135#2382138#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8517;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8518;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8519;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8520# bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems  dpa' rnams zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mngon sum du gyur pa na sems rnam par gyeng bar 'gyur ba'i chos du zhig khong du chud bar bgyi 'tshal lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rnam par gyeng ba rnam pa lnga rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba  gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396253#2396254#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10116;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10117;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10118# bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa bka' bzhin du sgrub pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231618#231620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2245# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam pa du mchis pa lags zhes bya ba ni 'di man chad ni dgu pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256138#256154#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5227;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5228;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5229;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5230;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5231;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5232# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni so  sor thar pa rnam pa du ma dag gis bsdus pa lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis ba zhus pa dang lan dag gis rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column12: 0.013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398352#2398355#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10369;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10370# ji ltar yan lag rnam pa bcu gcig gis sa rnams bsdus par  'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa yan lag bcu gcig sdud par ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column13: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378247#2378247#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8063;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8064;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8065# zhus pa dang  lan dag gis mtshan ma yongs su bsal ba rnam par grol  ba rnam par 'byed pa dang  rigs kyi bu gtso bo'i dbang du byas nas zhes bya ba man chad gzhan gyis brgal ba'i the tshom gcod pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column14: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223693#223693#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1266;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1267;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1268# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa dang  pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po dag gi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa'o // / +dang po la yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pa ste / /
column15: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380395#2380396#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8306;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8307;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8308# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong 'di dag gis ting  nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa du zhig sdud par bgyid lags ces pa 'di man chad ni bcu gsum pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis ting nge 'dzin gzhan rnams bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i sgo zhes bya bar ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345373#2345375#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4007;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4009# zhi gnas dang rjes su  mthun pa'i yid la byed pa bstan pa dang lhag mthong dang rjes su mthun pa'i yid la byed pa bstan pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column17: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381004#2381007#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8383;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8384;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8385;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8386# gags rnam pa lnga po dag zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi gags su gyur pa bstan pa'i  sgo dang  sgrib pa lnga po dag zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgrib par bstan pa'i sgo dang  rnam par gyeng ba rnam pa lnga ru dbye ba'i sgo dang  zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgrib pa bcu gcig gi gnyen por gyur pa bstan pa'i sgo ste 'di ni dang po'o // / +dang po la yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol pa  dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column18: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378908#2378908#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8135;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8136# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column20: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262817#262817#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6130;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6131# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /

column22: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402925#2402927#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10945;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10946# ci'i slad du  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa'i ming gi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column23: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385111#2385111#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8844;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8845;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8846# de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar du sgrib pa gang dag gi gnyen por gyur pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgrib pa bcu gcig gi gnyen por gyur pas bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston te / / +'di yang  rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column24: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391886#2391886#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9596;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9597;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9598# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sgrub par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang  yon tan yangs shing rgya cher  rab tu 'dren par 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu bdun pa mthu dang yon tan yangs shing rgya che ba'i bar du 'dren pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa ste / /
column25: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380777#2380777#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8355;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8356# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis las gang dag bgyid lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi las ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column26: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388446#2388446#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column27: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222898#222898#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column28: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226466#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column29: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239247#239247#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3245# pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bco brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /

column3: chog par mi 'dzin par sgom pas so zhes bya ba smos  te // / +mtshan ma med pa 'bar bar bsgoms so zhes mi sbyor bar mi bya'i // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355499#2355502#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5208# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378999#2379001#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8145# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams  pa la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di ltar don zab mo 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i ched du'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2381237#2381238#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8412# 'phags pa'i bstan pa rnams la 'dod pa bzhin du ma thob pa ni lhag mthong gi gags YIN NO ZHES BYA BA la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388511#2388513#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9190# ci ltar thos pa dang bsams pa'i chos dag la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems khyad par can gyis  legs par gtan la 'bebs pa dang  legs par bsams pa dang  legs par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid nang du yang dag par yid la byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402964#2402966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10950;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10951# rigs kyi bu don chen po yongs su grub cing sngon ma 'dris pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems thob nas dga' ba chen po skye bas de'i phyir dang po ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa zhes  bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column25: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232111#232112#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2297# sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang  tshul khrims rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang  lta ba rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang  sems rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par    dag pa spyod pa dang  ngag rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang  shes pa rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang  dri ma rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa sbyin pa'i rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun rnam  par phye ste bstan pa'o // /

column37: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262245#262245#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6072# de gnas pa'i mi rtag pa'i rigs pa nyid mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa dmigs su yod par gyur pa'i gtan tshigs  bstan pa'o // /
column38: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#690167#690167#TD4083E.TXT.r_731# yang gang zhig bdag sems bzhin zhes 'don pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las ma gsungs pa'i phyir dang  bzhin zhes bya ba ni mi rigs pa'i phyir log par brjod pa nyid yin no // /
column39: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2563187#2563187#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3376# rnam par smin pa 'byin par nges pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i mtshan nyid rgyas par bskyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column40: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380559#2380559#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8326# rigs kyi bu sems shin tu rnam par dag pa dang  shes rab  shin tu rnam par dag pas de dag gi 'bras bu byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ston to // /
column41: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368133#2368133#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6780;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6781# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa  ni mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +gsang ba'i phyir dang  bsgrags pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bcu gcig pa gsang ba dang bsgrags pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo ste / /
column42: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#668699#668699#TD4069E.TXT.r_6482;TD4069E.TXT.r_6483# de'i phyir yang de bshad pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir ro // / +de'i phyir yang de bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column43: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225773#225773#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1521# ye shes de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par nus par 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ye shes shes rab kyi grogs yin par bstan pa ste /// /
column44: 0.029#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530496#1530496#TD4061E.TXT.r_2448;TD4061E.TXT.r_2449# yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par ba zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // / +de la bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa'i phyir ston pa'i bstan pa bzhin byed ba'o // /

column3: de 'jig par byed pa    ni tshogs su mi byed pa ste / / +tshogs 'jig pa'i phyir dper na sman bcud kyis len gyis nad kyi tshogs bzlog pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256181#256197#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5235;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5236;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5237# yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i dngos po bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233342#233343#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2469# rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa bdun du dbye ste / /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362966#2362967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6101;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6102# 'dir de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun ston par mdzad pas de nyid las rnam pa bdun du dbye ste / /

column3: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang bral te chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba thob ba zhes bya ba ni bdag dang chog dang sangs rgyas rgyas la sogs pa'i 'du shes kyi mtshan ma dang bral  ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256196#256212#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5236;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5237;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5238;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5239# 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid las rnam pa bdun du dbye ste // / +'di ni dang po'i yang  dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.011#TD4013E.TXT.r#613424#613427#TD4013E.TXT.r_417# de ltar na bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir thabs kyi khyad par pha rol mi dpogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyod pas  'thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'di ni dad pas bskyed pa'i sems kyis thos pa'i tshe yang sems kyi rgyun rnam par dag par byed na rtag tu byed pas nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bsgrub pas lta smos kyang ci dgos / /
column6: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317351#1317351#TD4037E.TXT.r_166;TD4037E.TXT.r_167# de ltar 'di lta bu dang mthun pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags yin par rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs kyi rtags ni 'di dag yin te / /
column7: 0.015#TD4044E.TXT.r#390074#390074#TD4044E.TXT.r_1518;TD4044E.TXT.r_1519;TD4044E.TXT.r_1520# de la 'di yongs su smin par bya bas ni / / +yongs su smin pa'am / / +'di dag la yongs su smin par bya bas te / /
column8: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222974#222974#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1176# 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste / / +'di ni dang po'i shin tu mos pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /
column9: 0.017#TD4028E.TXT.r#1963424#1963426#TD4028E.TXT.r_74;TD4028E.TXT.r_75;TD4028E.TXT.r_76;TD4028E.TXT.r_77# gang la khyad par yod pa ma yin pa de ni khyad par med PA ZHES BYA BAS SO // / +'di ni gzung ba'o // / +'di ni 'dzin pa'o zhes bya ba'am / /
column10: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2791332#2791332#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12542;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12543;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12544;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12545# 'di dag ni mdo sde 'dzin pa'o // / +'di dag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa'o // / +'di dag ni ma mo 'dzin pa'o // / +'di dag ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'o zhes rab tu shes pa'o // /
column11: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1043484#1043484#TD4054E.TXT.r_8324;TD4054E.TXT.r_8325;TD4054E.TXT.r_8326# thugs brtse ba can nyan thos rnams la  dge sbyong dag 'di ni phan par 'gyur ba'o // / +'di ni bde bar 'gyur ba'o // / +'di ni phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'o zhes chos ston pa de la nyan thos de dag gus par nyan pa dang  rna pa gtod pa dang  kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog pa dang  chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgye  par mi 'gyur / /
column12: 0.018#TD4087E.TXT.r#1576765#1576765#TD4087E.TXT.r_2618;TD4087E.TXT.r_2619;TD4087E.TXT.r_2620# 'di ni tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa'o // / +'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o // / +'di ni rnam par shes pa'i nub pa'o zhes skye ba dang  'jig pa mthong bas  rgyun du gnas pa dang  gzhan yang des dbang po'i sgo rnams bsdams pa kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa dang  dbang po'i sgo rnams ma bsdams pa kun du ma bsten cing ma bsgoms te mang du ma byas pa dang  de bzhin du zas kyi tshod rig pa dang  nam gyi cha stod dang   nam gyi cha smad mi nyal ba la brtson pa dang  zhi gnas bsgom pa la brtson pa dang  lhag mthong bsgom pa la brtson pa dang  des rigs pa dang ldan pa yid la byed pa kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa dang  rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa yid la byed pa kun du ma  bsten cing ma bsgoms te mang du ma BYAS PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column13: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502309#502309#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6955;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6956# bye brag phyed pa'i tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'o // / +thos pa'i tha snyad gang yin pa 'di  ni yid ches pa'i lung gi tshad ma'o zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column14: 0.019#TD4018E.TXT.r#3081335#3081335#TD4018E.TXT.r_10082;TD4018E.TXT.r_10083# 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i bshad pa ye shes dpal bzang pos sbyar ba'i le'u  gsum pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos dpyad pa'i 'og tu rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i chos thor bu dpyad pa bcva lnga pa'o //// / +thams cad mkhyen pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por dgongs pa'i bsdu ba'i don ni 'di yin te / /
column15: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536267#536268#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11302# 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // / +'di yod pas 'di 'byung zhes bya bas ni gyo ba med pa'i rkyen las 'byung ba'i don bstan pa yin te / /
column16: 0.020#TD4009E.TXT.r#344847#344847#TD4009E.TXT.r_3286;TD4009E.TXT.r_3287# 'di ni khyad par du 'gro ba'i bar du gcod pa'o // / +rtogs par 'gyur ba'i bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por / /
column17: 0.020#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1981344#1981345#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_368;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_369# dbyibs med kyang de'i bkod pa tha dad pas 'di ni phreng ba'o // / +'di ni 'khor lo'o zhes bya bar 'gyur te / /
column18: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#796043#796043#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4897;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4898# rnam par dag pas rnam par dag par 'gyur zhes  bya ba ni blo dri ma dang bcas pas dri ma can du byas pa dang  dag pas dag par byas par nges par gzung ba'o // / +bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te / /
column19: 0.022#TD4079E.TXT.r#765114#765114#TD4079E.TXT.r_1460;TD4079E.TXT.r_1461;TD4079E.TXT.r_1462# snang ba med par gyur pa'i sbyor bas / / +mngon du gyur pa'i snang ba'i     // / +'khrul pa'i mtshan ma 'di dag spang bar bya ste / /
column20: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2040994#2040997#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9115;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9116;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9117# dngos po'i byed pa po'o // / +dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o // /
column21: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3117025#3117025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3638;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3639;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3640# byams pa de la mtshan ma phra mo ni 'di dag yin te / / +sems kyi  len pa'i mtshan ma'am / / +myong ba'i mtshan ma'am / /
column22: 0.023#TD4032E.TXT.r#1921657#1921657#TD4032E.TXT.r_336;TD4032E.TXT.r_337# yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o // / +'di 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid du ji ltar shes par bya zhe na / /
column23: 0.023#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1898417#1898417#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1823;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1824# phyi'i chos dang  phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag de'i sems kyis nye bar 'dogs pa yin te / / +zhen pa la brten pa'i tshul khrims mngon par bsal ba'i phyir dang  zhen pa la brten pa'i kun du rtog pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang   zhen pa la brten pa'i rims nad dang  ngal ba dang 'bad pa rnams so sor dgag par bya ba'i phyir dang  dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' zhing 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir srung bar 'gyur te / /
column24: 0.023#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1898495#1898495#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1828# ji srid du zhen pa la brten pa'i tshul khrims mngon par bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang  zhen pa la brten pa'i dran pa'i kun du rtog pa  rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang  zhen pa la brten pa'i rims nad dang ngal ba dang 'khrug pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang  dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' ba dang  'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul bar bya ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de'i    sems kyis nye bar 'dogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so // /
column25: 0.024#TD4010E.TXT.r#2257002#2257002#TD4010E.TXT.r_3392;TD4010E.TXT.r_3393# sred pa'i dmigs pa shes pa dang  chos kyi dmigs pa shes pa'o // / +bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes 'di dag gis bstan pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pas mthar phyin par bstan par sla ba ma yin no // /
column26: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#463591#463591#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1849# 'di ltar yi ge ni legs pa  brjod pas 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur la don ni skyon med pas bzhin zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe'o // /
column27: 0.024#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2570758#2570758#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_4408# 'di ni lta ba ma yin gyi 'di ni log pa'i shes pa yin NO ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI ni log par dmigs pa'i phyir log pa'i shes pa yin no // /
column28: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2539249#2539249#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_597# tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po yin la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'chal ba'i  tshul khrims ni mi dge bas kun nas slong ba'i phyir de'i gnyen po gzugs kyis pa'i tshul khrims rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin NO ZHES BYA BA NI RUNG ngo // /
column29: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#507028#507028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7555;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7556# rnam grangs dang po de yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +mi mthun par bshad pas 'dzin pa'i 'jig pa dang  rjes su mthun par bshad pas 'dzin pa'i 'jig pa'o // /
column30: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2369530#2369530#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6975;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6976# gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du'o // / +yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gsum du dbye ste / /
column31: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047483#1047484#TD4054E.TXT.r_8925;TD4054E.TXT.r_8926# rgyu dang 'bras bu zad pa'i skabs yin pas kyang 'dir bstan par blta bar bya'o // / +'di las bzlog pa ni rab tu chud za ba'i dbye ba bstan par blta bar    bya'o // /
column32: 0.027#TD4009E.TXT.r#344742#344744#TD4009E.TXT.r_3266# de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so sor bsdus pa'i don ni dang pos ni bar du gcod pa rnam par spong bas tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'o // /
column33: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2623446#2623446#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10817# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kun nas slong bar byed pa'i nyon mongs pa'i 'thob pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir chos shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul khrims kyi rten 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na yin na / /
column34: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#492971#492971#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5772;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5773# rmongs pa dang yang dag pa nyid du 'dzin par bstan pa dang  de la sems can gang dag ces bya ba dag gis khong du chud pa dag yul yang dag pa ma yin par rtogs par bstan pa'o // / +dang po la yang rnam pa lngar dbye ste / /
column35: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1156814#1156816#TD4047E.TXT.r_5238;TD4047E.TXT.r_5239# thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir rjes su brtse ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +tshul khrims chen po nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir  bla na med pa'i tshul khrims la sogs par rig par bya'o // /
column36: 0.028#TD4046E.TXT.r#2205593#2205593#TD4046E.TXT.r_1301;TD4046E.TXT.r_1302;TD4046E.TXT.r_1303# bde ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa gnang bas na / / +gnang ba'i tshul khrims so // / +de bzhin du gnyi gar phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir // /
column37: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1179348#1179348#TD4047E.TXT.r_8378;TD4047E.TXT.r_8379# 'di dang phyi ma la bde ba ste bde ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa gnang bas na gnang ba'i tshul khrims so // / +de bzhin du gnyi gar  phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir de gnyis la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can sdud pas na sdud pa'i tshul khrims so // /
column38: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#266683#266683#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6637;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6638# 'di ltar de las gzhan pa dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gang yin pa de nyid yongs  su gregs pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +nges par dam bcas pa'i don bsgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // /
column39: 0.029#TD4010E.TXT.r#2252105#2252105#TD4010E.TXT.r_2754;TD4010E.TXT.r_2755# de ltar gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshul khrims ni / / +'phags pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims dang  mkhas pas bstod pa'i tshul khrims zhes brjod do // /
column40: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1131604#1131604#TD4047E.TXT.r_1508# smon lam ngan pas yongs su gzung ba'i tshul khrims dang  tshul khrims de phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i sbyor bas bsdus pa'i brtson 'grus dang  gzugs dang gzugs med par skye bar 'dod pa'i bsam gtan dang  de'i don gyi  shes rab yang dag par blangs nas gnas pa'o // /
column41: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2196180#2196180#TD4046E.TXT.r_36;TD4046E.TXT.r_37# nyams par gyur na sor chud par byed pa zhes smos pa'o // / +rjes su bsrung bar bya ba'i tshul khrims ni / /
column42: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1179232#1179232#TD4047E.TXT.r_8368;TD4047E.TXT.r_8369# gtan mi bya ba kho nas nyes par spyod pa spong ba yang dag par len pa'i phyir ldog pa'i tshul khrims dang  gcig tu nges par bya ba kho nas bslab pa ste 'jug  pa'i tshul khrims dang  de gnyis rtag tu bag yod par bsrung ba'i phyir kun nas bsrung ba'i tshul khrims te / / +de ltar rnam pa gsum dang  rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bus rab tu phye bas na rnam par smin par byed pa ste / /

column3: 'dir kun nas dga' bas na kun dga' ste / / +chos nyid kun dga' yin pas chos kyi kun dga'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256213#256225#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5239;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5240;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# de'i phyir yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i dngos po zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271377#271379#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7213;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7214# sems med de sems rang dbang med pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column6: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334726#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column7: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384463#2384464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column8: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column9: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column10: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405615#2405617#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column12: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column14: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228866#228866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column15: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column16: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column17: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column18: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247470#247471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column19: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248951#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column20: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258660#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column21: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260979#260979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column22: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273162#273162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column23: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547818#547819#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12719;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12720# zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa lta bu'i dngos po gsum dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni nges par bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +mdo 'di  las gsungs pa'i ldem por dgongs pa bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar phung po la sogs pa'i chos kyi sgo rnam pa bcu gsum po dag la rang gi mtshan nyid yod par gsungs pa lta bu ste / /
column24: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533913#533913#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# de dag gi 'di la rnam par rtog pas bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa     // / +zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /
column25: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242248#242248#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3609# nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kho na la bskal pa gsum du  bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / /
column26: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230837#230837#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2156# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni go rims nor ba dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las 'bras bu bdun bstan pa dang  mi gsal bar 'gyur ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270214#270215#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7085;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7086# sngon shes rab  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column28: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228651#228651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1878# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni don rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // /
column29: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1797946#1797946#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_12377# zhes bya ba'i tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i mdo las byung ngo // /
column30: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542632#542632#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12121;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12122;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12123# mtshan nyid bral ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya // / +zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las / /
column31: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233238#233239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2453# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten med pa dang  tshol ba med pas bzod par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column32: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385682#2385684#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column33: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214636#214636#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_74;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_75# mtshams  rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gcig gi nyes pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gcig ces 'byung ngo // /

column3: chos ni 'dir chos kyi dbyings so // / +der dga' ba ni tshim pa ste / / +dper na yul can nam thub pa 'ga' zhig phyir rol gyi kun dga' ra ba'am / /

column3: skyed mos tshal lam  nags su dga' ba bzhin no // / +thams cad du tsam med ces bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256243#256252#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5245;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5246# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i nang nas bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: phyogs bcur 'dir tsam zhes yongs su ma chad pa dang  rnam pa tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i chos kyi snang ba yang dag par rnam par shes tshe / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256251#256267#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5244;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5245;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5246;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5247;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5248;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5249;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5250;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5251# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i nang nas bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +yang na  sdom pa yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba ni / /

column3: gzhung goms pa la lta ba  bzhin no // / +rnam par dag pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mtshan ma rnam par btags pa ma yin pa rnams de la kun du 'byung zhes bya ba la rnam par dag pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i cha la phan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256268#256289#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5251;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5252;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5253# dge ba'i phyogs kyi sbyor ba la brten nas 'jig rten pa dang rjes su mthun zhing  'jig rten pa dang mi 'gal ba dang  'dul ba dang rjes su mthun zhing 'dul ba dang mi 'gal bas na de'i phyir cho ga phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / /
column5: 0.009#TD4036E.TXT.r#5706#5711#TD4036E.TXT.r_743# 'jig rten dang rjes su mthun zhing 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba dang  'dul ba dang rjes su mthun zhing 'dul ba dang mi 'gal ba'i cho ga dang ldan pa yin no // /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#464869#464869#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2038;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2039# rna ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / / +rgya cher ni de nyid las  bshad pa bzhin no // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383832#2383832#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8704;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8705# rgya cher  de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par 'byung ste / /

column3: rnam par dag pa ma skyes su zin kyang sangs rgyas dang  'khor los  sgyur ba dang  gdugs dkar po la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnam par gtags pa ma yin pa rnams kun du 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256288#256304#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5251;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5252;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5253;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5254# dge ba'i phyogs kyi sbyor ba la brten nas 'jig rten pa dang rjes su mthun zhing  'jig rten pa dang mi 'gal ba dang  'dul ba dang rjes su mthun zhing 'dul ba dang mi 'gal bas na de'i phyir cho ga phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column5: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2335569#2335569#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2881# rgya cher de nyid las  bstan pa bzhin bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las nges pa'i don ma yin pa'i bstan pa ni 'di lta ste / /
column6: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267130#267131#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6682;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6683# nges par phan tshun so so tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes  bshad de ; / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column7: 0.017#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366613#2366615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6573;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6574# phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag  pa dang  yang dag par spong ba la sogs pa'o zhes bshad de / / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#259356#259356#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5666# rgya cher bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404266#2404266#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11084;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11085# slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las kyang don de skad du ston to // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i shes bya mdo sde rnams  dang  shes rab dam pa'i phung po shin tu bsgrub par dka' ba 'khor ba dang  zhi ba la mi gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i lam thob pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu sbyang dka' ba zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ni sa bcu pa la'o // / +de nyid grub pa ni sa bcu gcig pas sangs rgyas kyi la la'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256305#256316#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5254;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5255# pham  pa'i gnas lta bu'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir na zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /

column3: gong ma bas ches gong ma ni gong nas gong du ste / / +sangs rgyas kyi sa'i rgyu mdzes pa nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256317#256325#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5255;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5256;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5257# 'di ltar lci ba bzhi po dag gi nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur na gdon mi za bar pas pham pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dbang du 'gyur zhing / /

column3: rgyu shin tu bsags pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar bsgom pa rnam pa lnga'i 'bras bu rnam pa 'di lnga go rims bzhin du brjod nas gtsor nas bcu dag tu pha rol tu phyir pa bcu bsgom par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsgom pa rnam par dbye ba'i nges pa  nyid brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256326#256337#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5256;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5257;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5258;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5260# byang chub sems  dpa' las rgyal bar 'gyur BA'I PHYIR RO // / +phas pham pa de yang rnam pa bzhi yod do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256337#256345#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5260# rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen cing / / +bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang  ser snas zang zing dang chos sems can la mi ster    ba dang  khro ba'i sems kyis sems can la rdeg cing tshig rtsub po smras pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la skur pa 'debs shing log pa'i chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni phas pham pa bzhi'o zhes bshad pa lta bu ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256346#256355#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5260# bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang  ser snas zang zing dang chos sems can la mi ster    ba dang  khro ba'i sems kyis sems can la rdeg cing tshig rtsub po smras pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la skur pa 'debs shing log pa'i chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni phas pham pa bzhi'o zhes bshad pa lta bu ste / /

column3: sa so so la yang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu char sgom par mi 'gyur ram / / +sa 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sgom par 'gyur ro zhes nges par bya ba ni mi rigs so zhe na // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256354#256369#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5260;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5261;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5262# bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang  ser snas zang zing dang chos sems can la mi ster    ba dang  khro ba'i sems kyis sems can la rdeg cing tshig rtsub po smras pa dang  byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la skur pa 'debs shing log pa'i chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni phas pham pa bzhi'o zhes bshad pa lta bu ste / /

column3: gtsor na zhes bya ba smos pas nyes pa med de / / +gang la gtsor gang sgom par 'gyur ba de de la ston     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256370#256382#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5261;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5262;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5263# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +yang na phas pham pa  ni bcu ste / /

column3: gyi ; / +der gzhan yang sgom par 'gyur ba dgag pa ni med de / / +mdo las ji skad du sa rab du dga' ba de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhag par che ba yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256381#256399#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5263;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5264;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5265# snga ma bzhi'i steng du yang srog gcod pa dang  ma byin par len pa dang  log par gyem pa dang  brdzun du smra ba dang  chang 'tshong ba dang  gzhan gyi skyon nas smra ba bsnan te / /
column5: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1146395#1146396#TD4047E.TXT.r_3671;TD4047E.TXT.r_3672;TD4047E.TXT.r_3673# yongs su bsgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa'i dbye ba ni / / +mdo sder gtogs pa'i mdor bstan pa las shes par bya'o // /

column3: lhag ma rnams kyang yang dag par mi sgrub pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no // / +drug tu ni drug ces bya ba ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa la sbyin pa la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256175#256177#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5233;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5235# 'di yang mdor bstan pa dang  rnam par phye nas bstan pa nyid     // / +yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i dngos po bsdus pa'i phyir ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#541353#541353#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11963# rnam pa byang pa'i mtshan nyid kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes SO ZHES BYA BA NI gsum pa yongs su grub pa'i  shes pa nyid kyis rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes par 'gyur bar bstan pa ste / /
column6: 0.018#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2620085#2620085#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10436;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10437# gti mug dang bcas pa dang  gti mug dang bral ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o zhes    bya ba ni de lta bas na mdo 'dir zhe sdang dang ldan pas kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang  gti mug dang ldan pas kyang gti mug dang bcas par 'dod par bya'o zhes bya BA YIN NO // / +dmigs pa la mngon par sdud pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i sems ni rnam par gyeng ba dang mtshungs par mi ldan te / /
column7: 0.019#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2017998#2017999#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5851;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5852# 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi  gdags pa'i bar ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya'o // / +don dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba don yang dag par ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column8: 0.020#TD4053E.TXT.r#2967975#2967975#TD4053E.TXT.r_488# kun nas nyon mongs pa mi rgyu ba'i PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA NI de la dmigs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dngos po kun nas nyon mongs pas stongs par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231066#231066#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2182# snying rje med pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  rtag  tu mi byed pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  ma gus pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir DANG ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o // /
column10: 0.022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#830484#830486#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10592;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10593;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10594# de la skye bas na chos de skyed par BYED DO ZHES BYA BA LA / / +'dis  yongs su gzung ba'i dngos po rnams skye ba'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1195990#1195991#TD4047E.TXT.r_10662# bdag nyid yang dag par bsgrub pa'i 'jig rten shes pa bstan pa nyid ni khyim par gyur cing de lta bur gnas kyang de lta bur 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir / /
column12: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2319728#2319728#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1046;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1047# mkhas shing mdzangs PAS RIG PA YIN NO ZHES MOS par BYED DO ZHES BYA BA gsum pa mngon par     // / +yid ches pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu bstan pa'o // /
column13: 0.023#TD4043E.TXT.r#369500#369500#TD4043E.TXT.r_1811;TD4043E.TXT.r_1812# de nyid rnam PAR MA GYUR PA NI ZHES BYA BA NI don de la rnam par shes pa 'jug pa ni yid la byed pa la rag las pa'i phyir ro // / +rnam par shes par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni  thun mong ma yin pa'i bye brag gang gis yul rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba'o // /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264732#264732#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6420# de ltar skye ba'i phyir dang   mtshan dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  the tshom gyi dra ba gcod pa'i phyir dang  gzhan dag gis brgal du med cing gzhan dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  dge sbyong dmigs pa'i phyir DANG ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gsum pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column15: 0.025#TD4066E.TXT.r#2115936#2115937#TD4066E.TXT.r_1938;TD4066E.TXT.r_1939# 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba'i sems dang 'dra bar 'dir yang dpyad par bya'o // / +'khor bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA NI gang gi rgyu las byung ba'i 'khor bar 'jug pa dang  ldog pa yod pas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa las kun gzhi  rnam par shes pa gzhan yin par shes so // /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#515980#515980#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8614# dge slong kha cig ni phung po'i rnam par 'gyur ba dmigs pas zhes bya ba 'di ni bzhi pa phung po'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste / /
column17: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1206296#1206296#TD4047E.TXT.r_12090;TD4047E.TXT.r_12091# phan pa dang bde ba dag gis bsdus pa dang mthun pas bsdus pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir / / +bsdu ba'i    dngos po bzhi PO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA LA / /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271118#271118#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7180# bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems med  pa'i phyir dang  gzhan la brten pa'i sems yod pa'i PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA NI bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bshad pa'o // /
column19: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1222164#1222164#TD4047E.TXT.r_14310;TD4047E.TXT.r_14311# nges par bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i phyir so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis brtan par gzhag par bya'o // /
column20: 0.027#TD4029E.TXT.r#2130197#2130197#TD4029E.TXT.r_1311# rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de lta bur yod pa'i PHYIR RO ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column21: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1470463#1470463#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8212;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_8213# yongs su gzung ba'i dngos po ni yongs su gzung bar  bya ba yin pas na yongs su gzung ba'o // / +tha mar bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tshig le'ur byas pa'i mjug nas rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'byung ste / /
column22: 0.029#TD4032E.TXT.r#1939913#1939916#TD4032E.TXT.r_3166;TD4032E.TXT.r_3167# kha cig na re gnyis la rnam pa gnyis gnyis te yongs su shes pa rnam gnyis ni shes pa'i yongs su shes pa'i dang  spong ba'i yongs su shes pa'o // / +de la dngos po dang gsum pa ni shes pa'i yongs su shes pas yongs su shes par bya ba'o // /
column23: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#266779#266779#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6646# yongs su ma dag pa'i  phyir brten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mi brten par bskul ba'o // /
column24: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542079#542079#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12048# kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i phyir ni rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid gsum shes pa'i    dbang gis kun nas nyon mongs pa spangs nas / /
column25: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2063118#2063118#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12311;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_12312# de la dang po ni sdug bsngal  gyi dang po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyu YIN TE ZHES BYA BA rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o // / +'jug pa med pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang skye ba'i 'jug bzhi pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column26: 0.029#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201837#2201838#TD4046E.TXT.r_816;TD4046E.TXT.r_817# gang zag ma dag pa rnams slob ma sgrub pa rnams nyid la dad pa skyed pa'i phyir dang  snga nas dad pa rnams kyi dad pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro // / +de lta bus zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ba'i dngos po ci yang rung ba'o // /
column27: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320147#2320147#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1093# 'on kyang 'di ltar bsgom pa'i rnam pas sbyor ba bskyed par yang mi nus PAS ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS NI gsum pa bdag nyid la smad pa'i dbang gis  bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs stsogs par bstan pa'o // /

column3: phyi ma bzhir ni bzhi ste zhes bya ba ni rid du song ba la sogs pa la thabs la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256412#256420#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5266;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5267;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5268# 'di ni de las gzhan pa'i nyes pa yang ba rnams te / / +'phags pa tshangs pa'i dra ba'i mdo las / /

column3: thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +'dir thabs la mkhas pa gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256421#256428#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5268;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5270# dri ma dang bcas pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad gsungs pa  dang ; /

column3: gang 'khor ba yang yongs su mi gtong la mya ngan las 'das pa yang don du gnyer ba de thabs la mkhas pa ste / / +dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o snyam nas sems cad thams cad dang thun mong du byed des sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong bas 'khor ba  yongs su mi gtong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256429#256442#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5270;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5271;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5272# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +nyes pa yang ba rnams bstan pa lta bu ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256442#256456#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5272;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5273;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5274# ltung ba dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa ltung ba dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256520#256527#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5280;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5281;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5282# rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du bstan pa lta bu ltung ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid     // / +bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni lnga pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa ste / /
column7: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#540631#540631#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11879# yang dag pa ma yin pas brtags pa'i mtshan nyid de kun brtags pa yin par rab tu shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /

column3: gang yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256457#256464#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5273;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5274;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5275;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5276# gzhan yang ltung ba dang  bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +'gal bas 'gyur ba'i nyes pa bstan pa rnams te / / +bstan bcos de nyid las ji skad du / /

column3: snyam nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256465#256474#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5276;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5277# byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yongs su dag pa la gnas pa nyin  gcig bzhin du dkon mchog gsum po dag la mchod pa'i bya ba chung ngu 'am / /

column3: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma la zhes bya ba 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen  sdud ces bya ba dang sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256475#256485#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5276;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5277;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5278;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5279# byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yongs su dag pa la gnas pa nyin  gcig bzhin du dkon mchog gsum po dag la mchod pa'i bya ba chung ngu 'am / / +chen po yang rung ste / / +tha na lus kyis phyag gcig tsam btsal ba dang  tha na dkon mchog gsum las brtsams te / /

column3: smon lam sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa ni smon pa'i don mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir te / / +sangs rgyas su grub shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256486#256496#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5278;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5279# tha na lus kyis phyag gcig tsam btsal ba dang  tha na dkon mchog gsum las brtsams te / / +tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam du tshig tu brjod pa dang  tha  na dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan rjes su dran pa sngon du 'gro ba'i dang ba gcig tsam yang ma byas par nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: yang pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni bcu pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang de'i rjes  la thob pa nyid pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rnam par gzhag pa 'dir ni thabs la sogs pa pha rol tu phyi pa nyid du bstan to // /

column6: 5.960#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345384#1345385#TD4037E.TXT.r_4042# gal te kun nas dkris pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa' la pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos byung bar gyur na des sdom pa btang ba lan gnyis su slar yang mnod par bya'o // /

column12: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226518#226518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /
column13: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#255524#255525#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5153# de la so sor THAR PA ZHES BYA BA 'ang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni rigs brgyad po dag gis sdom pa yang dag par len pa dang po rnam par rig byed kyi so so nas sdig pa sna tshogs spong bar byed pa'i  phyir so sor thar pa dang  lam gyi zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537997#537997#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11542# sgo gong ma gnyis po 'di yang bstan pa  rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas 'phags pa'i gsung rab kha cig las snga ma bstan la / /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384355#2384355#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8763# rnam par gyeng ba 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas de'i phyir bstan pa rnams las 'byung ba sngar bstan nas / /
column16: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1194863#1194863#TD4047E.TXT.r_10485;TD4047E.TXT.r_10486# dus ring por goms par byas pa de'i rang bzhin du gyur pas de la chags shing  gnas skabs de las mi ldog pa'o // / +rigs pa'i sbyor ba'i bye brag yang dag par mthong bas kyang ldog par mi 'gyur ro // /

column3: bkag pa bcas pa med par yang mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu can srog gcod pa la sogs pa nyan thos dang  byang chub sems dpa' gnyi gas mi  bya bar nges par mthun pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256931#256944#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5332;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5333;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5334;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5335# nyan thos kyi tshul khrims btang ba'i rkyen mang nyung ni bstan pa rnams las so so nas  bshad pa mi mthun pas thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni rgyu rnam pa lngas gtong bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad de / / +de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos kyi nang nas so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ji ltar gtong bar 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: bslab pa thun mong ma yin pa ni bcad pas bkag pa bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rnams te / / +dbyar gyi nang logs su 'gro ba la sogs pa kun du spyod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256945#256960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5334;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5335;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5336;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5337;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5338;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5339;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5340# tshig le'ur byas pa las / / +so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba gtong // / +bslab  pa phul dang shi 'phos dang / /

column3: bslab pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni bslab pa phyi ma bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba kun du  spyod pa la'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256961#256971#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5338;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5340;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5341;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5339;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5342# rtsa ba chad dang mtshan 'das las // / +'di nyid kyi 'grel pa las / / +de la 'dul BA ZHES BYA BA NI SO sor thar pa'i sdom pa yin par dgongs te / /

column3: gang du dbyar gyi nang logs su song na nyan thos kyi ltung bar 'gyur pa de la ni dbyar bcad kyang gdul ba la lta bas yul gzhan ru 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ltung ba med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256970#256980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5341;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5342;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5343# de la 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yin par dgongs te / / +des dbang po rnams 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256981#256990#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5343;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5344# bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa ma gtogs pa gzhan so sor thar pa'i sdom pa rnam pa bdun po dag ni rgyu rnam pa bzhis gtong bar 'gyur te / /

column3: gzhan gyi don gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro // / +gang du sems can gyi don byar yod kyang  dbyar chad pas 'jigs nas yul gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la ltung bar 'gyur ba de la nyan thos la ltung bar mi 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256991#257000#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5344# brda phrad pa'i drung du bslab pa'i gzhi bsam pa thag pa nas slar phul ba'i phyir dang  rigs mthun pa btang ba'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid cig car byung  ba'i phyir dang  rgyu des dge ba'i rtsa ba BCAD PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column3: snying rje chung ba'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims sems kyi yin pa ni 'di ltar 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257012#257026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5345;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5346;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5347;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5348# bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa ni snga ma'i rgyu bzhi dang  mtshan mo zad pa las te / / +de'i phyir de dag ni bsdu na gtong ba'i rgyu lngar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#721764#721769#TD4091E.TXT.r_4950;TD4091E.TXT.r_4951# de ltar na de dag ni bsdu na gtong ba'i rgyu lngar 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.016#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1652748#1652748#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_9299# ci'i phyir rgyu de dag gis gtong bar gyur zhe na / /

column3: nyan thos kyi ni ma yin te / / +bdun spong ba yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i phyir nyan thos rnams kyi tshul khrims ni lus kyi dang ngag gi yin gyi sems kyi ni ma yin no //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257025#257038#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5347;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5348# ci'i phyir rgyu de dag gis gtong bar 'gyur zhe na / / +yang dag par blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i    rnam par rig byed skyed pa'i phyir dang  lus bor bar bya ba'i phyir dang  rten nyams pa'i phyir dang  gzhi chad pa'i phyir dang  tshad kyi dus las 'das pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#721781#721787#TD4091E.TXT.r_4952# YANG DAG PAR BLANGS PA dang 'gal ba'i rnam  bar rig byed bskyed pa'i phyir ba dang  lus bor ba'i phyir ba dang  rten nyams pa'i phyir ba dang  gzhi chad pa'i phyir ba dang  de srid du 'phangs pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.016#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2007548#2007551#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4329;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4330;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4331# las kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bya ba yang yin no // / +de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems pa'i  rten yin pa'i phyir gzhi yang yin no // /
column7: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2726081#2726082#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3582# dngos po  rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir dang  skad cig pa'i phyir dang  gyo ba med pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#876370#876371#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17695# tsam zhes bya ba smos pa ni de las lhag pa'i rten gcad par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.018#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2011686#2011686#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4952# rgyud zhi gnas kyis brlan pa'i phyir dang  rten dang ba'i phyir dang  de rgyas pa'i gzhi med pa'i phyir te / /
column10: 0.020#TD4053E.TXT.r#2968709#2968709#TD4053E.TXT.r_602;TD4053E.TXT.r_603# de'i gnas kyi phyir mthong ba'i rten mig yin PA'I PHYIR RO // / +mi gyo bar 'jug pa'i phyir mig ni rtag tu rigs gcig PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column12: 0.020#TD4050E.TXT.r#1099710#1099710#TD4050E.TXT.r_385;TD4050E.TXT.r_386# gang phyir dge ba'i sems  la yang bdag go zhes 'byung BA'I PHYIR RO // / +yul la rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o // /
column13: 0.020#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1981594#1981594#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_401# ji ltar lus kyi las su 'dogs par byed ces bya ba ni dbyibs btags par yod pa la las nyid mi rung ba'i  phyir dang lus la brten pa mi srid pa'i phyir 'dri ba'o // /
column14: 0.021#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2734842#2734842#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5003;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5004# rkyen  las myur du 'jig pa dang ldan la 'byung zhing rkyen las myur du 'jig pa dang ldan la 'byung bas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o // / +kun nas slong ba'i phyir tshul yin la kun nas slong ba'i phyir tshul yin pas gnas so // /
column15: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1826730#1826730#TD4039E.TXT.r_1445# sems tsam zhig rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi po rnams la 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur bar zad pa dang  sems tsam zhig rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi po rnams spong ba'i  phyir 'jug pa med pa'i kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur bar zad pa'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2044686#2044686#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9634# dbang po rnams ches yongs su smin pa'i phyir dang  rten khyad par can thob pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir te / /
column17: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#479477#479477#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3844# 'gyur ba'i lus len pas mthong bar mi nus pa'i phyir dang  sa bdun pa man chad dngos po can len pa'i phyir dang yang dag pa'i lus kyi don dang ldan pas nyes pa med pa'i phyir te / /
column18: 0.027#TD4041E.TXT.r#1275978#1275978#TD4041E.TXT.r_1081;TD4041E.TXT.r_1082# srid pa'i rtse mor song ba rnams la yang nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa thams cad  'phel bar byed pa'i phyir dang  dam pa rnams kyis ring du yongs su spang bar bya BA'I PHYIR RO // / +lus dang sems kun tu gdung bar byed pa'i phyir na rims nad rnams so // /
column19: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#657265#657269#TD4069E.TXT.r_4878;TD4069E.TXT.r_4879# lus dang sems yongs su gdung bar byed PA'I PHYIR RO // / +lus yongs su gdung bar byed pa'i phyir dang  sems yongs su gdung bar byed PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column20: 0.027#TD4071E.TXT.r#408862#408863#TD4071E.TXT.r_1546;TD4071E.TXT.r_1547# lus nye bar len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni / / +lus rang gir byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column21: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#888832#888833#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19546;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19547# lus mnyen par byed pa zhes bya ba ni las su rung bar byed pa'o // / +de nyid  kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni lus mnyen par byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column22: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#997346#997346#TD4054E.TXT.r_962;TD4054E.TXT.r_963# sngon  gyi las las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'o // / +yang dang yang nying mtshams sbyor ba'i lus len pa'i phyir kun du len pa'i rnam par shes pa'o // /
