column24: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2593571#2593571#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_7226;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_7227# dang po 'bad pas bskyed par bya ba'i rnam pa gtod pa la ni spyi la dmigs pa nyid kyis chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa kho nas gtod PAR NUS PA'I PHYIR RO // / +so sor nges pa la dmigs pa'i phyir lus  dran ba nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pas ni mi nus so // /

column3: mdor bsdu na gang kha na ma tho ba med par sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa kha na ma tho ba med ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257039#257051#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5348;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5349# yang dag par blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i    rnam par rig byed skyed pa'i phyir dang  lus bor bar bya ba'i phyir dang  rten nyams pa'i phyir dang  gzhi chad pa'i phyir dang  tshad kyi dus las 'das pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: ji ltar ba grod par bya ba ma yin par 'gro ba la sogs pa lta bu ni ma yin no // / +de  ni phan 'dogs pa yin yang kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257052#257061#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5349# bstan bcos yang dag par rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang   bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bslab pa dbul ba'i rgyu rnam pa lnga 'byung ba la yang mdzod kyi bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351039#2351040#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4649# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  gzhung rab tu bstan pa las kyang don gyis bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las rnam grangs dang po gsum gyis bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /

column3: de lta bu spang pa'i phyir kha na ma tho ba med pa smos so // / +lhag pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa bslab pa gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257062#257070#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5349;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5350;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5351# bstan bcos yang dag par rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang   bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bslab pa dbul ba'i rgyu rnam pa lnga 'byung ba la yang mdzod kyi bstan pa dang mthun no // /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi nang du ma 'dus sam / / +ci'i phyir logs shig tu brjod ce na / / +rnam par gzhag pa  gzhan gyi ngor bya ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257071#257085#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5350;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5352# bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa las / / +sdom pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pas dang po'i ltung ba rnams byung na de ni nyes pa yin gyi btang ba ma yin pas  gang zag de ni tshul khrims la gnas pa dang  tshul khrims zhig pa yin par rig par bya ste / /

column3: snga phyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +ji skad du tshul khrims kyi phung po la brten nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257083#257104#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5351;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5352;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5353;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5354# sdom pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pas dang po'i ltung ba rnams byung na de ni nyes pa yin gyi btang ba ma yin pas  gang zag de ni tshul khrims la gnas pa dang  tshul khrims zhig pa yin par rig par bya ste / / +gal te 'gyod par gyur na tshul khrims zhig pa spangs nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la gnas par 'gyur te / /

column3: bsam gtan nas brten nas shes rab kyi phung po 'byung ngo // / +de las rnam par grol ba dang rnam par  grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'byung ngo zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257105#257114#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5353;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5354;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5355;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5356# dper na mi phyug po bu lon chags pa yod na phyug po zhes kyang bya bu lon chags pa  zhes kyang bya ste / / +bu lon bcal zin nas / /

column3: rgya che ba nyid kyi khyad par zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni sna tshogs dang tshad med pa ste / / +'di ltar de dag gis sems can rjes su bzung ba'i phyir de lta bu dang de lta bu yang bslab par  bya'o ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257113#257130#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5355;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5356;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5357;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5358;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5359# phyug po kho na zhes brjod pa bzhin no zhes 'byung ste / / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530735#530736#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10622;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10623# bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa  las kyang de skad du ston to // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las na rnam pa gsum yod de / /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519381#519383#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9042;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9043# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las kyang de skad du ston to // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu  bshad pa chen po las ni bshad pa rnam pa gsum yod de / /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2350796#2350797#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4623;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4624# bstan  bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa las kyang de skad du ston to // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ni ci'i phyir 'di bzhi la gzugs med pa zhes bya zhe na / /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527253#527253#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10145# rgya cher rnam par 'byed  pa ni bstan bcos gzhung bstan pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: bsod nams tshad med pa rgya che ba yongs su 'dzin pa nyid ni snying rje chen po yongs su ma chad pa'i phyir bsod nams tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257131#257144#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5358;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5359;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5360;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5361# rgyu rnam pa drug gis gtong bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad de / / +lnga ni  mdzod kyi bstan bcos las 'byung ba dang mthun no // /

column3: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bya ba'i bsam pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya che ba nyid ces bya ba la dge ba la yang dag  par 'dzud pa ni phan pa'i bsam pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257145#257156#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5361;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5362# de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos las sde pa gzhan kha cig na re yang dag pa'i chos nub pas kyang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#684769#684769#TD4083E.TXT.r_100;TD4083E.TXT.r_101;TD4083E.TXT.r_102# nyin zhag  gcig pa'i yang dag par blangs pa ni dka' ba spyod pa dang 'dod pa las dben pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang  yun ring por rjes su 'brel ba med pa'i phyir 'di la 'os pa ma yin pas ma bstan to // / +'di ltar bstan par 'gyur te / / +so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdom  pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin te / /

column3: de nyid la lam bde pas sbyor ba ni bde pa'i bsam pa'o // / +yang na phyi ma la bde bar smon pa ni phan pa'i bsam pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257155#257167#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5361;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5362;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5363# de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos las sde pa gzhan kha cig na re yang dag pa'i chos nub pas kyang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur te / / +'di ltar chos nub pa'i tshe bslab pa'i gnas dang   mtshams gcod pa'i las la sogs pa thams cad kyang nub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brten pa ni dmigs pa'i phyir ro // / +nyan thos la sogs pa la 'di thams  cad med pas rgya che ba nyid kyi khyad par ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257168#257182#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5362;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5363;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5364;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5365# 'di ltar chos nub pa'i tshe bslab pa'i gnas dang   mtshams gcod pa'i las la sogs pa thams cad kyang nub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +mdo sde pa dag gi gzhung gis / / +rgyu rnam pa lngas sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur bar bshad pa'ang mdzod kyi bstan pa dag dang mthun te / /

column3: zab pa'i khyad par gyi dbang du byas nas / / +gang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa de lta bus zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257181#257192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5364;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5365;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5366;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5367# rgyu rnam pa lngas sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur bar bshad pa'ang mdzod kyi bstan pa dag dang mthun te / / +mtshan mo zad pa zhes par mi 'byung bar yang de nyes  pa lci bar 'byung bas bstan te / /

column3: srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i las gang gi gnas skabs su spyod ce na / / +gal te de gzhan mi dge    pa'i las la 'jug par mngon du phyogs par shes shing de'i sems kyang rig par gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257193#257210#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5366;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5367;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5368# de'i phyir bstan bcos de kho na nyid grub pa las / / +sde pa gzhan kha cig na re nyes pa lci ba bzhi po ltung bar 'gyur ba'i nyes pa dag las gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa gcig byung na / /

column3: de rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang mi zlogs pa dang  ngan song du yang 'gro ba dang  de bsad na bde 'gror skye ba yang mthong nas bdag las 'dis ngan song du 'gro ba ni bla'i / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257211#257225#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5368;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5369;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5370;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5371# dge tshul dang  dge slong gi sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /// / +'byung ba yin no // /

column3: 'di dag sdug bsngal gyi phung  po chen po dang ldan par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob pas mi gtong zhing sman pa lta bur phan par 'dod pas srog gcod pa'i las byed na kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257226#257236#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5371;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5372;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5373;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5374# nyan thos kyi sdom pa ni rgyu rnam pa lngas spong bar 'gyur ro zhes mdo sde pa ngag gis bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de / / +de'i bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257236#257244#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5373;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5376# de la rgyu dus na / / +dge slong gi  sdom pa blangs pa gtong bar 'gyur zhe na / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257244#257255#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5376# dge slong gi  sdom pa blangs pa gtong bar 'gyur zhe na / / +mdor bsdu na rgyu rnam pa lnga ste / / +bslab pa'i gzhi rnams phul ba'i phyir dang  ltung ba'i rtsa ba lhag par spyod pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nub cing mtshan gnyis skye ba'i phyir dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa'i phyir dang  rigs mthun pa spangs ba'i  phyir dge slong gi sdom ba blangs pa gtong bar 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.008#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2712159#2712163#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1306# de la rgyu dus na dge slong gi sdom pa blangs kyang  gtong bar 'gyur zhe na / /
column8: 0.022#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2712074#2712074#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1294# de ltar na las byed pa'i slob  dpon med pa dang  mkhan po med pa dang dge 'dun tshul la gnas pa tshad bar med pa ma gtogs par rgyu drug po de dag gis na dge slong gi sdom pa len par mi 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.022#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2711585#2711587#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1236;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1237# gal te bsam pa mtshungs pas len par byed cing de bzhin du srung bar yang byed na ni bye brag ni 'ga' yang med par rig par bya'o // / +de la rgyu dus na dge slong gi sdom pa len par    mi 'gyur zhing / /
column10: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2711595#2711595#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1238# dge slong gi sdom pa 'dod kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: bsod nams tshad med pa yang skyed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang  chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257250#257264#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5376# bslab pa'i gzhi rnams phul ba'i phyir dang  ltung ba'i rtsa ba lhag par spyod pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nub cing mtshan gnyis skye ba'i phyir dang  dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa'i phyir dang  rigs mthun pa spangs ba'i  phyir dge slong gi sdom ba blangs pa gtong bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: gzhan du ni ma yin no // / +zab pa nyid ni rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro // / +yang lus dang ngag gi las rtogs par dka' ba ni des rgyal srid kyang byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257353#257371#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5387;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5388# 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // / +kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid dang  don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang  byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam pa'i mtshan nyid dang  ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang  de'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang   de myong ba rnam par bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de'i bar du chod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang  de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang  de'i nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid dang  de'i phan yon gyi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bcom ldan 'das kyis    yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121598#3121610#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4251# kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid dang  don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang   byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam pa'i mtshan nyid dang  ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang  de'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang  de myong ba rnam par bsnyad pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de'i bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid  dang ; /
column6: 0.017#TD4070E.TXT.r#2821358#2821358#TD4070E.TXT.r_3016;TD4070E.TXT.r_3017# kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de ni mtshan nyid kho nas ngo bo nyid med pa ste / / +de'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar byas pa de  nyid kyis de ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan te / /
column7: 0.021#TD4050E.TXT.r#1098208#1098209#TD4050E.TXT.r_147;TD4050E.TXT.r_148# shes bya'i mtshan nyid ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid de ngo bo nyid gsum mo // /
column8: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3098524#3098525#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1009;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1010# ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du yongs su rtog pa dang  bye brag gi mtshan nyid yongs su rtog pa dang  gzung ba'i mtshan nyid du yongs su rtog pa dang  'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid du yongs su rtog pa'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047901#1047902#TD4054E.TXT.r_8978# gang du de kho na'i mtshan nyid las brtsams nas yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang  spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang  mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang  bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid dang  de kho na'i mtshan nyid la  sogs pa 'di dag gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  gnas dang gnas pa 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang  rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su ma shes pa la sogs pa dang  yongs su shes pa la sogs  pa la nyes dmigs dang phan yon gyi mtshan nyid kyis don ston pa ste // /
column10: 0.025#TD4027E.TXT.r#553578#553580#TD4027E.TXT.r_164# yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa'i don bsdus  pa ni yod pa'i mtshan nyid dang  med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rang gi mtshan nyid dang  bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid dang  med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i thabs kyi mtshan nyid dang  rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam grangs kyi mtshan nyid dang  'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa'i  mtshan nyid de / /
column11: 0.025#TD4065E.TXT.r#431046#431047#TD4065E.TXT.r_565# gang so so'i skye bo rnams kyis chos rnams la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du sgro btags pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid du sgro btags pa'i bdag nyid des de dag  bdag med kyi / /
column12: 0.027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3129241#3129241#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5152# gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  skye ba'i rgyu'i ngo bo nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dang  phyi mar skye ba las yang  dag par 'das pa dang  'chi 'pho ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang  skad cig gcig nas gcig tu 'bral ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang  'gro ba 'gyur ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang  las kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'du byed las yang dag par 'das pa nyid kyis so // /

column16: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#489114#489114#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5250# gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dang  chos dkar po'i mtshan nyid dang  gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid dang   brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column17: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#188182#188187#TD4035E.TXT.r_10804# de'i 'og ma bzhi pa ni dus kyi mtshan nyid dang  skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  rga ba'i mtshan nyid dang  gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang  mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang  sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid dang  stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang  bdag  med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par shes par bya ba'i mtshan nyid dang  gzung ba'i mtshan nyid dang  sdug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  phan 'dogs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tha snyad kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid dang  log    bar bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid de / /
column18: 0.028#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296825#2296827#TD4049E.TXT.r_1680# gang med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dang  'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang  'bral ba'i mtshan nyid dang  nye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang  skad cig gi    mtshan nyid dang  rgyun gyi mtshan nyid dang  nang la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  sems sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang  longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rgud pa'i mtshan nyid dang  snod 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i mtshan nyid do // /

column12: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506493#506493#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7490# rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa sha stag yin pas don dam pa'i  bden pa shin tu phra ba shin tu zab pa 'du byed rnams dang gcig pa tha dad pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du mi chud do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar ston to // /

column3: theg pa chen po'i chos la dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyan thos kyi chos la dmigs pa sel to // / +sna tshogs  kyis rab tu dbye ba ni theg pa chen po snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257442#257454#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5394;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5395# de la kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni gnyis pa go  rims bzhin du mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /

column3: gang la snyoms par zhugs na theg pa chen po'i chos mtha' dag snang ba de theg pa chen po snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257455#257471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5395;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5396;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5397# 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa bcu gcig tu dbye ste / /

column3: gang du bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bsags te / / +bdag gir byas par gyur pa de ni bsod  nams thams cad yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257472#257483#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5397;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5398;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5399# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis po grangs smos pa dang  go rims bzhin du  rnam par phye ste bshad PA BSTAN TE / / +'di ni dang po'o // /
column5: 0.024#TD4053E.TXT.r#2998761#2998761#TD4053E.TXT.r_4509;TD4053E.TXT.r_4510;TD4053E.TXT.r_4511# gang zag dang chos     // / +kyi dngos po bkag pa'i phyir ro // / +sgro 'dogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por 'di ltar ming ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya ba gsungs te / /
column6: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1046101#1046101#TD4054E.TXT.r_8713;TD4054E.TXT.r_8714# gang zag dang chos kyi dngos po bkag pa'i phyir ro // / +sgro 'dogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por 'di  ltar ming ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo zhes gsungs te / /
column7: 0.025#TD4032E.TXT.r#1957075#1957076#TD4032E.TXT.r_5828# yod pa dang med pa la gyeng ba dang bral ba'i phyir dang  phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pas yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2775386#2775386#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10370# gang zag gi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i mtshan ma'i don dang  chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang  bral ba'i mtshan ma'i don gyis so // /
column9: 0.027#TD4070E.TXT.r#2814616#2814616#TD4070E.TXT.r_1944;TD4070E.TXT.r_1945# las cig shos kyi gtan tshigs bstan pa'i phyir / / +de dang ldan pa'i gang zag dang 'grogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras so // /
column10: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1328665#1328668#TD4037E.TXT.r_1765;TD4037E.TXT.r_1766;TD4037E.TXT.r_1767# de'i mod la rnam par dag par 'gyur te / / +de ni yongs su smin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no // / +de la  yongs su smin par bya ba'i gang zag rnams ni sgrub pa dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhi ste / /
column11: 0.028#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692098#1692099#TD4048E.TXT.r_1152;TD4048E.TXT.r_1153# tshogs chen pos brtan pa'i phyir ro // / +rtogs pa'i khyad par ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med par rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261025#261026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5884;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5885# rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis 'du byed rnams skye ba dang  rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ltos  pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa'i go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po bzang skyong ni / / +'jig rten gyi rgyal po bzhin du ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236803#236804#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2922# pha rol tu phyin pa ni ches lhag par bde ba dang  yid bde ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang gzhan  thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma la de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnas kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni mthar rnam par 'gyur zhing  'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257483#257492#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5399# gang zag bstan pa'i phyir dang  kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir dang  chos rnams kyi byed pa dang  gyo ba dang  las byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column6: 0.020#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121637#3121638#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4254# gang zag bstan pa dang  kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid  bstan pa dang  chos rnams kyi byed pa dang  gyo ba dang las byed pa bstan pas blta bar bya'o // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230034#230036#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2062# 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang  longs spyod dang  dbang phyug dang  'dod pa'i bsod nams las shin tu yon tan gyi phan yon du lta pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste  bshad pa ston to // /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239987#239989#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3341# de'i phyir grogs yang dag par bcom pa'i bag la nyal zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la  sogs pas ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362655#2362656#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6059# 'du byed thams cad kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni  gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column10: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2587832#2587832#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6467;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6468;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_6469# dper na gzugs dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dag la yang sdug bsngal nyid du lta mod kyi de dag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba ni ma yin pa bzhin te / / +de ni gnod par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir la / / +de dag gi mtshan nyid ni de ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231069#231070#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2182# snying rje med pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  rtag  tu mi byed pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang  ma gus pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o // /

column3: gang yod na phyogs bcu rnams su da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du mthong bar  'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257491#257500#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5399;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5400# gang zag bstan pa'i phyir dang  kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir dang  chos rnams kyi byed pa dang  gyo ba dang  las byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236804#236804#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2922# pha rol tu phyin pa ni ches lhag par bde ba dang  yid bde ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang gzhan  thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma la de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnas kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir dang  pha rol tu phyin pa ni mthar rnam par 'gyur zhing  'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368831#2368831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6876# don rnam pa bzhi gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241927#241927#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3579# spri la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spangs pa'i phyir ni nges rab tu phye ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273676#273676#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7496# dngos po mod pa brgyad gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /

column3: dpa' bar 'gro ba ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mchog ste / / +dmag mi rnams kyi nang na dmag dpon dpa' bo bzhin du bdud kyi tshogs 'joms par nus pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257501#257515#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5400;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5402;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5403# 'di ni mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas kun rdzob bstan pa yin te / /

column3: gnyen pos rab tu dbye ba ni chos thams cad 'dres pa la dmigs pa dang ldan pas sgrib pa thams cad kyi gnyen po'i dngos  por gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257516#257532#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5402;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5403;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5404;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5405;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5407# dang po bdag dang chos byed bstan // / +gzhan gyi rjes mthun phyir ni bshad // /

column3: de bzhin nyid du chos thams cad 'dres par byed de / / +de las gud na med pa'i phyir ro // / +khye'us khye'u dbyung ba'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni khye'u snga ma khye'u phyi mas dbyung ba'i tshul du zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257528#257536#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5407;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5408# dang po kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni bdag  bstan pa dang  chos bstan pa dang  byed pa bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257537#257547#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5407;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5408;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5409# de la bdag bstan pa ni 'di lta ste / / +sems can dang  srog dang skye ba po dang  gang zag dang  mi dang  skyes pa dang  bud med dang  sangs rgyas bshes gnyen dang  chos kyi srung BA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pa bstan pa gang yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257605#257605#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5423;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5424;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5425# chos bstan pa dang  dngos po bstan pa'o // / +de la bdag bstan pa ni 'di lta ste / / +sems can dang  srog dang  spyod pa po dang  lha dang  mi dang  skyes pa dang  bud med ces bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: dper na khye'u phra mos khye'u sbom po 'byin pa de bzhin du kun gzhi rnam    par shes pa la nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i sa bon bag chags kyi bdag nyid rags pa gnas pa thams cad de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa gnyen po'i shes pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin phra mos 'byin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257548#257558#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5408;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5409;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5410;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5411# sems can dang  srog dang skye ba po dang  gang zag dang  mi dang  skyes pa dang  bud med dang  sangs rgyas bshes gnyen dang  chos kyi srung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa gang yin pa'o // / +chos  bstan pa ni 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257558#257582#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5410;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5411;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5412;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5413;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5415;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5417# gzugs dang tshor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa gang yin pa'o // / +gal te kun rdzob kyi bden pa don dam par yod pa ma yin na / /

column3: las su rung ba nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba ni bsam gtan gyis de ba dag gis gnas nas  bsam gtan las yongs su ma nyams pa bzhin du ji ltar 'dod pa gang du sems can gyi don mthong ba der skye ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257583#257590#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5417;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5418# su mthun par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan pa yin no zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan pa las / /

column3: ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba'i phyir ro // / +'di 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi las su rung ba nyid ni nyan thos la sogs pa nyid la med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257591#257603#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5417;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5418;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5419;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5420;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5421;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5422;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5423;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5424# gzhan yang bstan bcos ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan pa las / / +kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na / / +smras pa / /

column3: mngon par bsgrub pas rab tu dbye ba ni ting nge  'dzin gyi yon tan gyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams su thogs pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa skyed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257600#257614#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5421;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5422;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5423;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5424;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5425;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5426# 'di lta ste / / +bdag bstan pa  dang ; / +chos bstan pa dang  dngos po bstan pa'o // /

column3: de la gyo ba la sogs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung ste / / +'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa gyo bar byed pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'gul bar byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257615#257627#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5425;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5426;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5427;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5429;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5430# sems can dang  srog dang  spyod pa po dang  lha dang  mi dang  skyes pa dang  bud med ces BYA BA LA SOGS PA gang yin pa'o // / +chos bstan pa ni 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.018#TD4066E.TXT.r#2117217#2117219#TD4066E.TXT.r_2133;TD4066E.TXT.r_2134# tshor ba la sogs pa ni gnas kyi dbang gis nye ba dang ring ba'o // / +gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang  tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa rnams so // /

column3: 'bar par  byed pa dang khyab par byed pa yang de bzhin no // / +'jig rten gyi khams mthong bar mi nus pa mtha' yas pa gzhan dag gam sangs rgyas la sogs pa yang ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257628#257641#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5429;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5431# 'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba LA SOGS PA GANG YIN pa'o // / +dngos po bstan pa ni 'di lta ste / / +mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  skyes pa dang  'gag pa zhes bya ba LA SOGS PA GANG YIN pa 'di ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: sa la sogs pa yang pa yang chu la sogs pa'i dngos por gzhan du sgyur ro // / +skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams du mar 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257642#257651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5431# mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  skyes pa dang  'gag pa zhes bya BA LA SOGS PA GANG YIN pa 'di ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +de la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid  rnam pa bdun bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121645#3121649#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4254;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4255# gang zag bstan pa dang  kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid  bstan pa dang  chos rnams kyi byed pa dang  gyo ba dang las byed pa bstan pas blta bar bya'o // / +de la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa yin par blta bar bya'o // /

column3: 'ong ngo ;; / +rdul phra rab gcig gi nang du 'jig rten gyi khams mang po sdud kyang cher mi skye bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257652#257662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5431;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5432;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5433# de la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid  rnam pa bdun bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste / /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520145#520145#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9159# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par bshad  pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las / /

column3: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rnams su rdul gcig gis rgyas par byed de / / +khyab par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257663#257670#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5432;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5433;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5435# bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las ji skad du / / +don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid ni bdun dag go zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: rang gi lus su gzugs kyi lus thams cad 'jug go // / +gdul pa'i phyir gang gi  gzugs gang yin pa de'i gan du gzugs de nyid kyis 'gro'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257671#257683#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5434;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5435;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5436;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5438# 'di nyid kyi 'grel pa las / / +don  dam pa'i bden pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: snang bar byed pa ni mngon par byed pa'o // / +mi snang bar byed pa ni mi mngon par byed pa'o // / +dbang nyid du byed pa ni bdud sangs rgyas nyid du sgyur ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257684#257698#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5438;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5439;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5440;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5442# gang du sngar bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun la / /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520652#520653#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9229# ci'i phyir de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun la don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya zhe na / /

column3: gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul rab tu 'joms pa ni gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul zil gyis gnon  pa'o ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257696#257709#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5444# ye shes mchog gnyis kyi spyod yul du gyur pa'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520669#520674#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9233;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9234# 'jig rten  las 'das pa'i ye shes dang  rjes las thob pa'i 'jig rten pa'i ye shes so // / +don dam pa 'di spros pa med pa'i phyir ye shes gzhan gyi yul ma yin no // /
column6: 0.016#TD4032E.TXT.r#1958420#1958420#TD4032E.TXT.r_6042;TD4032E.TXT.r_6043# dbu ma'i lam gang chos tsam zhig yul du gyur pa'i ye shes so // / +de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gang bdag med par so sor rtog pa nas shed bu med par so sor rtog pa'i bar du'o zhes bya ba smos so // /
column7: 0.020#TD4013E.TXT.r#621803#621805#TD4013E.TXT.r_1508# de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang  mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su zin pa'i phyir bsod nams shin du khyad par du 'phags par rig  par bya'o // /
column8: 0.022#TD4029E.TXT.r#2162382#2162383#TD4029E.TXT.r_5508# gang zag dang chos su lta ba'i gnyen po'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1220011#1220012#TD4047E.TXT.r_14002;TD4047E.TXT.r_14003# de spangs ma thag nyid du de'i gnyen po'i ye shes 'thob par bstan pa'i phyir / /
column10: 0.024#TD4019E.TXT.r#2493613#2493613#TD4019E.TXT.r_11291;TD4019E.TXT.r_11292# chos bstan zhes pa ni snga ma rnams kyis bstan pa las rtog pa med pa'i  ye shes khong du chud pa'o // / +de 'dra ba spros pa dang bral ba'i don dam pa 'di la go rims dang mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par dbye ba mi 'thad de / /
column11: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936398#936398#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5991# dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.025#TD4032E.TXT.r#1920463#1920463#TD4032E.TXT.r_111;TD4032E.TXT.r_112# ci'i phyir bstan bcos 'di bshad ce na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir te / / +chos la bdag med pa bstan pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bskyed pa dang  de goms pas bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs  pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa ma lus par spangs pa thob par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.026#TD4079E.TXT.r#760098#760099#TD4079E.TXT.r_592;TD4079E.TXT.r_593# rtog pa don dam pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes te / / +'di la don dam pa yod pas zhes bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1215587#1215588#TD4047E.TXT.r_13386;TD4047E.TXT.r_13387# de yang rnam par rtog pa can gyi shes pas mtshan mar bya bar mi  nus pas te / / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#937383#937383#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6121;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6122# chos kyi sku'i rgyu mthun pa  las rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku byung nas sar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos rnams kyi longs spyod rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rjes las thob pa dag la 'jig rten pa'i ye shes la     // /
column16: 0.027#TD4061E.TXT.r#1522635#1522639#TD4061E.TXT.r_1343;TD4061E.TXT.r_1344# shes rab kyis so sor 'bigs par byed pa ni bdag gis mngon sum du byas so zhes 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi rjes las thob pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis nges par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#525366#525366#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9907;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9908# rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa'i spyod yul ni ma yin te / / +shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhe'o // /
column18: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2952591#2952593#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11668# gang zag dang  chos la bdag med par chud pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rnyed pa'i phyir lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gang zag ces bya'o // /
column19: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1123363#1123363#TD4047E.TXT.r_285# byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de dag dang  rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa dang  thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar thug pa'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro / /

column3: spobs pa med pa rnams la spobs pa sbyin par byed do // / +brjed ngas pa rnams la dran pa sbyin par byed do // / +gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gug par 'gyur ba pho nya lta bu'i 'od zer gtong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257710#257725#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5445;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5447# don dam pa 'di la spros pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin no // /

column3: gang dag nyan thos la sogs pa la med pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag     // / +mngon par 'du byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257726#257733#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5446;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5447;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5448# de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun la  don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bshad de / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: gang dka' ba spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod pa dka' ba spyod pa rnam pa bcu po de dag ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257734#257741#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5448# byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid ni shes bya'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan    pa'o ; / /

column3: khas blang bar dka' ba spyod pa ni byang chub chen por smon lam 'debs pa khas len pa'i phyir te / / +dka' pa ni bdag gi bde ba la mi lta bar  gzhan gyi don byed par dam 'cha' ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257742#257754#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5448;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5449;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5450# byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid ni shes bya'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan    pa'o ; / /
column5: 2.384#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#953543#953546#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8130# bsgrub  par bya ba'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun dang  bshad par bya ba'i chos gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis dang 'thob par bya ba'i chos mngal du 'jug pa la sogs pa ste / /
column6: 0.011#TD4037E.TXT.r#1369242#1369242#TD4037E.TXT.r_7160# byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rnam pa  thams cad kyi dbang du byas nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mdo nyid las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du bsgom mo // /
column7: 0.011#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2629060#2629060#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11601# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i bsam gtan ni ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang cha mthun pa yin no // /
column8: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#988726#988728#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12713# mthong ba'i lam gyi mtshan nyid skad cig ma bcu drug skyes pas na de ltar lhan cig dus gcig dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dus gcig tu mthong bar dgongs te / /
column9: 0.015#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2615028#2615029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9779;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9780# byang chub kyi phyogs la bzang zhing mthun pas na gsung rab las / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa yin par    'byung ngo // /
column10: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#175287#175288#TD4035E.TXT.r_8903;TD4035E.TXT.r_8904# 'du shes dang tshor  ba 'gog pa'i bar dang  byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te / /
column11: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267684#267685#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6764# yul la dmigs pa'i rnam pa dang bcas pa dmigs pa'i bdag nyid dang bcas pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun len par byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid do // /
column12: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#969584#969586#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10179# rang rig chos rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs  te zhes bya ba la chos kyi dbyings dang  rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thugs su chud de / /
column13: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368267#2368267#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6798# 'di ltar snga ma gnyis kyi yul yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dran pa nye bag gzhag pa bzhi la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po gang yin pa dag go // /
column14: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#944889#944889#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7055# mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa la ni don zhes bya ste / /

column3: mi ldog par dka' ba spyod pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal grang ba dang rlung la sogs pas mi zlogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257755#257763#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5450;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5451;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5452# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis dmigs par bya ba'i yul gang yin pa ste / /

column3: phyir mi phyogs pa ni sems can log par sgrub pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don bya dka' ba las phyir mi phyogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257762#257774#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5451;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5453# sngar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid la sogs pa nyid do //// / +bam po bdun cu pa / /

column3: gang dag ma la  sogs pa la log par sgrub pa dang  brtse ba'i phyir mi dgos par yang mig bslangs nas rkang pa gnyis kyis 'dril ba de'i don bya dka' ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382184#2382186#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8523;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8524# grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391946#2391947#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9606# grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming  bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257772#257787#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5453;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5454;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5455# rnam pa'i mtshan nyid ni brtag pa  rnam pa brgyad bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa rnam pa brgyad kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361900#2361900#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5965# sgo bstan nas grangs smos pa dang  grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du  rnam par phye ste bshad pa dang spyi'i mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257398#257399#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5389# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis po grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pas bstan te / /

column3: mngon du phyogs par dka' pa ni gnod pa byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bya ba bya dka' ba'o // / +'jig rten du skyes kyang 'jig rten pa'i chos rnyed pa la sogs pa brgyad  kyis mi gos pa ni dka' ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534655#534655#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11092# sgo bstan nas bstan pa smos pa dang  grangs zhu zhing ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257788#257804#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5455;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5456;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5457;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5458;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5459# grangs mdor smos pa dang  ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522648#522648#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9516;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9517# yul tha dad pa drug po dag la rags par  gyo ba dang  bar du chod pa'i rnam par rig pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro // / +de la mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni / /

column3: rtogs pa med par yang theg pa chen po'i don phra zhing mthu'i khyad par can la mos shing dad par dka' ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257802#257814#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5458;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5460# mtshan nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de / / +lam gyi phyogs yang dag par bshad pa dang  dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260395#260395#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5808# yin pa'i phyir bsam par mi bya ba dang  yang dag pa'i chos ma yin pa dang  nyon mongs pas mngon par bsgrubs pa ni don dang mi ldan pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu 'dren pa'i phyir bsam par mi bya'o // /

column3: rtogs pa ni mngon par rtogs pa ste / / +yang dag par khong du chud ces bya ba dang don gcig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257815#257822#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5460;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5461;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5462# gal te de ltar ci'i phyir de bzhin nyid la sogs pa la rnam pa'i mtshan  nyid ces bstan zhe na / /

column3: gang zag dang chos med pa'i ngo bo nyid kun  brtags pa dgag pa'i sgo nas bya dka' ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257823#257832#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5460;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5462;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5461;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5463# gal te de ltar ci'i phyir de bzhin nyid la sogs pa la rnam pa'i mtshan  nyid ces bstan zhe na / / +'di ltar yul rnam pa brgyad smos nas rnal 'byor gyi brtag pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: khong du chud pa ni dgongs te gsungs pa'o // / +dka' ba ni thos pa'i don btang ste / / +ma thos pa'i don rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257833#257844#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5462;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5463;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5464# 'di ltar yul rnam pa brgyad smos nas rnal 'byor gyi brtag pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +bstan pa rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366812#2366813#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6602;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6603# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bden pa gnyis bstan pa las 'byung ba bzhin  du rig par bya'o // / +yon tan gyi phyir dang skyon gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yon tan dang skyon gyi sgo bstan pa'o // /

column3: 'khor ba yang yongs su mi gtong la de'i nyes pas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni dka' ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257843#257852#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5464;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5465# bden pa kho na'i phyir dang  gnas pa'i phyir dang  skyon gyi phyir dang  yon tan gyi phyir dang  tshul khrims dang  'jug pa'i phyir  dang ; /
column5: 0.018#TD4036E.TXT.r#12206#12206#TD4036E.TXT.r_1774;TD4036E.TXT.r_1775;TD4036E.TXT.r_1776# rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin / / +sgeg pa'i phyir ma yin // / +brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par sngar bstan pa ltar ro / /
column6: 0.020#TD4001E.TXT.r#1976866#1976869#TD4001E.TXT.r_606;TD4001E.TXT.r_607;TD4001E.TXT.r_608# mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni yang srid pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ro // / +rnam par rig pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.022#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2032973#2032973#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7959;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_7960# de'i ro myong bar byed  pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i tshor ba'i ro myong bar byed pa'i phyir ro // / +de la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i tshor ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.022#TD4069E.TXT.r#638266#638267#TD4069E.TXT.r_2188# lus snang bar byed pa dang  snang bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni snang bar byed pa'i phyir dang   snang bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.024#TD4069E.TXT.r#636812#636812#TD4069E.TXT.r_1976# 'bad pa med pa dang  ji ltar 'dod par  'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'bad pa med par 'byung ba'i phyir dang  ji ltar 'dod par 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column10: 0.024#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2633719#2633719#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12229;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12230# bsam gtan ni rnam pa gsum ste ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang  dag pa dang  zag pa med pa'o zhes pa  'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +log par nges par sems pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni log par nges par rtog pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column11: 0.024#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2638586#2638591#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12844;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12845# de yang nye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ci yang med pa de nye ba'i phyir  te thag nye ba'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.024#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2074425#2074425#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13959;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13960# 'dis rnam par 'byed par byed pas na zhes bya ba'i phyir ro // / +'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2568959#2568959#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_4148;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_4149# bdag gi zhes bya ba ni gsum par bstan pa'i phyir la / / +bdag gi phyir zhes bya ba ni bzhi par  bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2005778#2005778#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4077;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_4078# bzod par dka' pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni zil gyis mnan par dka' ba'i phyir ro // / +chos mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lung dang rtogs pa'i chos dag mngon sum du byas pa'i phyir dang  dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2051088#2051088#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10564;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10565# rgyu smras pa ni slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ste / / +chos brtan par bkod pa'i phyir dang brtan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column16: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#12537#12537#TD4036E.TXT.r_1824;TD4036E.TXT.r_1825;TD4036E.TXT.r_1826# rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin / / +sgeg pa'i phyir ma yin / / +brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa de dag  gis ni / /
column17: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529989#1529989#TD4061E.TXT.r_2377;TD4061E.TXT.r_2378# gdul ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bral bar bya ba'i phyir ro / / +ma lus par spang bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: de gnyis mi 'byed pa'i phyir ro // / +sbyor bar dka' ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib thams cad las rnam par grol ba spangs pa la zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i khyad par ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257853#257868#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5465;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5467# rigs pa'i phyir dang  bsdus pa dang  rgyas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa ste / /

column3: gal te sbyin pa cung zad mi sbyin la zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan  mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas sems can thams cad bdag gir byas te sbyin pa de byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257869#257883#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5467;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5468;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5469# 'og nas re re nas ston pas de'i phyir 'dir ma bstan to // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni / /

column3: thams cad la thams cad sbyin par dgongs pa'o // / +yang na sbyin par bya ba dang sbyin par byed pa dang  len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas    so ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257884#257895#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5468;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5469;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5470;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5471;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5472# bden pa dang  rnam par gzhag pa dang  skyon dang  yon  tan dang  tshul dang  'jug pa dang  rigs dang  bsdus pa dang  rgyas pa zhes 'byung ste / / +re re'i mgor ni so sor brtags pa dang  mjug tu ni spyod pa zhes 'byung yang / /

column3: gal te sbyin pa thams cad la 'dod par mi byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni bkag pa la 'dod pa med ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257896#257904#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5470;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5471;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5472# don ni mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun no // / +de la bden pa ni 'di lta ste / / +chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid  gang YANG PA'O ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366535#2366535#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6562# phyi rol gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya ba'am de lta bu la sogs pa  thams cad do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o // /

column3: nye ba la sbyin pa dang  bdag la sbyin pa byin pa dang  bdag la sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ba dang  bdag gi snga rabs rnams kyis byin pas sbyin no snyam pa de la 'dod par  mi byed kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257905#257912#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5472;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5473# chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid  gang yang pa'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257913#257929#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5473;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5474;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5475;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5476;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5477# 'di yang rnam par brtag pa rnam pa brgyad kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa las rnam pa brgyad du dbye ste / /

column3: mya ngan las 'das pa la dmigs pa dang  dngos po la mi gnas par 'dod par byed pa'o // / +gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad pas mi 'gro ba'o zhes bya ba ni so so rang gis rigs par bya ba'i chos nyid khong du chud nas rang gi rtogs pas sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i  tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257930#257944#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5475;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5476;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5477;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5478;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5479;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5480# 'di ltar rtsa ba'i ye shes kyis de     // / +bzhin nyid mngon sum du gyur cing / / +rang bzhin mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni bden pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: gal te bdag sbyin pa la 'jug par mi byed pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngang gis 'jug pas sbyin pa'i phyir de la bdag nyid 'jug mi dgos pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257945#257958#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5479;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5480;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5481;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5482;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5483# de'i phyir bden pa kho na zhes gsungs so // / +gnas pa ni 'di lta ste / / +gang zag gi rnam par gzhag pa'am / /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#493659#493661#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5854;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5855# 'dus byas dang  'dus ma byas thob pa gang yin pa 'di ni gdon mi za bar yang dag par mad mod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // /

column3: gzhan ni 'jug par byed de / / +yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i phyir ro gal te lan 'ga' sbyin pa ci yang sbyin par mi byed pa'o zhes  bya ba ni rtag tu thams cad sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257959#257969#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5482;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5483;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5484;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5486# chos rnams  kyi kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag PA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste / / +bdag dang chos su 'dzin pa gnyis rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'ang / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257969#257986#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5484;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5485;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5486;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5487;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5488;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5489# bdag dang chos su 'dzin pa gnyis rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'ang / / +lung bstan pa rnam pa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'am / / +chos dang rnam par dbye ba ste / /

column3: gal te sbyin pa la snying po med pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa'o zhes bya ba la mi 'phro ba na ting nge 'dzin te // /
column4: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537961#537961#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11538# 'di ltar yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag dang chos la sogs par 'dzin pa de dag ni sems kyi rjes su yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir // /

column3: des sems rnam par mi 'phro ba'i phyir ro // / +der 'du shes pa ni mnyam par bzhag pas sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i tha  tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257985#257999#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5489;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5490;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5491# 'di ltar kun brtags pas bdag dang chos yang dag pa nyid du 'dzin pa dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis yod cing / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378550#2378550#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8091# gzugs brnyan de la brten nas yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyi rjes su yongs su 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma yod par 'gyur pas // /

column3: gal te ser sna 'byung bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni rtsa nas 'byin ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257998#258007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5491;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5492;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5493# yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyi rjes su yod par 'dzin pa'i phyir rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: gal te mtha' la mi gnas par gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni zhi bar bgrod pa gcig pu la nyan thos ltar gnas pa ma yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258008#258019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5492;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5493;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5494# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du 'grub pa las / / +kun tu brtags pa'i bdag yang dag pa dang  chos yang dag pa ni yod PA MA YIN YANG / /

column3: gal te sbyin pa la dbang byed pa ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba  ni sbyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna la sogs pa dbang byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258020#258031#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5494;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5495# yang dag pa ma yin  pa'i sems kyi rjes su rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // / +mgo gcig pa dang  rnam par dbye ba dang  dris nas lan gdab pa dang  gzhag pas lung bstan pa rnam par gzhag PA ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS pa lung bstan pa rnam pa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121690#3121691#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4263;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4264# kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par gzhag pa'am / / +mgo gcig dang  rnam par dbye ba dang  dris te lan gdab pa rnam par  gzhag pa'am / /

column3: gal te mi zad pa la mi gnas par gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni phun sum tshogs pa phul du byung ba'i mthar thug pa sangs rgyas nyid thob nas de nyid du mi gnas kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258032#258044#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5495;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5496# mgo gcig pa dang  rnam par dbye ba dang  dris nas lan gdab pa dang  gzhag pas lung bstan pa rnam par gzhag PA ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa lung bstan pa rnam pa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: sprul pa rnams kyis  gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir sbyin pa la 'jug ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258043#258052#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5496# rgol ba'i lan gdab pa'i chos las brtsams nas lung bstan pa bzhi'i smra ba rnam par gzhag pas de'i phyir rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa la yang ci rigs su zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258051#258060#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5496;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5497;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5498;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5499# rgol ba'i lan gdab pa'i chos las brtsams nas lung bstan pa bzhi'i smra ba rnam par gzhag pas de'i phyir rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2466450#2466451#TD4019E.TXT.r_7816;TD4019E.TXT.r_7817# cang mi smra bar bzhag pas lung bstan pa ni ji skad du kha cig bdag ces bya ba'i dngos po ci dge ba zhig gam 'on te mi dge ba zhig ces 'dri ba dang  mo gsham gyi bu mdog dkar ba zhig gam 'on  te gnag pa zhig ces 'dri ba LA SOGS PA LA CANG MI smra bar bzhag pas lung bstan pa ste / / +ji ltar 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las gsungs pa lta bu'o // /

column3: ji ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na / / +gal te tshul khrims chung zad mi srung     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367984#2367996#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6765# ji skad du lung bstan pa rnam pa bzhi ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa dang  rnam par phye nas  lung bstan pa dang  dris nas lung bstan pa dang  mi smra bar gzhag pas lung bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258061#258076#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5497;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5498;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5499# 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las / / +ji skad du / / +lung bstan pa'i smra ba rnam pa bzhi ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa dang  rnam par phye nas  lung bstan pa dang  dris nas lung bstan pa dang  cang mi smra bar gzhag pas lung bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368032#2368034#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6769;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6770# don de dag ni nges par de yin no zhes mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa lta bu'o // / +rnam par phye nas lung bstan pa ni / /

column3: bdag dang gzhan ma nyam pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir gzhan gyi tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367988#2368000#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6765;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6766# ji skad du lung bstan pa rnam pa bzhi ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa dang  rnam par phye nas  lung bstan pa dang  dris nas lung bstan pa dang  mi smra bar gzhag pas lung bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368069#2368071#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6774;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6775# slar de nyid las khyod gang la ltos te 'dri zhes slar dris nas lung bstan pa lta bu'o // / +mi smra bar gzhag pas lung bstan pa ni / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258068#258077#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5499# lung bstan pa'i smra ba rnam pa bzhi ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa dang  rnam par phye nas  lung bstan pa dang  dris nas lung bstan pa dang  cang mi smra bar gzhag pas lung bstan pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258139#258141#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5506;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5507# sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog gcig kho  nar zad dam zhes dris pa la sogs pa la don 'di ni de ltar ma nges so zhes rnam par phye nas lung bstan pa lta bu'o // / +dris nas lung bstan pa ni ji ltar kha cig 'di skad du / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258171#258178#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5511;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5512;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5513# 'on te khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin zhes dris pa la sogs pa la khyod gang la ltos te 'dri zhes dris nas lung bstan pa lta bu'o // / +cang mi smra bar bzhag pas lung bstan pa ni ji skad du / /
column9: 0.006#TD4019E.TXT.r#2466335#2466340#TD4019E.TXT.r_7800;TD4019E.TXT.r_7801;TD4019E.TXT.r_7802;TD4019E.TXT.r_7803# skye ba thams cad gdon mi za bar 'gag par 'gyur ba yin nam    dkon mchog gsum bsod nams kyi zhing gshin pa yin nam zhes pa la sogs pa dris pa la / / +de ltar yin no zhes lung bstan pa lta bu'o // / +rnam par phye nas lung bstan pa ni kha cig 'di skad du / /
column10: 0.013#TD4069E.TXT.r#645540#645543#TD4069E.TXT.r_3223# mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa la sogs pa rnams ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa dang rnam par phye ste lung bstan pa dang  dris nas lung bstan pa dang  gzhag par  lung bstan pa ni 'dri ba ste / /
column11: 0.014#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2936466#2936467#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9422;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9423# gang chen por lung bstan pa'o // / +de la chen por lung bstan pa ni sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu  lung bstan pa zhes bya'o // /
column12: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367962#2367962#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6763# mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa'i phyir dang  rnam par phye nas lung  bstan pa'i phyir dang  dris nas lung bstan pa'i phyir dang  gzhag pas lung bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bcu pa lung bstan pa rnam ba bzhi rab tu dbye ba'i sgo ste / /
column13: 0.017#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2572975#2572980#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_4674;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_4675# chos mang ba nyid du lung bstan pas so // / +ji ltar na dris nas lung bstan pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni dris pas lung bstan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column14: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1669979#1669979#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_12051# dri ba nyid kyis de lung bstan pa'i phyir ji ltar dris nas lung bstan pa ma yin / /
column15: 0.028#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2018178#2018178#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5871;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5872# chos mang po nyid du lung bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar na dris nas lung bstan pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni dris nas lung bstan pa kho na yin no zhes bya bar bsams pa'o // /

column3: mdo gang las / / +dge slong dag nga ni srog gcod pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba der dgongs pa ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258078#258089#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5499;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5500;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5501# lung bstan pa'i smra ba rnam pa bzhi ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa dang  rnam par phye nas  lung bstan pa dang  dris nas lung bstan pa dang  cang mi smra bar gzhag pas lung bstan pa'o // / +de la mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa ni kha cig 'di skad du / /

column3: gal te srog chags rnams 'khor ba las shin tu zlo  ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'da' bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368015#2368018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6766;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6767# de snga ma mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa ni dper na kha cig skye ba thams cad gdon mi za bar 'gag par 'gyur ram / / +sangs rgyas dang  chos dang  dge 'dun dkon mchog bsod nams kyi zhing gshin pa yin     // /

column4: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367962#2367962#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6763# mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa'i phyir dang  rnam par phye nas lung  bstan pa'i phyir dang  dris nas lung bstan pa'i phyir dang  gzhag pas lung bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bcu pa lung bstan pa rnam ba bzhi rab tu dbye ba'i sgo ste / /
column5: 0.017#TD4019E.TXT.r#2466422#2466424#TD4019E.TXT.r_7815;TD4019E.TXT.r_7816# 'on te ma yin zhes pa  la sogs pa dris pa la khyod gang la ltos te 'dri zhes slar pha ral dris nas ci rigs par lung ston pa lta bu'o // / +cang mi smra bar bzhag pas lung bstan pa ni ji skad du kha cig bdag ces bya ba'i dngos po ci dge ba zhig gam 'on te mi dge ba zhig ces 'dri ba dang  mo gsham gyi bu mdog dkar ba zhig gam 'on  te gnag pa zhig ces 'dri ba la sogs pa la cang mi smra bar bzhag pas lung bstan pa ste / /
column6: 0.022#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1669662#1669663#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_12010;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_12011# ci mi 'di khyad par du 'phags pa yin nam dman pa yin zhes 'dri na / / +gang las ltos te 'dri zhes dris nas lung bstan par bya ste / /

column9: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#532915#532915#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10866# sa'i mdun rol ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa ma yin par bstan pa dang sa la gnas pa rnams de bzhin  gshegs pas lung bstan pa yin par bstan pa ste / /

column3: shes bya'i pha rol tu gnas pa zhes bya ba ni 'dug ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste / /

column3: gal te rgyun du bla na med pa'i bsam gtan thob par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig gi tshul du snga ma bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258212#258220#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5515;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5516# lung bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang  spros pa bskyed  pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / / +rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  sa bcu pa'i 'grel ba dang  mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs  pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: sang rgyas kyi thugs kyi rgyud la mnga' ba'i bsam gtan ni bla na med pa'o // / +sems la nyon mongs  par byed pa thams cad la 'dis gnod par byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bkag pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258221#258230#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5516# rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  sa bcu pa'i 'grel ba dang  mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs  pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347095#2347098#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4180# ji ltar gnas brtan pa'i sde pa dag dpe 'di nyid la brten nas srid pa bar ma rnam par mi gzhag pa lta bu dang  mdzod  kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bye brag tu smra ba dag srid pa bar ma rnam par mi gzhag pa lta bu ste / /
column7: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371003#2371004#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7150# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa dang  yang dag pa'i rigs ba dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ste mangs kyis  dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2330032#2330032#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2269# bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo  bstan pa dag las ni dge slong lnga po dag gi ched du gsungs PA YIN NO ZHES STON te // /
column9: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341864#2341864#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3596# dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa ni bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rgya cher ston to // /

column11: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368115#2368115#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6780# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa  ni mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258258#258266#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5518;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5519# 'di ltar de  bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dbang gi rjes su phan gdags pa'i phyir ched 'ga' ni gsang ba dang  ched 'ga' ni rnam par dbye ba'i rnam par bzhag pas chos ston pas so // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258265#258281#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5518;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5519;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5520;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5521# 'di ltar de  bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dbang gi rjes su phan gdags pa'i phyir ched 'ga' ni gsang ba dang  ched 'ga' ni rnam par dbye ba'i rnam par bzhag pas chos ston pas so // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las gsang ba dang  rnam par dbye ba smra ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267903#267904#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6779;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6780# de'i phan yon gyi mtshan nyid ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos de dag nyid la yod pa'i yon tan gang yin  pa de ni de'i phan yon gyi mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcu gcig pa phan yon gyi mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni / /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2348813#2348813#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4352# tshig 'di gcig  kyang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig na re sems rtse gcig pa nyid ces bya ba ni kun rdzob tu rnam par rig pa tsam kho na ste yul ni sems las logs shig na med pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid ces bya'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384813#2384814#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8817;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8818;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8819# ting nge 'dzin thob pa yang gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin thob mod kyis 'go ma pa'i yid da dung nges par ma gyur cig nye bar ma zhi bas rgyus mtshan ma de  ston pa'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni / / +mtshan ma'i sems rnam par gyeng ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384564#2384564#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8789;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8790# 'di ltar 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs pas gong mar mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni nga rgyal mchog tu gyur pa'i bsam gtan dang  theg pa mchog tu gyur pa'i bsam gtan dang  lta ba mchog  tu gyur pa'i bsam gtan zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: chos kyi sku rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / / +chos kyi sku ni gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid de / /

column3: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba de bzhin nyid do // / +rtag pa ni 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro // / +dri ma med cing thogs pa med pa'i ye shes bla na med pa yang yin te / /
