column5: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047776#1047780#TD4054E.TXT.r_8963;TD4054E.TXT.r_8964# rnam par byad bar zad kyi bdag ni med do zhes rab tu bstan to // /
column6: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1350011#1350013#TD4037E.TXT.r_4596;TD4037E.TXT.r_4597# de dag la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs nas / / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs  pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // /

column3: de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spong ste / / +shes rab dang snying rjes mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260717#260724#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5840;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5841# dge slong dag ci tsam du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs  pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba'i nang du shes so zhes bya ba 'dis ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047789#1047792#TD4054E.TXT.r_8964;TD4054E.TXT.r_8965# dge slong dag  ji tsam du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar nang du shes so zhes bya ba 'dis ni / /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260824#260824#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5857# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par nang du shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ba yin no //// /

column3: de yongs su bor bas mi gnas pa'i tshul du bshad par bya'o // / +nyan thos kyi ye shes las byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rnam pa lngas khyad par du ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260725#260738#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5840;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5841;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5843# dge slong dag ci tsam du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs  pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba'i nang du shes so zhes bya ba 'dis ni / / +thob pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4053E.TXT.r#3000222#3000236#TD4053E.TXT.r_4719;TD4053E.TXT.r_4720;TD4053E.TXT.r_4721# dge slong dag ngas ji tsam tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar nang du 'du  shes so zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'thob pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bstan te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047793#1047812#TD4054E.TXT.r_8964;TD4054E.TXT.r_8965;TD4054E.TXT.r_8966;TD4054E.TXT.r_8967;TD4054E.TXT.r_8968# dge slong dag  ji tsam du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar nang du shes so zhes bya ba 'dis ni / / +mthong ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bstan te / /

column3: rnam par mi rtog pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni nyan thos rnams ni phyin ci log bzhi la rnam par mi rtog go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260737#260746#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5845;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5846# so so rang gis rig par bya ba thob par ston pa'i phyir ro // / +mdo 'di dag thams cad ni bshad pa'i tshul lo // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'    rnams ni byang chub ces bya ba'i bar du chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog go // / +nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i khyad par ni rnam pa gsum ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260744#260757#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5843;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5844;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5845;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5846# mdo 'di dag thams cad ni bshad pa'i tshul lo // / +de yang dgongs     // / +pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4053E.TXT.r#3000242#3000257#TD4053E.TXT.r_4722;TD4053E.TXT.r_4723# de yang dgongs pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya ste / / +yongs su shes par  bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes pa dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i 'bras bu dang  de rab tu shes pa la dgongs nas mdo de dag bshad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047811#1047824#TD4054E.TXT.r_8967;TD4054E.TXT.r_8968;TD4054E.TXT.r_8969# mdo 'di thams cad ni bshad pa'i tshul lo // / +de yang dgongs pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya ste / /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366471#2366473#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6551# yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes pa dang  yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang  de rab tu rig par byed  pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis grangs kyi ming bkod pa'o // /
column8: 1.192#TD4033E.TXT.r#1385272#1385275#TD4033E.TXT.r_605;TD4033E.TXT.r_606# don rnam pa lnga gang zhe na zhes 'dri ba la lan du / / +yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes pa dang  yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang de rab tu rig par  byed pa'o zhes gsungs te rnam pa de lngas kun bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 1.192#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3115558#3115560#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3440# yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes pa dang  yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang  de  rab tu rig par byed pa'o // /
column10: 0.014#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368693#2368694#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6860# de la gsum du bsgyur ba ni snga ma'i yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes par byed pa 'di nyid la gsum du bsgyur ba zhes bya ste / /
column11: 0.014#TD4054E.TXT.r#1046971#1046973#TD4054E.TXT.r_8860;TD4054E.TXT.r_8861# de yang gang / / +yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i rgyu dang  yongs  su shes pa dang  yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  de rab tu shes pa'o // /
column12: 0.015#TD4019E.TXT.r#2412385#2412385#TD4019E.TXT.r_645;TD4019E.TXT.r_646# stong pa'i dngos pos gnas par bya // / +zhes zab mo'i don smras pa'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.015#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2911644#2911644#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6118# thabs la mkhas pas theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po'i don rtogs par bya bar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste / /
column14: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#54089#54090#TD4036E.TXT.r_8057# lan 'ga' lan 'ga' ni bde ba'i dngos po chung ngu'i tshul gyis khyab par byed do // /
column15: 0.016#TD4047E.TXT.r#1144352#1144352#TD4047E.TXT.r_3361;TD4047E.TXT.r_3362# skur pa 'debs pa ni don dam par yod pa yang dag pa'i dngos po la skur pa 'debs pa'o // / +bsal ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir / /
column16: 0.017#TD4001E.TXT.r#1972645#1972645#TD4001E.TXT.r_13;TD4001E.TXT.r_14# gleng gzhi dang  gleng bslang ba dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang      // / +yongs su shes pa dang  yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  de ji ltar yongs su shes par bya ba dang  mdo sde'i dgos pa'o // /
column17: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#1138984#1138984#TD4047E.TXT.r_2548;TD4047E.TXT.r_2549# dngos po'i tshogs de'i dbang du byas nas rnam pa gsum du brtag  par bya ste / / +'byung ba'i dngos po dang  'byung ba las gyur pa'i dngos po dang  gnyis ka'i dngos po'o // /
column18: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1790249#1790249#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_11447;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_11448# khyod kyis mig gis gzugs dag ma mthong zhing sngon mthong bar ma gyur ma mthong na gzhi de las khyod la 'di lta bu'i dngos po mthong bar bya'o zhes 'dun pa'am / / +chags pa'am / /
column19: 0.021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1790293#1790293#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_11456;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_11457# gzhi de las khyod la  'di lta bu'i dngos po rnam par shes par bya'o zhes 'dun pa'am / / +chags pa'am / /
column20: 0.021#TD4053E.TXT.r#2999500#2999500#TD4053E.TXT.r_4627;TD4053E.TXT.r_4628# de la yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po ni phung po la sogs pa'o // / +yongs su shes par bya  ba'i don ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'o // /
column21: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047834#1047834#TD4054E.TXT.r_8970;TD4054E.TXT.r_8971# de la yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po ni  gzugs la sogs pa'o // / +yongs su shes par bya ba'i don ni ro myang ba la sogs pa ste // /
column22: 0.021#TD4039E.TXT.r#1860491#1860492#TD4039E.TXT.r_5285# de bas na gzhan dag gi rang gi don 'thob pa'i sgo nas  thob par bya zhing mngon par rdzogs par BYANG CHUB PAR BYA BA'I don la de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos las gud na ches shin tu gya nom pa dang  'das pa'i bstan pa'i gnas kyi la chad pa 'di ni rang gi don thob pa bla na med pa'o // /
column23: 0.023#TD4072E.TXT.r#2099081#2099081#TD4072E.TXT.r_953# de nyid kyi phyir gang du yang dag pa'i shes pas kyang stong pa nyid du bstan pa der kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin nyid byis pas gzung bar shes par bya ste / /
column24: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#152883#152884#TD4035E.TXT.r_4888;TD4035E.TXT.r_4889# brnyas shing nyan pa na ston pas na dus ma yin pa'o // / +snga ma dang phyi ma'i don 'brel pa med pas  na ma 'brel pa'o // /
column25: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1046983#1046983#TD4054E.TXT.r_8861;TD4054E.TXT.r_8862# yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i rgyu dang  yongs  su shes pa dang  yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  de rab tu shes pa'o // / +de rnams yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po la sogs pa don drug po dag mdo sde so sor rnam par bshad pa rnam par nges pa ji ltar mthun mthun du'o // /
column26: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#135718#135719#TD4035E.TXT.r_1898# rjes su 'brel ba'i skye bo'i don dang  dmigs pa myong ba'i don dang  dmigs pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i don dang  dmigs pa mngon par 'du byed  pa'i don dang  chos de dag nyid dus tha dad pa'i don dang  sgrib pa med pa'i don dang  mi rtag pa dang bral ba'i don dang  mi rtag pa dang ma bral ba'i don dang  rtag pa phyin ci ma log pa'i don dang  bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i don dang  tshor ba dang bral ba ma    yin pa'i don dang  tshor ba dang bral ba'i don dang  nang dang phyi'i skye mched rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba de dag ni / /
column27: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349660#2349660#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4471;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4472# smras pa'i don rtogs pa dang dngos po'i mtha' rtogs pa dang  yang dag  pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'o // / +de la don yongs su tshol bas ni smras pa'i don rtogs pa yin no // /
column28: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1208998#1209001#TD4047E.TXT.r_12516;TD4047E.TXT.r_12517# bzod pa chen po la zhugs par gyur pa'i tshe 'di dag ma lus par rab tu  spong bar 'gyur ro zhes des na rab tu dga' ba'i gnas ba la 'jug par bstan pa'i phyir / / +'thob pa'i tshul gyis 'jug par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ste / /
column29: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2772754#2772754#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10011# rang bzhin gyi    mtshan ma khyi'us khyi'u dbyung ba'i tshul gyis mngon par 'byin par byed / /

column3: de kho na rtogs pa nyi tshe ba ma yin pa ni nyan thos rnams de kho na'i phyogs gcig gang zag la bdag med par rtogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368655#2368663#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6853;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6854;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6855;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6856# de la ro myang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo zhes bya ba khungs su bzhag nas mdo 'di las gsungs pa'i don lnga po de dag ston pas ming ni mdo las gsungs pa dang mthun yang tshig gi don bshad pa ni tha dad pas de'i phyir de nyid las yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po ni 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260756#260771#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5846;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5847;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5848;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5849;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5850# yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes pa dang  yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  de rab tu shes pa la dgongs nas mdo 'di dag bshad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047823#1047832#TD4054E.TXT.r_8969;TD4054E.TXT.r_8970# yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang  yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang  yongs su shes pa dang  yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  de rab tu shes pa la dgongs nas mdo 'di bshad do // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni  gang zag dang chos gnyi ga la bdag med par rtogs so // / +shes bya'i nyi tshe ba ma yin pa ni nyan thos rnams sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa tsam la shes pa skyed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368672#2368683#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6857;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6858;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6859# don gyi bye brag des gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po de yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260771#260781#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5848;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5849;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5850;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5851;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5852# gzugs la sogs pa'o // / +yongs su shes par bya ba'i don ni 'di lta ste / / +ro myang ba la sogs pa ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4053E.TXT.r#3000272#3000278#TD4053E.TXT.r_4725;TD4053E.TXT.r_4726;TD4053E.TXT.r_4727# yongs su shes  bar bya ba'i don ni ro myang ba la sogs pa ste / / +rnam pa des gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po de yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro / /
column7: 0.015#TD4048E.TXT.r#1689134#1689139#TD4048E.TXT.r_748;TD4048E.TXT.r_749;TD4048E.TXT.r_750;TD4048E.TXT.r_751# kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o // / +mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa ni 'di lta ste / / +gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa'o // /
column8: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047833#1047844#TD4054E.TXT.r_8970;TD4054E.TXT.r_8971;TD4054E.TXT.r_8972# de la yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po ni  gzugs la sogs pa'o // /
column9: 0.022#TD4037E.TXT.r#1324806#1324806#TD4037E.TXT.r_1275;TD4037E.TXT.r_1276# 'di ltar 'du byed kyi don dang  lta ba'i don dang  nye bar 'dogs pa'i don du'o // / +gal te gzugs la sogs par ming du btags pa'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming rnam par mi 'jog na ni / /
column10: 0.023#TD4068E.TXT.r#577226#577226#TD4068E.TXT.r_850# de la 'dod pa'i dngos po ni blta bar 'dod pa'i dngos po gzugs dang mnyan par 'dod pa'i dngos po sgra la sogs pa'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368568#2368570#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6839;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6840;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6841# de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po ni 'di lta ste / / +phung po la sogs pa'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4053E.TXT.r#2978434#2978435#TD4053E.TXT.r_1902;TD4053E.TXT.r_1903# tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i mtshan ma dang mngon rtags 'dzin du bcug nas lus dang sems la yongs su gdung bar byed pas yongs su gdung ba rnams so // / +gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la dga' ba'am lhag par  chags par byed du bcug nas de rnam par gyur na mya ngan la sogs pas sems can rnams nyon mongs par byed pa'i phyir 'khrug ba rnams so // /
column13: 0.029#TD4019E.TXT.r#2489887#2489887#TD4019E.TXT.r_10803;TD4019E.TXT.r_10804# gzhan ni don dam pa'i dngos por 'dod pas mi 'thad pa'o // / +gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas dngos po mi rtag par 'dod pa 'gog ste / /
column14: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267750#267750#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6768;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6769# de myong ba rnam par bsnyad pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste / / +de nyid las rnam par grol ba'i shes pas so sor yang dag par myong ba gzhan dag la rgya cher sgrogs pa dang   'chad pa dang  yang dag par ston pa de ni myong ba rnam par bsnyad pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdun pa de myong ba rnam par bsnyad pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column15: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1739906#1739906#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5275;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5276# 'on kyang gang de na dmigs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa'am / / +tshor ba'i rnam pa'am / /
column16: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1740178#1740178#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5316;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5317# gnas par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi rnam  pa de dag dang rtags de dag dang  mtshan ma de dag yid la mi byed kyi 'on kyang gang de na dmigs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa'am / / +tshor ba'i rnam pa'am / /
column17: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1487868#1487868#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10236;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10237# 'on kyang de gang zhe na dmigs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa'am / / +tshor ba'i rnam pa'am / /

column3: de tsam gyis don byas pa'i phyir ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes bya thams cad la ni shes pa bskyed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260782#260791#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5851;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5852;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5853# rnam pa des gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po de yongs su SHES PA'I PHYIR RO // / +yongs su shes pa ni 'di lta ste / / +nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag de ltar gsum du  bsgyur bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i shes pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4053E.TXT.r#3000287#3000294#TD4053E.TXT.r_4727;TD4053E.TXT.r_4728# yongs su shes pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag nga ltar gsum du bsgyur bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i shes pa'o / /
column6: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1047855#1047863#TD4054E.TXT.r_8973;TD4054E.TXT.r_8974# yongs su shes pa de ni nye len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag de ltar gsum du bsgyur bas yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i  shes pa'o // /
column7: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#196598#196598#TD4035E.TXT.r_12553;TD4035E.TXT.r_12554# tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes la / / +des de ltar ma shes pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'dod pa'i khyad par 'dod pa'i phyir / /

column3: sems can  rnams la nyi tshe ba ma yin pa ni nyan thos rnams ni bdag gi don du zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa la sbyor ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368753#2368760#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6867;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6868;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6869# yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta ste / / +lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di las zhes bya ba nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260790#260799#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5853;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5854;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5855# nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag de ltar gsum du  bsgyur bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i shes pa'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4039E.TXT.r#1858143#1858143#TD4039E.TXT.r_5000;TD4039E.TXT.r_5001# rgyu kun 'byung bar gyur na  ji ltar kun 'byung bar gyur pa dang  rgyu 'gags na ji ltar 'gag par 'gyur ba de yang 'di lta ste / / +mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i 'jig rten pa'i yid la byed pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas so // /
column7: 0.024#TD4036E.TXT.r#43240#43243#TD4036E.TXT.r_6551;TD4036E.TXT.r_6552;TD4036E.TXT.r_6553# rtogs ba rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir te / / +smras pa'i don rtogs pa dang  dngos po'i mtha' rtogs pa dang  yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'o // /
column8: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1331062#1331062#TD4037E.TXT.r_2092;TD4037E.TXT.r_2093# dam par gyur pa dang   yon tan brjod pa dang  rjes su dran pa dang  'byung ba dang  khyad par gyis kyang de skad bstan pa bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +yang rtogs pa'i lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do // /
column9: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1163107#1163110#TD4047E.TXT.r_6161;TD4047E.TXT.r_6162# mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir nang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa'i mtshan ma ni ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul yin pa'i  phyir de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma rnams dngos po'i brjod pa dang bral bas ji skad bstan pa'i rnam pas rnam pa dgu po las sems gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa zhes bya ba'o // / +mnyam par bzhag pas sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nges pas de nyid  kyis ji ltar bsams pa'i zhes bya ba smras te / /
column10: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#191366#191366#TD4035E.TXT.r_11570;TD4035E.TXT.r_11571;TD4035E.TXT.r_11572# de'i 'og tu tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'gyod pa med pa la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin du sems mnyam par gzhag pa la mngon par dga' ba ni gnyis pa'o // / +de nas sems mnyam par gzhag pas yang dag pa     // / +ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa dang  sdig pa'i lta ba dang bral na ni gsum pa'o // /
column11: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1324765#1324765#TD4037E.TXT.r_1270# ming tshol bar gyur pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa dang  dngos po tshol bar gyur pa dang  ngo bo nyid du btags pa tshol bar gyur pa dang  bye brag tu btags pa tshol bar  gyur pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'o // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du byang chub chen por sbyor te / / +rnam pa 'di gsum ni nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyi nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i  khyad par ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260798#260813#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5854;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5855;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5856# yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste / / +lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di las zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi dang bcas pa'i bar las grol ba nas rnam par thar par rab tu grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // /
column5: 0.024#TD4053E.TXT.r#3000305#3000307#TD4053E.TXT.r_4729# lha dang mi dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i bar las grol ba nas rnam par rab tu grol zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // /

column3: mi gnas pa nyid khyad par yin pas mi gnas pa'i khyad par te / / +nyan thos rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas so // /

column5: 0.0#TD4053E.TXT.r#3000314#3000318#TD4053E.TXT.r_4729;TD4053E.TXT.r_4730# lha dang mi dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i bar las grol ba nas rnam par rab tu grol zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // / +de rab tu shes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par nang du shes so zhes bya ba'o // /

column10: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136935#1136936#TD4047E.TXT.r_2256# kyi chos rnams myur du yongs su smin par gyur pa la ni rang nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1231895#1231896#TD4047E.TXT.r_15709# dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rgyas par gyur na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te / /
column12: 0.023#TD4060E.TXT.r#680501#680503#TD4060E.TXT.r_24# de'i tshe bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par shes so zhes bya ba dang  btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni ma dul ba rnams  dul bar mdzad pa / /
column13: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034955#1034955#TD4054E.TXT.r_7135# bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par shog shig snyam pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'o // /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2310832#2310832#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_23;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_24# lnga pa mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs ni 'di lta ste / / +bla na med pa  yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa gang yin pa'o zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column15: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#485693#485693#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4743;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4744# skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni 'di lta ste / / +skye ba 'di nyid kyi mjug thogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying rje dang ye shes kyi dbang gis mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas so // / +gtan du ba'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni nyan  thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i khyad par ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260820#260835#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5856;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5857;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5858;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5859;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5860# der rab tu shes pa  ni 'di lta ste / / +bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par nang du shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ba yin no //// /

column3: nyan thos rnams ni mar me'i 'od bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par zad par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260836#260845#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5858;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5859;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5861# bam po bdun cu gcig pa / / +'jug pa ni 'di lta ste / / +dus gsum dang  'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid dang  rkyen bzhi po dag go  zhes bya ba ni drug pa 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas su gyur nas gzugs med pa bzhin du chos kyi skus  'khor ba ji srid par gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260844#260856#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5861# dus gsum dang  'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid dang  rkyen bzhi po dag go  zhes bya ba ni drug pa 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do // / +'di ltar 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dus gsum po dag tu skye ba dang  gnas pa dang  'jig pa'i dbang gis 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang  rkyen bzhi po dag yod par gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten du 'khor bar gyur pa'o // /
column5: 0.020#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068315#1068319#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2576;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2577;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2578# 'brel ba med pas 'brel pa zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o // / +'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang 'bral ba'i phyir zhi ba'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#177880#177880#TD4035E.TXT.r_9310# sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir dang   gcig tu nges par bde zhing gnod pa med pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar bya ba'i phyir ni bsgom pa'o // /

column3: gong na med pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis kyang de dag gi ye shes khyad par du 'phags te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260855#260864#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5861;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5862;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5863# 'di ltar 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dus gsum po dag tu skye ba dang  gnas pa dang  'jig pa'i dbang gis 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang  rkyen bzhi po dag yod par gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten du 'khor bar gyur pa'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4047E.TXT.r#1139133#1139136#TD4047E.TXT.r_2570;TD4047E.TXT.r_2571;TD4047E.TXT.r_2572# 'on kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs pa'i ming gi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis so zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +'jig rten rnams kyi mkhas par 'dod pas na mkhas pa'o // /
column6: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#177880#177880#TD4035E.TXT.r_9310# sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir dang   gcig tu nges par bde zhing gnod pa med pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar bya ba'i phyir ni bsgom pa'o // /
column7: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#292374#292374#TD4026E.TXT.r_3011# pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i bstan bcos la 'god par mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ro //// /
column8: 0.020#TD4091E.TXT.r#748073#748075#TD4091E.TXT.r_9622;TD4091E.TXT.r_9623;TD4091E.TXT.r_9624# phung po 'jig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o // / +me gsum zhi bar byed pa'i phyir zhi ba'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4050E.TXT.r#1117930#1117930#TD4050E.TXT.r_2959;TD4050E.TXT.r_2960# gang gi phyir tshig gis bstan par mi nus pa dang  'jig rten  pa'i shes pas shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // / +yang rnam pa mi rtog pa'i rjes las thob pa de yang rab tu dbye ba rnam pa lnga blta bar bya ba yin pas rtogs pa dang  rjes su dran pa dang  rnam par gzhag pa dang  'dres pa dang  'byor ba la dpyod pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392743#2392743#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9703# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched na ni shin tu phra ba'i dmigs pa'i rnam par rig pas shin tu phra bas dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column11: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#178323#178323#TD4035E.TXT.r_9367# tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' ba la kun du rmongs pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams ma rig pa la gnas par bstan pa'i phyir rig pa gsum rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o // /
column12: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#710719#710719#TD4091E.TXT.r_2985# 'dir ni yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i  phung po lnga pa tshe rabs gsum du bar chad med par 'brel pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar 'dod do // /
column13: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1132964#1132964#TD4047E.TXT.r_1686;TD4047E.TXT.r_1687# mngon par 'dod pa nyid yin pa dang  bde ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang  'dod pa'i rnam par  smin pas bsdus pa'i phyir / / +gsum po 'di dag dang ji ltar rigs par sbyar bar bya'o // /

column3: nyan thos rnams kyi gong na ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang  theg pa chen po yang yod do // / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i  gong na ni theg pa gzhan med pas rnam pa lnga po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi khyad par du rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260865#260874#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5862;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5863;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5864;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5865# bstan bcos rnam  par bshad pa las / / +snga phyi rgyun gcig nas gcig tu mi 'chad cing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260875#260885#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5864;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5865;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5866# mngon sum du gyur pa gsal zhing dmigs su rung ba / / +rgyu dang bcas shing mi gnas pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'o zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /

column3: don de nyid tshigs su bcad pas sdud de / / +snying rje'i bdag nyid ye shes kyis // / +rnam ldan khyad par 'phags pa rnams // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260884#260895#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5865;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5867# rgyu dang bcas shing mi gnas pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'o zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / / +mtshan nyid bzhi dang  dus gsum gyi don ni mtshan  nyid gsum dang  las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / / +rnam     // / +pa lnga bshad zin to // / +'jig rten 'das pa yi // / +zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260894#260907#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5866;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5867;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5868# mtshan nyid bzhi dang  dus gsum gyi don ni mtshan  nyid gsum dang  las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /

column3: 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams so // / +'jig rten las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa khyad par du 'phags  pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260905#260913#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5868;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5869;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5870# skye ba ni bsam gtan gsum dang  'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang  rkyen bzhi po dag go zhes 'byung ba dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column5: 0.007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258664#258664#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5575# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / / +rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ces 'byung / /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236884#236884#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2929# yon tan gyi stobs zhes 'byung ba dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las NI KHYAD PAR DU 'PHAGS PA gya nom pa'i stobs zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir te / /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260982#260982#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5880# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / / +mthun par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ste / /

column3: de'i bgegs su gyur ba'i las mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mthu mnga' yang ci'i phyir gzhan la nor la sogs pa mi sgrub pa de brjod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260914#260936#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5869;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5871;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5872;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5873# mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste / / +'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang  rgyu dang rkyen bzhi po dag go zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gis nor to // /

column3: de'i zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rnams dang sbyar ro // / +longs spyod rnams kyi bar du gcod pa'i las mthong nas  spyad du med pa'i phyir sbyin pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur du 'ong zhes de dag la mi sbyin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260937#260947#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5873;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5874;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5875# grangs mdor smos pa dang  grangs smos pa bzhin du  ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du phye ste bshad pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261594#261596#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5971;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5972# dang po la yang rnam pa gsum ste / / +grangs mdor smos pa dang  grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa dang  mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2369715#2369719#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6999;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7000;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7001# de la khams kyi don ni khams rnam pa lnga po 'di lta ste ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pas ni gsum pa khams kyi don rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste / / +mdor bstan cing grangs smos pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa dang  don rnam pa gsum bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba ste 'di ni dang po'o // /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258614#258615#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5568;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5569# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +grangs mdor smos pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa ste / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361896#2361900#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5965# sgo bstan nas grangs smos pa dang  grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du  rnam par phye ste bshad pa dang spyi'i mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column9: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261505#261506#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5959;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5960# 'di  yang rnam pa bzhi ste / / +grangs mdor smos pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa dang  mtshan nyid mdor bshad pa dang  brtag pa dang lan dag gis rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ste / /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228616#228616#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1872;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1873;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1874# rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa lnga'i phyir ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin    gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te / / +'di yang rnam par dbye ste / / +grangs mdor smos pa dang  grangs bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du rnam par dbye ste bshad pa dang  rgol ba'i rten du bzlas te bshad pa'o // /
column11: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528339#528339#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10307;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10308;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10309# len pa  rnam pa gnyis so ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pas ni gnyis pa sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa len pa rnam pa gnyis la brten par ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste / / +grangs smos pa dang  grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa dang  khams la brten nas rnam par  dbye ba'o // /

column3: gal te de dag la longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs kyang longs spyod mi nus pas 'di bsgrubs kyang ci phan snyam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260946#260957#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5873;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5874;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5875# grangs mdor smos pa dang  grangs smos pa bzhin du  ming bkod pa dang  go rims bzhin du phye ste bshad pa ste / / +'di ni dang po ste / / +ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2938566#2938570#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9705;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9706# rig pa ni rnam pa bzhir shes par bya ste / / +ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i  rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361944#2361947#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5967# ji snyed yod pa nyid shes pa dang  ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid shes pa dang  'dzin pa'i don shes pa dang  gzung ba'i don shes pa dang  rnam par gzhag pa'i don shes pa dang   longs spyod kyi don shes pa dang  phyin ci log gi don shes pa dang  phyin ci ma log pa'i don shes pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa'i don shes pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i don shes pas so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column7: 1.788#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220413#220413#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_802# sbyin pa dang  tshul khrims  dang  bzod pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column8: 0.010#TD4036E.TXT.r#18876#18878#TD4036E.TXT.r_2751;TD4036E.TXT.r_2752# 'di lta ste / / +ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa  sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pas so // /
column9: 0.010#TD4036E.TXT.r#43136#43141#TD4036E.TXT.r_6527;TD4036E.TXT.r_6528# ji ltar rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed ce na / / +rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa  sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa ste / /
column10: 0.012#TD4036E.TXT.r#26376#26376#TD4036E.TXT.r_4032# ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa'i rigs pa dang ldan pa'i 'du byed tsam dang      // /
column11: 0.013#TD4029E.TXT.r#2121316#2121318#TD4029E.TXT.r_134;TD4029E.TXT.r_135# rigs pa du zhig gis dpyod par byed ce na / / +ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang   chos nyid kyi rigs pa ste / /
column12: 0.013#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2938071#2938074#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9639;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_9640# rnam pa bzhi dang rnam pa gsum yin no zhes bya ba la rigs pa bzhi ste / / +ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa ste / /
column13: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#24708#24708#TD4036E.TXT.r_3762# ltos pa'i  rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa'i rigs pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa ste / /
column14: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#45128#45130#TD4036E.TXT.r_6875;TD4036E.TXT.r_6876# grags pa'i chos nyid yang de yin te / / +de ltar bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pas yongs su tshol bar byed do // /
column15: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#45322#45323#TD4036E.TXT.r_6910# grags pa'i chos nyid dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyang de  yin no zhes de ltar bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed do // /
column16: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#45528#45529#TD4036E.TXT.r_6944# bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes de ltar  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa yongs su tshol bar byed do // /
column17: 0.019#TD4029E.TXT.r#2160787#2160787#TD4029E.TXT.r_5294# 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad mas yongs su rtog pa'o zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pas gzugs la sogs pa dang  bu ba sa med dang  byas pa nyid la sogs    pas sgra mi rtag par yongs su rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'thad pa kho na yin no // /
column18: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362433#2362433#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6027# ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang   chos nyid kyi rigs pa dang ldan pa ste zhes 'byung ba yin te / /
column19: 0.020#TD4026E.TXT.r#315100#315100#TD4026E.TXT.r_7423;TD4026E.TXT.r_7424;TD4026E.TXT.r_7425# bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa ni / / +yang dag pa'i  lta ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o // / +'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni / /
column20: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261525#261526#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5962# yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa  grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column21: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228675#228678#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1879;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880# chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang  mi lta ba nyid kyi phyir dang   kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang  yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column22: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258638#258641#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5571;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5572# gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang  dgongs pa'i tshul lo zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column23: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341590#2341592#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3561# rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan dmigs par bya ba'i yul gyi dngos po dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan  dmigs par bya ba yul gyi dngos po dang dngos po'i mtha' dmigs par bya ba yul gyi dngos po dang  dgos pa yongs su grub pa dmigs par bya ba yul gyi dngos po'o zhes gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column24: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391988#2391988#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9610# sems kyi skye  pa la mkhas pa dang  sems kyi gnas la mkhas pa dang  sems kyi bslab pa dang  sems kyi 'phel ba la mkhas pa dang  sems kyi 'grib pa la mkhas pa dang  sems kyi thabs la mkhas pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /
column25: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252169#252169#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4751# mdo sde zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni grangs smos pa bzhin du ming smos pa'o // /
column26: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#315068#315068#TD4026E.TXT.r_7416;TD4026E.TXT.r_7417# pa gdags pa rnam par gzhag par ni rnam par bzhi ste / / +ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa'o // /
column27: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2394548#2394548#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9925# gnas rig pa dang  yo byad rig pa dang  longs spyod rig pa dang  ltos pa rig pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // /

column3: dper na / / +ma ni byis pa'i bu rnams la / / +nu zho blud par nus mod kyi // / +kha yi  bug zums  pa yi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260958#260973#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5875;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5876;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878# ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o / / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257407#257407#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5390;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5391# 'di ni dang po grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam  par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ming cung zad 'di dang mi mthun no // /

column3: bu la mas ni ji ltar bya / / +zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +longs spyod de nye bar sgrub na dge ba'i chos skye ba'i bar du gcod pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni longs spyod bsgrubs pa la spyod pa'i bgegs su gyur pa'i las med du zin kyang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404046#2404046#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11066;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11067# mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239725#239725#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3305;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3306# mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  ni mdo 'di dang cung zad tha dad de / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260974#260990#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5881# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272101#272101#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7325;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7326# 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334725#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384462#2384463#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column10: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384830#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column11: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column12: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405614#2405615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column14: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column15: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column16: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228866#228866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column17: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column18: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column19: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column20: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247471#247471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column21: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column22: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258660#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column23: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273162#273162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /

column29: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385683#2385683#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column30: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214636#214636#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_74;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_75# mtshams  rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gcig gi nyes pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gcig ces 'byung ngo // /

column3: gal te 'di ltar de longs spyod phun sum tshogs  pa rnyed nas bag med pas dge ba'i chos skye bar mi 'gyur bar mthong na mi sgrub ste / /

column3: 'di ni mthong ba'i chos la dbul por gyur pa ni bla'i / / +'di tshe rabs gzhan dag na yang longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bar gyur na mi rung ngo zhes mi sgrub po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261011#261018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5884# rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis 'du byed rnams skye ba dang  rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ltos  pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa'i go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2704966#2704966#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_427;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_428# de'i phyir 'du byed rnams la rgyu yod du zin kyang cig car mgo  mnyam du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // / +de la 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu ni gang dang  rkyen ni gang zhe na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'du byed rnams 'byung ba'i rkyen ni bzhi po 'di dag yin par gsungs te rgyu'i rkyen dang  mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang     dmigs pa'i rkyen dang  bdag po'i rkyen to // /

column3: 'di lta bus kyang mi sgrub ste / / +kun  du skyo ba mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i phyir // / +zhes bya ba'o // /

column5: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261701#261710#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5988# de la mngon sum dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste  bshad pa ston to // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222963#222964#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1174# dam pa'i chos bstan pa dag la shin tu mos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa'i go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366680#2366680#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6582# kun rdzob kyi phyir dang don dam pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: longs spyod bsgrubs pas bde bar gyur na kun du skyo ba mngon du gyur ba med par 'gyur te / /

column5: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225658#225659#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1506;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1507# bsam gtan mngon par bsgrub nus pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa ye shes rang gi grogs byed  pa nyid du bstan pa'o // / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan pa'o // /
column6: 2.980#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225358#225362#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1472;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1473;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1474# gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams skyes bu dam pa la yang dag par brten pa dang  dam pa'i chos mnyan nas tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rgyu dang rkyen bya ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam  pa stobs chung ba nyid bzlog nas lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par can du gyur pa dang  khams dang mos pa la gya nom pa yang thob par gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsum pa stobs bsam gtan gyi grogs su gyur pa bstan pa'o // / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug  bsdu bas bstan te / /
column7: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384022#2384022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8726;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8727# rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba'o // / +rnam par gyeng ba 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad  pa mi mthun te // /

column10: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262621#262621#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6109# 'di yang rnam pa gsum po mdor bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan te / /

column12: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320178#2320178#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1095;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1096;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1097# bdag nyid la smad pa'i dbang gis rtogs par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa dang  ma rtogs pa'i phyir yang bsod nams dang ye shes la brten par bstan pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /

column3: des kyang dge ba'i chos rnams mi  skye bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam mo // / +mi dge ba'i chos sogs pa'i rgyu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang longs spyod chen po bsgrubs phun sum tshogs pa des rgyags nas mi dge ba'i chos la sogs par mthong ba de la yang mi sgrub ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261046#261062#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5888;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5889;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5890;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5891# 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug  bsdu bas bstan te / / +rigs pa phyi ma gsum po dag la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: dper na blo gros yangs pa rnams la nor med dger    'gyur te // / +nyis na dbul bar gyur nyid bla yi sdig spyod de lta min / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261073#261089#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5892;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5893;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5894;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5895;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5896# de'i  phyir bstan bcas rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas nyan thos kyi sa las 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#18887#18890#TD4036E.TXT.r_2753;TD4036E.TXT.r_2754;TD4036E.TXT.r_2755;TD4036E.TXT.r_2756# de la ltos pa'i rigs pa gang zhe na / / +ltos pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +skye ba'i ltos pa dang  gdags pa'i ltos pa'o // / +de la skye ba'i ltos pa ni rgyu gang dag dang  rkyen gang dag gis phung po rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'i  phung po'i skye ba de ni rgyu de dag dang  rkyen dang de dag las ltos pa yin no // /
column6: 0.022#TD4029E.TXT.r#2136759#2136759#TD4029E.TXT.r_2118;TD4029E.TXT.r_2119# zhes bya ba ni byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rig pa 'di ni rnam pa gnyis  su 'byung ste / / +'di lta ste 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang  'khrul pa'o // /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261334#261334#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5925# kha cig na re de la rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column8: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2705840#2705840#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_539;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_540# bzo shes pa dang bzo'i las de dang de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas de dang de dag mngon par 'grub pa'i bdag po'i rkyen yin no // / +de la rgyu'i rkyen gang yin    pa de ni skyed pa'i rgyu nyid yin no // /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261161#261161#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5905;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5906# bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste / / +rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dag gis chos rnams thob pa'am / /
column10: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121787#3121787#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4281# so so'i shes pa dang  bshad pa dang  smras pa'i don bsdus pa dang  legs par khong du chud par bya ba'i  rgyu gang dag yin pa dang  rkyen gang dag yin pa de ni 'thad pas bsgrub pa'i rigs pa yin no // /

column3: ma rabs sems rgyags gyur na dbang po'i rta 'khrul te // / +rigs pa min dang phongs pa kun gyi snod du 'gyur // /

column5: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#18891#18898#TD4036E.TXT.r_2755;TD4036E.TXT.r_2756# skye ba'i ltos pa dang  gdags pa'i ltos pa'o // / +de la skye ba'i ltos pa ni rgyu gang dag dang  rkyen gang dag gis phung po rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'i  phung po'i skye ba de ni rgyu de dag dang  rkyen dang de dag las ltos pa yin no // /

column3: zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +sems can ches mang ba dag la gnod pa'i rgyu nyid du ma thob pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni su dbang  phyug thob nas sems can shin tu mang po dag la gnod par byed pa de la yang mi sgrub ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261102#261110#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5897;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5898;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5899# dag la ltos pa yin no // / +gdags pa'i ltos pa ni 'di lta ste / / +ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs gang dag gis phung po rnams gdags par 'gyur ba'i phung po'i gdags pa de ni ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag la ltos pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261110#261121#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5899;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5900# ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs gang dag gis phung po rnams gdags par 'gyur ba'i phung po'i gdags pa de ni ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag la ltos pa yin te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#18909#18925#TD4036E.TXT.r_2757;TD4036E.TXT.r_2758# ming gi chogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs gang dag gi phung po rnams gdags par 'gyur ba'i phung po gdags pa de ni ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag  la ltos pa yin te / /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374646#2374647#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7583;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7585;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7584# de la tshig  'bru gang zhe na / / +ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs so zhes 'byung bas de'i phyir tshig 'bru ni ming dang tshig dang yi ge la bya bar mngon no // /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2369031#2369031#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6902;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6903# de la tshig 'bru'i don ni 'di lta ste / / +ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs gang yin pa ste ming la sogs pa gsum po 'di dag kun kyang gsal ba'i don dang ldan pas tshogs zhes  bya'o // /
column9: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#142724#142724#TD4035E.TXT.r_3079;TD4035E.TXT.r_3080# de la rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi dmigs pa gang zhe na / / +ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs la brten pa'i     // /
column10: 0.022#TD4043E.TXT.r#376844#376844#TD4043E.TXT.r_2801;TD4043E.TXT.r_2802# de la rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi dmigs pa gang zhe na / / +ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i  tshogs la brten pa'i don ni dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba la tshogs la brten pa'i don ZHES BYA BA NI DE DAG gis brjod par bya ba'o // /

column3: 'di gcig pu dbul ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba ni bla'i / / +'dis gzhan mang po la gnod pa byas na mi rung ngo snyam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261120#261141#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5899;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5900;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5901;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5902;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5903# ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs gang dag gis phung po rnams gdags par 'gyur ba'i phung po'i gdags pa de ni ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag la ltos pa yin te / / +de ni phung po rnams kyi skye ba'i ltos pa dang  gdags pa'i ltos pa'o zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: don de nyid tshigs su bcas pas sdud de / / +las dang sgrib dang mngon gyur dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403222#2403224#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10978;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10979# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa  thams cad yongs su spangs pas de'i phyir gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa'i sa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa rnam par bshad pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221516#221518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_951# 'di ni rang bzhin gyis gcig gis gcig bsdus pa'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dang po gsum gyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222595#222597#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1120# mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#241018#241020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3480# 'phags ba legs  pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  mdo 'di nyid dang  bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las / /
column8: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2362201#2362203#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5999# bstan bcos mdzad pa'i slob dpon rnams kyis 'di ltar so so nas don gyis mdo'i tshig bzung nas mi mthun pa rnam pa sna tshogs su bshad de  bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column9: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384857#2384859#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8822;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8823# gal te byang chub sems  dpa' phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi lus kyi nang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma'i rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las bstan pa ni  mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang don mthun no // /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214079#214080#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_10;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_11# kun tu rmongs pa dang gnas ngan len de dag kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang   dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni / /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216491#216492#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_301# 'phags  pa mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang bkod pa phal cher mthun te / /
column12: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226166#226168#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1567# pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi go rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig  gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir / /
column13: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229705#229708#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2015# mod de nyid dang  mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe  bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /
column14: 0.008#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226528#226528#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1615# 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu  rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha  rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas / /
column15: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403706#2403707#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11033;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11034# 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis nyon mongs pa'i shing bsreg pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo  las kyang / /
column16: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404606#2404606#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11110# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo  las kyang don gyis mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to // /
column17: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405220#2405221#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11168;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11169# 'di  ltar sa 'di la rnam pa thams cad du chos sna tshogs ston pa la dbang thob pas thogs pa med cing yangs shing rgya che ba'i blo gros thob pa de yang shin tu dge ba'i phyir legs ba'i blo gros zhes bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column18: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221250#221251#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_904# bslab pa gsum po dag slob bar byed  pa'i phyir ro // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / /
column19: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224977#224978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1435;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1436# bsdu  ba'i dngos po de yang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyir yongs su bzung ba la bya'o // / +mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes 'byung gi bzhi zhes pa ni mi 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225804#225807#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1524;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1525# mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do // / +mtshams  rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang phal cher mdo de nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column21: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239295#239295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3252# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang zhu tshig gsum 'byung ba'i phyir ma tshang bar mngon no // /
column22: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253557#253558#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4949;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4950;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4952# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gsungs pa dang mthun par bstan to // / +mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo     // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las tshig cung zad tha dad kyang dngos po dgu bstan pa la ni don mi mthun pa med do // /

column3: zhes bya  ba la sogs pa'o // / +lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa bshad zin to // / +mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni gnyen po nyid yin pas de'i 'og tu spong ba'i khyad par brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261142#261149#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5904# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang  bstan bcos  rnam par bshad pa las kyang / /

column6: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366382#2366382#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6542# don rnam pa bcu po de dag kyang bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las mdo las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ste / /

column3: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa dang nyan thos  ltar 'khar ba dang mya ngan 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261157#261169#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5904;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5905;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5906;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5908# phal cher mdo nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ba'i phyir bshad pa mang po ma byas so // / +bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste / / +rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dag gis chos rnams thob pa'am / /
column5: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3121762#3121764#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4276;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4277;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4278# de la ltos pa'i rigs pa ni 'du byed rnams 'byung ba dang  rjes su tha snyad gdags pa'i rgyu gang dag yin pa dang  rkyen gang dag yin pa ste / / +de ni ltos pa'i rigs pa yin no // /

column3: nyon mongs pa yongs su btang ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams dang  de yongs su btang ba dang bcas pa ste / / +de'i mthu la gnod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261168#261185#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5907;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5908;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5909;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5910# 'grub pa'am / / +skyes pa rnams las byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bya ba byed  pa'i rigs pa zhes BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261743#261743#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5994# 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang  'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba nyid dang  chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid 'di ni 'jig rten na mngon sum gyi mtshan mas dmigs pa yin TE ZHES BYA BA 'DI ni gnyis pa rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong pa'i gnas te / / +gnas gyur pa zhes bya ba ni gnas gyur pa de la gzugs med pa bzhin du gnas pa ni shes rab kyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams kyi skabs kyang mi 'byed la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261186#261197#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5909;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5910;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5911# mdo'i tshig 'di yang so sor bshad pa mi mthun pas / / +kha cig na re dbang po drug gis yul drug mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni thob pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: snying rje'i gzhan gyi dbang gis 'khor ba yang mi 'dor ro // / +gnas ni gang de'i gyur pa ni gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261198#261208#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5911;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5912;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5913# 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs  su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'grub pa zhes bya'o // / +chos rnams skyes na ni so so'i bya ba byed de / /

column3: 'khor ba  ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid de zhes bya bas ston to // / +'khor ba ni 'khrul ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261207#261218#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5912;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5914# chos rnams skyes na ni so so'i bya ba byed de / / +dper na mig gis gzugs la blta na yid kyis chos 'dzin pa'i bar lta bu'o zhe'o // /

column3: skye ba dang 'chi ba'i dbyangs thag la 'phyang mo nyug ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261219#261226#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5914;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5915;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5916# kha cig na re dge ba spyad pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang  yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa grub pa'o // /

column3: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa'i rnam pa'i chos so // / +mya  ngan las 'das pa ni de nyid rnam par byang ba'i char gtogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261227#261239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5915;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5916;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5917# mthong ba dang thos  pa la sogs pa ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ste / / +de'i phyir nyan thos kyi sa las / /

column3: kun brtags pa'i dngos po med pa'i car gtogs pa'o // / +gnas ni de nyid gnyi ga'i char gtogs pa ste / / +gzhan gyi dbang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261240#261251#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5917;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5918;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5920# phung po rnams rang gi rgyu dang  rang gi rkyen gyis bskyed pa gang yin pa rnams ni rang gi byed pa de dang de dag la sbyor bar byed pa yin te / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: gang gi gnas she na / / +gyur ba'i ste 'brel pa'i phyir ro // / +de gyur pa ni de yongs su     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261249#261259#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5920# mig gis gzugs rnams la lta bar byed pa dang  rna bas sgra rnams nyan par byed  pa dang  yid kyis chos rnams la shes par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzugs kyis mig gi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  sgras rna ba'i spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  de bzhin du chos rnams kyis yid kyi yul du gnas par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams    de dang de dag gis gcig la gcig bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  sbyor ba dang thabs su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#18972#18982#TD4036E.TXT.r_2763# dper na mig gis gzugs rnams la lta bar byed pa dang  rna  bas sgra rnams nyan par byed pa dang  yid kyis chos rnams shes par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzugs kyis mig gi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  sgras rna ba'i spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  de bzhin du chos rnams kyis yid kyi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa'i bar     // /

column3: gyur pa'o ;; / +yang na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi gnas te / / +ji skad du sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa ni // / +sangs rgyas chos kyi gnas yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261258#261267#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5920# mig gis gzugs rnams la lta bar byed pa dang  rna bas sgra rnams nyan par byed  pa dang  yid kyis chos rnams la shes par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzugs kyis mig gi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  sgras rna ba'i spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  de bzhin du chos rnams kyis yid kyi yul du gnas par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams    de dang de dag gis gcig la gcig bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  sbyor ba dang thabs su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no // /

column3: gnas gyur pa ni 'bras bu ste // / +chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin // / +zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // / +ji ltar ni 'gyur gyur pa de  gang yin snyam pa la / /

column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#18992#19006#TD4036E.TXT.r_2763;TD4036E.TXT.r_2764;TD4036E.TXT.r_2765# dper na mig gis gzugs rnams la lta bar byed pa dang  rna  bas sgra rnams nyan par byed pa dang  yid kyis chos rnams shes par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzugs kyis mig gi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  sgras rna ba'i spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  de bzhin du chos rnams kyis yid kyi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa'i bar     // / +dag lta bu dang  gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams de dang de dag gcig la gcig bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  sbyor ba dang  thabs su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: gzhan gyi dbang 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid de'i gnyen po skyes na zhes bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261280#261289#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5920;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5921# mig gis gzugs rnams la lta bar byed pa dang  rna bas sgra rnams nyan par byed  pa dang  yid kyis chos rnams la shes par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzugs kyis mig gi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  sgras rna ba'i spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  de bzhin du chos rnams kyis yid kyi yul du gnas par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams    de dang de dag gis gcig la gcig bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  sbyor ba dang thabs su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no // /

column3: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyes na'o // / +kun nan nyon mongs pa'i cha ldog cing zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa'i cha gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261290#261303#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5920;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5921;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5922# mig gis gzugs rnams la lta bar byed pa dang  rna bas sgra rnams nyan par byed  pa dang  yid kyis chos rnams la shes par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzugs kyis mig gi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  sgras rna ba'i spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  de bzhin du chos rnams kyis yid kyi yul du gnas par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams    de dang de dag gis gcig la gcig bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  sbyor ba dang thabs su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no // / +'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste / / +rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis dam bcas pa dang  bshad pa dang  smos pa'i don sgrub pa dang   yang dag par khong du chud par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa rnam par bshad pa ston to // /

column3: ldog pa ni gzhan du gyur pa'o // / +rnam par byang ba'i char gyur pa // / +zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i dngos por te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261301#261313#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5922# rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis dam bcas pa dang  bshad pa dang  smos pa'i don sgrub pa dang   yang dag par khong du chud par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa rnam par bshad pa ston to // /

column3: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pa nyid ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba brjod du med pa'o // / +nyam chung bar byed cing rgyas par gyur pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261312#261323#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5922;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5923;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5924# rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis dam bcas pa dang  bshad pa dang  smos pa'i don sgrub pa dang   yang dag par khong du chud par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380564#2380565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8326;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8327# rigs kyi bu sems shin tu rnam par dag pa dang  shes rab  shin tu rnam par dag pas de dag gi 'bras bu byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa lan du yang dag par gsungs pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam grangs gnyis kyis bstan te 'di ni dang po'o // /

column3: mos pa'i dbang gis thos pa'i bag chags bskyed pa'i stobs kyis  rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags nyam chung bar byed cing rnam par byang ba rgyas par 'gyur ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344190#2344190#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3879;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3880# sgo dang po 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +kha cig na re mdo'i tshig 'di  yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / /

column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261322#261331#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5923;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5924;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5925# 'di yang rnam grangs gnyis kyis bstan to // / +'di ni dang po'i mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261331#261339#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5924;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5925;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5926# 'di ni dang po'i mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +kha cig na re de la rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column9: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2318218#2318219#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_872;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_873# bstan pa la brten nas mos pa tha dad par gyur pa mdor bstan pa dang  rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad kyis bstan pa la brten nas mos pa tha dad par gyur ba rgya cher rnam  par 'byed pa dang  rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad kyis bstan pa la brten nas mos pa tha dad par gyur ba bshad pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba bstan pa ste 'di ni dang po'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gsum yod de / /
column10: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345680#2345680#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4041;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4042# rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dmigs par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dris pa dang lan dag gis  rnam par phye nas bshad pa'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column11: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321719#2321721#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1263;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1264;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1265# chos rnams kyi kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la yang skur ba 'debs so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa nyes dmigs rnam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di la yang  bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382708#2382708#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8584;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8585# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed par ltung bar gyur na de ni yid la byed pa'i  rnam par gyeng ba zhes gsungs pa ste / / +mdo'i tshig 'di la bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column13: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261087#261087#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5894;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5895;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5896# skye ba'i ltos pa dang  gdags pa'i ltos pa'o / / +de la skye ba'i ltos pa ni 'di lta ste / / +rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis phung po rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'i phung po skye ba de ni rgyu de dag dang rkyen de     // /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2377850#2377851#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8018;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8019# 'di ni mtshan ma bstan pa'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /

column3: mos pa dang thos pa'i bag chags gnas pas 'dzems pa dang bcas pa la nyon mongs pa chung ngu kun du 'byung ba'am kun du mi 'byung bar  'gyur ro // /

column3: rtogs nas gyur pa ni sar chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / / +de kho na dang de kho na yin pa snang ba ste / /

column3: bar chad dang bcas pa dang  bar chad med par rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kun du 'byung ba'i phyir de la res 'ga' ni de kho na  snang / /

column3: res 'ga' ni de kho na ma yin pa snang ste / / +langs pa'i 'og tu ste sa drug pa'i bar du'o // /

column3: bsgoms pas gyur pa ni sgrib pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bcas par gyur pa'i mtshan ma thams cad mi snang ba dang  de kho na nyid snang bar gnas gyur pa gang yin  pa de ste / /

column3: sa bcu pa'i bar du'o // / +'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa ni sgrib pa med pa rnams kyi ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang sgrib pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa med par gyur pa'i mtshan ma thams cad mi snang bar gyur pa dang  sgrib pa thams cad med pa'i phyir de shin tu rnam par dag    pa'i de kho na snang ba dang mtshan med dag nyid la dbang thob par gyur ba'i gnas yin te / /

column3: 'di ltar mtshan ma la dbang thob pa de nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sems can gyi don byed do // / +gyur pa dam pa ni go bla ste / /

column10: 0.019#TD4067E.TXT.r#1093506#1093507#TD4067E.TXT.r_1175;TD4067E.TXT.r_1176# des lus dang  ngag dang  yid kyi spyod pa la mi shes bzhin du 'jug pa'o ZHES BYA BA LA LUS dang   dag dang  yid kyi spyod pa la mi shes pa ni 'gro ba dang ldog pa la sogs pa la legs par so sor ma brtags par 'jug par rig par bya'o // / +ltung ba'i rten byed pa'i las can no / /
column11: 0.020#TD4049E.TXT.r#2304806#2304807#TD4049E.TXT.r_3010# mi slob pa'i chos bcu ni  mi slob pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i dbang du byas par shes par bya'o // /

column13: 0.021#TD4027E.TXT.r#556383#556383#TD4027E.TXT.r_701# gang zag dam pa rigs pa'i don la mkhas pa rtog ge pa spyod yul can dag tshad ma  gsum la brten nas 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pas grags pa'i dngos po'o // /

column15: 0.021#TD4009E.TXT.r#330215#330215#TD4009E.TXT.r_1388;TD4009E.TXT.r_1389# brjod du med cing bshad du med pas bstan  du med pa'o // / +rnam par shes pa'i gnas ma yin pas rten ma yin pa'o // /

column18: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#212419#212421#TD4035E.TXT.r_14948# ngag dang  rtog pa dang  tshol ba'i nyes pa dang  bsam gtan la brten pa gsum gyi mthar gyur pa'i nyes pa dang  rten    cing 'brel par 'byung bar gtogs pa'i len PA'I KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA'I phyogs skyed par byed pa'i nyes pa dang  'du byed KYI KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA'I phyogs skyed par byed pa'i nyes pa ste / /
column19: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034168#1034168#TD4054E.TXT.r_7031;TD4054E.TXT.r_7032# rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa 'ba' zhig yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la byang chub sems dpa'i gos pa med pa'i bsam pa'o // / +byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i phung po spangs pa'i rnam par smin pa de lta bu yang sems can rnams kyi yin par dga' bar byed cing bdag la ni ma yin te / /
