column21: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#971742#971744#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10456# gsum zhes ston pa na mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma gsum dang mi 'gal bar rigs pa'i tshig dang  yi ges mdor bsdus nas ston par byed pas na de la bstan pa zhes bya'o // /
column22: 0.026#TD4043E.TXT.r#372230#372230#TD4043E.TXT.r_2203;TD4043E.TXT.r_2204# gnas PA ZHES BYA BA NI SO sor gnas pa'o // / +phung po la mkhas pa yang bsdus par rig par bya'o ZHES BYA BA NI PHUNG por bsdus pa'i chos rnams kyi bye brag la dmigs pa'i shes rab nges pa ni ngo bo nyid kyis phung po la  mkhas pa yin no // /
column23: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#157188#157188#TD4035E.TXT.r_5572;TD4035E.TXT.r_5573# sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i las dang  de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod pa'i sgo dang  mthu'i sgo dang  rnam par byang ba'i sgo'o // / +rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i     // /

column26: 0.029#TD4019E.TXT.r#2429391#2429391#TD4019E.TXT.r_3032# yang sangs rgyas rnams ni de 'dra ba'i byed ba dang bral mod kyi gang gi mjug thogs su gang skye bar nges pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba don dam par 'dod de de 'dra ba'i byed pa dang yang bral ba'o // /

column5: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264737#264737#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6420;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6421# de ltar skye ba'i phyir dang   mtshan DANG LDAN PA'I PHYIR DANG  the tshom gyi dra ba gcod pa'i phyir dang  gzhan dag gis brgal du med cing gzhan dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  dge sbyong dmigs PA'I PHYIR DANG ZHES BYA BA la sogs pas ni gsum pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa'o // / +sgrib pa thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa'i char  gtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid rnam par log na zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha gzung ba dang  'dzin pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par log par gyur na sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261783#261804#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6001;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6002;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6003;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6004;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6005# mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya ste / / +'di ltar mi rtag pa rags pa 'di la brten nas mi rtag pa phra mo la sogs pa rjes su dpag pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma la gnas nas     // /

column21: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1506659#1506659#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12402;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12403# rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang BRAL BA'I PHYIR RO // / +dga' ba'i bde ba ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid kyi bde ba'o // /
column22: 0.028#TD4042E.TXT.r#1679174#1679174#TD4042E.TXT.r_354;TD4042E.TXT.r_355# ji ltar yi ge'i phyi mo med pa'i yi ge mngon par mi gsal ba de bzhin du mdo'i sde la sogs pa yan lag bcu gnyis kyang chos kyis mtshan nyid rnam par ma bzhag na mngon par mi gsal ba yin gyi rnam par bzhag na mngon par gsal bar 'gyur ro //// / +mtshan nyid tha mi dad par brjod pa'i phyir ma mo de nyid chos mngon par zhes bya ste / /
column23: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2745710#2745710#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6309;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6310# phal cher slu ba dang  'jigs pa dang  'jigs su rung ba'i rgyu mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro // / +phra ma'i dbang gi 'bras bus ni snod kyi 'jig rten nas phyogs 'bar 'bur dang  lcang lcong dang  mtho  dman dang  bgrod dka' ba dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa dang  'jigs su rung ba'i rgyu mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2446455#2446455#TD4019E.TXT.r_5164# mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs kyi yul  skye zhing 'jig pa'i bdag nyid rgyun chad nas zhi bar gnas pa'i 'gog pa'i rang bzhin mngon du byas nas gnas zhes pa'o // /
column25: 0.029#TD4050E.TXT.r#1110928#1110928#TD4050E.TXT.r_1879;TD4050E.TXT.r_1880# par bsags pa ni mi dge ba'i grogs po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de lta bu'i rnam pas 'jug pa'i gnas bstan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa / /
column26: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544818#544818#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12376# ji ltar snang ba bzhin du mtshan nyid de yang dag par med pa'i phyir kun du rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // /
column27: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125833#3125834#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4759;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4760# des las kyi sgrib pas rab tu brjed par 'gyur ba dang  mi byed na yang ltung ba'i sgrib pas rab tu brjed PAR 'GYUR BA'I PHYIR RO // / +gang gi phyir gsang ba'i gnas RNAM PAR DBYE BA'I PHYIR rmongs par byed pa / /
column28: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1864334#1864334#TD4039E.TXT.r_5694;TD4039E.TXT.r_5695# de ltar lam bsgom pa la bag yod pa'i sgo nas mi 'dre bar gnas pa ni / / +dran pas legs par gnas par 'gyur ro // /

column3: chos thams cad la dbang  sgyur ba nye bar gnas pa rnam par byang ba'i char gtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid du yongs su gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261817#261830#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6005;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6006;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6007# de la re zhig tshe gcig gi mi rtag pa'i don rags pa la brten nas mi rtag pa nyid du mngon sum mthong ba ni mi rtag pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya'o // / +rang gi lus kyi gnod pa  sna tshogs myong ba mthong ba'i phyir sdug bsngal mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i tshad ma la bya'o // /

column3: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo nyid las gyur pa'o // / +dkar po'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni nyan thos rnams kyi gnas gyur pa ni nyon mongs pa spangs pa tsam  gyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir dkar po'i chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261831#261849#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6006;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6007;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6008;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6009# rang gi lus kyi gnod pa  sna tshogs myong ba mthong ba'i phyir sdug bsngal mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i tshad ma la bya'o // / +smod cing tshol ba rnams la rang dbang med pa'i phyir bdag med par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ni bdag med pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#26194#26194#TD4036E.TXT.r_4005;TD4036E.TXT.r_4006# bde ba chung du dang  'bring dang  chen po nye bar bsgrub pa'i phyir mos pa gang yin pa'o // / +de la mdza' bshes kyi phyogs dang  dgra bo'i phyogs dang  tha mal pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa yin no // /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#538973#538973#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11682# lnga pa sems can rnams rnam par rmongs par byed ces bya ba ni log par ston pa rnams bdag nyid kyis 'dzin pa gang yin pa des sems can rnams rmongs par byas nas yang dag pa'i shes pa bskyed pa'i dper bstan  pa'o // /
column7: 0.025#TD4043E.TXT.r#367701#367701#TD4043E.TXT.r_1574# ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar gang yin pa dag 'byung bas na de bzlog pa'i phyir de dag la ste ston par byed do // /
column8: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2788624#2788624#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12134;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12135# bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtson par byed pa'i tshe na ni / / +bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pa nyid rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir gang na dge slong mdo sde dang 'dul     // /
column9: 0.027#TD4032E.TXT.r#1931154#1931154#TD4032E.TXT.r_1830# gzhan khong khro ba la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang  nyon mongs par gyur pa'i phyir / /
column10: 0.028#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393866#1393866#TD4098E.TXT.r_624;TD4098E.TXT.r_625# dge ba ni gang rnam par shes pa lnga dang lhan cig rgyu ba de ni shes rab kyi yin gyi lta ba ma yin  te mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro // / +yid kyi sa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'o // /
column11: 0.029#TD4025E.TXT.r#2177424#2177424#TD4025E.TXT.r_1727# 'phags    pa'i gang zag sleb pa'i rgyud la yod pa ji ltar mthong ba'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sgom pa'i shes pas gzhom par bya ba gang yin pa de dag bsgom pas spang bar bya bzhes bya ba'o // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dkar po'i chos kyi rang bzhin nyid de / / +de la ni lung du ma bstan pa'i gnas skabs kyang gang yang med na nyon mongs pa can gyi gnas skabs ltag  la yod / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261850#261865#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6008;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6009;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6010;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6011;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6012# 'di dag ni thos pa dang bsams pa'i shes rab rnam par gyeng  ba'i sems kyis rnam par rtog pa yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma ma yin no // / +'di nyid la ni 'jig rten gyi mngon sum zhes bshad do // /

column3: dbang bcu ston te / / +tshe la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'chi ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261864#261873#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6011;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6012;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6013# de la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag ces bya ba ni 'dus byas rnams spyir bsdus pa'o // / +'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba  nyid ces bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed dag go // /

column3: sems la dbang ba ni gang 'khor ba kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang  gzhan dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yo byad kyang sgrub cing de la de dag gi sems gtong pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261874#261888#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6013;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6014;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6015;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6016# chos thams cad bdag med ces bya ba ni chos thams cad bsdu ba'o // /

column3: yo byad la dbang ba ni zas  la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261887#261896#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6015;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6016;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6017;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6018# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las nges pa'i don ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid do // / +zag pa dang bcas pa  thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba nyid do // /

column3: yo byad ni 'tshog chas zhes bya ba dang don gcig ste / / +bsam pa ji ltar ba bzhin du sems can rnams la yo byad sbyin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261897#261910#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6017;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6018;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6019;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6020# chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid dang  bdag med pa nyid do zhes 'byung ba yin no // / +mi rtag pa la sogs pa 'di dag gi rigs pa yang don rnam pa gnyis dang ldan te / /

column3: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gsum     // / +char yang de'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261908#261918#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6019;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6020;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6021# dang po ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rigs pa ste / / +mngon sum gyi mtshan  mas dmigs pa so so dag mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o // /

column3: las la dbang ba ni lus dang ngag gi las ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261919#261926#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6021# gnyis pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid de dper na skud pas me tog brgyus pa dang 'dra bar 'di ltar mi rtag pa gcig gis phung po la sogs pa la khyab par gyur te / /

column3: sems can rnams kyang de la 'dzud pa'i phyir ro // / +skye ba la dbang ba ni ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'gro ba rnams su skye ba'i phyir  te ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261927#261938#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6021;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6022;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6023# gnyis pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid de dper na skud pas me tog brgyus pa dang 'dra bar 'di ltar mi rtag pa gcig gis phung po la sogs pa la khyab par gyur te / / +sdug bsngal dang  bdag med pa yang de bzhin no // /

column3: ji skad du / / +tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon pa 'grub po zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +mos pa la dbang ba ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin du sa la sogs pa gser la sogs par bsgyur bas de'i mos pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261939#261957#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6023;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6024;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6025;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6026# 'dir mngon sum gyi tshad ma  zhes bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid phyi ma la brten pa yin pas de'i phyir btags pa tsam du 'jig rten pa'i mngon sum zhes bya ba yang / /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2343959#2343959#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3855;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3856# 'di ltar byang chub sems  dpa' rnams bstan pa'i chos de dag la sems rtse gcig tu nyan par byed pa dang  legs par bzung ba dang  kha ton du byang bar byed pa dang  yid kyis legs par sems pa dang  shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs par byed pas so // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni mtshan  nyid rnam pa bzhis thos pa'i shes rab ston te mdo 'di las gsungs pa'i dang po thos pa'i mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa gzhan rnams kyis so // /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324112#2324112#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1617;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1618# bdun  pa ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'o zhes bshad pas de'i phyir rigs la gnas pa la yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i don yod par rig par bya'o // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / /

column8: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1744930#1744930#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5871# gnas brtan thogs med kyi theg pa chen po'i chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa'i sar mtshan dang dpe byad kyi le'u las / /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389043#2389043#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9264# rgya cher ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389089#2389089#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9270# ming la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa lnga rgya cher 'byed pa ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu ni / / +ji ltar  sngon sems can thams cad kyi sems dang mthun par byas pa de bzhin dus la sogs pa yang de'i mos pa'i rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261958#261977#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6025;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6026;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6027;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6028;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6029;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6030# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni yang dag pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma la brten nas 'jig rten gyi    mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las / / +mngon sum de su'i mngon sum du brjod par bya zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#184079#184087#TD4035E.TXT.r_10210;TD4035E.TXT.r_10211;TD4035E.TXT.r_10212# mdor bsdu na bzhi ste / / +dbang po gzugs can gyi mngon sum dang  yid kyis myong ba'i mngon sum dang  'jig rten gyi mngon sum dang  dag pa'i mngon sum mo // /

column3: sngon gzhan dag la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du  ye shes btang ba'i phyir ro // / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par ro // /

column9: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1322162#1322162#TD4037E.TXT.r_880# shes bya'i sgrib pa de las rnam par grol ba'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi yul gang yin pa de ni shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na yin par rig  par bya'o // /

column3: yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis zhes bya ba la yod pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa ni / /
chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // / +med pa'i mtshan nyid ma  yin pa ni / / +stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262046#262055#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6044;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6045;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6046# bla na med pa la yang bla na med par shes shing 'jig rten pa rnams dang thun mong MA YIN PA 'DI NI dag pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin te / / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /

column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368504#2368504#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6831;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6832# yang na  rnam par grol ba'i shes pa rnams zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid sgrib pa dang bral ba la rnam par grol ba'i shes pa zhes bya'o // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni / /

column3: gnas tshad med pa dag gis 'thob pa'i phyir gcig  pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no // / +'di gnyis las gang yang rung ba gcig med pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'o // /

column5: 0.020#TD4066E.TXT.r#2106620#2106620#TD4066E.TXT.r_636# sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa bye brag med pa'i phyir thams cad kyang sems thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan par thal bar 'gyur ba de bsal ba'i phyir / /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +gang la nga'o snyam du 'dzin pa yod  pa de la ni 'di ni gzhan no zhes bya ba yod la / /

column5: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353995#2353995#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5018# de lta bu dang mthun pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gang yin pa de ni chos la mi gnas pa'i zhi gnas  dang lhag mthong zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba ste / /

column3: 'di ni rnam par gzigs so zhes tha snyad dang mthun par byas pa'i phyir ro // / +tha dad rigs phyir sangs rgyas nyid gcig ma yin no // /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262215#262222#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6068;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6069;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6066;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6067;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6070;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6071# 'di ltar gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa ni rnam pa gsum yod pas 'di lta ste / / +'du byed thams cad skad cig pa nyid dang  'jig rten pha rol yod pa nyid dang  las yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa chud mi za ba nyid do // /

column3: rigs ni skye mched drug  gi khyad par te / / +de ni tha dad de / / +rang bzhin du gnas pa dang yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de tha dad pas sbyor ba yang tha dad de / / +de las sangs rgyas ni gcig yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262183#262192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6064;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6065;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6066# 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma nyid dang  'jig rten pha rol yod pa nyid du las yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa chud mi zab nyid de zhes bya  pa la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gsum ste / / +gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid gsum bstan pa dang  de la zhes bya ba man chad kyis dmigs su yod par gyur pa'i gtan tshigs bstan pa dang  rgyu dang rkyen des zhes bya ba man chad kyis nges par  grub pa nyid du bstan pa ste / /

column3: gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba mi rigs so // / +don med phyir zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid mang po nyid ces bya bar  sbyar te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262191#262202#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6066# gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid gsum bstan pa dang  de LA ZHES BYA BA MAN chad kyis dmigs su yod par gyur pa'i gtan tshigs bstan pa dang  rgyu dang rkyen des zhes bya ba man chad kyis nges par  grub pa nyid du bstan pa ste / /

column3: sangs rgyas nyid gcig tu zad na ni so so'i tshogs rnams don med par 'gyur ro // / +kun phyir zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams ni theg pa gsum po dag la 'god pa'i phyir so sor sems can gyi don mtha' dag la nan tan mdzad do // /
gal te sangs rgyas gcig kho na  yin na ni sangs rgyas gnyis pa med pa'i phyir de sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid la 'jog par mi mdzad pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad par ma gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262221#262239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6069;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6070;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6072# 'du byed thams cad skad cig pa nyid dang  'jig rten pha rol yod pa nyid dang  las yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa chud mi za ba nyid do // / +de ni 'di skad du / /

column3: de'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid mang po nyid du shes par bya'o // / +thog ma med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba bzhin du     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262237#262256#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6072;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6073;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6074# mi rtag par rags pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis ngo bo nyid rnam pa 'di gsum rjes su dpag tu yod par gyur to zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // / +de gnas pa'i mi rtag pa'i rigs pa nyid mngon sum du DMIGS PA'I PHYIR ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa dmigs su yod par gyur pa'i gtan tshigs  bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#46783#46783#TD4036E.TXT.r_7148# shes bya'i dngos po mngon sum du  rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gong nas gong du ches yongs su dag pa dang  ches yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.026#TD4057E.TXT.r#1399213#1399213#TD4057E.TXT.r_251;TD4057E.TXT.r_252# yid kyi rnam par shes pas yongs su bcad  pa dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa yang de'i tshe 'gags pa'i phyir ro // / +lhag par yang skad cig mar smra bas de mngon sum du ji ltar 'dod / /
column7: 0.027#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847922#2847925#TD4052E.TXT.r_771;TD4052E.TXT.r_772# rnam pa gcig tu na thos  pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba dang  skyes nas thob pa'i shes pa dag gis mngon sum du ma byas pa'i phyir zab pa'o // /
column8: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603263#2603263#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8416;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8417# thob pa dang zhes pas mngon sum du byed pa dag GIS ZHES BYA BA NI ting nge 'dzin gyi dus na de dang mthun pa'i rten gyis thob  pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir dang langs pa'i dus na de yang so sor yang dag par myong ba'i shes pas mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro // / +mngon sum du gyur pa ni mngon du byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus zhi ba thob pa'i gnas skabs na mngon du byed par rung ngo snyam  du bsams pa yin no // /
column9: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256176#256176#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5235# yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i dngos po BSDUS PA'I PHYIR ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to // /
column10: 0.029#TD4033E.TXT.r#1383524#1383524#TD4033E.TXT.r_373;TD4033E.TXT.r_374# mngon par brjod pas mngon par brjod PA ZHES BYA BA NI de ltar zag pa med pa'i chos mngon sum du brjod pas rjod par byed pa'o // / +de ni 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong yin pa'o // /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang thog ma'i mtha' med par 'dod de / / +sangs rgyas gzhan la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas nyid ni rgyu med pa las byung bar gyur du 'ong ngo // /

column3: de lta bas na gcig pa ma yin no // / +mang po yang ma yin  te ; / +dri ma med pa'i gnas la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262264#262274#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6075# 'di ltar des gnas pa'i mi rtag pa rags pa nyid mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar skad cig ma'i skye 'gag dang bcas pa mi rtag pa phra mo'i don yod par rjes su dpag pa  ste ; /

column3: dri ma med pa'i gnas ni 'dir chos kyi dbyings su 'dod de / / +ye shes kyi bye brag gis glo bur dri ma spangs pa'i phyir te / /

column5: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1322029#1322029#TD4037E.TXT.r_863# dpyod pa'i rjes su dpyod pa la gnas pa rnams kyi shes pa shin tu rnam par phye ba nges pa'i spyod yul shes bya'i dngos po mngon sum dang  rjes su dpag pa dang  yid ches pa'i lung gi tshad ma la brten nas / /

column3: de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa  de ni rtag pa ste / / +gzhan du na de bzhin nyid ces bya ba yang med par 'gyur ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262301#262310#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6077;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6078# sems can gyi bye brag sna tshogs dang  las sna tshogs dngos su dmigs PA'I PHYIR ZHES BYA BA NI GNYIS pa sdug bsngal rags pa la brten nas dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +'di ltar da    ltar gyi dus su sdug bsngal sna tshogs yod pa gang yin pa de ni snga ma'i las sna tshogs la brten nas / /

column6: 0.025#TD4037E.TXT.r#1320361#1320361#TD4037E.TXT.r_633# de la tshe 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan du 'dod pa'i 'bras bur  'gyur ba'i las rgyu bde bar gtogs pa gang yin pa dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po'i bde ba gang yin pa dang  tshor ba'i rgyun chad pa'i bde ba gang yin pa dang  gnod pa med pa'i bde ba gang yin pa de dag ni phan 'dogs pa dang  kha na ma tho pa med pa yin pas de dag byang chub sems  dpas sems can rnams la spyad pa'i phyir dgos par nges par bsgrub par bya'o // /

column3: smon  lam btab tu zin kyang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir bya ba yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262323#262332#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6079;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6080# mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir des gdon mi za bar ma 'ongs pa na yang sdug bsngal ba'i 'bras bu yod par rjes su dpag pa'o // / +sems can bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gyi las yongs su dag pa dang   yongs su ma dag pa la gnas pa na mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bdag med pa rags pa la brten nas / /

column3: sems can ji srid par gnas pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid do // / +bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa de so so rang gis rig par bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262333#262347#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6080;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6081;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6082# sems can bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gyi las yongs su dag pa dang   yongs su ma dag pa la gnas pa na mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bdag med pa rags pa la brten nas / /

column3: bsam pa zhes bya ba  ni rigs pa nges par sems pa las byung ba'i shes pa ste / / +rtog ger rtogs pa dper shes par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262346#262360#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6082# 'di ltar sems can rnams da ltar bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba dag ni las dge ba dang  mi dge ba la gnas pa nyid du  mthong bas las yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa dag gis ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu rab tu 'dren cing chud mi za bar rab tu shes pas bdag bde ba dang  sdug bsngal myong ba ci yang med pa kho na rab tu shes pa'o // /

column3: de'i spyod yul ma yin pas rtog ge'i sa la yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262359#262368#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6082# 'di ltar sems can rnams da ltar bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba dag ni las dge ba dang  mi dge ba la gnas pa nyid du  mthong bas las yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa dag gis ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu rab tu 'dren cing chud mi za bar rab tu shes pas bdag bde ba dang  sdug bsngal myong ba ci yang med pa kho na rab tu shes pa'o // /

column3: chos kyi sku ni mos pa dang chos spyod pa rnams kyis kyang thog ma nyid  du 'thob pas na reg pas 'thob ces bye brag tu byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262367#262386#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6082;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6083;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6084;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6085# 'di ltar sems can rnams da ltar bde ba dang  sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba dag ni las dge ba dang  mi dge ba la gnas pa nyid du  mthong bas las yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su ma dag pa dag gis ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu rab tu 'dren cing chud mi za bar rab tu shes pas bdag bde ba dang  sdug bsngal myong ba ci yang med pa kho na rab tu shes pa'o // /

column3: 'thob pas rnyed pa yin no // / +rtag pa'i phyir bskyed pa zhes ni mi brjod do // / +theg pa chen po'i chos 'dres pa la dmigs pa rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni brda phrad par zad de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262386#262394#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6084;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6085# mngon sum du ma gyur pa la rjes su dpag par byed pa LA ZHES BYA BA NI  gsum pa rigs pa'i sgo nas phra ba nyid du rjes su dpag par bstan te / / +'di ltar gong du bstan pa'i rgyu dang  rkyen rnam pa gsum po des mi rtag pa rags pa de dag gis shin tu phra zhing mthong bar dka' ba'i dngos po rjes su dpag par byed pa'o // /

column3: rnam pa lnga legs par  bsgoms pa zhes bya ba la / / +rnam pa lnga ni skad cig re re la gnas ngan len gyi gnas thams cad 'jig par byed pa dang  sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang bral te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262395#262406#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6085;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6086# 'di ltar gong du bstan pa'i rgyu dang  rkyen rnam pa gsum po des mi rtag pa rags pa de dag gis shin tu phra zhing mthong bar dka' ba'i dngos po rjes su dpag par byed pa'o // /

column3: chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba thob pa dang  chos kyi snang ba thams cad du tshad med cing rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa    pa yang dag par shes pa dang  rnam par dag pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mtshan ma rnam par brtags pa ma yin pa rnams de la kun du 'byung ba dang  chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir gong ma bas ches gong ma'i rgyu yangs su 'dzin par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262407#262414#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6086# de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni gnas mngon sum du  dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262415#262426#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6086;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6087# de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni gnas mngon sum du  dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262427#262441#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6087;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6088;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6089;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6090# rang gi rigs kyi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rang gi rigs kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262149#262151#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6059;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6060# mdor bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // / +'di ni dang po mdor  bstan pa ste / /
column8: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232403#232404#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2341;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2342# gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pa bcas pa la bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad la mkhas pa dang  ltung ba las bslang ba la  mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston te / / +'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan pa yang dang po mtshan nyid bdun bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320178#2320178#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1095;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1096;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1097# bdag nyid la smad pa'i dbang gis rtogs par mi 'gyur bar bstan pa dang  ma rtogs pa'i phyir yang bsod nams dang ye shes la brten par bstan pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // /

column3: sgrib pa srab mo  gzhig par dka' ba shigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i mtshan ma ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262442#262453#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6089;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6090;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6091# mdor  bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu ba'o // / +'di ni dang po chos mtshungs pa'i dpe mdor bstan pa'o // /

column3: dper na rdo rjes ni shin tu sra ba gzhig par dka' ba'i rdo rje yang phigs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262452#262461#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6091# nang dang phyi rol gyi 'du byed rnams kyi tshogs la 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa'i skye ba dang  'chi 'pho ba dag gi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs  pa la ni gnyis pa yang dag par rnam par bshad pa ston to // /

column3: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di yang de las gzhan pa'i shes pa rnams kyis gzhig par dka' bas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa'i  rnam pa shin tu sra ba gzhig pa'i phyir ye shes kyi de ma thag pa'i lam yin pas rdo rje dang bstun pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262460#262482#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6091;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6092;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6093;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6094;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6095# nang dang phyi rol gyi 'du byed rnams kyi tshogs la 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa'i skye ba dang  'chi 'pho ba dag gi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs  pa la ni gnyis pa yang dag par rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column5: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#492006#492007#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5648;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5649# de la sems can gang dag byis pa dang rmongs pa dang  shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can shes pa med pa de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa rmongs pa dag yang dag pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i  dpe bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa lngas dbye ste / /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328683#2328685#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2134;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2135# bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na bca' sga ni phye ma'i sman dang sbyar ba dang  bcud kyis len sbyar ba thams cad du gsal bar bgyi lags so zhes bya ba  'di man chad ni gsum pa dpe smos nas bzlas te bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang dpe rnam pa bzhis bstan pa nyid las rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#497867#497867#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6391;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6392;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6393# 'di ni gtan tshigs bstan pa'o // / +gsum pa ni dpe rnam par gzhag pa'o // / +'di chos mtshungs pa'i dpe bstan  pa'o // /
column8: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2781767#2781767#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11246# gzhu chen po'i dpe dang  sman pa'i dpe dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa'i dpe gzhan gyis KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA DANG  rnam par byang ba dang  rjes su mthun par sbyar ba dang  'jig rten pa'i dpe mthong ba'i 'brel pa gang yang rung bas KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA'i     // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin des ni sgrib pa thams cad dang bral lo // / +de dag gis gnas gyur pas 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa dang de'i rjes la thob pa'i ye shes de gnyis kyis gnas gyur  pa chos kyi sku 'thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262481#262491#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6094;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6096# 'di ni dang po mi rtag pa'i dpe bstan pa'o // / +de la nang dang phyi rol ces bya ba     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262491#262507#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6096;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6097# ni sems can dang  sems can ma yin pa las brtsams nas phyi nang gi dpe bstan pa ste / /

column3: 'byor pa rnam pa lngas zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga gyur pas so // / +nyan thos ni sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa'i phyir mdze can lus 'dor ba bzhin du phung po'i rgyun gcod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262508#262518#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6097;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6098# nang dang phyi rol gyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis la 'jig rten pa dag gi thun mong du skye ba dang  'chi 'pho la sogs pa'i dngos po nyid du shes pa mi rtag pa phra mo la sogs pa de dag gi dpe bstan  pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs yongs su bzung ba'i phyir mdze can sgrin po sman bcud kyis  len la brtan pa bzhin du kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid du sgyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262519#262534#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6098;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6099;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6100;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6101# yang na rags pa dang  phra ba mi dbye bar sbyi'i dper bstan pa'o // /

column3: de la gzugs kyi phung po gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing la dbang 'byor te / / +ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gser la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du ston pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262533#262547#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6100;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6101;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6102# skye ba dang 'jig bdag gis zhes 'byung gi 'chi 'pho zhes mi 'byung ngo // / +'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid  dper nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa sdug bsngal dper bstan pa ste / /

column3: lus bstan pa la dbang 'byor te / / +ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du  lus 'gyur ba dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha dad pa rnams su skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la ston pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262546#262563#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6101;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6102;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6103# 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid  dper nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa sdug bsngal dper bstan pa ste / / +'di ltar 'jig rten na yod pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal brgyad po dag bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal ba'i dper nye bar sbyar ba'o // /

column3: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po la dbang 'byor te / / +mtshan de dang dpe byad bzang po de dang de ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262562#262574#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6104;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6105# 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa rang dbang med pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs  ba dag gi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bdag med pa'i dpe bstan pa ste / /

column3: sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs  mtha' yas pa dang  spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba la yang dbang 'byor to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262575#262584#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6103;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6104;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6105# 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa rang dbang med pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs  ba dag gi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bdag med pa'i dpe bstan pa ste / / +brda phrad par zad do // / +gzhan yang phyi rol dag la 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa'i 'byor pa rgud pa dmigs pa dag gi dper nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa 'byor pa dang rgud pa'i  dpes bstan pa'o // /

column3: tshor ba'i phung po gyur pas ni kha na ma tho ba med cing tshad med la / / +rgya che ba'i bde bar gnas pa la dbang 'byor pa 'thob ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262585#262602#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6105;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6106;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6107# gzhan yang phyi rol dag la 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa'i 'byor pa rgud pa dmigs pa dag gi dper nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa 'byor pa dang rgud pa'i  dpes bstan pa'o // /

column3: de la kha na ma tho ba med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +tshad med pa ni sna tshogs kyi     // / +phyir ro ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262596#262603#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6106;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6107;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6108# de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262678#262688#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6115;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6116;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6117;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6114;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6118# yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni / / +gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262126#262126#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6055;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6056# de ltar bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid zhes bya'o zhes bya ba de ni gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ste / / +brda phrad par zad do //// /

column3: rgya che ba ni khams gsum pa'i bde ba las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir ro // / +'du shes kyi phung po gyur pas ni bstan pa la sogs pa la dbang 'byor ba thob ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261719#261724#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5989;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5990;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5991# 'di ni dang po mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gsum ste / / +mdor bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262604#262623#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6106;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6107;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6108;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6109;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6110# de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ste / / +brda phrad par zad do // / +yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan  nyid ston to ; / /

column3: 'di ltar 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid de / / +don yongs su gcod pa'o // / +ji ltar  'du shes su 'gyur ba de lta bu ming gi chogs la sogs pas rjes su tha snyad 'dogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262617#262624#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6108;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6109;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6110;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6111# yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan  nyid ston to ; / / +'di yang rnam pa gsum po mdor bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262625#262634#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6109;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6110;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6111;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6112# 'di yang rnam pa gsum po mdor bstan pa dang  rnam par bshad pa dang  mjug bsdu bas bstan te / / +'di ni dang po'o // / +'di lta ste / / +'di ltar mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang  gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang  rang gi  rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni grub par bya ba la gcig tu nges par grub par byed pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par bshad pa ste / /

column25: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222882#222882#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /

column3: de'i phyir de ni de dag gi gnas so // / +de la lha'i gnas pa rnams kyi nang na ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lan mang du gnas pa mdzad do // /

column3: 'phags pa'i gnas pa rnams kyi nang na ni stong pa nyid la  gnas so // / +tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams kyi nang na ni snying rje la gnas so // /

column3: sna tshogs 'di dag gis nyan thos la sogs pa las khyad par du 'phags so // / +nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das pa las khyad par du bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: gang phyir sangs rgyas rang gis dbyings brnyes nas // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa  smos so // /

column3: de 'dod pas ni de thob byed // / +ces bya ba ni dga' ba rnam pa lnga 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos kyi dbyings de yang dag par thob par byed do // /

column3: rnam pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi dga' ba de gang zhe na / / +mthu dang bya ba grub dang chos ro dang / /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#491509#491513#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5581# gzhan yang slob dpon yang dag bden pas 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i brjed byang  byas pa las / /

column3: zhes bya ba  la sogs pa smos te / / +dga' ba'i rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +mthu ni nus pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262867#262875#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6137;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6138# slob dpon yang dag bden pas 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i brjed byang byas pa las ni / / +theg pa chen po'i gzhung dang sbyar na stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i  ye shes gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de'i dpag tu med pa ni de de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dang ldan pa gang g'a'i klung du ma'i bye ma bgrang ba las 'das pa rnyed kyi chos kyi sku la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262876#262884#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6138;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6139;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6140;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6141# theg pa chen po'i gzhung dang sbyar na stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i  ye shes gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262884#262893#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6139;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6140;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6141# shes pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni / / +rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o // / +theg pa chung ngu bas 'dod pa'i don ni mtshan nyid gong ma las bzlog pa las rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: thams cad kyang mthu mtshungs pa'i phyir ro // / +gang dag la mthu dpag tu med pa mnga' ba de dag la dgyes pa skye'o // /

column3: dang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdu ba'i don to // / +bya ba ni byed pa ste / / +sems can gyi don te / / +skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum la 'god pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262905#262923#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6142;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6143;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6144;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6145;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6146;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6147;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6148;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6149;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6150# gzhan yang 'phags pa gsar 'od  dam pa'i mdo las / / +rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni // /

column3: de grub pa dpag tu med pa ni dus gsum po dag la yang thogs pa med  pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i phyir mthu dpag tu med pa dang bya ba grub pa dpag tu med pa las dgyes pa skye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262924#262935#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6149;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6150;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6151;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6152;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6153;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6154# rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni // / +rtsa bdag tu gyur pas na // / +zhes bya ba ni sngar  ye shes skye ba bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405686#2405686#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11210;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11211# 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las ni chos kyi sku nam mkha' lta bu dang  shes rab sprin chen po lta bus thams cad kun la khebs shing khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa ste / / +slob dpon yang dag bden pa'i brjed byang    las / /

column3: chos kyi ro ni mdo'i sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde'i chos dang ldan pa'o // / +dpag tu med pa ni 'dres pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i don ni mdo'i sde la sogs pa'i chos kyis brjod par     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262935#262945#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6152;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6153;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6155;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6156# yon tan dpag tu med pa dag / / +rab tu brgyan par gyur pa yin // / +zhes bya ba ni yon tan skye bar bstan pa'o // /

column3: par bya'o ;; / +de'i 'byor pa ni ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du snang ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262942#262961#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6155;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6156;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6157;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6158# zhes bya ba ni yon tan skye bar bstan pa'o // / +de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi shes rab yin la / /

column3: chos kyi ro dpag tu med pa dang  don 'byor pa dpag tu med pa las dgyes pa skye'o // /
yon tan rnams ni mngon par shes pa la sogs pa ste / / +de dag gi 'byor pa dpag tu med pa las  dgyes pa skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262960#262969#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6157;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6158;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6159;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6160# thams  cad ces bya ba ni mkhyen pa dang ldan pa yin la / / +mkhyen pa'i bye brag kyang mi mtshungs pa'i phyir thams cad ces gsungs so // /

column3: kha cig na re don ni mya ngan las 'das pa'am ji ltar 'dod pa'o // / +yon tan ni stobs la sogs pa zhe'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262970#262977#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6159;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6160;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6161# theg pa chung ngu'i gzhung gis thams cad stong pa nyid du mkhyen pa zhes bshad de / / +de la stong pa ni thams cad ces bya ba'i rtsa ba yin la / /

column3: rtag tu mi zad gzigs pas zhes bya ba ni mthu la sogs pa bdag la yod pa de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa de dag nyid mya ngan las 'das par yang yongs su zad pa  med par gzigs nas dgyes pa skye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262978#262994#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6160;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6161;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6162;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6163;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6164# de la stong pa ni thams cad ces bya ba'i rtsa ba yin la / / +thams CAD CES BYA BA NI stong pa'i yan lag  yin te ; / +rtsa ba las mi thob pa yin pas stong pa la rnam pa thams cad ces bya'o // /

column3: mchog ni khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro // / +kha na ma tho ba med pa ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#262993#263005#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6164;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6165# shes pa dang ldan pa'i nang na rnam pa sna tshogs mi mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: chos kyi sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i gnas nyid de de  yod na kun du ston pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263006#263017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6167# 'dir mkhyen pa rnam pa gnyis bshad pa yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi  mthun pas be'u'i sde pa rnams ni gang zag gi chos thams cad shes par nus pa la / /

column3: de ni nyi ma dang 'od zer gyi tshul lta bu yin no // / +sprul pa'i sku'i gnas zhes bya ba ni 'dir yang de nyid gnas kyi don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263016#263028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6166;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6167;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6168;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6169# 'dir mkhyen pa rnam pa gnyis bshad pa yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi  mthun pas be'u'i sde pa rnams ni gang zag gi chos thams cad shes par nus pa la / / +thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / / +de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos kyi nang nas / /

column3: phal cher zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mos pas spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i phyir ro // / +nyan thos rnams ni  dman pa la mos pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263029#263037#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6169;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6170;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6171# gal te logs shig tu gang zag gi bdag nyid yang dag par yod par rnam par ma    bzhag ; /

column3: de dag dang las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong ba med par yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ro // / +sa chen por chud pa rnams ni chos zab cing rgya che ba rtogs pa'i phyir sprul pa'i skus yongs su smin par bya ba ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263038#263055#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6170;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6171;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6172;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6173;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6174# bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur te / / +sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa yin no // /

column3: bsdus  pa ngo bo nyid kyis bsdus pa ni / / +sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag pas zhes bya ba ste / / +chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263056#263066#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6173;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6174;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6175;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6176# thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni rgyun la brten nas thams cad mkhyen  pa zhes 'dod kyi / / +bdag ni ma yin no zhes zer te / / +de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos las / /

column3: chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro // / +gang zhig rnam par dag pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263067#263075#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6176;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6177;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6178# nged kyi bcom ldan 'das thams cad gcig par mkhyen pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mi zer te zhes 'byung ba yin te / /

column3: gang zhig gyur pas yin snyam pa la / / +kun gzhi rnam par  shes pa gyur nas zhes bya ba smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263074#263085#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6176;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6177;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6180# nged kyi bcom ldan 'das thams cad gcig par mkhyen pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mi zer te zhes 'byung ba yin te / / +bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na / / +be'u'i sde bdag ni nged thams cad  mkhyen pa zhes zer bar zad kyi / /

column3: kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sa bon can de gnyen pos bstsal na yon tan kha na ma tho ba med pa mang po thams cad dang mthun par 'gyur te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263086#263099#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6178;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6179;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6180;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6181# be'u'i sde bdag ni nged thams cad  mkhyen pa zhes zer bar zad kyi / / +bdag gi shes so zhes mi smra ste / / +'di ltar rgyud kyi dbang du byas nas spyod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i mtshan brnyes pa yin te / /

column3: dper na sman nang med kyis dug bsal na sman nad med du 'gyur ba bzhin du gyur pa brjod    par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263097#263118#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6180;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6181;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6182# 'di ltar rgyud kyi dbang du byas nas spyod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i mtshan brnyes pa yin te / / +phung po rnams kyi rgyud la nus pa khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu yongs su grub pas thugs la dgongs pa tsam gyis  mkhyen par mdzad pa'i dgongs pa'i yul dag la phyin ci log mi mnga' bar mkhyen pa skye ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'i / /
column5: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1156404#1156404#TD4047E.TXT.r_5185;TD4047E.TXT.r_5186# bsgribs pa med  par 'jug pas na chags pa med pa'o // / +de lta bu'i ye shes ni dgongs pa tsam gyis grub pa'i ye shes zhes kyang bya / /
column6: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3114317#3114317#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3258;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3259# gang gi tshe rgyun chags su yid la byed pas bar chad med pa'i sems nyid yid la byed pa'o // / +ji tsam gyis na zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gnyis 'dres par gyur te / /

column3: rnam par smin pas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsdus zhes bya bar sbyar ro // / +mig la sogs pa'i dbang po gyur nas zhes bya ba ni de dag rnam par smin pa yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263118#263128#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6181;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6182;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6183;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6184# phung po rnams kyi rgyud la nus pa khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu yongs su grub pas thugs la dgongs pa tsam gyis  mkhyen par mdzad pa'i dgongs pa'i yul dag la phyin ci log mi mnga' bar mkhyen pa skye ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'i / / +skad cig ma gcig la cig car mkhyen pa NI MA YIN PA'I PHYIR TE / /

column3: de gyur pa yang sngon byung ba'i tshul gyis rnam par smin pa nyid du gnas te / / +sngon byung ba'i  tshul nyid kyis rnam par smin pa'i ye shes thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263129#263141#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6184;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6185;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6186;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6187# dper na rgyun gyis nus pa'i phyir // / +me yis thams cad  sreg 'dod ltar // /
column5: 2.980#TD4051E.TXT.r#1235579#1235584#TD4051E.TXT.r_482;TD4051E.TXT.r_483;TD4051E.TXT.r_484# mes ni thams cad sreg 'dod ltar // / +de bzhin thams cad mkhyen 'dod kyi // /
column6: 2.980#TD4095E.TXT.r#104581#104586#TD4095E.TXT.r_8173;TD4095E.TXT.r_8174;TD4095E.TXT.r_8175# rgyun gyis spyod pa'i phyir na dper // / +me yis thams cad sreg  'dod ltar // /
column7: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1081137#1081142#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4813;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4814;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4815# rgyun gyis spyod pa'i phyir na dper // / +me yis thams cad sreg 'dod lta // /

column3: gnas pas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis bsdus pa'o // / +'dod pa la spyod pa la sogs pa la gnas gyur nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni mos pas spyod pa la sogs pa bsdu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263142#263157#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6187;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6188;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6189;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6190# gcig par thams cad mkhyen phyir min // /

column3: de gyur pas gnas pa'i ye  shes 'thob bo // / +ye shes tshad med pas gnas pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gang gis lha la sogs pa'i gnas pa sna tshogs rnams kyis gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263158#263173#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6190;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6191;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6192;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6193;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6194# bdag gis kun shes pa ni ma yin par shes na 'di dang de dag gis brtags pa dang sbyar na bdag gis  sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang rung / /

column3: dbang 'byor bas sa ni yongs su 'dzin pa'i las sna tshogs gyur nas zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten na zhing las dang chod la sogs pa  yongs su 'dzin pa'i las sna tshogs gang yin pa de gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263172#263183#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6192;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6193;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6194;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6195;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6196;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6197# gang du bstan zhe na / / +tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad du / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263184#263196#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6196;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6197;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6198;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6199;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6200# da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gang // / +de dag sems can  mya ngan sel ; / /
column6: 0.0#TD4099E.TXT.r#114559#114562#TD4099E.TXT.r_1855;TD4099E.TXT.r_1856;TD4099E.TXT.r_1857# gang dag 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / / +gang dag ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /

column3: tha snyad pas zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten na mthong ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad gang yin pa de dag gyur nas mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs pa  la dbang 'byor ba thob ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263197#263214#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6199;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6200;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6201# khyod kyi gzhung gis ni phung po kho na la dus gsum yod par 'dod kyi / / +gang zag las ni ma yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar de ltar nges shes 'byung ngo // /

column3: des sems can thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pa'i ye shes thob bo // / +sel babs zhes bya ba ni gang 'jig rten na mdza' bo dang nor gyi stobs kyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba la sogs pa nas byung ba'i gnod pa zhi bar byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263213#263223#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6201;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6202;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6203# thams cad yod par smra ba de'i gzhung gis thams cad mkhyen pa ZHES BYA BA DE YANG dag pa dang kun rdzob kyi ye     // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263223#263231#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6202;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6203;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6204# shes las ye shes gang gi dbang du byas nas bstan zhe na smras pa / / +yang dag pa dang kun rdzob la dmigs pa gnyi ga la brjod pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de gyur nas sems  can thams cad kyi gnod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes 'thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263232#263241#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6203;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6204;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6205# yang dag pa dang kun rdzob la dmigs pa gnyi ga la brjod pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o // / +de lta ma yin na ni theg pa gnyis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: rnam pa drug po 'di dag gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi chos drug 'thob bo // / +gnas dang dgongs pa dang phrin las tha dad pa med pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dbyer med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263242#263249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6205;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6206;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6207# mdo sde'i gzhung dang   gzhan yang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263250#263260#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6207;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6208# slob dpon med pa'i ye shes dang  thams cad mkhyen pa dang  rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang  rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes so zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: gnas tha dad pa  med pa ni de bzhin nyid tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa tha dad pa med pa ni thams cad kyang phan pa dang bde bar dgongs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263259#263273#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6208;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6209;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6210# rnam par phye ste bshad pa med na 'di dag la bye brag ci yod ce na / /

column3: phrin las tha dad pa med pa ni thams cad kyang 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir te / / +mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang yongs su mya ngan las     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263274#263285#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6210;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6211;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6212# rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po la dmigs pa'i mkhyen pa'o zhes zer ro // / +dge 'dun phal chen pa'i sde pa dang  lan cig brjod pa'i sde pa dang  bya ma la pa'i sde pa dag ni 'di skad du / /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#456057#456057#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_802# gnyis pa ni phal chen pa'i sde pa dang  lan cig brjod pa'i sde pa dang  'jig rten las 'das par smra ba'i sde pa dang  bya mngal ba'i sde pa la sogs pa rnams te / /

column3: 'das pa ston pa'i phrin las can yin pa'i phyir ro // / +lus tshad med pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir tha dad pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar lus gzhan dang gzhan tshad med pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239883#239884#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3324;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3325# mtshungs bar ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed ni bag la nyal zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / / +gzhung lugs kyi 'khor lo'i bstan bcos  las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263286#263295#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6211;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6212;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6213# dge 'dun phal chen pa'i sde pa dang  lan cig brjod pa'i sde pa dang  bya ma la pa'i sde pa dag ni 'di skad du / / +skad cig ma'i sems gcig gis  thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263295#263316#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6213;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6214;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6215;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6216;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6217# skad cig ma gcig gis sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad shes so // /
column7: 0.009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2330843#2330846#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2377;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2378# de dag gis 'phags pa'i gsung rab khungs su bstan pa ni gzhan nas bstan pa bzhin no // / +sde pa tha dad pa'i gzhung lugs kyi bstan bcos las bstan pa dang sbyar na / /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#456619#456620#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_883# bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las go bar gyur te zhes bshad pa de ni gzhung lugs kyi bstan bcos las 'byung ba'i thams cad yod par smra ba la sogs pa'o // /

column3: de'i phyir tha dad pa med pa ma yin te / / +ji skad du sngar / / +bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364562#2364565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6300;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6301;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6302# 'phags pa'i gsung rab las tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad  la thug pa kho nar gsungs pa'i phyir dang  khams chung ngu brtsegs pa las bar ma dang chen po mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro // / +'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa rnams dang sbyar na yang / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239883#239884#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3324;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3325# mtshungs bar ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed ni bag la nyal zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / / +gzhung lugs kyi 'khor lo'i bstan bcos  las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528252#528252#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10285# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni  bstan bcos rnam par dgrol ba'i lam bstan pa dang  mngal du 'jug pa'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: gnas pa tha dad yod ma yin // / +sngon gyi rjes su 'brang bas na // / +de la gdags pas tha dad byed // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340793#2340795#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3484# gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las zhi gnas ni 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366102#2366105#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6499;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6500# bstan pa'i sgo bstan pa dang  grangs bstan pa dang  ming bkod pa'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222269#222271#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1061;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1062# 'di gnyis la byang chub kyi tshogs zhes  bshad do zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni bsags pa'i don gyi phyir tshogs zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222386#222388#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1081;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1082# phyi ma gsum ni ye shes  yin te / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ji skad du / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263317#263328#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6216;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6217;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6218# 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa dang sbyar na / / +yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269925#269929#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7050;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7051# dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang  lha'i rnga la yid la byed pa med kyang bya ba'i dngos po rnams mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#453094#453094#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_394# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /

column28: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274194#274195#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  lang gi che bsgyur ba las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column29: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221407#221407#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_936# bslab pa gsum rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang  bstan  bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang  lung sna tshogs dang  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column30: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#531508#531509#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10713# 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa dang sbyar na bstan bcos rnams  so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / /

column32: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344365#2344367#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3894;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3895# sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni bcu gcig dge ba las shin tu sbyangs pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las lus yang zhing zo mdog bde ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu  sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bshad de / /
column33: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396710#2396711#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10167;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10168# gnas bcu pa'i bshad pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rim par gnas pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni sa zhes bya'o zhes  bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column34: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#451981#451981#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_236# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med  kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni mdo sde rnams kyi tshig dag gis ngo bo nyid byed do zhes zer ba 'di yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes sun 'byin te / /
column35: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521876#521876#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9400# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni gnyis su phye nas bstan te / /
column36: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523259#523259#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9598# gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las rnam pa lngar bstan pa  yin te de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las 'di lta ste / /
column37: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323866#2323866#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1580# sems can dmyal bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column39: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353302#2353302#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4928;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4929# 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa dang sbyar na / / +so so nas bshad pa mi mthun  te / /

column3: ces bshad pa lta bu'o // / +de bzhin du gnyis pa la yang brjod par bya ste / / +de gnyis kyi gnas ni chos  kyi sku yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263329#263338#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6217;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6218;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6219# yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / / +theg pa gnyis kyis thams cad mkhyen pa thob par lta bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin  no zhes bshad de / /

column3: dgongs pa dang phrin las dag kyang tha dad pa med do // / +tha dad pa 'di ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gzhan no // /

column3: 'di ni gzhan no zhes bya ba dang  'di ni sh'akya thub pa'o // / +'di ni rnam par gzigs so zhes bya'o // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis slob ma la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'i  yon tan rnams kyang shin tu sbyangs pa'i phyir / / +khyad par du 'phags pa brjod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263356#263366#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6223;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6224;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6225;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6226;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6227# de ni thams cad zad par 'dod // / +cig car thams cad rig min pas // /

column3: shin tu yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang  snying  rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms rnams so // /

column3: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig dang  spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263384#263393#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6228;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6229;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6230;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6231;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6232# chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes thugs su chud pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin nam zhe na / / +thams cad mkhyen    pa yin mod kyi / /

column3: mngon par shes pa drug ces bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul dang  kha'i rna ba dang  sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang  sngon gyi gnas rjes  su dran pa'i shes pa dang  'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa dang  zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bdag nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263394#263403#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6231;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6232# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa nyid du chos thams cad thugs su chud cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyang bsdus pa yin no zhes bshad kyang 'gal  ba med do ; / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263403#263411#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6232;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6233# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa nyid du chos thams cad thugs su chud cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyang bsdus pa yin no zhes bshad kyang 'gal  ba med do ; / /

column3: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo yod pa la sogs pa'o // /
