column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264276#264286#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6359;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6360;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6361;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6362# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang phal cher bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba dang mthun par bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#513225#513226#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8311;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8312# bstan bcos mngon pa kun  las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  rnam 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang 'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518357#518359#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8891;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8892# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang  'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las log pa'i chos 'dzin cing yang dag pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i spong ba zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372096#2372097#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7301;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7302# slob dpon yon tan byin gyis 'grel pa las kyang don phal cher 'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni dper na gzhan dag  las klog pa dang kha ton slob pa dang rnam par 'byed cing dpyod ba lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes pa zhes bya'o // /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243996#243996#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3843# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: shes bya'i     // / +sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga'o // / +snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir rtag tu mnyam par gzhan pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264287#264298#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6362;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6363# de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams dang  dus gsum gyi chos ni mtshan ma yod pa ma yin na / /

column3: skyon med bzhud kyang mnyam par gzhag / / +ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264296#264304#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6362;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6363;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6364;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6365# de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams dang  dus gsum gyi chos ni mtshan ma yod pa ma yin na / / +'di ci'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264479#264483#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6389;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6388;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6390# gzhan yang sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan nas / /

column3: gang gi phyir de lta bur gyur ba de'i phyir khyod  rtag tu 'dri ba thams cad kyi lan ldon pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264305#264325#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6364;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6365;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6366;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6367;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6368;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6369;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6370# mtshan gcig kyang yang dag par yod pa ma yin na / / +sum cu rtsa gnyis lta smos kyang ci dgos she na / /

column3: so so yang dag par rig pa'i 'grel ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni / / +gnas dang gnas pa bshad bya dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264315#264326#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6367;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6368;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6369;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6370# sangs  rgyas kyi chos la bden pa gnyis yod do // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264477#264478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6389# gzhan yang sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan nas / /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219331#219331#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_679# mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa'i phyir dang  bla na med pa'i bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bde ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dang  phun sum  tshogs pa bla na med pa ni 'di lta ste / /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264362#264363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6376# shes rab kyi lam gyi phyir ni mtshan med par bstan to // / +skye ba'i lus kyi phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to // /
column8: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1223616#1223617#TD4047E.TXT.r_14527;TD4047E.TXT.r_14528# gzhan dag la 'di lta bu mi srid pa'i phyir zhes bya bas so // / +mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba ni / /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +de la gnas ni bstan pa'i chos te / / +mdo'i sde la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264322#264333#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6368;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6369;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6370;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6371;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6372# kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang  don dam pa'i bden pa'o // / +kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264361#264363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6376# shes rab kyi lam gyi phyir ni mtshan med par bstan to // / +skye ba'i lus kyi phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to // /

column3: gnas pa ni de'i brjod par bya ba'i  don to // / +de ni gnyis kyis bshad par bya ba yin pas ston pa gnyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264332#264342#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6370;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6371;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6372;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6373;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6374# don dam pa'i bden pa'i phyir ni mtshan med par bstan to // / +gzhan yang lam gnyis te / / +sems can bsod nams spel ba'i lam  dang ; /

column3: tshig dang  shes pa ste / / +ngag kun du slong bar byed pa'i phyir ro // / +de dag la blo gros mi thogs pa ni mkhyen pa ldog pa med pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264338#264353#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6372;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6373;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6375# sems can bsod nams spel ba'i lam  dang ; / +sems can shes rab sgom par byed pa'i lam mo // /

column3: de la gnas pa blo gros thogs pa med pa ni / / +chos so so yang dag par rig pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264354#264363#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6376# bsod nams kyi lam gyi phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to // / +shes rab kyi lam gyi phyir ni mtshan med par bstan to // /

column3: rnam grangs su gtogs pa rnams la thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +gnas pa blo gros thogs pa med pa ni don so so yang dag par rig pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264362#264372#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6375;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6376;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6377;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6378# shes rab kyi lam gyi phyir ni mtshan med par bstan to // / +skye ba'i lus kyi phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264322#264325#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6368;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6369;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6370# kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang  don dam pa'i bden pa'o // / +kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264477#264478#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6389# gzhan yang sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan nas / /

column3: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang  chos rnams kyi don gzhan la sogs pa'i dgongs pa la thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264373#264381#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6377;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6378# chos kyi sku'i phyir ni mtshan med par bstan te / / +'di ltar  skye ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang pos bdag nyid brgyan pa yin la / /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264101#264103#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6338# byang chub sems dpas 'thob pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang yin pa dang  'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'thob pa'i mtshan la bye brag tu gyur pa ci yod ce na / /

column3: tshig la blo gros thogs  pa med pa ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264380#264389#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6379# 'di ltar  skye ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang pos bdag nyid brgyan pa yin la / /

column3: yul gyi skad tha dad par rang rang dang phan tshun ming gzhan gyis tha snyad 'dogs pa dang  chos kyi nges pa'i tshig la thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264388#264397#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6379# chos kyi sku ni stobs bcu dang  mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang  so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs pas bdag nyid brgyan pas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264398#264412#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6379;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6380;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6381;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6382# chos kyi sku ni stobs bcu dang  mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang  so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs pas bdag nyid brgyan pas so // / +sems can rnams la rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gnyis yod de / /

column3: chos rab tu dbye ba'i shes pa la blo gros thogs pa med pa ni spobs pa so so  yang dag par rig pa'o // /
mngon par shes pa rnam par 'byed pa'i tshigs su bcas pa ni / / +ched du bzhud dang de dag gi // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264413#264422#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6382# bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen can gyi sems can rab tu 'dren par bzhed pa'i phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i sku spyod par mdzad do // /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219330#219331#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_678;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_679# bla na med pa'i byang chub ni bla na med pa'i rnam pa bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir bla na med pa zhes bya ste / / +mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa'i phyir dang  bla na med pa'i bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bde ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dang  phun sum  tshogs pa bla na med pa ni 'di lta ste / /
column6: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264101#264103#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6338# byang chub sems dpas 'thob pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang yin pa dang  'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'thob pa'i mtshan la bye brag tu gyur pa ci yod ce na / /
column7: 0.018#TD4019E.TXT.r#2516991#2516991#TD4019E.TXT.r_14494# de yang kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam pas bsdus pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba ni ma yin te / /
column8: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1223617#1223617#TD4047E.TXT.r_14527;TD4047E.TXT.r_14528# gzhan dag la 'di lta bu mi srid pa'i phyir zhes bya bas so // / +mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba ni / /
column9: 0.019#TD4010E.TXT.r#2255430#2255432#TD4010E.TXT.r_3170;TD4010E.TXT.r_3171# bar snang mtshungs pa ni spros pa med pas so // / +gal te mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par byang chub sku mnga' na ji ltar bar snang ba mtshungs pa'i sku yin zhe na / /
column10: 0.022#TD4010E.TXT.r#2255508#2255509#TD4010E.TXT.r_3187# chos kyi sku'i dbang gis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku mthong bar gyur na yang tshad dang chu dang zhing 'di tsam mo zhes sus kyang gzhal bar mi nus so // /
column11: 0.022#TD4019E.TXT.r#2430958#2430958#TD4019E.TXT.r_3251# zhing sna tshogs su sprul ba'i sku sna tshogs ston pa dang  sngar snang ba med pa las  lha chen po dang gtogs 'dod la sogs pa mu stegs kyi ston pa rnams kyi gzugs dang  de'i 'og tu khyod nyid mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku  ru snang ba'i go rims mi 'thad ces brtsad pa dang  khyod kyi rgyal sras las sam rgyu gang las byung zhes pa dang  'khor ba'i gnas su sred pa'i srad bu la sogs pas bcings pa las thabs gang gis grol zhing grol ba'i gnas kyi khyad par gang zhig tu 'gro bar 'gyur zhes pa ste / /
column12: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#467095#467095#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2324# skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pas rab tu brgyan pa'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.025#TD4010E.TXT.r#2246380#2246380#TD4010E.TXT.r_1986# gzugs bzang 'chang ba ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'chang ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: legs 'doms zhes bya ba'i sgra ni re re dang sbyar te / / +de ni mdzes par 'doms pa yi pas legs par 'doms so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264420#264432#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6382;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6383# bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen can gyi sems can rab tu 'dren par bzhed pa'i phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i sku spyod par mdzad do // /
column5: 0.025#TD4019E.TXT.r#2430958#2430958#TD4019E.TXT.r_3251# zhing sna tshogs su sprul ba'i sku sna tshogs ston pa dang  sngar snang ba med pa las  lha chen po dang gtogs 'dod la sogs pa mu stegs kyi ston pa rnams kyi gzugs dang  de'i 'og tu khyod nyid mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku  ru snang ba'i go rims mi 'thad ces brtsad pa dang  khyod kyi rgyal sras las sam rgyu gang las byung zhes pa dang  'khor ba'i gnas su sred pa'i srad bu la sogs pas bcings pa las thabs gang gis grol zhing grol ba'i gnas kyi khyad par gang zhig tu 'gro bar 'gyur zhes pa ste / /
column6: 0.028#TD4010E.TXT.r#2255508#2255509#TD4010E.TXT.r_3187# chos kyi sku'i dbang gis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku mthong bar gyur na yang tshad dang chu dang zhing 'di tsam mo zhes sus kyang gzhal bar mi nus so // /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#219331#219331#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_679# mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa'i phyir dang  bla na med pa'i bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bde ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dang  phun sum  tshogs pa bla na med pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: bye  brag khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra ba ni 'doms pa'o // / +ched du bzhud nas legs par 'doms // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264433#264452#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6383;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6384;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6386;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6387# shes rab kyi rgyu dang rkyen can gyi sems  can rab tu 'dren pa'i phyir / /

column3: zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pas 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du bzhud pa'i phyir ro // /

de dag gi tshig rnams kyis legs par 'doms zhes bya ba ni lha'i rna ba'i    mngon par shes pas 'gro ba thams cad pa'i 'dul pa rnams kyis smras pa'i sgra don dang ldan pa'i rgyang ring po yang gnas nas ji ltar mthun par chos ston pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264453#264471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6387;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6388;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6389# ming la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can gyi phyir ni mtshan med par bstan to // /

column3: spyod pa mkhyen nas legs par 'doms // / +zhes bya ba ni sems kyi rnam grangs kyi mngon par shes pas dbang po mchog dang  mchog ma yin pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#967605#967605#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_9955# dam pa'i chos gsung rab yan  lag bcu gnyis nyan pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.029#TD4010E.TXT.r#2249111#2249111#TD4010E.TXT.r_2317# byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi gdung  rgyud mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs nas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang  dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku chen por gyur nas / /

column3: 'ongs pa la legs par 'doms zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa ste / / +des 'ongs pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264484#264494#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6389;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6390;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6391;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6392# gzhan yang sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan nas / / +mtshan med pa'i chos 'jig par mi mdzad do zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: 'gro ba la legs par 'doms pa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa ste / / +des 'gro ba rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264495#264504#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6391;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6392;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6393# mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rgya cher rnam par  bshad pa ni / / +mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#503328#503328#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7101# bde ba rnam pa lnga'i don zhib tu bshad pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: nges par  'byung ba la legs par 'doms zhes bya ba ni zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264505#264514#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6394# stobs bcu dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod pa ZHES BYA BA NI GSUM PA stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /

column3: chos kyi sku ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po kun du ston pa'i gnas yin pas de dang ldan pa lta bur ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264515#264525#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6394;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6395# stobs bcu dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // / +mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par ston pa phas kyi  rgol ba thams cad kyis brgal du med cing / /

column3: sems can kun gyis khyod mthong na // / +skyes bu mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264526#264534#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6394;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6395;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6396# mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par ston pa phas kyi  rgol ba thams cad kyis brgal du med cing / / +log par smra ba thams cad tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba ni gzhi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni skyes bu chen po khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste / / +mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa khyod mthong na kye ma bcom ldan 'das ni skyes bu ches po'o zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264535#264551#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6396;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6397;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6398;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6399# mdo 'di nyid las mdor bsdus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa drug bstan pa'o // /

column3: mthong ba tsam gyis dad par 'gyur // / +zhes bya ba ni dad pa skyed  par mdzad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264552#264561#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6398;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6399;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6400# de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brgya bzhi bcu ston to // / +bla na med pa'i gnas pa'i mdo las ni yon tan rnam pa brgya brgyad cu ston te / /

column3: yongs su dag pa bzhi'i rnam par 'grel pa'i bstod pa ni / / +len dang gnas dang gtong ba dang  sprul pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2400630#2400632#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10662;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10663# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +zhib tu mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264562#264572#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6399;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6400;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6402# bla na med pa'i gnas pa'i mdo las ni yon tan rnam pa brgya brgyad cu ston te / / +zhib tu mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2375719#2375720#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7747# mdo dang bstan bcos las stong pa nyid bco brgyad dang   stong pa nyid bcu drug dang  stong pa nyid bcu bzhi dang  stong pa nyid rnam pa gnyis zhes bstan pa yang zhib tu mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2359846#2359846#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5695# rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i  ting nge 'dzin 'di'i bye brag gi mtshan nyid kyi don zhib tu mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#503327#503327#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7101# bde ba rnam pa lnga'i don zhib tu bshad pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349695#2349695#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4476;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4477# smras pa'i don dang shes bya'i dngos po ji snyed yod pa nyid dang ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid gang yin pa de tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de  nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // / +gnas yongs su dag pa ni bsam gtan la brten nas ji ltar bzhed pa dang  ji srid du bzhed pa  bzhin du sku lus len pa dang  bzhugs pa dang 'dor ba la mnga' brnyes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264571#264587#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6401;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6402;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6403# legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad  dang ; / +dge sbyong bzhi snang ba yin te zhes bya ba ni lnga pa lam dang 'bras bu snang ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /

column3: dmigs pa yongs su dag pa ni sngon med pa'i gzugs sprul pa dang  sngon byung ba'i gzugs gser la sogs pa'i dngos por bsgyur ba dang  rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud pa mnga' brnyes  pa'o ;; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264588#264604#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6403;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6404# 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung nas chos legs par gsungs pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang  des mngon du byas pa'i dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang   'phags ba nyi shu rtsa bdun la sogs pa 'bras bu sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ba yin la / /

column3: thugs yongs su dag pa ni ji ltar bzhed du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la dbang bsgyur ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264605#264620#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6403;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6404;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6405# 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung nas chos legs par gsungs pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang  des mngon du byas pa'i dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang   'phags ba nyi shu rtsa bdun la sogs pa 'bras bu sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ba yin la / / +gal te sangs rgyas byung bar ma gyur na / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#492676#492679#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5735;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5736# don med pa la dmigs pa las kyang sems skye bar bshad pas / / +de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347421#2347423#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4212;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4213# mdo sde pa'i gzhung dang rang nyid bzhin mthong ba rnam par 'jig par mdzad de // / +de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las grib ma'i gzugs dang gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs ni tha dad  par bshad pa ni mi rigs te / /

column3: skad cig re re la ji ltar bzhed pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gzhan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro // / +mkhyen pa yongs su dag pa ni ji ltar bzhed pa bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo kun du 'dzin     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264621#264628#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6405;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6406# thams cad mi snang bas de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las mi ni bsod nams dang shes rab dang ldan mod kyi / / +gal te sangs rgyas 'jig  rten du ma byung na rnam par smin pa myong ba dang  lam 'thob par mi 'gyur la gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung bar gyur na ni / /

column3: pa yang dag par 'byor ba'o // / +stobs kyi rnam par 'grel pa'i bstod pa ni / / +thabs dang skyabs dang dag par dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264627#264638#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6407# gal te sangs rgyas 'jig  rten du ma byung na rnam par smin pa myong ba dang  lam 'thob par mi 'gyur la gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung bar gyur na ni / /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / / +bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dang las dang dag pa dang  theg pa chen po dang  don bzhi po dag la sems can rnams slu ba'i phyir  bdud gang yin pa de 'joms par byed pas stobs bcu rnams kyi las brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264636#264647#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6406;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6407;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6408;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6409# gal te sangs rgyas 'jig  rten du ma byung na rnam par smin pa myong ba dang  lam 'thob par mi 'gyur la gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung bar gyur na ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264648#264655#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6408;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6409;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6410# dper na mi'i mig dang ldan yang / / +nyi ma ma shar na ci yang mthong bar mi 'gyur gyi / /

column3: de la dge ba ni bde 'gro'i thabs so // / +mi dge ba ni ngan 'gro'i thabs so zhes de ston pa la bslu ba'i phyir bdud nye bar gnas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264653#264675#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6409;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6410;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6411;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6412;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6413;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6414# nyi ma ma shar na ci yang mthong bar mi 'gyur gyi / / +nyi ma shar nas gdod mthong bar 'gyur bas bdag la     // /

column3: 'di ni de lta ma yin gyi / / +'di ni log pa ste / / +mi dge ba las bde 'gro'o // /
bde  ba las ni ngan 'gro zhe'am // / +yang na thams cad ni rgyu med pa 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264676#264684#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6413;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6415# phyi nang gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis yang dag pa'i lta ba skyed de / / +gzhan las chos thos pa dang  bdag nyid nang du tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ste / /

column3: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba'o zhes zer ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis 'gro ba rgyu med pa las byung ba dang  mi mthun pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni gnas ma  yin zhing go skabs med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264683#264702#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6414;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6415;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6417;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6418;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6419# gzhan las chos thos pa dang  bdag nyid nang du tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ste / / +bsod nams kyi dngos po bskyed pa'i phyir  dang ; /

column3: 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / / +'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264703#264711#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6418;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6419;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6420# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin no // /
column5: 0.027#TD4053E.TXT.r#3002833#3002833#TD4053E.TXT.r_5064;TD4053E.TXT.r_5065# smra ba'i  yon tan dang nyes pa brtags nas mi byed pas 'byung ba ni chad pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +byed pas 'byung ba ni lcogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1050672#1050672#TD4054E.TXT.r_9397;TD4054E.TXT.r_9398;TD4054E.TXT.r_9399# smra ba'i yon tan dang nyes pa brtags nas mi phyed pas 'byung ba ni chad pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir  ro ; / / +byed pas 'byung ba ni / / +mi gzhol ba'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1630275#1630275#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5862;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5863# rgyur gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin te / / +'di  las 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1201105#1201106#TD4047E.TXT.r_11309;TD4047E.TXT.r_11310# gzugs la sogs pa rang nyid kyis bdag med pa'i mtshan  nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / / +de dag la de las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid kyang med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 'byung gi / / +rim la sogs pas dbang phyug la sogs pa la ma yin no zhes 'joms te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264712#264722#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6419;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6420# dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin no // / +de ltar skye ba'i phyir dang   mtshan dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  the tshom gyi dra ba gcod pa'i phyir dang  gzhan dag gis brgal du med cing gzhan dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  dge sbyong dmigs pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /

column3: gnas dang thabs zhes bya ba ni don gcig go // / +skyabs zhes bya ba ni las te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264723#264732#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6420# de ltar skye ba'i phyir dang   mtshan dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  the tshom gyi dra ba gcod pa'i phyir dang  gzhan dag gis brgal du med cing gzhan dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  dge sbyong dmigs pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /

column3: ji skad du / / +'jig rten 'di ni las bdag gir bya ba las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264731#264741#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6420;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6421;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6422# de ltar skye ba'i phyir dang   mtshan dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  the tshom gyi dra ba gcod pa'i phyir dang  gzhan dag gis brgal du med cing gzhan dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  dge sbyong dmigs pa'i phyir DANG ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PAS ni gsum pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264786#264790#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6425;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6426;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6427# de ltar rnam pa lnga po dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i spyi'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264791#264798#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6429# de ltar rnam pa lnga po dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i spyi'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264798#264806#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6429# rigs kyi bu de lta na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lung gi tshad ma'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid lnga po dag gis yongs su dag pa yin NO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa tshad ma gsum las brtsams nas mtshan nyid  snga ma lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa'o // /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256404#256405#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5265# lhung ba'i gnas lta bu'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsum pa lhung ba'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261664#261664#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5981;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5982# mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bshad pa dang  mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // / +dang po la yang rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: 'dir yang slu ba ni snga ma bzhin no // / +de yang bdud gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi rnam par smin pa  mkhyen pa'i stobs thogs pa med pa sems can ni las kyis mthon po dang  dma' ba dang  ngan pa dang  bzang por rnam par phye ba yin gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264739#264750#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6420;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6421;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6422;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6423# de ltar skye ba'i phyir dang   mtshan dang ldan pa'i phyir dang  the tshom gyi dra ba gcod pa'i phyir dang  gzhan dag gis brgal du med cing gzhan dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  dge sbyong dmigs pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga rnam par phye nas bstan pas mjug bsdu ba dang  mtshan nyid lnga po spyi'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264750#264758#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6422;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6423;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6424;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6425# mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga rnam par phye nas bstan pas mjug bsdu ba dang  mtshan nyid lnga po spyi'i mjug bsdu ba'o // / +'di ni dang po ste / /

column3: dbang phyug la sogs pa las byung ba ni ma yin / / +glo bur du byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'joms so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264759#264768#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6424;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6425;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6426# go rims bzhin du mtshan nyid lnga po dag dang sbyar bar bya'o // / +de ltar skye BA ZHES BYA BA NI gang su yang rung ba zhig byung na 'jig rten du zhes  gsungs pa'o // /

column3: dag pa zhes  bya ba ni dag pa rnam pa gnyis te / / +'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste / / +rnam par gnon pa dang bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms pa bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pas dag pa dang  'phags pa'i lam gyis dag pa'i phyir re zhig pa dang gtan    du ba'o ;; /
column4: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#231712#231712#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2254# so so ba la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa lnga'i mtshan nyid snga ma la brten nas bsdus pa dang  so so ba bdun bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384564#2384564#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8789;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8790# 'di ltar 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs pas gong mar mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni nga rgyal mchog tu gyur pa'i bsam gtan dang  theg pa mchog tu gyur pa'i bsam gtan dang  lta ba mchog  tu gyur pa'i bsam gtan zhes 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#915672#915673#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3198;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3199# de ni don mtshan zhes bya ba la / / +gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid lnga po de ni don dam pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392746#2392746#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9703;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9704# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched na ni shin tu phra ba'i dmigs pa'i rnam par rig pas shin tu phra bas dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa    las kyang gong du bstan pa'i mtshan ma lnga po dag bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#464604#464604#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1995;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1996# tha snyad la bde bar bya ba dang  'jig rten pa dang mthun par bya ba dang  sems can gyi dngos    po rnam pa thams cad kyis med do snyam pa'i skrag pa bsal ba dang  bdag dang pha rol la tha snyad kyis yon tan dang ldan pa dang  skyon dang ldan par yid ches pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang  chos mngon pa las kyang 'di dang mthun  par bshad de / /

column3: 'di la yang slu ba ni snga ma bzhin no // / +der yang bdud gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis 'joms so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264796#264809#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6428;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6429# de ltar rnam pa lnga po dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i spyi'i mjug bsdu ba'o // / +rigs kyi bu de lta na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lung gi tshad ma'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid lnga po dag gis yongs su dag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa tshad ma gsum las brtsams nas mtshan nyid  snga ma lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264887#264892#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6439;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6440;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6437;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6438# de ltar na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni / / +mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  dpe'i phyir dang  yongs su grags pa'i phyir dang  lung gi  tshad ma'i phyir mtshan nyid lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column6: 0.009#TD4069E.TXT.r#664727#664728#TD4069E.TXT.r_5903;TD4069E.TXT.r_5904# 'o na de lta na ni gzugs mang po las gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du bstan pa ni 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar byas pas 'brel par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir  yin zhe na / /
column7: 0.009#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603089#2603090#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8395;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8396# dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba kho na'i phyir spel bar byed kyi de dag la yang yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir nyon  mongs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ni MA YIN NO // / +yang ji ltar na nyon mongs pas 'jigs pas yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir spel bar byed ce na / /
column8: 0.011#TD4009E.TXT.r#340989#340989#TD4009E.TXT.r_2757;TD4009E.TXT.r_2758# sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column9: 0.011#TD4009E.TXT.r#341150#341153#TD4009E.TXT.r_2779;TD4009E.TXT.r_2780;TD4009E.TXT.r_2781# 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'gag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column10: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235248#235249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2723# sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i  phyir ro // /
column11: 0.011#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134732#2134732#TD4029E.TXT.r_1864;TD4029E.TXT.r_1865# chos dang chos can dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro // / +de nyid kyi phyir mjug thogs su bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pas de rnyed par rig par bya'o zhes bshad do gnyis mi dmigs pas rnyed pa  las ji skad bshad pa ltar gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sngar phyir nang gi dmigs pa gnyis po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rnyed pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de gnyis nyid mi dmigs pa las rig pa bya'o zhes gnyi ga'i dmigs pa rnyed pa lta bu bshad pa yin te / /
column12: 0.011#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096155#3096155#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_610# ji ltar ming rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rgyu mtshan la de'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang  rgyu mtshan gcig la yang nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang  sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas /// /
column13: 0.011#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201119#2201119#TD4046E.TXT.r_710;TD4046E.TXT.r_711# de la nyes pa dang bcas pa ni kha na ma tho ba skye ba'i phyir ro // / +'gal ba dang bcas pa  ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.011#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155760#1155762#TD4047E.TXT.r_5094;TD4047E.TXT.r_5095;TD4047E.TXT.r_5096# rang bzhin gyis brling ba ni rab tu dang ba'i shugs kyis kun du bskyed pa'i phyir brling ba'o // / +rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i    sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir gsal ba'o // /
column15: 0.011#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162313#1162313#TD4047E.TXT.r_6047;TD4047E.TXT.r_6048;TD4047E.TXT.r_6049# gang gi tshe mngon par mtho ba las brtsams nas chos ston par byed pa'i tshe sbyin pa dang  tshul  khrims dang  mtho ris kyi gtam byed pa'o zhes bya ba'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'jug sla zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column16: 0.011#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847926#2847926#TD4052E.TXT.r_771;TD4052E.TXT.r_772# rnam pa gcig tu na thos  pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba dang  skyes nas thob pa'i shes pa dag gis mngon sum du ma byas pa'i phyir zab pa'o // / +'jig rten pa'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir phra ba'o // /
column17: 0.011#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530640#1530640#TD4061E.TXT.r_2466# gzhan yang rtag tu bsgom pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  bar chad med par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  chog mi shes par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.011#TD4069E.TXT.r#632114#632114#TD4069E.TXT.r_1331# lhag mthong la zhugs pa'i ni rnam par ma zhig pa dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ni rnam par ma zhi ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column19: 0.011#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078526#1078526#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4380# bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang  bde ba'i snying pos skyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column20: 0.011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2035520#2035521#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8316;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8317# so so'i skye bo'i rgyud la yod pa ni thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor  ba na 'dris pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob pa'o // / +'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa ni ma 'dris pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'o // /
column21: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#970574#970574#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10293# chos kyi sbyin pa chen po ston pa rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba dang don gcig tu sbyar ba'i phyir / / +de la dang pos ni mang du thos pa'i phyir gsal bar ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la / /
column22: 0.012#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2002687#2002688#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3554;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3555# 'ga' yang 'jam por rjes su 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro // / +chags par bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas brnab sems kun du spyod pa med do // /
column23: 0.013#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#862231#862232#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15521# srid pa bar ma zhes  bya ba 'di ci zhe na zhes bya ba la 'di log par rtogs pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid ma bstan pa'i phyir the tshom za bas dris pa'o // /
column24: 0.013#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2550998#2550998#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1881;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1882# chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya bar chos kyi ngo bo nyid mngon par shes pa'i phyir ro // / +gya gyu'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gya gyu'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir te / /
column25: 0.013#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2610327#2610330#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9246;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9247;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9248;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9249# lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am / / +phyir mi 'ong ba'i  'bras bu'o // / +mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams gzhi med pa'i phyir te / /
column26: 0.013#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529127#1529127#TD4061E.TXT.r_2281;TD4061E.TXT.r_2282# rnam  pa gcig tu na sdug bsngal gyi phung po can gyi mdo dang bo las 'dod pa rnams dang gzugs rnams GSUNGS PA BZHIN NO // / +yid byung bar bya ba'i phyir dang  'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir dang  'gog par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i  phyir dang  kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir dang  'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir te go rims bzhin no // /
column27: 0.015#TD4019E.TXT.r#2409560#2409561#TD4019E.TXT.r_274;TD4019E.TXT.r_275# tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pas de lta bur snang ba'i skal ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pas so // /
column28: 0.016#TD4091E.TXT.r#726024#726024#TD4091E.TXT.r_5700;TD4091E.TXT.r_5701# brnab sems dang log lta ldan pas so // / +chags par bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i  phyir ba dang  las mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas ni med do // /
column29: 0.018#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1630290#1630290#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5865# de ltar na yan lag thams cad kyang rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir gnyi gar 'grub par 'gyur ro // /
column30: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1124486#1124486#TD4047E.TXT.r_447;TD4047E.TXT.r_448;TD4047E.TXT.r_449# bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir / / +sems can la dga' BA YIN NO // / +rnam pa bcus ji ltar rigs par sems can la sogs pa'i yul la yang dag par sgrub par byed pas 'jug pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtags bstan pa'i phyir / /
column31: 0.020#TD4054E.TXT.r#1031487#1031488#TD4054E.TXT.r_6652# ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad par sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa'o // /
column32: 0.020#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2610637#2610637#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9295# de bas na 'phags pa la nges par mi rtog pa'i sgo nas bdag tu lta ba  la sogs pa 'byung bar mi rung bas yongs su nyams pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pas yongs su nyams pa med do // /
column33: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311777#2311778#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_112# kha cig na re 'di ni bskal ba grangs med pa gnyis par gtogs pas rab tu dga' ba'i nye ba'i sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ji ltar mi lcogs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bsam gtan dang por gtogs pa lta bu'o zhe'o / /
column34: 0.022#TD4010E.TXT.r#2278756#2278756#TD4010E.TXT.r_6142# chos bdag med pas rab tu bsgos pa'i phyir dang  thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o // /
column35: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349635#2349636#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4467# rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pas bsgrub pa'i  rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa ste / /
column36: 0.022#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2790909#2790914#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12474;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12475# rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pas bsgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pas  rab tu shes pa'o // /
column37: 0.022#TD4079E.TXT.r#761601#761601#TD4079E.TXT.r_877;TD4079E.TXT.r_878# shes pa'i bdag nyid yin yang gcig dang du ma nyid dang bral ba'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'i phyir dang  bag chags kyis bcom pa'i sgras kyang bag chags kyis nyams pa las skyes pa'i 'khrul pa'i mtshan mar gsungs pa'i  phyir ro // / +'o na brdzun pa de ji ltar der snang bar 'gyur zhe na / /
column38: 0.022#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2623445#2623445#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10817# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kun nas slong bar byed pa'i nyon mongs pa'i 'thob pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir chos shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul khrims kyi rten 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na yin na / /
column39: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1222784#1222784#TD4047E.TXT.r_14401;TD4047E.TXT.r_14402# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas tha ma las sa'i le'u ste gsum pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so //// / +de ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i  sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir / /
column40: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1332812#1332812#TD4037E.TXT.r_2327# sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes pa sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column41: 0.023#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2625944#2625945#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11139;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_11140# de med pa'i phyir ro // / +sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa med pa'i shes pa bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa dang  bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang  mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa de lta bu ni 'thob po // /
column42: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#152883#152883#TD4035E.TXT.r_4888;TD4035E.TXT.r_4889# brnyas shing nyan pa na ston pas na dus ma yin pa'o // / +snga ma dang phyi ma'i don 'brel pa med pas  na ma 'brel pa'o // /
column43: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2734997#2734998#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5012# 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ril po'i 'du shes rab tu bshig par byas par 'gyur ba dang  yod cing med pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la  bden pa dang gnas pa las gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang  bdag nyid kyang som nyi med cing the tshom med par 'gyur ba dang  gzhan dag gis dri ba dris na'ang ma dad pa rnams dad par bya zhing dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang  bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir legs pa kho nar lan 'debs pas  lan ldan par 'gyur ba dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rig pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang  brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang rang bzhin dang skyes bu dag gi byed pa po med pa nyid dang lus med pa nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang bdag gi shes rab kyi dbang po rgyas shing 'phel la  yangs par 'gyur zhing dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang  rgyas par rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu rnam par dbye ba dang bcas pa'i bar dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par 'gyur ba dang  dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang rgyas par rten cing 'brel bar     // /

column3: nges 'byung theg pa chen po la // / +zhes bya ba ni stobs lhag ma'i las ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264897#264900#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6440# mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  dpe'i phyir dang  yongs su grags pa'i phyir dang  lung gi  tshad ma'i phyir mtshan nyid lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.013#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#862230#862232#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15521# srid pa bar ma zhes  bya ba 'di ci zhe na zhes bya ba la 'di log par rtogs pa'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid ma bstan pa'i phyir the tshom za bas dris pa'o // /
column6: 0.014#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2725357#2725357#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3437;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3438# dgongs pa ni gzugs dang yongs su gyo ba dang  sems las byung ba rnams kyi gnas gtso cher bstan pa yin par blta bar bya'o // / +de dang 'gal bas gnyen po'i lung yang dmigs pa'i phyir te / /
column7: 0.014#TD4053E.TXT.r#2983425#2983427#TD4053E.TXT.r_2560;TD4053E.TXT.r_2561# de dag gis sems kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bsam gtan gyi sgo nas gzugs dang gzugs med  na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsgribs pa'i lung du mi ston par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.014#TD4054E.TXT.r#1050315#1050316#TD4054E.TXT.r_9342;TD4054E.TXT.r_9343# rnam par thams cad du 'gal ba med cing 'khrul ba med pa ste / / +yid ches par byed pa'i  lung de ni yid ches par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.015#TD4010E.TXT.r#2278756#2278756#TD4010E.TXT.r_6142# chos bdag med pas rab tu bsgos pa'i phyir dang  thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o // /
column10: 0.016#TD4052E.TXT.r#2850518#2850518#TD4052E.TXT.r_1116# thogs pa med pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lung gis gnod pa'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.023#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2050288#2050288#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10451;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_10452# dbang po rno ba'i phyir na mi gyo ba ste / / +'di gyo bar mi nus pa'i  phyir mi gyo ba'i chos can no // /

column21: 0.026#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847926#2847926#TD4052E.TXT.r_771;TD4052E.TXT.r_772# rnam pa gcig tu na thos  pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba dang  skyes nas thob pa'i shes pa dag gis mngon sum du ma byas pa'i phyir zab pa'o // / +'jig rten pa'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir phra ba'o // /
column22: 0.026#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530640#1530640#TD4061E.TXT.r_2466# gzhan yang rtag tu bsgom pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  bar chad med par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  chog mi shes par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /
column23: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#632114#632114#TD4069E.TXT.r_1331# lhag mthong la zhugs pa'i ni rnam par ma zhig pa dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ni rnam par ma zhi ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column24: 0.026#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078526#1078526#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4380# bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang  bde ba'i snying pos skyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column25: 0.027#TD4051E.TXT.r#1247977#1247977#TD4051E.TXT.r_2174# rigs pa 'di nyid kyis med pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yod pa'i phyir med pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid pas gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column26: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#662789#662789#TD4069E.TXT.r_5645# grib ma 'khor ba'i phyir dang  che ba'i phyir dang  chung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.029#TD4022E.TXT.r#398497#398497#TD4022E.TXT.r_88;TD4022E.TXT.r_89# rten med pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so zhes ji ltar mdo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid de  gsal bar bstan pa yin no // / +snang ba'i phyir ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor lhar chos thams cad mthong ba'i phyir dang  sgyu ma la sogs pa ltar 'du byed thams cad mthong ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: sangs rgyas nyid du nges par  'byung bar bya ba'i phyir theg pa chen po ston pa na slu ba'i phyir bdud nye bar 'dug ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264810#264823#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6429;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6430# rigs kyi bu de lta na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lung gi tshad ma'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid lnga po dag gis yongs su dag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa tshad ma gsum las brtsams nas mtshan nyid  snga ma lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa'o // /

column3: bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rnyed par dka' bas / / +nyan thos nyid du nges par 'byung yang bla'o zhes zer pa de la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264822#264834#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6429;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6430# rigs kyi bu de lta na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lung gi tshad ma'i phyir dang  mtshan nyid lnga po dag gis yongs su dag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa tshad ma gsum las brtsams nas mtshan nyid  snga ma lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa'o // / +'di ltar bstan pa'i 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa las mtshan nyid lngar bstan pa de yang tshad ma gsum gyis bsdus pa yin te / /
column5: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1181471#1181471#TD4047E.TXT.r_8687# sa bcu la legs par zhugs par gyur pa'i rtogs pa'i khyad par thob par gyur pa'i chos bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid  can shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1319765#1319766#TD4037E.TXT.r_541# kha na ma tho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tshe 'di pa dang  tshe gzhan pa dang  zhi bar  byed pa'o // /
column7: 0.022#TD4013E.TXT.r#613425#613425#TD4013E.TXT.r_417# de ltar na bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir thabs kyi khyad par pha rol mi dpogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyod pas  'thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'di ni dad pas bskyed pa'i sems kyis thos pa'i tshe yang sems kyi rgyun rnam par dag par byed na rtag tu byed pas nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bsgrub pas lta smos kyang ci dgos / /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522645#522645#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9516# yul tha dad pa drug po dag la rags par  gyo ba dang  bar du chod pa'i rnam par rig pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1218168#1218170#TD4047E.TXT.r_13743;TD4047E.TXT.r_13744# de nyid ni byis pa'i skye bos btags pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o // /
column10: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1032808#1032809#TD4054E.TXT.r_6857;TD4054E.TXT.r_6858# 'di gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na / /
column11: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1031487#1031488#TD4054E.TXT.r_6652# ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad par sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa'o // /
column12: 0.023#TD4053E.TXT.r#2966312#2966312#TD4053E.TXT.r_239;TD4053E.TXT.r_240# bdag gzugs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas  bdag rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i bar du lhag ma bco lnga ni bdag gir lta ba'o // / +'brel bas bdag gir gyur ba ni 'di ltar de de dang 'brel bas de dang ldan par 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.024#TD4019E.TXT.r#2459346#2459346#TD4019E.TXT.r_6865# dmigs pa'i rkyen ni rang snang ba'i yan lag dang  skyed bar byed pa'i yan lag gnyis  dang ldan pa shes pa'i rnam par 'jog par byed pa'o 'dir mtshan nyid ni shes pa'i rnam par 'jog pa'o zhes byed pas nye bar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid du sbyar kyang 'gal ba med de / /
column14: 0.024#TD4026E.TXT.r#277017#277017#TD4026E.TXT.r_367;TD4026E.TXT.r_368;TD4026E.TXT.r_369# de'i yon tan gyi khyad par shes pa nyid kyis rab tu dga' ba mang ba'i phyir ro // / +sgrub pa'i khyad par ni / / +'di ltar skyo ba med par dka' ba spyod pa'o // /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349635#2349636#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4467# rigs pa bzhi po ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pas bsgrub pa'i  rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pa ste / /
column16: 0.025#TD4053E.TXT.r#2989058#2989059#TD4053E.TXT.r_3299;TD4053E.TXT.r_3300# 'di gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang zhe na / /
column17: 0.025#TD4032E.TXT.r#1961716#1961716#TD4032E.TXT.r_6563;TD4032E.TXT.r_6564;TD4032E.TXT.r_6565# gnyis pa ni sgrub pa'i dmigs pa'o // / +lnga pa ni 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa ste / / +thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'i dmigs pa'o // /
column18: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#511148#511148#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8065# rtogs par dka' ba mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las YANG DAG PAR 'DAS PA'I don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /
column19: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3107282#3107282#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2190# ngas  ni don dam pa rtog ge thams CAD LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS PA'I mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /
column20: 0.025#TD4053E.TXT.r#2982593#2982593#TD4053E.TXT.r_2454# zhi ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal  nyid kyis ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams dang bral ba'i dbang du byas pa'o // /
column21: 0.025#TD4018E.TXT.r#3089336#3089336#TD4018E.TXT.r_11061# de'i phyir de ltar rang gi sems gzugs su snang ba la mtshan nyid rnams kyi sra ba dang gsher  ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid du de ltar mngon par chags pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams la mngon par chags par mi byed de / /
column22: 0.026#TD4054E.TXT.r#1025186#1025186#TD4054E.TXT.r_5657# 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid la byed pas so sor rtogs pa ni dpyod pa'i yid la byed pa'o // /
column23: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#184987#184988#TD4035E.TXT.r_10299# dper na legs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu mi sdug par 'gyur ba dang   nyes par spyod pa'i sdug bar 'gyur ba dang  nyes par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la log par bsgrubs pas rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang  legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la yang dag par bsgrubs pas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur bar rnam par 'jog pa dang   gdags par smra bas yongs su ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid la / /
column24: 0.027#TD4049E.TXT.r#2287877#2287877#TD4049E.TXT.r_63;TD4049E.TXT.r_64;TD4049E.TXT.r_65# sems kyi mngon par 'du byed pa'i ngo bo gang gis dge ba dang  mi dge ba dang  lung du ma bstan pa dang  gnas skabs sna  tshogs rnams su sems 'jug par byed pa'o // / +rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na / / +rnam par shes par byed pa'i mtshan nyid de / /
column25: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3122066#3122066#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4302;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4303# de ltar na 'byung ba dang  mtshan dang  the tshom gcod pa dang  brgal du med cing brtsad du med pa dang  dge sbyong dmigs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid lngar rig par bya'o // / +de ltar na 'thad pas bsgrub pa'i rigs pa de ni mngon  sum gyi tshad ma dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma dang  yid ches pa'i lung gi tshad mas mtshan nyid lnga po dag gis yongs su dag pa yin no // /
column26: 0.028#TD4022E.TXT.r#398497#398497#TD4022E.TXT.r_88;TD4022E.TXT.r_89# rten med pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so zhes ji ltar mdo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid de  gsal bar bstan pa yin no // / +snang ba'i phyir ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor lhar chos thams cad mthong ba'i phyir dang  sgyu ma la sogs pa ltar 'du byed thams cad mthong ba'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.029#TD4027E.TXT.r#560794#560794#TD4027E.TXT.r_1552;TD4027E.TXT.r_1553# chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs pas pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams khong du chud pa'i phyir ro // / +lnga pa ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'i dmigs pa'o // /
column28: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2717769#2717769#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2065;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2066# de la rgyas pa las byung ba ni rnam pa gnyis te yul la khyab pa'i rgyas pa las byung ba dang  mtshan nyid brtas par byed pa'i rgyas pa las byung ba'o // / +de la rgyas pa las byung ba dang po ni gzugs can zas dang gnyid dang tshangs     // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyi stobs rnam pa bdun gyis 'joms so // / +mi  'jigs ba rnams rnam par 'byed pa ni bstod pa'i sgo nas / /

column5: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390449#2390450#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9442;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9443;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9444# bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad  pa chen po las kyang don rnam pa gnyis kyis ston pas dang po mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa ni zas ma tshos pa lta bu'o zhes bshad de / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las / / +gzhan yang mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pas ni sems can rnams ngan 'gro rnams su     // /

column5: 0.009#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603089#2603090#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8395;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8396# dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang mar skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang  mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba kho na'i phyir spel bar byed kyi de dag la yang yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir nyon  mongs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // / +yang ji ltar na nyon mongs pas 'jigs pas yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir spel bar byed ce na / /
column6: 0.011#TD4009E.TXT.r#340989#340989#TD4009E.TXT.r_2757;TD4009E.TXT.r_2758# sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /

column8: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235249#235249#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2723# sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang  sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i  phyir ro // /
column9: 0.011#TD4029E.TXT.r#2134732#2134732#TD4029E.TXT.r_1864;TD4029E.TXT.r_1865# chos dang chos can dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro // / +de nyid kyi phyir mjug thogs su bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pas de rnyed par rig par bya'o zhes bshad do gnyis mi dmigs pas rnyed pa  las ji skad bshad pa ltar gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir RO ZHES BYA BA NI sngar phyir nang gi dmigs pa gnyis po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rnyed pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de gnyis nyid mi dmigs pa las rig pa bya'o zhes gnyi ga'i dmigs pa rnyed pa lta bu bshad pa yin te / /
column10: 0.011#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3096155#3096155#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_610# ji ltar ming rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du rgyu mtshan la de'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang  rgyu mtshan gcig la yang nye bar 'dogs pa mang ba'i phyir dang  sna tshogs pa'i phyir bdag nyid mang po 'thob par 'gyur bas /// /
column11: 0.011#TD4046E.TXT.r#2201119#2201119#TD4046E.TXT.r_710;TD4046E.TXT.r_711# de la nyes pa dang bcas pa ni kha na ma tho ba skye ba'i phyir ro // / +'gal ba dang bcas pa  ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // /
column12: 0.011#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155762#1155762#TD4047E.TXT.r_5095;TD4047E.TXT.r_5096# rtag tu byed pa dang  gus par byed pa'i    sbyor ba las skyes pa'i phyir gsal ba'o // / +yang bsam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir brling ba'o // /
column13: 0.011#TD4047E.TXT.r#1162313#1162313#TD4047E.TXT.r_6047;TD4047E.TXT.r_6048;TD4047E.TXT.r_6049# gang gi tshe mngon par mtho ba las brtsams nas chos ston par byed pa'i tshe sbyin pa dang  tshul  khrims dang  mtho ris kyi gtam BYED PA'O ZHES BYA BA'O // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa'o // / +rnam par ma 'khrugs pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'jug sla zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column14: 0.011#TD4052E.TXT.r#2847926#2847926#TD4052E.TXT.r_771;TD4052E.TXT.r_772# rnam pa gcig tu na thos  pa las byung ba dang bsams pa las byung ba dang  skyes nas thob pa'i shes pa dag gis mngon sum du ma byas pa'i phyir zab pa'o // / +'jig rten pa'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir phra ba'o // /
column15: 0.011#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530640#1530640#TD4061E.TXT.r_2466# gzhan yang rtag tu bsgom pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  bar chad med par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  chog mi shes par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /
column16: 0.011#TD4069E.TXT.r#632114#632114#TD4069E.TXT.r_1331# lhag mthong la zhugs pa'i ni rnam par ma zhig pa dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ni rnam par ma zhi ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.011#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1078526#1078526#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4380# bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang  bde ba'i snying pos skyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column18: 0.011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2035520#2035521#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8316;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8317# so so'i skye bo'i rgyud la yod pa ni thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor  ba na 'dris pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob pa'o // / +'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa ni ma 'dris pa'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'o // /
column19: 0.012#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#970574#970574#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10293# chos kyi sbyin pa chen po ston pa rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba dang don gcig tu sbyar ba'i phyir / / +de la dang pos ni mang du thos pa'i phyir gsal bar ston par 'gyur RO ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column20: 0.012#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2002687#2002688#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3554;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_3555# 'ga' yang 'jam por rjes su 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro // / +chags par bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas brnab sems kun du spyod pa med do // /
column21: 0.013#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2550998#2550998#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1881;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1882# chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya bar chos kyi ngo bo nyid mngon par shes pa'i phyir ro // / +gya gyu'i rgyu las byung ba'i PHYIR ZHES BYA BA NI GYA gyu'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir te / /
column22: 0.013#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2610329#2610330#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9247;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9248;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9249# phyir mi 'ong ba'i  'bras bu'o // / +mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams gzhi med pa'i phyir te / /
column23: 0.013#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529127#1529127#TD4061E.TXT.r_2281;TD4061E.TXT.r_2282# rnam  pa gcig tu na sdug bsngal gyi phung po can gyi mdo dang bo las 'dod pa rnams dang gzugs rnams gsungs pa bzhin no // / +yid byung bar bya ba'i phyir dang  'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir dang  'gog par 'gyur bar bya ba'i PHYIR ZHES BYA BA NI SDUG bsngal nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i  phyir dang  kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir dang  'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir te go rims bzhin no // /
column24: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1201191#1201191#TD4047E.TXT.r_11321;TD4047E.TXT.r_11322# cig shos ni sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i phyir zhi bar rig par bya ba'o // / +de ltar na rgyu dang bcas pa'i skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas  zhi ba nyid du gsungs pa yin no // /
column25: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2481739#2481739#TD4019E.TXT.r_9701;TD4019E.TXT.r_9702# dngos po yang dag pa'i rgyu las byung ba nyid du kun brtags pas mi bden pa'i don blo yis gzhag pa'i phyir kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin nyid snang ba'o // / +de ltar na dngos po'i mtshan nyid la lta bar lhung bas phyin ci log pa'i blo     // /
column26: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#704635#704635#TD4091E.TXT.r_1862;TD4091E.TXT.r_1863# 'di ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral nas / / +skyon med par 'jug pa'i phyir sa 'og ma pa'i spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o // /
column27: 0.028#TD4071E.TXT.r#403144#403144#TD4071E.TXT.r_595;TD4071E.TXT.r_596# khungs med pa'i phyir ro // / +de bas na gnyi gar nges par mi gzung bar thal bar 'gyur BAS ZHES BYA BA NI / /
column28: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2737495#2737495#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5290;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5291# de ltar na de ni  nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rnam par byang ba'i rab tu dbye ba yin no // / +de la nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i log par bsgrub pa dang spang bar bya ba'i rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na / /
column29: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1222163#1222163#TD4047E.TXT.r_14310;TD4047E.TXT.r_14311# nges par bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i phyir so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis brtan par gzhag par bya'o // /
column30: 0.029#TD4069E.TXT.r#634934#634936#TD4069E.TXT.r_1722;TD4069E.TXT.r_1723# the tshom dang ldan pa'i phyir mi gsal ba'o // / +log pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi mkhas pa'o // /
column31: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#978273#978273#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11265;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11266# de bas na ji ltar btsal ba'i chos gzhan la phan  par bya ba'i chos bshad par bya'o // / +bdag la phan par bya ba'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya ste / /
column32: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3125681#3125681#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4738# des kyang de byed la mi  byed na yang log pa'i chos yongs su bsngo bas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column33: 0.029#TD4036E.TXT.r#5661#5661#TD4036E.TXT.r_732;TD4036E.TXT.r_733;TD4036E.TXT.r_734# ma nyams par byed par dang  skyon med par byed pa yin te / / +de ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan par gnas pa yin no // / +ji ltar na so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na / /
column34: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#871932#871932#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17038;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_17039# nye bar bsgyur ba'i dbang gis skad kyi byings kyi don yongs su bsgyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de ltar na byung ba ni rab tu skye ba'o zhes bya bar bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column35: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1332810#1332811#TD4037E.TXT.r_2327# sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang  bzo dang las kyi gnas shes pa sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i phyir ro // /
column36: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520792#520792#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9254;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9255;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9256# bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i  phyir bdag ma yin pa'o // / +gzhan yang de nyid las / / +bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po'i phyir stong pa'i rnam bsgom mo // /
column37: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2942394#2942394#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10242;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10243# 'dod chags can la mi gtsang ba'i chos bstan pa dang  zhe sdang can la byams pa'i chos bstan pa la  sogs pa gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis bstan cing bshad pa yang dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro // / +de la smin par bya ba'i dngos po dang  smin par rung ba'i dngos po gnyis la khyad par ci yod ce na / /
column38: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#938819#938819#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6302;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6303# sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa ni snying rje chen po'o // / +de ltar mnyam pa nyid kyi  ye shes byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa'i phyir / /
column39: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1124486#1124486#TD4047E.TXT.r_447;TD4047E.TXT.r_448;TD4047E.TXT.r_449# bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir / / +sems can la dga' ba yin no // / +rnam pa bcus ji ltar rigs par sems can la sogs pa'i yul la yang dag par sgrub par byed pas 'jug pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtags bstan pa'i phyir / /
column40: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#825973#825973#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9884;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9885# lta ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang  'phags pa'i lam dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // / +des na rnam par ltung ba'i gnas lta bur gzigs pas snyoms par mi 'jug go // /

column3: 'di gnyis ni gzhan gyi dbang las brtsams pa ste / / +de'i phyir / /
bdag gzhan don la bu stegs gzhan // / +mi tshugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264901#264909#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6440;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442# mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  dpe'i phyir dang  yongs su grags pa'i phyir dang  lung gi  tshad ma'i phyir mtshan nyid lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230479#230480#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2122;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2123# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten gyi 'du 'dzi mang po dngos po la brten pa zhes 'byung ste / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang de skad du bstan to // /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258664#258664#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5575# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / / +rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ces 'byung / /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2333293#2333293#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2651;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2652# theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ched du gsungs pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las     // /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544116#544116#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12298# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni tshig lnga 'byung ste / /

column3: zhes bya ba smos te / / +'jigs pa med cing mi tshugs pa'i phyir 'jigs pa dang  bral bar ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264910#264918#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6441;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang de skad du ston to // / +de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa  bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to // /

column3: bsrung ba med pa dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par 'byed pas bstod pa'i tshigs su bcud pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264919#264926#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa  bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to // /

column3: 'khor du tshar bcad gsung mdzad pa / / +zhes bya ba ni bsrung ba med pa rnams ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361724#2361727#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5946;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5947;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5948# de dag bsdus pa las so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lnga pa 'dris pa rnam par bshad pa bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2388446#2388449#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9185;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9186# bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la brten nas nan tan du bsgrub pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang  dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis byang chub thob par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237281#237282#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2973;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2974# ci'i slad du 'jig rten na sems can dbul bo dag gda' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu drug pa sems can gyi rigs kyi las kyi nyes pa yod par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244133#244135#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3860;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3861;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3862# bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa dang  skyon dang yon tan rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253706#253712#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4967;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4968# dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste  bshad pa bstan te / / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264927#264936#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6442;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6443;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6444# de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa  bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272667#272671#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7385;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7386;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7387# nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus la ni dngos  po 'di dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku dang  theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column11: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361673#2361676#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5942;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5943# de dag so so las yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa ma  'dres par rnam par bshad pa bston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol pa'o // /
column12: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380777#2380779#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8355;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8356;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8357# bcom ldan 'das zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis las gang dag bgyid lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong gi las ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba    gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column13: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220345#220346#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_793;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_794# 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column14: 5.960#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#239835#239837#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3317;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3318;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3319# 'di ni dang po'i bag la nyal gyi rnam pa'i grangs mang nyung rab tu dbye ba'o // / +'di yang zhu ba  gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column15: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#236484#236485#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2884;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2885# 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs par ston te / /
column16: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253420#253422#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4929;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4930# dngos po gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa dngos po dgu phye ste bshad par ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan du gsungs pas 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do // /
column17: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402927#2402927#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10945;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10946# ci'i slad du  sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar la sangs rgyas kyi sa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa'i ming gi don bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te / /
column18: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222898#222899#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1166# bcom ldan 'das  bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni  mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o // /
column19: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226466#226466#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1607;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1608# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan gsungs pas bstan te / /
